column3: comment

Room was small and no wardrobe or cabinet or even an arrangement to place the suitcase! We had to place the suitcases on the floor. An upgrade at additional cost was agreed upon for 2 out of 4 days' stay, but they did not provide. There are hundreds of Rooms in Pattaya facing the sea, so if you are paying through your noses, do not take the City View rooms. Not worth it!
Air-conditioning in the room was not cool enough. Shower did not have any pressure. Was just a fad better than a trickle.
Refrigerator in the Room was useless. A Bucket of Ice Cream simply melted overnight. We had to trash it.
Food was generally OK but the In Room Dining was much better with the Chef agreeing to provide out of the Menu.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
We stayed here during the Songkran holidays.  The hotel was quite crowded.  
Our room was very spacious and clean.  The room cleaning service was quite late due to the many rooms to clean.
Nevertheless, the employees here are always friendly and helpful.
The swimming area is huge and there are always different activities going on.  Very lively area.

This Hotel Pattaya Hotel, so I feel very comfortable! From the hotel to the reception room service, the attitude is very good, next to Pattaya tourism, will still continue to choose the hard rock hotel!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Great hotel location is awesome and the pool area is second to none. Rooms were surprisingly quiet and the staff was very helpful. Played in a golf tournament and the event dinner was at the hotel and it was all done very well.

Great location close to many shops and eateries.
Everything for a family is available in the resort.
Service friendly, helpful.
Room was a bit smaller than expected, but had a small balcony.
Pool area perfect for kids and families.

This was the second time I'd stayed at the Hard Rock. All things considered, it is a good hotel for holiday and business travellers alike. Located at the quieter end of Beach Road, it is within a 20 minute walk from the lively end of Pattaya and is nice and quiet.
The reception area is quite large with an abundance of seating, and both check-in and departure were without fuss. I stayed in a Club Executive room and was able to use the lounge on that floor which served complimentary drinks and snacks. It proved to be a very good venue to hold an informal business discussion away from the crowds.
Food was good enough without being exceptional. There is a Hard Rock Cafe on the ground floor which faces onto Beach Road.
The swimming pool is quite big and has a fair amount of room for sunbathing although the beach is literally across the road.
My bedroom was a reasonable size with a large bed and I had a good view of the sea.
Overall, I would say this place is pretty good value for money.

Stayed at Hard Rock Hotel for the first time and the first time to Pattaya. The week we were there, there was a Pattaya Seafood Festival along the beach across Hard Rock Hotel. It was awesome as food is everywhere!
This hotel is fully recommended for its’ professional service rendered by the staff, amazing in-house pool, coolest souvenir shops, The Rock Shop, and not to mention the Rock Spa. Everything was value for money.
Easy access to the beach and surrounding bars and malls! Definitely will come back again!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: one problem,,,,,,before  was   super   all room balcony ,,,we falang love balcony ,,,just look around  now    all big hotel have  many room balcony ,,, but hard rock  owners  decided  to go    with less balcony ,,its  too  bad ,
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Everything from initial welcome, to final goodbye was as good as anywhere i have stayed.
Pool area, spa area, and bar were excellent
Great value 
I need to put another few lines in, but i cant really add to the above

This was my second time.stayed for 4 nights. amazing hotel. close to everything. ac in my room 1035 did not work but the staff was good enough to change the room immediately to 935 within minutes. the receptionist GIFT is extremely helpful and nice. the hard rock cafe in the hotel premises is perfect as it is so hot to walk out these days. at the cafe food is really good and have a choice(salads, steak,burgers) . everyone at the hotel is helpful. nice pool. overall great hotel and will definitely go back.

It was a great experience after all but your Housekeeping staff need to be improved! Teach them a basic courtesy to knock and wait before entering immediately. The live band at cafe was great but the singing was not so...
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I have stayed in Hard Rock, Chicago, and felt a little claustrophobic. No such problems of space here. It's well-sprawled out, standing out majestically overlooking the Gulf of Thailand. Check-in staff - like everyone else, everywhere else in Thailand - are polite. But the process takes time.A Very large amount of time. In contrast out Marriott check-in in Bangkok took under 10 min. The rooms are good, clean, comfortable, though you'd be disappointed by the tv offerings. One good thing is that there is a good CD/USB player in each room, and the set rocks. The pool is huge, the gym good, the steam/sauna facilities nice., and the breakfast, ok (I saw only Pork, pork and more pork all three days for breakfast. No chicken, no fish). The air-conditioning can get a little cranky, and we are told this is because of a renovation going on. Oh yes, they need to definitely find someone better to supply their match sticks. The quality they have sucks.

There was good service. and i felt comfortable and clean~~~~
but hair dryer wasn't in the room so it was not good for me.
but mostly service was good. and maybe next time i will go there again. Thanks
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Kids like foam party. Swimming Pool Staff at the pool care and  friendly
The rooms are clean, the staff clean are smiling. Parking is too small.        
Want to add activity in the pool.         
Room only rates are reasonable 2,700 THB

The staff is very friendly and helpful. The hotel is very good maintained and compared to its age still in a very good shape. Improvements could be done to the TV equipment. The location is excellent and nevertheless very quiet. Very positive for me was that the air condition of the room could even be kept switched off over night. The cooled lobby and floors make it very comfortable and enjoyable when entering the hotel. There's also a good smell in the air.

We recently stayed here as a family of 8 using 4 rooms, we were given sea view even thou we only booked city view so was a nice little extra. We as a family couldn’t fault anything we all loved the place, the pool staff are absolute brilliant and a true credit to hard rock Pattaya. We made some great friends here and hope to see them again when visiting next time. If I could give one suggestion it would be that all rooms have balcony’s but this didn’t ruin my stay at all its just something I personally like to have. Thanks again for a brilliant holiday

Had great stay with big rooms and enjoyable pool
Gym and Steam room are a must 
Had breakfast twice at 350 bht, Has plenty of choices and friendly staff 
Nice location on beach road and has entry on both sides

the reception and wait staff are exceptional!    We enjoyed our stay;  the first time either of us has stayed at a HRH.  love the food and the theme party around the pool was a blast!  
would recommend this hotel to anyone going to Pattaya Thailand.  
the music alone (rock) for breakfast buffet makes it memorable.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Overall travel so-so, and five days, only the first day go to the playground, the next day in the hotel's swimming pool, so too has no meaning, more attractions or island beach project will be better, some members are all in to take off the ball at one's own expenses to go to scenic spots, this will cause the problem of word of mouth company.

Spent a couple of days in Pattaya, staying at the Hard Rock Hotel. I would definetly recommend this hotel for all age groups. The hotel staff are extremely helpful and service is excellant. The rooms are really spacious and cleaned up to scratch everyday. The position of the hotel is very well located with the sea front located  across the road the hotel. There is easy access to taxi and there is a shopping mall just down the road. Thank you Hard Rock for adding that extra something to my holiday.

Great hotel to stay if u want to stay at an extravagant place - the decor & rooms are all thematic and great fun to experience.
Hotel facilities, incl. breakfast, lounges & restaurants and pool are great.
Hotel has direct access to beach.

its a family hotel
they make u feel like stars actually
lovely pool for kids and for adults in foam party only on saturdays for 20+
the staff is amazing...speacial thanks to
the lovely lady ms caroline she was very humble, supportive ,kind and ofcourse beautiful and more over concerned.
the location is perfect of the hotel
if u r with ur family u dont have any other choice... it has to be Hard rock pattya.
my suggestion to hotel is they should be not promoting thiet own tours only.
they should have a travel desk seperately
and i found taxi prices very expensive inside the hotel then just outside the hotel...
onething more hotel should provide or promote meter taxi instead of promoting fix rate taxis...
only travel part was very bad
rest nothing can be improved... its awsome
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The name says it all. The staff is fabulous coupled with the ambience of the lobby, the lounge and the rooms. Your ears are filled with nice rocking music venever you are out. The perfect view of the beach and all those not outgoing types, the huge thematic swimming pool is the icing on the cake. Last but not the least is the gr8 room service and the cuisines offered.

I spent a week in family in this hotel and really appreciated it. The room rate booked via internet was good and we had the surprise to be upgraded when we arrived.
The 9 and 10th floors have a nice view even though not all rooms have a balcony.
It also gives access to a separated breakfast / snack room on the 9th floor which limits a lot the crowd and noise.
The personnel is very helpful and the trattoria is excellent for a reasonable cost (more or less the same as all other restaurant over the beach). The best is the swimming pool which is perfect for kids with one side arranged as a sandy beach with rocks and slides. Super playground for kids.
I want to thank the team for the great support in organizing short trips around sometimes with nearly no plan and also the kindness towards the kids.

The hotel location is fantastic; Close to all the action but far enough away to chill and have fun. We only spent 2 nights in this property over the weekend to escape the hustle and bustle of Bangkok. If travelling with kids this hotel has lots to do with fantastic activities, and great swimming pool for both adults and children. Our daughter particularly enjoyed the Foam Party on Saturday afternoon, and kids performance on Saturday night. Thank you Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya for a fantastic weekend....We Will be Back!!

Our overall stay was fabulous. The pools offered everything we needed to have an enjoyable family getaway. The staff was friendly from the moment we were greeted to the moment we said goodbye. I would recommend this hotel and its facilities to all types of travelers from couples to families.

Pool was modified successful. Fitness room still good. Complete HRH resp. HRC Team very friendly and helpful. Good pool action for kids. Kids pool was modified very well. SPA little bit expensive. Breakfast very good -asian/international style-.

Pro:Quite good experience. Room clean service is good and breakfast is good. Con:But we can hear the noise from the next room. And life buoy near the swimming pool is not free. It's a little surprising.

Nice staffs . 
Room was clean . Swimming pool was attractive .
Dinner and breakfast were all outstanding !

Was not too happy with this hotel the first thing was the man who bought luggage up brought us a map but then told us any tours ring him he organise his friends to take us not too keeen on this i liked destination asia trips booked and no problems with shifty people.
When we first checked in room with balcony do not reccomend room is tiny lights broken had to call down to be fixed we both took a shower the next morning and the bathroom flooded had to be moved to another room without a balcony much bigger room. so if you stay get rrom without balcony was honeymoon only honeymoon thing was a plate of choc dipped strawberries.
There are lots of activities going on for people with kids and a nice pool. 
I got sick after eating in there restaurant (starz diner) only thing i ate for 5 days that hubby didnt have same or try and i got really sick so avoid fish. Condoms in the minbar were a little tacky if you have kids. THe hotel othere than getting sick wasnt too bad supplied umbrellas and it pelted down one day i didnt mind hotel but better value for money elsewhere quite far away from everything. Also i just didnt like pattaya quite dirty walking hand in hand with hubby and massage lady's giving sign for hand job not very nice. But plenty of massage places everywhere plenty of old men with young attractive thai girlfiends if this is waht you want go to pattaya but i wouldnt reccomend staying here hilton looked much nicer and closer to shopping cntres restaurants walking street.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Big room with balcony and view+all the amenities you would expect. The staff is very friendly and helpful, especially reception when you check in. Excellent swimming pool, including one for children. Buffet breakfast has everything you could possibly want. Koobai at the travel desk will answer all your questions and make any bookings you want.
My 4th Hard Rock Hotel and one of the best. You will no be disappointed

This trip is our third time here. Everything still good, all staff are very friendly. Facilities and Room are goods. And very delicious food. Very surprise with fruit in the room for all of rooms that i've booked.

Nothing wrong with the place, clean, central, safe, huge, great pool, top breakfast.
I thought it was expensive though, and I thought that it really had no thai character. Not my cup of tea really. I scored this average because of my taste which prefers everything traditional, which is obviously personal, and because of the high price.

the room is very organised and clean and the food was amazing so was the staff,last time i went was 2014 and i went there before a lot of times. the location is amazing, the sea is right in front of us.

It is a basic hotel with smelly rooms, inhospitable rude staff who doesn't want to help or assist. A dirty, smelly room was given upon checkin, room was changed after putting our foot down but apology extended. If you want to stay for foam party and a nice pool then it's fine otherwise stay away from his motel.

The swimming pool is big and it is good for family who's travelling with kids. The receptionist from taiwan really rock my stay. However, while i was taking a rest in the room, one housekeeping staff came in to my room without ringing the door bell and knock the door.

Hard rock pattaya is still the best in its way. Lots of fun stuffs to do loads of good food to eat. Hard rock cafe’s burgers are second to none. You can rest here, play here, eat here. Makes you feel like a rock star.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
The staffs are very helpful, friendly, and professional. 
The moment one step into the lounge, smiling faces greet you. Sincere smiles.
Throughout the evening they make sure your needs are met and things are okay for you.
Even an hour of stay make one really feel great and relaxed.

We go to hard rock cafè's when ever we can. But this was the first time we had stayed in one of the hotels and really wished we hadnt. Maybe our expectations where unrealistic but the hotel didnt come anywere near what we thought. We only stayed here 1 night but that was more than enough. The lifts were filthy and our room stank like old loft blankets. Musty and stale. Just not nice. Luckly we had reservations elsewhere so didnt chance the food. The sad thing is this place has kinda put us off the hotels. Shame.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Rooms are clean.
Location is quite convenient.
All the staff are helpful.
I love the swimming Pool.
The breakfast are delicious.
Me and my girlfriend had a 
Great experience in spent 2 night in this hotel.
We definitely will come back again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Hotel location is very good near the beach road. Nice pool. Room was clean. Helpful staff. Breakfast was excellent lot of everything (bread, eggs, fruits, juices, ham,cheese... ).There is  restaurant too (very good pizza).

I will be back as soon as possible :-)
Everything is just perfect and the staff is making you feel like a true rockstar...
Pool area is nothing else than fantastic and just a short walk to the beach....

it was amazing for children, parent  and teenagers
If you need to partying and having fun you must come to hard rock pattaya. 
All staff are friendly & always smile. You can join many activities at swimming pool all day.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Good service and musical entertainment. Recomends for people who love to enjoy a moderate noice level. There vas no noice from unexpected visitors. A good security is taken care of the guests wallfare.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Came away for the weekend with a large group from Bangkok and we had the best time. The hotel has plenty to offer so you don't even need to leave if you're here for a short stay. The rooms and lounge access were brilliant, there is a huge swimming pool with plenty of activities going on and the restaurants all serve great food... the breakfast buffet is huge! The staff were fabulous throughout our stay - thank you!

fantastic property, nice location with access to both beach road and 2nd road, great breakfast, spacious and great rooms, best pool side. staff was very friendly and pampered us. we got early check in. most of the rooms have sea views. many international restaurants nearby.
#NAME?

We spent three days and our 4 year old daughter spent most of each day in the pool. The beach/sand area is very good for children learning to swim. We had several meals at the hotel and enjoyed the food.

I have stayed in other hard rock hotels too.
Hard Rock Pataya deserves only 4 star.
Food is nice but breakfast in rock royalty not worth it at all. 
You can book the rock royalty excess room provided you drink alcohol drinks which is provided during the cocktail hours. Breakfast at stars dinner  have slightly better choices but not many.
Coustomer service is ok.... 
In terms of location in pataya hard room is situated in one of best locations. 
Overall i really enjoyed my stay and i am sure to be there for my next visit to Pataya.  Thanks guys.

The first staff who served us carry our luggage into our room and then introduce everything in the room. He was always smiling while standing in front of the main entrance, ready to serve during our visit.  The pool was surely perfect and I spend my morning there everyday.  The location was great as we can assess to most famous attactions easily.  
I will choose this hotel again when I visit Pattaya.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I think that it is good at all, except the pillow is too high, and the room arrangement made me disappointed. I have never thought that  i will got such mess, even if i have stayed many times in the hotel.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Location ans there swiming pool is good.The  sand inthe beach.  You should find out.

After our second trip to Hardrock Hotel, Pattaya ... all I can say is that it is one of the best locations in the world with something for everyone, young or old. The staff are friendly and helpful, activities all day long, spectacular sized swimming pool and good food. Most importantly, we were stranded there due to flight cancellations because of the Iceland Volcano and the staff couldn't do enough to assist us. From the table staff to reception staff and the General Manager Gorge ... who gave us the lowest room rate to assist financially while stranded which was so helpful when other hotels were turning out their guests and urging them to go and wait at the airport ... We stayed an extra 5 nights and they assisted in every way possible. Thank you HARD ROCK HOTEL and we shall see you soon again!
Danielle M and Dean S

Good location 
Good service
Good bed
Good room
Good activity
All staff have a service mind
Fair food
Fair swimming pool
All clean
Xbox360 in the room but only one game
Free movie on tv but no thai sub title

We stayed in this hotel on the first day of our Thailand visit and loved it.We reached the hotel quite early then our check in time but we were given room immediately.The room came with 2 huge beds.Its right next to the beach and all the attractions were nearby but we spent most of our time inside the hotel.We also attended the Beach Foam party inside the hotel and the entry was 180 bahts per person.I enjoyed the breakfast buffet served there and the staff were brilliant.Overall Great Hotel and I Highly recommend this Hotel.

The room was large and the breakfast was delicious.
There was convenience store near, was convenient.
I thought that I would like to come with my family.
However, at that time I would like to ask you not to leave the room near the elevator. I was so noisy this time that I could not sleep well

I stayed for 2 nights at the HRH in Pattaya, due to a business appointment close by.
The front desk people were very friendly and helpfull and also the staff at the restaurant vwere pretty good and very polite.
I know the Hard Rock Hotels (especially US) quite well, and here you should not expect the same standard. Again it was good, but not excellent. 
E.g. only one single picture in the Hotel room (I stayed at the composer suite), everything else looked like more a hospital ;-) ; one evening you have a turn down service, the other night not.
The pool area is nice, clean and big - nothing to complain about there.
The massage at the Rock Spa was good (very good people with good massage skill), but one afternoon while it was raining, the water was dripping from the ceiling. 
Overall good, but not excellent.
Would I go back again? Yes, definitely - it is still one of the hotels in Pattaya with a higher standard.
Overall rating I would give 4/5.

It beautiful place and easy to walk go to shopping mall and go find some food and we are go by car them have good packing......I will come back Thailand at here again it good for take a rest and everything not so expensive every one here very nice to me ...thanks for good vacation

Great stay at The Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya! Fantastic room, excellent customer service from all the staff, good food at the cafe (thank you Pound and Jubel for the dining experience!). Highly recommend you stay there!

Spent 3 days here with some friends and I have to say the property is great, the rooms are ok and the service is mostly very good.
The pool is spectacular and the proximity to the beach is second to none its only across the road.
What stops me from rating it as a 5 is the following.
1. The bathrooms are a bit weirdly layout with the toilet chair tucked in very close to the glass dividing the shower from the rest of the bathroom and it makes it hard to use it correctly if you are a bit bigger like me.
2. When you use the hand shower and not the roof based rain shower, the rain shower drips ice cold water on you as you shower which is an annoyance but not a huge problem.
3. When booking car pickup and drop off there is no offering top use the nice Mercedes vans parked outside which I assume are available by the hotel, instead we got some older vans that were far from comfortable, I would have happily paid extra had I been offered the choice for a Mercedes van.

pool was warm so not refreshing. Rooms were dark with poor lighting. pool party was a let down. May have been off season so no one there and guests staying should not be charged to use that area of the pool where the party is so everyone used the other end of the pool so a bit of a waste. Good location. Food was good

Good location and pool complex. Nice quiet rooms with good shower. Shame the swim up pool bar closes in the evening at 6.30pm as the pool is open till much later Charging 300Bht per day for an inflatable ring or float in the pool is very poor

best location, in front of the beach, 10 minutes to the central festival (shopping mall). a lot of style you can choose for the breakfast. nice swimming pool with children facility. i will stay in here again.

I love all the staff, friendly, helpful. The hotel itself is good too with all the facilities and amenities.
Enjoy all the Movies provided. Was staying in Rock Loyalty room, so get to enjoy the tea time, cocktail time all day long.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Start on a positive, hotel location great you can walk the strip away from hustle of the walking streets. Great security felt safe as a family. great front house staff, check in smooth, restaurant staff great! housekeeping were amazing  Down side; pool attendance were awful, after watching one of the pool staff grab my 8 year old wrist and really squeeze it resulting in his watch catching his skin and the red marks on his wrist telling him Not to kick the football as he wanted to give ball to a child in a party that was taking place  my son was clearly upset and not what you would expect from a 5 star hotel staff!!!  ....IF the hotel
Insists on saying this hotel is KID friendly educate your staff NOT to Man handle the children. I seen the same pool attendant grab another child My husband  challenged the attendant and no apology except for a vacant scowl. NOTE to manager; educate your staff not to touch or grab your guest !!!!!  Especially children. The hotel is I feel is more gay friendly than family friendly I have nothing against gay people but it certainly is not family friendly you have to pay for everything from a pair of slippers to a float in the pool.   my recommendation to the Manager is train your staff not to grab the children and educate them in customer services have a rule if beds left unoccupied remove towels... As towels just left so no beds we had to sit on the rocks to watch the kids play in the pool.

I used to go here every year when I lived in Thailand, but now that I have moved I no longer go there. What is most memorable about this place is the pool activities that are challenging and fun, such as running on this obstacle course that is on the water. I also remember going for "foam parties" where you ran around in the place full of foam. Those were happy times.
The cleanliness of this hotel is not great but overall I had a lot of fun.
I went there from around 2007-2010 when I was about 5-8 years old. I recommend this place to families who have kids (5- 12 yrs old).
***I have no idea if this place is the same as it was 6 years ago, but I would definitely recommend it if you go to Pattaya :)***

We reserved the parking But we haven’t record and no parking area when i went there. Very disappointed because i went there every year and royalty’s guest. Anyway we will back again because we love this place.
the hotel,staff,food,location every thing is good ,but the hotel is under renovation and there is lott of noise because of that.so before booking just confirm that the work is over or not.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Had ten lovley nights in hard rock hotel plenty to do location brilliant staff very friendly entertainment for adu!ts and children would defiantly stay hear again drinks a little pricey but that's same with most hotels but just outside plenty of cheap bars in soi8 sailor bar very cheap

Nice place, great staffs good location, perfect place for relaxing or partying, you choose! I regret it to stay only for 1 night, definitely will come back again!!! Actually it looks so much like my hometown just a lil bit more western, but I still love it.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: You all made our anniversary stay great with the fresh roses, chocolates and sea view upgrade! The only issue we had was the smell of cigarette smoke coming in thru the vents to our smoke free room. Having a filter in those smoking rooms or something would be great. The smell woke my wife up on 2 occasions since my wife is allergic to it. Otherwise, the room was clean and comfortable and we enjoyed our stay.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Spent 3 days here with some friends and I have to say the property is great, the rooms are ok and the service is mostly very good.  The pool is spectacular and the proximity to the beach is second to none its only across the road.  What stops me from rating it as a 5 is the following.  1. The bathrooms are a bit weirdly layout with the toilet chair tucked in very close to the glass dividing the shower from the rest of the bathroom and it makes it hard to use it correctly if you are a bit bigger like me.  2. When you use the hand shower and not the roof based rain shower, the rain shower drips ice cold water on you as you shower which is an annoyance but not a huge problem.  3. When booking car pickup and drop off there is no offering top use the nice Mercedes vans parked outside

This is my first time in Pattaya and Hard Rock Pattaya brought my family the comforts during the two night stay!
The staff were friendly and were accommodating to my needs. They are able to converse in English pretty well too! Check-in was quick and efficient, the porters delivered my luggages to my rooms in a quick amount of time too. 
My rooms were on the 8th floor, facing the city of Pattaya. Though the views aren't as great as looking upon the beach, the city view were a pleasant scene to look at too. The rooms are well-equipped with the usual essentials, and the bed were comfortable to lie on after a long day of activities! 
The pool is a great thing to have in the sunny weather of Pattaya. The pool is quiet in the late afternoon, with some ambient music playing in the background. 
There's a jacuzzi feature too, which is something cool.
There will be security guards checking on your bags before entering the hotel from the entrance at the beach, which I feel is something very good as it will make the guests feel safe.
One of the best thing about the hotel is its location. It's located in the heart of the busy Pattaya beach, making it closely located to places like nightbars and the Central Festival Mall.

Great place for weekend stay....great location....pretty good American food.....really enjoyed my visit...... my A/C could have been a bit cooler.... and a few more English TV stations would have made it a perfect "10"

an extremely comfortable stay with a realistic price. Breakfast is excellent, beds like home, pillows like home. good shower with fast wifi is all i ask for when travelling!! great location and funky live bands playing around the pool

Good for kids with family- central location with easy access to Hard Rock Cafe.  Our fifth visit and lucky to be upgraded to the Producer suite which made the weekend special. Recommend a cabana around the pool but don't go just for the beach which is a disappointment (at least compared to most over beaches in Thailand)

EVE and BELLA I don't have words to thank you for the room upgrade!!
This hotel is fantastic! everything is just terrific, especially if you are traveling with young kids as it has a play area and beach dedicated to them. Location is also really good! I love the band playing every weekend! Breakfast was delicious and I came across one of the best customer service (sky high literally). Thank you, Hardrock will stay again. Rooms were really nice and mini bar was also very trendy :)

It was our first time here. Totally impressed! The staff were friendly which created relaxing atmosphere. The hotel design is superb, very cool, filled with music and entertainment elements. The room was very comfy. There were pool games and dance at some point, couldn't stop smiling when we saw such happy faces and interaction from other guests who were there. Here, they called guests rock stars and they treated us like ones. Loved it!

Hotel stuff was very friendly and the atmosphere in the hotel cool. Music they played was great, we also like to hear music on the pool area and in this hotel they played it. When eating lunch on the poolside, there were four rats (!) running under the table and one jumped on our food! Hotel staff handled this episode extra well. Were were offered new food and some glasses wine. When we checked out they even returned the money back. Really good service indeed.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: First visit to this hotel and loved it. We usually stay in North Pattaya but this is hotel is in a great location, 10mins walk to Terminal 21 and the same to Mikes Shopping Centre. After a quick check in showed to our room which was spacious and spotlessly clean, no balcony as they incorporated it into room space , but rooms are available with balcony. Only ate breakfast  in hotel which was first class , Pool area great and all staff couldn’t have been nicer. We were there when the Covid started and the hotel was very quick to do whatever they could to reduce any risk to customers. Hand sanitizer everywhere , spraying sunloungers and tables poolside with antibacterial spray, removing some dining tables so there was more space between diners and even giving us serving spoons
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Rooms are good,  but I think we went here at the wrong time during the Songkran festival when it's jam packed. A lot of action for the kids with live band by the pool and games,  but the pool was quite dirty,  there are not enough sunbeds to cater for all the guests and you have to que up for everything.  We are not early risers,  so by the time we get down to breakfast it was total chaos with no tables and staff running around like headless chickens.  It's clearly the most busy weekend of the year,  but they were not staffed or organized to handle this many guests.  Might be a good action packed place for younger people or kids that wants the action at a less busy weekend though.  Location is in the middle of beach road with access to everything in Pattaya.  We will select a more quiet place next time,  but doesn't mean you shouldn't stay if you like a lot of activities in a hotel.

It's been a year since I've stayed at this property, but I've stayed here 10+ times.  It's a typical HR in many ways, but the poeple are really what sets it apart.  You'll enjoy great security, clean rooms, friends/helpful staff, good food (somewhat American style if you want that) and a fantastic pool.  The massages are great, but there are so many places in Pattaya that are equally as good, but less expensive.
The only knock I would have is on the goofy shower area--ackward.  I would definately recommend.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We stayed at Hard Rock with our three kids for a couple of nights. The place is grest fun for the kids, lots of activities all day. Great location at the more quiet side of the beach, plenty of restaurants and shops. We checked in the kids at the kids club for an hour (better standard than other hotels) and had a drink at Hilton top roof Horizon bar at sunset, magic. Our room with bunk beds for the kids was great, comfortable beds and video games in the room. We would have given this hotel a better rating if the gym management was more service minded. Their shoe policy was a bit strange, were rubber crocs was accepted but not open toe gym shoes as we had. We were therefore not allowed in the gym. Very odd and unusual. The spa was top class, though a bit pricy well worth every baht!

This hotel is perfectly located on the beachfront, has spacious and clean rooms and has a perfect welcoming service. Also the swimming pool is big. Very funny if you have kids. The buffet breakfast is good and abundant. Nice stay.

Nice place to stay, very relax
near to beach, just opposite very nice beach
nice breakfast
friendly staff
clean, tidy and spacious room
free wifi 
nice swimming pool
convenient location, a lot of convenient stores and massage centers nearby
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: It was a relaxing holiday.  Stayed at the Rock Royalty Sea View.  It is a must to book a Rock Royalty level rooms to avail the Royalty lounge benefits.  Food was amazing specially the danish pastries.  Staff were all accommodating and always serve with a big smile and politeness.  Will definitely book again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: My wife and I live in Thailand and I had always been hesitant to visit Pattaya. We went for a quick weekend trip from Bangkok (2 hour drive) and stayed at this property. It was a great choice. Very welcoming staff who could not do enough for us. Very big, CLEAN and comfortable room. Great meals and dining service. We did not have kids with us but, it looked like all of the kids there were having a great time at the kids club. Highly recommend this property especially for families.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: in general seem ok especially but when going in details I would like to recommend some point such as smell of carpet on walk way an elevator not very good,the toilet flushing not proper due to the tub feature and design.

Location - Can't get any better in pattaya.
Staff - Awesome and most professional 
Rooms - amazing and spacious
Overall a mesmerising experience to stay in this hotel.
Pool area and hard rock cafe is awesome.. food is great. 
Cheers ...

very friendly staff, good breakfast, parking might be a little bit too far, very  impressive event on my holiday, room with very good panoramic view and clean, i can promise that i will visit a hard rock hotel again, thanks you very much

Nice Hotel in Pattaya. Great location. Very good service. Great pool area.
Typical Hard Rock Hotel feeling.
But the Hotel need to think about a renovation of the rooms. They are quite out of date and the TV and music system. Bigger TVs and a sound system would make the Hard Rock feeling even better.

Hard Rock 'Rocks' in one word , our stay at HR was excellent we have completely enjoyed their services.
The pool was great the room had a nice view of the beach the breakfast (mostly american) was excellent.
Will definitely stay at this Hotel again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Hard Rock Pattaya lives the Hard Rock service philosophy. From the time we checked in to time we left staff always came to speak with our kids or chat with us. They even remebered us at checkin ! Quito was so surprised at how much our kids have grown and Uncle Sax loves when the MacKenzie family shows up for the games and activities ! Great job guys - keep that rockin spirit alive !

boys trip for the 8th time, we have stayed at many hotels but HR is great!
Food is quite expensive however.  Food by the pool should be less and have more Thai inspired cuisine.
Rooms are great and service is fantastic!

I was traveling with my 18 year old son and we found out that the pool at the hard rock was one of the best in Thailand,  the staff is 2nd to none.the location is just a short tuk tuk ride to walking street where you can find anything you might ever need in the wonderful world. the Hard Rock in Phuket has a staff that is even better then pattaya and they know there rock and roll growing up in Seattle wa in the 80's with band like Mother love bone and soundgarden and nervana I know a little my self and the food is the best. and the cold beer and stiff drinks make me smile every time. Larry Maxwell Seattle washington USA

Service Overall, I was satisfied with the room condition and the bubble party was the best. However, the smell of cigarette in the soundproofing or smoking area was not good. Front staff were friendly.

Good location, comfortable rooms, very good food and drinks but most of all an excellent staff that is attentive without being intrusive. Excellent job by the management and specially their general manager!

Truly enjoy my two days at the Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya, it's right in the heart of everything couldn't ask for anything more. The pool area was amazing, played some water basketball, got to meet some locals and fellow visitors alike. Definitely looking at returning for a longer stay.

The rooms , ambience and location is excellent , the staff was very cooperative and friendly, some more spread of indian food would make us more comfortable. It is value for money for the stay, we all had a great time

I stayed at the HR Hotel three days in March 2005.  This hotel is a truly 4 star hotel.  It is across the beach. The room is nicely decorated with rock stars.  It has a CD player in the deluxe room.  Beautiful swimming pool. It also has a sand pool for the kids and a miniture water slide for the kids.  Internet stations with flat screens in the loby. Very friendly staffs. About a 15 minute walk to the Walking Street or take the taxi for 10 bhat.

My husband and I stayed at Hard Rock Hotel in December 2015. Its a beautiful hight of the range hotel, staff is very helpful. Rooms are nice and clean but a bit small, no balcony, its was a downside for me.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I stayed here for more than a week. My biggest gripe is the cooks that make the pizza outside. 
On more than one occasion, I noticed some unsanitary events. On one occasion, the cook walked back to the grill area eating a pineapple. A few minutes later he placed a pizza in the oven. I think he forgot he didn't wash his hands. 
On another occasion, I noticed the cook tasting the pizza sauce. Then he felt the need to continue stirring the pizza sauce with the same spoon. I could tell by his body movements that the spoon went directly back into the pizza sauce. 
I have worked at a restaurant or two in my time. Upon entering the kitchen, you wash you hands. You don't cook and eat at the same time. I have ate at the hotel outside restaurant several times and the cooks are allergic to the washing of the hands. 
The gym is decent. Nothing to brag about. What the gym needs is sanitary spray or antibacterial wipes. The only thing the gym offers is a green towel and a bottle of hand sanitizer. How about you let me wipe down the equipment after that sweaty guy got off of it. A green towel does not protect me from bacteria and sickness. 
You can walk to one of the bigger malls. Central Festival. You just have to leave out the back entrance and not the main entrance. It's several floors of stores with restaurants, a bowling alley, and movies at the top. Everything you need is around the hotel. Out the back entrance, you can take a motorcycle, tuk tuk, or taxi 5 minutes to Walking Street. 
On the weekends they have events that make your stay horrible. It is nothing but loud music. So, be careful on the weekends if you want to attempt to get any sleep. Look at room location. Having a window that faces the pool will be a mistake on the weekends.

All of the Hotel is great and verry clean.i come again.
The room to with city view was at balcony a little bit loude because the aircon or vetilation from kitchen.I like the new pool area.hard rock is the best😚
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: My second home in Pattaya Thailand, Excellent service. great friendly staff at all levels from the cleaning staff to the front desk. great location with very efficient security. great swimming pool. the composer suit is very large and comfortable. fruits and sweets fresh every day. best value in Pattaya with no show off

Hard Rock Hotels by nature are weird that everything is still about Rock History.
Having said that, the rooms were clean and the service good. 
A few minor issues on check in but the staff had it sorted a little while later.  
Cool pool with beach side bure's; thatched roof, sandy beach and chilled drinks... what more can you ask for, except you gotta pay a premium for that.
Typical breakfast bar - nothing outstanding - but still a good hotel.
Far enough away from the busier parts of Pattaya to still enjoy the place.
Staff had a pep in their step and were fun and freindly and always had a smile to offer.
Rock on man!!

I am a Hotelier myself and it is not easy to please me but I am impressed by the staff at Hard Rock Hotel! I think they are the friendliest, most helpful and attentive! Child Friendly and family hotel

We stayed at the hotel for one night only. Check-in was quick and friendly. Ample parking available. The rooms were clean and tidy but not too well maintained, fridge didn't work and the overhead shower in the room couldn't be used either. Mini bar was well stocked and not overly expensive. We didn't use the pool but it must be a highlight of the hotel.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Hotel is a bit outdated. Lots of wear and tear. Hairdryer didn´t work ( was replaced), sockets and light fixtures very old, air-condition hard to control. Bed was comfortable though. Breakfast average. At this price wouldn´t stay there again as it seems to appeal more to Russian tourists than to business guests.

We just got back from a 2 week stay at the hard rock and what a great hotel.  When we first checked in i thought the rooms not so big and not as nice as other hotels we have stopped in but clean, fresh and comfortable.  We stayed in a city view deluxe with balcony, not many sea view rooms have balconys and for us a balcony is a must.  The view not so good and the balcony noisy because of air conditioning units.
But on saying this i have never come across more helpful, polite and genuine staff they cannot do enough for you.  The staff that entertain round the pool are amazing, they never stop and the kids love them.  If you are after a quiet pool this is not for you, loud music, games, pool volleyball, water polo, giant water balls, pool bar, basket ball net in pool i could go on.......but we found this very entertaining and spent a lot more time round pool than we usually would.
A member of staff told us what a great company hard rock was to work for and the opportunities the staff get are great.  One day we wanted a letter translating from english to thai and the staff on reception did this with no problem.
The location of this hotel is good for us, you are right on beach road within walking distance of central festival a great shopping mall and all of our favourite soi's you are on a baht bus route so cheap transport and right across from the beach.  Plenty of security on all gates so felt safe and sound.
The pool is lovely but one small complaint not enough sunbeds for amount of rooms in hotel, i think 100 sunbeds and 400 rooms, also you can pay to use the pool so outside guests can come in thus takin up more sunbeds.  Some days people had put towels on beds and we never saw them come back so a bit unfair for people wanting beds.
On the whole a brilliant hotel and we would come back again rock on!!!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: My 7th visit to pattaya was as wonderful as my first visit superb location and facilities all in all top hotel.With in walking distance to walking street .The walk is a must as some of the scenery is breath taking.

Well went 2013 July but wouldn't let me gone that far back so just put close date of month. 
Amazing hotel for family and solo adult people as well  , the food and staff and hotel was pure luxury I would totally recommend any day come here again or people to come it's makes not want to leave the hotel look around Pattaya be honest didn't like environment of Pattaya remind me of old man club sort place so that why hotel made me feel normal again and enjoyed that last part of the holiday. In that hotel. Loved the design of hotel and the way did pool part sand part normal pool. Just pure bliss and beautiful.

Been here 3 years ago, very pleasant. We had a soap party,and there was a bus of people fom other hotels who paid 30$ to get in to our pool for this party! For us it was free of course. Cool room design!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
The room was very nice and they also prepared birthday cake for my husband.
The breakfast is good and the staff is very friendly.
Located in the heart of Pattaya so we could go around by walking.
The pool also so nice.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
We love the programmes arranged by the hotel at the pool but the drinks were overpriced. 
The bed was not very comfortable but the room was clean and nice. 
Hotel staff 'tried' to be friendly but no warmth. Only 1 of the guard was very nice and friendly.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
This was my first stay in this hotel. The location is good , just opposite the beach. 
The hotel room was clean and well maintained. Buffet breakfast was great too. All the staff were friendly and helpful.
We will definitely choose this hotel again in the future.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The check inn process was terrible and it took more than 2 hours to check in , there was a lady by name Brenda she was very rude and terrible and was totally terrible , never recommend this hotel to any one , very bad behaviour of the staff , the entire hotel is in a run down condition , rooms are very small and old fashioned , breakfast area is very very dirty

I initially booked a kings club room for 3 adults but have needed to change my booking for 4 adults and 2 Seaview rooms adjoining if possible and they have altered my booking with exceptional communication, can't wait for our stay in August and appreciate the changes even though I had paid for the initial room

Enjoy staying at the hotel with a good hospitality. The location of the hotel is very excellent. Nice room and nice swimming pool. The room price is cheaper if you book as a group. Will go back and spend sometimes there for sure.

Good family holiday though more pool activities/ equiptment should be free. Drinks expensive. Spa very expensive being this is Thailand. Would have thought the food in the resort would more closely resemble the cafe menu

We booked two rooms for six people.  the rooms are comfortable with nice bed and pillows.  The shower and comfort room is clean.  The people in the reception and concierge are quite nice, they even bother to give a simple cake to my daughter as it was her birthday when we checked in.    The breakfast is great, swimming pool is very nice too... the only thing that we didn't like most is the lobby , as it is not well lighted, as other hotel, or it might be as them theme is about rock music... but overall we are quite satisfied....

I arranged a Group meeting at Hard Rock Hotel from march 21-27 2013, including internal meetings at hotel and external transportation to my suppliers in Rayong ang Bang Na area + social trip to Ko Larn Island and nice team dinner by the pool before we go back to each country. I would say that all parts of the arrangement went as planned if not better, and the people there is very  helpful and do all they can to make your stay and business event as good as possible, a special thank to "Tina" who handled all for me, and i can for sure recommend her to other who will have similar arrangements too. All feedback from my managers in Europe and Asia that goes with me here vas very good and if possible we will of course use this hotel again for similar events. I also used Hard Rock Hotel as my business hotel for ordinary stays, and can also recommend it for others. The rooms is very nice especially now after refurbish and car parking is easy in front of hotel and the safety is the best ever of any Pattaya hotel. Location is great, just 10 min walk to Central Festival for shopping, and to Bangkok it takes only 1,5 hr. by car..  My best recommendations for this hotel!

Everything was excellent. One of the top spots in Pattaya with great facilities.
Staff were very helpful and went out of there way for anything that we needed.
The pool and all services were amazing and the best in the area

Do not like Pattaya at all but was with friends in Jontien and decided to stay at the coast a few days and liked the look of the Hard Rock Hotel other friends recommended too. Stayed Easter Monday until today four nights and got a very reasonable rate. We arrived at midday and the room wasnt ready which was fair enough as check in is 2pm and had been a bank holiday weekend. We left our luggage and came back at 2pm. The lady at check in was called Brenda and said our room wasnt quite ready and she was apologetic. That was fine we said we would sit and wait no problem. At 2.20pm she came up and apologised again had upgraded us to the executive floor and gave us free drinks vouchers. We said we really didnt mind but thank you and was very impressed with her and the service. The room was fantastic, clean, spacious and free movies which my son loved in the evening. The Hard Rock Hotel Pool is probably one of the biggest and best I have ever been too. Furthermore, staff organise activities for kids every hour or so. The Hard Rock Cafe food was good and you get a discount if you are staying at the Hotel. We only ate there one night but have no complaints but like to try different places. Very few sex tourists around, unlike most of Pattaya and for families if you should choose to holiday in Pattaya or if you live in Thailand would totally recommend.

Very nice surrounding. Easy to travel around the city. Friendly  and helpful staff as I have special child kids so I'm very concern about how people react to them. Love the Breakfast and Pool the most. Will be back again to explore for more.

A VERY memorable experience back in Mid 2005. The hotel was pretty cool and retro, food was fairly decent and the pool had a good design to it. Fairly good for youngsters as it was quite hip and they had a foam party (Which I was surprisingly refused entry for being underage which in Thailand they usually don't care as long as you have the money!)
The rooms were hilarious, they had multiple free condoms and since we paid a bit extra we had access to the executive lounge which was quite cool free internet, breakfast and nibbles later on in the day. I remember there was a massively built American guy who was always there on the computers. 
Pattaya itself is an experience and a half. I saw some EVEN YOUNGER white kids with "escorting" some Thai females by the arm and the clubs were fairly loud and crazy.

The hotel is decorated in an extraordinary way, the family room we got was big and well equipped even the X Box with Kinect camera was in the room. Hotel staff was very kind and helpful, and speak very good English, the food at the hotel was indeed a 5 star hotel.
Hotel's location is excellent, right on the beach and close to the everything !!! 
The hotel has a huge pool but we did not enjoyed it because the water was cold all the time and almost no sun in the pool area.

Thanks to Ms Jasmine for taking extra efforts to sort out my payment adjustment request. Not necessary to oblige, but Ms Jasmine went extra mile to reach out to her Manager (thanks to you as well) and gave excellent solution. Way to go.
About the hotel, nice location, beautiful swimming pool.. enjoyed

Great service from the time I checked in to the time I checked Great from the time I checked in to the time I checked out.  I left a necklace in the room. Called a day after checkout and they mailed it to me. Excellent!!!! Great choices of food if you just want to stay there.  Great location.

Stayed at this hotel with my family to celebrate my brothers 20th birthday for 3 nights. We chose Hard Rock Hotel coz it is a young cool hotel with loads of activities and obviously a name you can trust. We arrived at BKK airport, reserved a car to drive us to Pattaya, journey takes approximately 2 hours from BKK old airport to hotel. We found the staff very friendly all way through our stay. Rooms are big and spacious, clean and tidy, love the rock and roll touch! Breakfast was delicious,loads of choices to chose from,from japanese to english, american to chinese,thai to vegetarian,all you can think of! The pool is very nice as well,full of activities to entertain children and adults,shame we were not able to enjoy the foam party as they only have it once a week on saturdays. Still,there is a small jacuzzi which overlooks the beach,quite relaxing indeed!The downsides of the hotel is that it does not have a Wi-fi free area,u have to pay 200 baht for an hour for EACH device used(was 4 of us). For a hotel such as Hard Rock,and living in 2013, I would expect Wi-fi to be free, if not in the room,at least in a communal area. We found the balcony to be extremely noisy as well and couldn't really enjoy the benefit of a balcony in the room. I requested an ironing board and iron to be sent to my room and was disgusted with the condition of the ironing board. An incident happened as well,my aunt found herself locked in the bathroom,unable to open the door,we had to find a spoon to try to unlock the door from outside,and only after about 10 minutes she was "rescued". I would advice you not to lock the bathroom door if not required.

Stayed at Hard Rock Hotel for 3 nights, staff on arrival didnt seem as friendly or welcoming as other hotels in Thailand. Werent overly helpful or cheerful.
Room was good more spacious than I expected.
Buffet Breakfast has a fair but to offer and staff in there very helpful and friendly.
Pool is great, enjoyed an afternoon of sun baking, cocktails and chicken wings!
Hotel is a good 20-30mins from Walking St, if you dont feel like walking its very easy to get to in a 10baht truck, they are everywhere.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I've been to hard rock hotel in Bali and Penang, so the hotel was quite a disappointment for me. however, the service was extremely superb, like other hard rock hotels, the staff are friendly and helpful. the room was fine. the breakfast was not that great. I was lucky that I managed to go to their foam party. it was an awesome party! the hotel facilities are great but to my disappointment, a lot of activities were cancelled due to non-participants or less crowd, I ended up spending my day at cabana with my book. it is quite a distant from the hanging out places so you have your privacy here. the staff in hard rock shop are really friendly. I got a shirt for their charity event. it was a good quality shirt for 500 bath.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Thank you Hard Rock Team
My entire stay at the hotel was comfortable, convenient, and entertaining. If you are looking for a centrally located Hotel in Pattaya you cannot go wrong with the Hard Rock. The staff are amazing!!

Yes swimming pool is always okay on HRH and my daughter loves it, but when you have bought a deluxe room incl free WIFI, you don't need to call them and explain that the need to install extra router. First night we only received 2 bath towel. Next night 2 face towel and 3 night extra towel for water on bathroom floor. This here is not necessary for a 4 star hotel and that price.
At last it was difficult to receive a correct answer from tour counter about transport, but then it is nice to know how to use internet instead

Me and friends love music , we all have a very good time , the breakfast is awesome , we love the swimming pool very much , the staff are friendly , bed is very comfortable , although that's a little bit far away the street , but we still love to stay here.

This was our combined 8th trip to the Hard Rock Hotel and again we cannot fault the service and quality level of the hotel. The club level is superior to most other club levels around the world. Pool is fantastic. Close proximity to everything.

Very friendly staff.. smooth check in.. even the lobby had the hard rock touch.. you ll certainly love this place the minute you enter! The pool was awesome. Crowded always.. The hotel is on the beach and transportation to local attractions hardly takes any time.. Didn't get time for breakfast, but I heard the spread was superb.. The stay was fantastic!

We only stayed two nights but we throughly enjoyed our stay. Hotel located away from all the noise, room was clean & big enough for two. Bathroom also veg.
We didn't eat in the restaurant as the prices looked particularly expensive compared to eating out.

The pool is attractive very big clean and inside have one more pool with sand you can feel you were in beach the staff are very polite and you can drink your delicious coctails while you can sit in the pool also the room is ver clean and big i really reconend this place you can walk everywhere with a short walk

Staff very friendly and could not fault their service. If you stay at the Hard Rock be prepared to pay high prices for drinks and food. No happy hours on cocktails etc and the competitor hotels nearby e.g. the Hilton and Holiday Inn both welcome happy hours 5pm-7pm. Lots of guests going out of the hotel to purchase food and drinks. Also be aware the hotel hosts private parties where the pool and hotel areas get sectioned off which I don't think it's fair when guests have paid for the full facilities. We did get an early check in on arrival which was much appreciated. Breakfast was basic not the standard we have been used to. Hard Rock food at the beach bar needs to improve vastly over priced. A beer was 295baht which the rate would make it £6.82 a pint. Never paid these prices in Sharm or Patong. Found a lovely restaurant for lunch called the Discovery Beach Hotel just to the right of the hard rock on beach road. The Holiday Inn cocktails were fabulous and The Tavern next door for food with also daily promos on food and cocktails.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Having been staying in Had Rock Pattaya for 5 days.  The staffs are very helpful form front desk to the restaurant staffs.  Excellent pool facilities that suite people of different ages.  The BBA buffet is great with very reasonable price.  The  SPA treatment is excellent and values for money.  Very convenient location with only 10 mins walk to major shopping mall.  Highly recommended for staying in Pattaya and fo sure will visit again if I am going to Pattaya again.

Really nice hotel in a good location. We opted for a upgrade on our room and I must say it was well worth it.
We ate out most days and didn't try anything the hotel had to offer. 
I will happily stay here again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
My wife & I stayed here in a Delux Seaview Room in May, 2012.  We were very pleased with our room; it had fantastic views (5th floor- but higher would probably be even better), and a stylish design.  It had a comfortable bed, nice bathroom, and all the amenities you need.  Getting a wifi internet connection is expensive though.  The breakfast is very good, with many delicious choices available.  Food in the hotel is generally pretty pricey, but we enjoyed the delicious, wood-fired pizza from their Italian restaurant.  Everything in the restaurants is also available from room-service for slightly lower prices.  
The Hard Rock property was great!  We really enjoyed the pool a lot.  The staff is friendly and fun; they organize games and activities like water volleyball, water basketball, & kayak races in the pool throughout the day.  There is also a sandy area of the pool which is very cool & different.  In fact, I'd say it's a little bit nicer than the beach across the street from the hotel because it's cleaner and shady.  They were renovating the water slide area during our stay, but kids will have fun with that when it's ready in a few weeks. One thing that I didn't really like about the pool was its tile bottom.  They've done a very nice job of laying the tiles so that they're not sharp (often a problem with tile bottomed pools) but there is a lot of algae growing on the grout in the spaces between the tiles.  It's not a big deal, but it makes the pool seem a little dirty, even though it's actually pretty clean.  
The Hard Rock is a great, family friendly oasis near the "action" of Pattaya.  If you  want to go out to places such as Walking Street is very easy using the 10 Baht public transportation on Beach Rd, so it's also a good choice for others as well.  We would definitely stay here again if we go back to Pattaya.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The property is not geared towards business travel. The outdoor bar was not staffed and getting drinks and food was difficult. The massage and staff was awesome. Booked 2 rooms and was very difficult to get charges added to two different credit cards. Did have transport service.

I can't see good view in your hotel. I felt the hotel fee was a little expensive than the not good view. I think I was too anticipated to your hotel. But your music band in swimming pool was excellent. I felt it was very impressive.

Central location on Pattaya Beach. Lobby area is a little dated and check in was slow despite not being busy. Rooms are comfortable, beds excellent, and shower room adequate, although a bit dark as it's all coloured in black. What a shame they removed all the balconies and created larger indoor floor space, the views out to see are great especially from the higher floors. Pool is excellent with plenty of sun beds, on Saturday they added at least 30 extra beds to cope with higher demand. Pool area can often be noisy with music, pool games and groups drinking. Breakfast was OK, but I would have liked more choice, the cooked options were consistently cold as the heat lamps seemed next to useless. Nice outside area to eat/drink on outside deck by Hard Rock Cafe, but the prices are

So, I stayed yet again at the wonderful Hard Rock Pattaya. I am never let down. Seems like it gets better each time! Sally was the most amazing employee there. Remembered my name, made convo and was just all smiles! I'll be back again Hard Rock!

The room is clean and location is good compare with other famous hotel. The waiter is very nice and helped us a lot. I will recommend HARD ROCK to my friends and colleagues when they have chance to visit Pattaya.

Nice hotel. great staff very friendly. rooms massive and well equipped. food and drink expensive compared to outside but quality good. massive pool. all good. good atmosphere to the place. will be back again in June.
An amazing place to stay and chill wid frndz .. The pool party on saturday nyt is totally amazing .. The staff are friendly and cooperative .. I had a good experience at hardrock hotel pattaya 🍻 🏊🏼🎸

I had a great stay of 4 nights with friends. Rooms were clean and spacious but I would recommend the extra $$ for an Ocean view room with balcony.
Breakfast buffet was awesome with lots of choice. Room service was fast and delicious.
The pool bar was fabulous! it has recently been renovated and one side has sand like a beach and it goes all the way up to the pool bar which has rocks for seats not stools! Drinks are expensive with no many drink specials or happy hour. Lots of fun pool games are played throughout the day too.
My highlight would be the in house Muay Thai training from Kwanthai Sitmorseng. What a legend a WBA world title holder and muay thai expert. My husband and I both did 2 x 1 hour pts with Kwanthai and it was the most memorable part of my days in Pattaya.

Spent one evening at the center of pattaya as we get here quite late. The hotel is a bit wear out and also a bit dark. Room is not big and we were given lower floors facing some machine on the roof, not a pleasant view. Some of the major toiletries such as tooth brushes are missing. We had a walk around the pool and it is okay. The overall impression is that the hotel has been around quite a while...
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: This is my first stay in one of Hard Rock hotels and one of best on my trip we got Rock Royalty level room they are on 2 last floors with special services so extra bonus there but even normal rooms are great.Nice hard rock decorations great view from window or balcony ( depends on room you get )and very big nice pool.Hotel itself is on main street a bit far from walking street with many option to eat and drink with hard rock cafe just next to hotel.

I have been in this hotel for a while and the facilities, the enviroment and the staff makes our stay very relaxing. Food in restaurants is very good, no need to go outside because we can find everything inside the Hotel.

Hotel hardrock Pattaya is a great holiday hotel for the whole family. Situated right in the heart of the city, Bangkok opposite the beach, within walking distance from all the action areas of vibrant Pattaya
Great view from our room.
The rooms are well placed & spacious with good amenities including free WiFi
There's always something happening to keep the family occupied during the stay in case you don't plan to go out much
Breakfast is well spread & good for anyone including vegans like us
Sure to come back on my next visit

Good location, privacy , valuable,cleanliness,comfortable,Nice breakfast,Enjoy the pool and sauna, night with nice music , keep it up all the staff always smile , helpful,friendly,politeness .have a good sleep with nice room

Permanently good hotel for all kind vacation. Perfect location, friendly staff, clean and comfortable rooms. Wonderful breakfasts and evening bbq. Happy to back here any time. Stay cool, Hard Rock! !!

We are regulars at the Hard Rock hotel in Pattaya. This time it was my father’s 70th birthday and the staff went all out to make it an amazing experience for him. An upgrade for the room, rock royalty benefits, a voucher for the restaurant, a cake and candles with happy 70th on it, and a customised Hard Rock polo shirt with the number 70 on it. And the all staff made him feel extra special every chance they got. Thank you Hard Rock Pattaya for giving us an unforgettable experience.

Good getaway from stressful environment. Pool, beer and a good night's sleep.
Breakfast was awesome. Location is far from the bustling walking street, though easily accessible via taxi. Local food are available around the corner outside of the hotel. And not forgetting the band. The only disappointment was that discount was only applicable for certain rooms guest for the Hard Rock shop. So much for the "love all, serve all".

It is one of the best hotel near beach area. Walking street is also near by. 
They have amazing pool party every Saturday. 
In rooms also they have a music player so you can play your own music. 
Rooms are also comfortable. Good experience at Hard Rock hotel.

The laundry service was very bad. Need at least 1 day for laundry service. Second, hard rock hotel provides 2-bed room for one person. The room cleaning service was very late, they only come to clean the room after 3pm, it is already disturbing ppl from resting.

We love the place because my kid and I can make activities together and all staffs are very friendly and helpful. We have never disappointed with Hard Rock. It is a good choice for spend my time with family at HR so I can drink cool beer and see my kid is swimming around me without crying, but only one problem is I don’t get the room type and correctly beds I have booked.

This is not the first time I have been in Hard Rock since my first stay and I found comfort in terms of location, cleanliness, availability of amenities and entertainment. I also do not forget the staff especially the receptionist eve.

Good hotel with cordial staff and good ambience.
The food ( breakfast sets u off for almost an entire day and is remarkable good ).
The location is also very close to beach or rather on the beach.
Pool is very excellently designed and is always bustling with a lot of people. 
Overall experience is " I will come back soon ".

Excellent location right on the beach road is this lovely property Hard Rock in pattaya. Huge swimming pool with water slides for kids make this hotel perfect to go with kids too. The coaches made us play pool games which added to some thrill. Beach could be accessed from the hotel. Thumbs up to the chef for great food loved the sandwhiches and burger in kids meal. Good rooms the best ones were sea facing. Excellent service & great ambience. Few minutes away from the walking street everything close by. Loved our 3 nights stay...enjoyed the property!

This hotel but not a brand new. It's an old hotel, but renovated. Nothing bad about that (just the structure is a bit low ceiling). The room is just an adequate size. Comfy bed, with rain shower bathroom (no tub on the standard room). The most interesting thing is the pool with sand, and slider. It's a bit crowded and seems like got a birthday party group everyday. However, it's quite fun for kids. I found out the following day that it's a bit dirty, no garbage picking up from the pool. The breakfast was good taste and a lot of choices. service is very food too. Staff are friendly. 
Overall, a good choice for kid. Location is also very center of Pattaya (near a big department store, Central Festival). Just clean the pool and it will be much better.

The friendly staff, from reception, restaurant, and even security manning the lift, always made me fell welcomed. This is what made me keep coming back here for every business trip. The rooms may be a bit aged, but they are clean and comfortable, and that is enough for me.

The Hard Rock Pattaya is to say the least Awsome!!! We were greated by fantastic staff but especcially JJ, he made sure that everything was ready as we checked in with a group of 15 people. JJ was available to help us with anything needed. The rooms at the Hard Rock are great, we had a non smoking room on the 7th floor which has no balcony BUT is a larger room then the smoking rooms. 
The Cafe where we enjoyed a fantastice baffet breakfast every morning was also top of the line. The staff in the cafe are also helpfull especially ADAM, who would have a reserved table for 15 people every morning for us.
I have 2 young children and the staff at Lil Rock kept then busy while in there, the pool staff were great as well. Pool games everday for the kids to participate in and even some games for the adults. The kids also loved the foam party!!
The location is nice, close to Central festival shopping center, Walking street but if you don't want to walk just jump on a baht bus and they will get you around Pattaya for 10baht.
We were in Pattaya from the 5th of April untill the 19th of April, this is while Songran is on. Let me tell you, what an experience. Where in the world can you get away with wetting people when they are totally dry and going somewhere with freezing cold water?? THAILAND thats where!! We had sooooo much fun doing this from the 15th of April untill the 19th of April(the whole of Pattaya celebrates on the 19th). 
I would highly recomend this hotel to anyone and the Pig on the spit was awesome!!!
Thanks Hard Rock You  Rock!!!!!

Stay here for 2 nights , this 4 star hotel is at good location near beach , night life and shopping, good experience to stay at hard rock.breakfast is world class ,lot of fruits fresh as well as  dry fruits I really love to stay here again ,swiming pool is on ground giving a marvelous look.

upon reading all the positive feedback on this hotel, i decided to book an ocean view room for our 1 night runaway. we really enjoyed our time at the pool (my kid loved the pool slide), and glad that we got a room even though we were there ahead of check in time, but nothing else sadly. 
check in was somewhat messy with no proper waiting queue, and the front office folks looked a little lost. got our ocean view room on level 5 but the view was blocked by trees (so best to request for higher floor rooms if you have booked an ocean view room), and the room wasn't very ready to be occupied by another guest yet. i read quite a few positive comments on service, but unfortunately, we didn't really have the chance to enjoy that level of service. 
felt a little disappointed in the end, probably because we came with a somewhat high expectation, after reading all those positive feedback.

We stayed at the Hard Rock for 4 days during February. This is our 3rd time staying at the resort and we had a fantastic time again.
Rooms are very nice and the breakfast buffet is great, but the definite highlight of the Hard Rock is the pool area.  There are fun activities going on at the pool area every day with very friendly and fun staff creating a great atmosphere.  The security officer at the beach entrance who salutes you, did an excellent job of directing everyone and making us smile every morning, He went the extra mile to help us with our luggage and get the Hard Rock Cafe staffs attention for patio service.
Charcrit and the team at the shack bar by the pool provided fantastic service and made our stay an absolute pleasure, spending time at the pool each day was the highlight of our trip, and we will definitely return to the Hard Rock again for this great service.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Great location close to the amenities and attractions. Excellent swimming and customer service. Room a bit small in comparison to similar rating hotel but clean and comfortable. Great place to stay in Pattaya

The location is great with so much within walking distance, including the beach right across the street. The staff were also brilliant as my arrival was a surprise for my friends and they got me through check-in ASAP so that I was not seem. The surprise was  success!!!!
The pool area was lovely and we spent many an hour there. However, I did not expect it to be such a family hotel and there was really no real escape/area for adults.
For Thailand, considering what you received, the food was expensive and the band on the Hard Rock Cafe way too loud for the small space.
That being said, it was a great holiday and I would recommend the Hard Rock for those that want some luxury.

Clean big room and excellence services check in and check out (forgot to see her name) also tour program from mr simon, nice pool, nice location near with alcatraz and food centre also beach, breakfast was ok
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: This hotel is very kids friendly! I took the opportunity of their "Kids wanna rock" promotion and the kids enjoyed a lot! Big and warm pools... tasty restaurant and a special nomination for the bartender at Soul lounge: she did wonderful cocktails!

I really enjoyed my recent short stay here, and will certainly be returning again and again. Reception girl Nastya was charming, and very professional in everything she did. She took  care of everything for me and certainly made me feel like a rockstar. Thank you Nastya - hope to see you soon.
