There is a nice swimming pool area at the back, where they were having a pool party on the night of my arrival. Great DJs, super cool atmosphere (despite 32 degree heat).
Just outside the back gate is the Hard Rock Cafe and across the street is the beach.  A short promenade along the beach takes you to the pedestrianised area of shops, bars and restaurants (and Russian strip-Tease joints).
All very splendid!

We love to stay at this hotel. 3 weeks each time..go very fast because you  feel like home ..the people working there give a very good service and are so nice😊 Love music and live music every day 🎸Recomand your stay here!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
1.Add more navigation to hotel coner and elevator,it can be more convenient to anyone.
2.The toothbrushes and toothpaste can be set on the rooms,because sometimes we must go down the lobby asking for them

The staff are amazing very friendly, welcoming and can’t do enough for you. There is plenty to do or if you want to relax. The pool is definitely the place to be . The staff are so good with the kids as well as the adults. The water aerobics is a must. Would definitely recommend it.

Plus points:
1) Have 2 hard rock shops selling stuff with either (hardrock)hotel or (hardrock)cafe branded stuff if you are into it
2) Welcome drink was good
3) had lunch at the hardrock cafe while waiting check in. Nice and friendly crew. But food too long considering there was only 2 tables
Minus points
1) Definitely not a business hotel
2) Food hygiene: terrible at the hotel restaurant. Went to take watermelon, was little specks on it and thought it was seeds. When i reach for it with the tongs, seeds moved. Actually were mini flies. Cannot believe it in a hotel
3) balcony was dirty, cobwebs and dirt all over the walls and floor.

Unfortunately, instead of having holiday, I was here for business at Rayong. So I feel really misplaced. While others were with their shorts, I was with my business attire. 
Anyway, this hotel is nicely located accross the beach, lot of happenings around. Swimming pool is the center of attraction. 
There are several halal indian restaurant around, walk for 5 min to central festival mall, there are two halal restaurants at the food hall at the basement level. 
I booked hotel with sea view, but the room does not have balcony, so not really optimized for a sea-view room. 
The breakfast buffet was too-porky for me as moslem. So I skipped it

I recently stayed here for the weekend with a very large group of friends and was not sure how much I would enjoy the experience of a large themed chain such as this however it greatly exceeded my expectations. The staff were simply fantastic, nothing was too much to ask and service was always with a smile. It can be hard to deal with large groups but the hard rock staff took it all in their stride. We had use of the King's Club Lounge which was well worth it as the communal dining area where breakfast was served was an incredibly loud, echoey space that wasn't great after indulging in the happy hour the day before. 
The hotel room was well equipped with two large single beds and comfy bedding. My only complaint was the lighting in the bathroom which wasn't great for putting on makeup etc. However this is really a very small complaint as everything else was completely faultless. 
The pool area is generous and well designed. The children's area can be easily avoided and food and drink can be ordered right from your sun lounger. After enjoying snacks at the happy hour including cheese (a treat when you live in Thailand) and then eating at the restaurant buffet we all attended the foam party which was so much more fun than I'd imagined. You can go in the pool and in the foam and it was really well organised. The bar staff were also super nice and tolerant of 50 something screeching women.  
I would definitely come again with friends for a fun break within easy reach of Bangkok. I think it would also be good if there were kids in the group as there was a lively kids club and a large pool with lots to do.

Always friendly and quick Service, cleaness and Food very good, nice Crew there, really nice place to start your vaccation to other Areas too. Good safety, good structure around too.
Definately a place you can visit and stay !

We stayed at this hotel from 27/02 - 02/23 for our honeymoon. 
The hotel stay would have been fine if not for two bad incidents in the hotel. 
1] The hotel was trying to charge us for two drinks which were missing from the freezer. Our mistake was we did not count the drinks in the freezer while entering, but then do you expect the guest to count it upon entering ?
2] Secondly two precious watches, worth 400$(approx) was stolen from our room.
The hotel has a nice pool area and Spa, not to mention the breakfast buffet.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Nice hotel, great place , had a good time at the pool...room was spacious, location was ideal..
visited Hard Rock Cafe, u have a friendly staff named Pound...he made us feel comfortable..you should have more staff like him.

Nice place to stay but the quality of the drinks at shack bar is no where at minimum standard , bought few cocktails at shack bar but despite feedback given the waiter decided to be rude by giving nasty look rather than taking the feedback positively, suggest senior management try to taste the cocktails prepared at foam party, on positive side at Hard Rock Cafe cocktails taste great, contra to at shack bar
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Stayed for 12 nights and wasn't over impressed with hotel/complex !!
Rooms to be fair inside not bad, most have no balcony, breakfast buffet is one of worst ever experienced around world, un-imagenative and predictable !!
Very pricy in general and with exception of odd individual member of staff, service was slow !!
Pool area cramped, with to much emphasises given to under used cabanas !!
On site band very good but again drinks/food pricy !!

this the place to have fun in thailand, a ginormous pool with its own beach, a bar in the pool with rocks as stools, all day entertainment from the pool team (it helps if you like to dance), amazing buffets with a whole pig on a barbecue on saturday nights, the friendliest staff i have ever met and a fabulous hard rock cafe to rock away the evenings. Fantastic for familes with young children as they have a kids club with video games, rock climbing and lots lots more.if you can afford it book into the kings club floor where the rooms are enormous and the club room serves FREE snacks and drinks all day.we were in the kings club and i was able to order sirloin steak for breakfast in the club room at no extra charge..very tasty.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: very good property. very good location. nice swimming pool and the wi fi was great getting 2.3 mb/s download speed. only thing less option in indian food. but just out side of the hotel have ALI BABA indian restaurant.  nice place to eat. good food.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Very nice stay, friendly staff and good facilities.  Room was very clean and spacious.   Food was reasonably priced and discount offered in restaurant to hotel guests.   A couple of free welcome drinks was a very nice gesture too.   Upgraded on arrival to sea view.

The room was quite nice.
Check-in was terrible.  The Chinese guests checking in swamped the reception area.  They require a 400 Baht deposit and their credit card reader wouldn't accebt three of my cards despite my using them earlier and later that same day.

There are a lot of new hotels popping up but HRC is aging well. Really friendly staff, relaxed atmosphere. Very family friendly but still good for people (like me) who aren’t fond of kids. The breakfast was ok better than some, but the restaurant was great and and music was top notch.

Visited for several nights on business.  Excellent well-appointed room!  Hotel directly across from the beach, although the beach is not very clean or attractive.  Hotel has large pool area, multiple family activities and several dining choices.  Extremely helpful and courteous staff.  Superb buffet breakfast included with the room and served from 6 to 11.

The location is great away from the hustle and bustle but yet a walking distance from eateries and shopping mall. You can also just get a tuk tuk just outside of the hotel anytime of the day. Spacious room nice pool good breakfast and the friendly staff.

the pool wasnt so clean.please clean the main pool. everything is great. i just had sauna and steam room, it's really good. the restaurant service is good. the room is clean, staff is friendly.. beside from the pool everything is excellent.

Overall the hotel was superb. Pool was awesome. Location was gd and services was tremendous. Except being muslim, food was difficult in the hotel as they serve pork. So i could only depend on toasts and cereal.

our room is behind the hotel, so we can't see the view from the window;but the breakfast is very good; and also one of the receptionists can speak chinese, who is very kind, help us a lot;  one-day trip can be booked from the hotel. the swimming pool is very big.

Stayed for 2 nights during our post-Bangkok Songkran experience. Staffs were really friendly and kind, even the security guard at the ground floor lift lobby would rush to call the lift once he sees you walking over hahaha. Special shout out to Som (Sorry if i've mis-spelt your name) who provided lots of information when we first arrived.
My main reason why this review was only 4* was cause i expected a lot more when it comes to the room since we chose a hotel that charges a significantly higher price. Please place the hairdryer in the wash room rather than in a separate location. Wash room mirror would also fog up after a shower.

Right on the beach towards the northern end of Beach Rd this hotel could not be better located. It has a fantastic pool  with swim-in bar, pool games and comfy sun lounges. Quirky features include murals of the Beatles crossing Abbey Rd so that you can have a photo with the fab four. You can also have an electric guitar sent to your room free of charge for that 2am jam session. All in all not five star but a fun place to stay.

Been to pattaya in December and stayed in hard rock and as expected it was nice hotel with all the amenities with great location and good food.Hard Rock is bang opposite of sea beach and nearby of lot of restaurant and market
Highly recommended
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
The overall services and place still excellent for me, Khun Ann still gave me a very warm welcome.
Staffs at Starz Dinner are very good service mind.
Staffs at Rock Spa very good service mind.
But junior staffs in Rock Royalty at the date I was checked-in, not much gave smiles to Thai people.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Always use Hard Rock, frindly people and good combination of peacefullness and a rock party if you need. Girls in the business lounge and office facilities are very service minded and helpfull, as a returning guest do the service mpress be time after time. Facilities is maintained at a very high standard, even the Hotel always have many guests.
Morning buffet if fine, not "high class", but with plenty of options in fine quality.

Overall satisfied. Im a frequent traveller which spending about 120 days every year around south east asia.
The hotel have a friendly staffs, very clean room, the facilities was good and the most important thing that is i can get my collections at the hardrock cafe. Well,15% discounted price because i booked via Hardrock website.
Don't trust all the travel website please, while you are booking thailand hotels, always go to the original hotel website and i guarantee you will get the best rate among the other websites.
One last thing im not really happy about it that is the hotel have different rate (cheaper) for only PRC & resident from Macao / HK to book via Ctrip.com. think they should apply to all neighbour country like Malaysia and Singapore. Guess what? Our spending power is not lesser than PRC / Macao / HK ! Just that our populations are lesser.
Hope the hotel can seriously consider this. Because of this different of rates that only makee stay 1 night here and going to centara grand mirages stays for the next 4 nights even the rates are much more expensive. But at least consistent and no different.
I have a great stay in Hardrock and will definite visit here again in Songkran Festival.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Our favourite place to stay .. perfect location views and best pool in Pattaya.and it's Perfect for the water festival too, you can go out get soaked and pop back to hard rock to relax . (Then repeat) 👍🏻
It's always great to come back to hard rock and perfect for family's . Our  kids 13-15-18 love it. The service is always spot on .. great food and the rockstar floor nine is fantastic . We will Always come back 
Many thanks to all the hard Rock

I booked hotel day before when I was in BKK - last minute price was very good, so I really get value for the money. Room was nice and clean, and we had a nice view to the sea. I received free late check-out because of HRC Rewards. Breakfast was very nice and there was lot to eat. The breakfast was included my room price. Reception arrange transfer back to the BKK in no time. Special thanks to Ana who was working in the front office - she and whole hotel really rocks - for sure I am coming back this hotel for longer stay
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Well we love Hard rock cafes all over the world so had to stop here. Not dissapointed with our meal at all, lots of it and great service. We also had a live band playing while we were here. Fantastic and a real great voice. Cant say anything about the hotel here but security on the entrance and it was clean and tidy, we loved it.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: This was one of the highlights we had in our Bangkok Pattaya trip. so nice location, interiors, room service and buffet spread. located very close to walking street, alcazar shows and beach. you cant ask for more from this place.. although very tough to find veg food here.. :P

Staff were helpful and very welcoming always smiling!! However the room and bathroom was very small. We hardly had space to keep our luggage. Apart from that everything was great!!  Location is perfect- right on the beach and easily accesible

First time in Pattaya and we booked a superb hotel, the staff were were always jamming to help and rock you in the right direction.
The staff were also enjoying Songkran with plenty of entertainment for families during the day and evening for over 20's  
The main hotel is wheelchair accessible with amble room to maneuver in the bedrooms with a double size walk in shower.
Disappointing that I was unable to use the gym due to access, there was no mention on Hard Rock Hotel Website advising customers that Gym is located upstairs in a separate building with no lift.   
Full marks for the walk in swimming pool with life guard on duty. Twins are too young to join the foam party but enjoyed the atmosphere and DJ boom toons.
The buffet breakfast is always enough to set anyone up for the day ahead.
We enjoyed a stroll to Central Festival shopping mall by crossing at pedestrian crossing just passed Hard Rock Cafe, walk down promenade until you see Police station, then cross back over this way is wheelchair friendly.

Hard rock pattaya is my 3rd try on Hard rock chain after hard rock bali and macau.. And the rock vibe is still there, on the decor and the atmosphere.
We got upgraded when we check in. The staff at receptionist is helpful and check in was fast.
The staff that sent our bag to the room (Kevin) is totally great, he did explain to us about attractions at pattaya and even gave me the map of pattaya when i asked him. And he told us about the jetski scam so we can avoid it. 
The room is newly renovated i think and it has the hard rock-ish design and amenities. The room feels good and airy with the balcony, but the wardrobe section could be better as its stuck on the corner with little space left to put your clothes. The bathroom is kinda old and the sanitary ware at the shower area looks like they need a change.
Bed is comfortable, and room service is quick and delicious. Its our anniversary trip and the hotel staff put flowers and a plate of strawberry chocolates with a greeting card so big thanks for that.
The pool is great and the breakfast is tasty, loved the thai noodle soup there.
Location is quite in the centre of pattaya, near some night market and central festival mall and a lot of eateries nearby
The downside is, that the front lobby feels so hot even at night time, maybe its because pattaya is hot or the air conditioner need an upgrade. And while some staff perform great and helpful, some are just plain, even when i smiled at them and thank them for doing something, no facial expression or smile back from them.
Overall, stay at hard rock pattaya is recommended, especially if you already know what to expect from hard rock hotel chain cause this hotel is lived up to the expectation
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I have stayed at the Hard Rock Hotel in Pattaya twice now in the last  year and loved it both times. Ralph and the service staff were great and will use it for all my yearly trips to Thailand from now on. Glad to see the rooms and Hotel are getting a much needed face lift. Keep up the good work.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Perfect location on Beach Road & Second Road , very friendly staff from the bell boy to Receptionist, Swimming pool life guard all of them were kind & helpful.
Half km from walking street, full security on gates.
The best Swimming pool with entertainment & games, highly recommended for families & kids. You mus try the Hard Rock Cafe delicious food & service.

I have stayed here before which is why I returned.  Problem was - I planned to stay a week or more but when I booked a room through their Website I kept getting prices that were all over the place from $46/night up to $142/night.  So I booked one night getting the lower price.  When I arrived I asked the manager about the crazy prices and she replied that they are closing the hotel in 2 days.   I guess that's the end of my review!

get wild at the hardrock bar...great night of dancing and having fun...get drunk..great music...great company...fun..fun...fun..strategic location right by the beach in Pattaya...friendly staff...great service..

WARNING there are fake fire detectors in all rooms and corridors, this hotel is a disaster waiting to happen, also there are only one fire bell / alarm every floor, in the middle. if there is a fire then you will not hear the fire alarm. also if there is a fire in your room the smoke will kill you before the hotel staff is warned.
 when asking for the managers comments before printing this, he replyed that he did not have the time to answer. even hven i was there for 4 days.
also there are mushrooms in the showers since there is no outlet from the showers.. its a great hotel, bat i did not sleep well when thinking the sinaro of an fire.
also internet did not work in the room.

Details make a hotel special. The fine attention to details make the Hard Rock Hotel a truly special hotel. I've been living and traveling throughout Thailand over the past few years. I've stayed in many hotels from a $11 a night budget hotels to some of the best 5-star resorts. The Hard Rock Hotel in Pattaya is one of my favorite places to be. If you've traveled in Thailand, you know that the service can be rough at times. Not at the Hard Rock. From the minute you step foot on the property the staff is there to greet you with a smile and attend to your needs.
We were fortunate enough to receive a Kings Club Seaview room. If you're traveling as a couple, a club room is completely worth the extra money. Many of the club rooms I've stayed at before are limited in selection and service but not here. You really don't need to eat outside of the hotel. And, from 6-7:30pm they offer free cocktails, beer and wine. 
The pool is probably the best feature of the hotel. The staff keep the pool and grounds exceptionally tidy and are always available to take your drink or food order. 
What impressed me the most was seeing the general manager everyday interacting with guests and staff. I had written him before my arrival to make him aware of the special family trip we were about to take. And, to my surprise, he had a complimentary bottle of wine and letter welcoming us. And, as I stated earlier, I've stayed in many hotels in Southeast Asia and around the world. Rarely does a general manager personally go out of their way to make a guest feel special. Mr. Smith is a class act and his generosity is greatly appreciated by myself and my family. 
Details matter when you're traveling. From the superbly comfortable beds to the music playing in the hallways the Hard Rock pays attention to details. I'm already looking forward to my next stay.

Only problem according to me in the hotel was 
1. No free drinking water in hotel .
2. No free swimming tube . 
Room were clean and location was fabulous , pool was super cool overall a 5 star property . 
I loved it

I like the Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya. Everybody can enjoy the party foam on saturday. Good vision for firework. Good Location. Cleanliness Room.  Good Service.  Good and Service mind Staff. Great Breakfast. Easy to transports.

There was good service. and i felt comfortable and clean, and mostly service was good. Location is strategy, when you walk out from the hotel you will see Family Mart and 7-11 just in front of you and the shopping center is just nearby the hotel (walking distance around 5 to 10 min). Love it and will come back stay again~!!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We were supposed to have FREE LAUNDRY during our stay BUT unfortunately Hard Rock hotel could not provide the free laundry service even we could send our laundry around 2pm and wish to get back by the next day which before 10am due to checkout. Their reason was laundry gonna closed at 4pm which is not possible for them to send back EVEN by the next day before 10am! So we have to "burn" our FREE SERVICE which provided by the hotel itself.

Large swimming areas make this place a great stop for families.  The Soul Lounge has a great pool table , drinks and food served by very competent and friendly staff. There also is good mellow live jazz.
The food elsewhere is quite good although on a recent weekend the hotel was full and breakfast was very crowded. 
Overall it’s a well run place and has a lot for everyone.

This hotel was great! Very clean modern rooms. The staff was excellent. The pool is very large. A quick 2 minute taxi ride or 10 minute walk to the night life. Food was very good, especially the breakfast which was included. Highly recommend!

Nice hotel, but as a lot of hotel in Asia sometimes has problems about noise. Not noise from pool or street (it's normal is Pattaya) but from others guest also eatlein the morning. I was curious to give a look to foam party: definitely it's not Ibiza. And I think not a great idea that a guest that spend a lot of money for the room has to pay. So difficult to explain to the staff that I was guest so I had to pay 200 and not 380, so strange that u have one drink included but...no beer! Anyway if you don't go to the party if you get a good price hotel it's very good

The property of Hard Rock hotel is great clean and great facilities freindly & helpful staffs. The sauna was great the pool was perfext for adult and children, also we loved the food there as they are varieties of them to try.

I was breastfeeding mum and I travel without my sons, so I very appreciated that hotel staff willingness to help to keep my express breastmilk into freezer. Especial thanks to Boy as my prepared icebox was not big enough and he offered me 1. Really appreciate his effort. Just a little bit annoying when 1 of the day the toilet wasn't clean and smelly, however, it was ok on next day.  
I will back in next week. Hope see u all again.

Value for money,room was nice,staff were friendly,food was good, swimming pool huge, location was perfect too. So far the best hotel i have stayed in pattaya so far, good service when checking in, breakfast was good too on level 9 .

Hard rock cafe Pattaya hotel is an amazing place to stay, i really love the hotel. ambiance and hospitality is just perfect. Good cafes and restaurant and bars and pool is really big. i really enjoyed with my family. foam party on Saturday night was really awesome.

There are great activities , security for attended party and song. I think that foam party should close at 2.00 am. Weaknesses is parking and late check out untill 12.30 should  be 13.00because last night hard party but understand that fully booked on Sunday ka😁
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: It's was wonderful moment with great services,great food,great entertainment and great pool also.i spend 3 to 15 days stay  in hard rock hotel pattaya and we will always come back.thank you for all crew's...we are the rock...

My family and I spent 1 night at Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya. We have been very impressed with the hotel, excellent service, great room and superb King Club!
Overall we enjoyed very much our stay, great food, very good service around the pool with friendly team!
The kids club is very nice and great service, My son enjoyed so much it was hard to getting out.
Well I will for sure return at Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya.

I have been staying in hardrock for 4 to 5 times since 2010. For my recent stay in May 2018, I noticed a slight degradation of service.  Upon check in at the rock royalty lounge and entered my room, I had to wait for my luggage for over 30 minutes and only upon I called the operator, my luggage finally appeared.  Besides, the female staff working in the kids club seem to understand only basic English and hardly smiled, she seemed to not enjoying her work in the club and gave me an impression that she did not like my kid staying in the kids club for too long and I had to take back my kid as soon as possible.  Other than the above two points, the room, the location and other services, in particular all staff serving the pool, remained perfect,

The Hardrock as normal was a fantastic hotel, we used our points for a free night after staying in Bali last year.  The waterpark was great for the kids.  The only thing I don't understand about Hardrock is there pricing there always seem to price themselves out, if they would reduce there prices around the pool by 25-40% and have more promotions happy hours daily etc then I actually think they would make more money.  Even let people/families use the pool inflatables for free....

very good service and thank you very much. Special thanks to Khun Ann and all of staff fpr take care my family during stay at Hardrock hotel. This time we have back to Bkk in emergemcy but we will go to Hardrock again

Stayed in this hotel for 2 nights for business. Overall there was nothing in particular that was very bad, however I expected a lot more from this hotel. Perhaps the hotel guests of whom 90% appear to be Chinese have different expectations? I have following points noted below that reflect my poor rating for this hotel.
- Hotel is generally a little shabby and needs updating. Examples: Pool around the bar area was very dirty with lots of particles floating around. My room had strands of hair in and around the bathroom.: Carpet in the elevator is dirty stained. I am sure I would have noticed more if the interior was not so dark.
- The service at the restaurant was very poor. I got my order processed OK, but there was no follow up. It had taken some time to get their attention when I needed something. The guy in the table next to me actually had his meal removed from the table thinking that he was finished with it when he left to go to the bathroom. They were very apologetic and replaced the food...but that's not the point.
- Concierge arranged a taxi for me on departure. I specifically asked for a taxi that will run his meter. When the taxi arrived he already negotiated a 1,200 baht fare for a 25 minute taxi ride. I know I got ripped off but did not have the time to argue. Not sure if the concierge got a kick back or not? BTW my taxi ride from the Sheraton centre of Bangkok to the Hard Rock was 1,600 baht.
- It was also noisy at night, music coming from the restaurant.

It’s was fun and fancy. Appreciated that you guys did your best to find the room byvwhat we requested! I love breakfast and the fancy space .  Especially free fitness and sauna. Will be back again for sure! Xxx

Enjoyed the hotel and location, the staff were excellent and prompt with friendly Hard Rock Service. The hotel is extremely well maintained, This is my second stay in this hotel, last been over 10 years ago.
i stayed on business with a company conference, the meeting facilities were excellent as was the food.
Would highly recommend this hotel for either business or few days to relax.

it was our first trip to pattaya and like bali,there are hundreds of hotels/resorts/villas/condos to choose from.decided to play it safe and settled for this resort.
LOCATION: on the beach road but entrance was at the back.mid-sized car-park with security.just across the road from the beach and meters away from restaurants
CHECK-IN: Fast and friendly
ROOM: I had booked 2 superior rooms via Agoda and requested for interconnecting rooms but was told that only deluxe seaview rooms had this.upgrade would cost THB 2000.00 per room.Should have done this when i booked as it would have only cost THB 200 more than a superior room! rooms were as expected,nice,clean and modern.beds were comfy and view was great! full mini-bar and mutiple channels in many languages on the flatscreen.there was even a mini-stereo! bathroom was nice but water pressure was kinda low for my liking
POOL: fabulous! large and different sections for kids,games and pros.best part is it closes at 10pm and there are 2 lifeguards all the way till closing time!
FOOD: we didnt have meals at the hotel but had dinner at the adjacent hard rock cafe.food and service was good but HRC was pretty small.band was ok as the same bands do the hard rock cafe tour in asia,and i've been to quite a few and have seen this band before.decent
CHECK-OUT: Fast and effiecient
STAFF: Like with all the Hard Rock Hotels and Cafes i've been to,the staff are mainly young and vibrant.no different here.full of energy which is a plus point.kudos to the chain's HR management!

HR's are always good hotels, Pattaya is no exception, nice room, nice pool, food is good, you can have western food if you want which is also good. Staff are friendly and helpful.  What more do you need from a Hotel?

A really great time for our family, everybody enjoyed the stay included my 6 years old daughter...
The kids activities throughout the day are just great.
Breakfast is wonderful.
Ideal location just minutes from shopping mall, the beach is in the other side of the street.
The staff are just great and helpful !

I and my family went to take a rest at this hotel. The room is neat and comfortable. My child also have a lot of fun with Foam Party in the afternoon. Except that, they have a lot of things to pay such as kids room , climbing , water floating things, etc. all of them are additional expeditures. However, I still like this hotel in terms of Room, Breakfast and Hard Rock Cafe.

Hotel was very good, staff were warm and hospitality. I had enjoyed the promotion spa in the hotel and it was very nice and enjoyable with skilled massage staff.
Swimming pool in the hotel was beautiful and facilities were also nice. The Hard Rock Cafeteria outdoor dinning was a wonderful place for dinning with live Rock music.
Room was clean and quiet, but the washroom was not very convenience for the bath, there was no bathtub and got only a fixed overhead shower which was no good for ladies and kids. 
Location of the hotel was good which was next to the beach and only few minutes walk to Festival Central.
All in all, I enjoyed my 5 days stay in the hotel.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Great stay with family. Good location. Lots of fun activities. Loud music was a bit late from foam party until 1AM. Not so sleep friendly. Excellent service and friendly staffs. Nice big pools. We'll go back.

Rooms do need some updates like TV and carpets are getting dirty. Fridges are smelling now very old. Bathroom is still great. Bed is super comfy. Pool update is fantastic. So just a few things need to improve the hotel.

The first day I arrived the hotel with my couple found the hotel overall presentation were good. When we enter our room, the decoration deeply impressed us of its tidienes as well all room's details. However, I realized there was no brushing set supply. The hotel staff top it up after I expedited a call for the captioned.
The entire stay with 4 days, started from 11 to 15 check out. The pool side environment deeply impressed us and we enjoy the moment we spent there. 
As I remembered, in one of the day, we are going to search for genuine crocodile leather products, the pool side guy demonstrated the willing to help ethos, he was endeavoring to provide us inforMario, and eventually we could bought the right thing, at the right place, from the right source. I on behalf my couple would like to deliver our warmest regards to the guy who assisted us in the due course.
On the one of the day, we had booked an one day tour with picked up from Hard Rock at around 8 o'clock. However, the tour company did not turn up for almost 20 minutes past. Then I approached to the front desk, the front desk helped me to confirm and retrieved the pick up for us. This episode rendered with great impressions as we were not familiar to deal with local company. 
The trip had been finished, I commented the hotel with high level of overall performance and worth to introduce to my friends.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
So, I booked this hotel based on the reviews here.  Overall, I find the rating and reviews to be quite accurate, thanks Trip Advisor!
This hotel is in a great location.  The beach is across the street, walking street is just down the street, and all the shopping and food is just down the street.  The hotel is a little dated, but very well maintained and the grounds are amazing.  There were zero construction noises (a big win for anywhere in Pattaya), and the room was very clean.  The bed was comfortable, and the shower was amazing.  The room was very quiet, and the curtains easily darkened out the entire room.  Quite a peaceful place for being a Hard Rock, and right in the middle of the Pattaya nightlife. The absolute best thing about this hotel is the staff.  Several of them actually asked and remembered my name, shook my hand, and genuinely were kind, friendly, and helpful.  Wifi was great here too, in room and on site.
Only a few negatives I'd list for this hotel (why I gave 4 instead of 5 stars). I've eaten at 3 restaurants here.  All 3 were extremely expensive, but the quality was far from matching the price.  I understand pricey food for these properties in prime locations, but the quality should match.  Don't bother with Breakfast, saying it was mediocre would be a huge compliment, and was 400 baht per person.  The Hard Rock Cafe was the same way, friendly, amazing people, but expensive and questionable quality food.  The only other issue that I have is the plumbing.  No matter what you do in the toilet, it requires several flushes for it to go away, and most times it just didn't.  There is no bowl brush, or bum gun cleaner, so it's a bit of an experience.
Overall though, I had a wonderful time at this hotel, and the people really made me feel welcome here.  The pool and property is great, and the location can't be beat.

I stayed with family for 5 nights having booked the hotel less than 48 hours before flying to Thailand.  The hotel assisted me by helping to arrange a private transfer vehicle for the nearly 2 hour journey from Bangkok Suvarnabumi Airport to the hotel.  The flight arrived early and still the transport was available to us a soon as we were ready for it.  On arrival at the hotel having paid for a Kings Club room there is the added benefit of personalised check in services.  The room was a lovely size although a little bit warm as it was facing into the sun for much of the day and has a lovely big window.
The staff were exceedingly friendly and soon knew the names of all of my family.  There is lots of music as would be expected at a Hard Rock venue and lots of fun things to do; listen to a band playing poolside, attending a foam party, zorbing on the pool, cocktail hour, games in the Kings Clubroom, spa facilities the list goes on.  
Outside the hotel it was easy to access lots of other things to do from spa type activities to watersports and elephant treking.  
For a last minute holiday this was certainly more than I had hoped that it would be and all with the added advantage of being in Thailand where the cost of living and entertaining is significantly less than the UK.  
Super venue!!!

Having stayed there many times it's always good to return, have to say that any hotel is only as good as the staff, and this is where Hard Rock wins hands down.
First impressions are very important, on the first of our two stays we were welcomed by "Fluke", nothing was too much trouble and he made us feel very welcome, we were taking my partners parents and brothers and sisters away following her graduation, mum and dad hadn't stayed in a hotel for 25 years. Fluke made them feel like stars, and we had a great stay.
The stay was great, every member of the team, check-in, cleaners, pool and restaurant staff all provided excellent service and helped us all enjoy our stay - thank you one and all.
On our first stay we had a city view room, lovely room, though I do like a sea view.
Our second stay was last minute, we were actually going somewhere else and changed our minds en-route, we booked via our smart phone through an agent, in fact we arrived so quickly the booking hadn't made it onto the system. That didn't phase the staff and we were soon in our room and onto the pool.
This time we had a sea view room, whilst I do love my sea view when they refurbished the rooms they seem to have made the rooms bigger by removing the balcony, I don't think that was a good move.
All in all two good stays, and look forward to our return in the not too distant future.
One thing worth of note, we were in the HRC All Access scheme which gave us a discount on food and merchandise, when we stayed over the Christmas holiday our discount was not given and we advised to sign up for the new HRC Reward Card. We duly signed up for the programme and presented our card for our points at the Hard Rock Cafe during this visit, our card was declined and were advised that Pattaya were not participating in the programme - it was still being advertised within the cafe though.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Stayed at hardrock for four days.
Have stayed at hard rock for the past 14 years every year
Great time as usual  but service at the pool needs more staff hard to get food or drink
Makes it hard to enjoy you stay when you wait half a hour for a drink at a bungalow.
Management need to step up there game. 
Shame my favourite hotel in pattaya...
Never seen pattaya so quiet at this period which makes it even worst from the service point .

I did confirm our room-type a few days before arriving  but didnt get the correct ones and this is the second time i had this problem with this hotel!!  And the noise from the pool was really annoying. Such a disappoint staying. However, overall service was acceptable. The pools and restaurants staffs were friendly and helpful.

WE arrived after a hectic and tiresome tour of genting highlands and this hotel was a bliss.
Travelling with young children, the hotel (never seen such smiling and helpful Staff) immediately upgraded us to a suite which was sea facing. The inhouse games for kids, amazing swimming pool and the most comfortable room was compelling us to stay for more days, but the international itinerary does not allow you that flexibility. Therefore, any of you readers, if planning to visit Hard Rock in Pattaya, then give yourself 2-3 days to enjoy the comforts of the hotel. The cafe on the main road serves one of best margaritas if I have ever had ! The location of the hotel is par excellence which makes it walking distance from beach and 5 mins drive from all the other attractions of Pattaya.
A must stay !!

I always like staying at Hard Rock Pattaya, now the hotel looks awesome <3 All the decorations and interior design I love so much. Every time I stop over Pattaya, this is the place, I love to be. When you stay at the hotel, you would expect something as comfortable as your own place, I love the bed here so much. Lovely place to be.

Had a great family holiday for the water festival will be back for sure xmas kids love it 
Food buffet was on of the best we have ever had plenty of range seafood to dessert.
Water festival was a safe environment for the kids with plenty of action at the pool for them or on the balcony water fighting

I stayed in this Hotel, I love the view of this hotel, from the room you can view the beach scene. Swimming pool is very big and pool side bar is also awesome. Hotel staff was very co-operative. Breakfast was really great and lot of varieties were available.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Hard Rock Pattaya is overall quite good, especially the swimming pool, large enough, iconic shape and also love the "water" activities created by the team.
Room size is a bit small and it is suggested to have touch-up renovation.  But glad that the air-conditioning is very strong!
Please also improve the ventilation of bathroom, I feel like I was having sauna after shower...hahaha

Hard rock-one of the best hotels in Pattaya for all kind of people. The best location, the best pool, the best animation team, excellent food for its category. I am pleased to come to this hotel again

service excellent very nice , room very clean , children liked swimming pool and party foam so much , staff very nice everybody , but kids club have expense not free and air condition lose , i come back as soon as.

Stayed with this hotel recently during my 2-day business trip to Pattaya. I have always love the culture at Hard Rock hotels and this one is no different. Staff are pretty friendly and check in took around 5 minutes. I was lucky to be upgraded to a Deluxe Seaview Room where space is abundant for 1 person or even 2 persons. Love the modern concept of the refurbished room. The room was quiet which is conducive for work and for rest - although I don't mind some music. I did not manage to explore around the hotel vicinity but right at the door step, you can get some really nice decent maasage at THB250 which I feel is a bonus! The location is right smack in the centre of Pattaya, good for party-goers and people who love shopping. I would recommend this hotel to fellow business travellers, friends and families who love the pool!
I love Hard Rock!

Wow—my first Hardrock Hotel experience and it was worth every 
dollar! The hotel is centrally located in town across from beach and for shopping and nightlife. I booked the Composer 1 BDRM suite with airport car transportation for an additional charge. However, you can book a private car at the airport as well, but it made things much easier for my first time visiting. Arriving international flights expect a minimum 1HR to clear customs and immigration—ensure arrival customs arrival card is filled out in entirety before getting off plane. For planning, ride from airport to hotel was ~ 1HR-30MIN. Check-in was on the 9th floor in the Rock Royalty lounge (VIP), which provides light foods and refreshments throughout the day, followed by cocktail hour (6-7:30) in the evening—a must before going into town. The hotel offers unique bars, restaurants, and entertainment on site and gets quite lively in the evening. The pool area is spacious, reasonably so, with the bubble party every day Saturday—try it. The Spa services in the morning are refreshing after a late night in the town. Buffet breakfast is served in the lobby and Club level—excellent variety of tastes. The Rock Shop and Hotel shop have different souvenirs so ensure u visit both for exclusive merchandise. Club access (9/10 floor) is the way to book reservations based on all the free amenities, discounts, and pampering, which is included in room price—cheap. Lastly, enjoy your stay and sign up for Rock Awards for future discounts. Best, JB

at this moment a huge construction site next to the hotel! Very noisy at the pool! Drinks at hotel very expensive so nobody there for a drink. Not much variety in the breakfast, it's our second and last time here merely because the hotel doesn't inform guest about the huge construction site at all.
Staff however friendly.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Last time i was here was 5-6 yr back and that time the hotel needed renovation badly and now they are fully renovated.. u can find lot of the changes in the rooms and the lobby , coffee shop etc. 
They have improved a lot and its surely better. The rooms looks much better and brighter.
All thier twins are queen size so can easily accommodate 2Ad & 2 Ch without an extra bed. 
Bathroom doens't have tubs. 2 drawbacks in the bathroom is that they only have big rain shower and they don't have normal shower so its quiet difficult for gals like us who doens't want to get hair wet during bath and 2nd is that the glass which spilt between the bath and toilet area is small so the water do go to wash basin and toilet area which makes the whole bathroom wet. 
Beside that nothing to complain about..
The pool area is great and lot of the acitivites for the kids and teenagers. Location of the hotel is right on the beach road. 
Indian Breakfast spread is good from American to Asian with Indian dishes too. 
Hard rock cafe is right on the beach road and they serve one of the best cocktails in town.
Will surely visit again as Kids loves it.

We were at hard rock for 2 night stay. Awesome hospitality, good food, clean rooms, beautiful view from room.. everything was just TOOO good. 
Special mention Mr Simon was very supportive .he planned n executed are outdoor trip, I mean sight seeing . He made sure That we go back with beautiful memories of Pataya. 
Hotel staff even arranged a baby sitter to tc of our daughter so that I n my hubby could enjoy some good time together.
Overall fantastic experience n memorable moments 
Will visit again for sure. Thanks again to simon, keep up the good work.

Concierge is good. Frontdesk not good. Staff by the poolside should be trained. Restaurant is fine. Room is nice and clear. The reason I gave a 2 stars is we didn't feel welcome to this hotel. It just seemed that staff were trying to charge for whatever they could at any possible time. Facility-wise, I recommend this place. Staff wise when it comes to the front-desk especially, I recommend you train them to become less arrogant when dealing with the customer.

Stayed for a night in the famed hard rock hotel on the Pattaya beachfront. The sea-view rooms are spectacular. the hotel decor is typical of this chain of hotels.... rock n roll memorabilia, dark shades, iconic trademarks like guitars, rock star costumes, music channels streaming videos, music, rooms with personal mini hi-fi systems, foam parties in the pool & the hard rock cafe ( open from 1100 hrs till very early morning....playing excellent live rock music). The rooms are tastefully decorated albeit i would say that the maintenance was low.....(my shower broke down) the service was efficient , the mechanic fixed it in the next 30 mins but then i had to leave for my day trip in a hurry. The high point of the stay however was the food: a rockin choice of continental, Thai & Indian cuisine. The famed Hard Rock Cafe lives up to its reputation playing great live rock music. the pool is unique in its design with its own sand-beach. The meeting/conference rooms called "the hall of fame" are well equipped & also bear the typical dark furnishings associated with rockers but you find the staff is quite polite and can speak pretty good English which in Thailand is a definite advantage over many other hotels. All in all, the hotel provides quality service at a higher price. But then again ..... this is a "HARD ROCK HOTEL"

Second visit to Pattaya - usually a regular to Phuket. Stayed 10 days in February. Service here is excellent to say least - front counter staff all seem to command a good knowledge of english language and are "hip "in style of communication. Hotel amenties cater for all ages and a lot of pool activities dedicated to younger visitors. Well located to beach but a taxi or tuk tuk to better entertainment areas south of hotel. Rooms good but recent refurbishment has largened room by removing balconies on most rooms so be aware here if your are like us and love a balconey.
Beaches are clean and shopping value for money good due to competition. the infamous Walking Steeet has undergone a change and now virtually nothing but Go Go clubs - not worth the time. Hotel good value for money and recommended.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Room was big and clean.
Staff well spoken and very polite.
Location was amazing, right opposite the beach and a short walk to the shopping centre or you could catch the local taxi the run along the street and honk to see if you need a lift, only 20 Baht per person.
The pool! Wow, never had so much fun with all the activities the arrange, we are a young couple and were surprised at how much fun we were having plus we scored a free beer from wining one of the games. 
The pool was also the first heated pool we experienced in our trip! 
Definitely returning to Hard Rock next time we visit Pattaya.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I stayed 4 nights during business trip. I did not expect much, and therefore this hotel was able to surprice me positively. The lobby is not very welcoming and the entry and exit process is slow. The room we had was large with extra sofa/bed, but no balcony. Some rooms have balcony and thefore the room is smaller. The toilet/shower was in good condition and size, but a bit dim. Overall the room was slightly better than average. My wife had a birthday, and the hotel remembered her with a chocolate cake, a nice positive gesture.
Hotel breakfast buffet was OK, average. We also had lunch and dinner and the average comment is still valid in my opinion. The pool area was quite nice, large with a good pool and enough good sunbeds. The location of the hotel is good, just in the middle of the Pattaya beach across the street. Overall we felt we have good value for money this time.

Amazing view from the room. Food is very good. Pool and the ambience is really nice. Hotel staff is friendly. 
The location of the hotel is the best. 
There is only one problem 
Room size is a little small. But overall a very good property

Hard Rock Hotel is my favorite chains.So that why I always give my review and feedback to property.
10th April 2019 - Wednesday 
I was arrived in the HRH Pattaya and has been warm welcome by Kin from the bellman service.He totally welcomed myself.He assisting my luggage and keep my luggage in the luggage storage room while waiting my room.
Next i would like to say thank you to Jeanne for expedite my check in process.Kudos also to Megan,Ava,Eve.
Jeanne is the receptionist who check in myself to the property.
Megan was helped myself by giving direction to go to the attraction places in Pattaya.Very knowledgeable person.
Ava and Eve are totally awesome and cheerful personality.
Congrats to all of them.You guys ROCKSS!!!
During afternoon, I kinda hungry a liitle bit then I decided to go Hard Rock Cafe Pattaya and ordered some foods.
This is place that i met another person , named Joe.He is Duty Manager in the Hard Rock Cafe Pattaya.He is funny guy,great and pleasant personality too.Thank you Joe for your great hospitality service that you rendered.Really appreciated.But I am so sorry because I didnt get opportunity to take selfie with you on last day in there.One day I will coming again and meet up with you.Not to forget to Pokkie for the great service,she always taking care all my foods and drinks all the way while myself enjoyed the liveband in the cafe.
11th April 2019 - Thursday
On my 2nd days in Pattaya and especially in Hard Rock Hotel,I was planned to do my own itinerary by visiting all the attraction places in Pattaya.Guideline and information  given from Kin,Megan,Som and Rat from Limo & Tour Desk / Frontdesk.All of them are totally awesome.They shared information with all the accurate details.Not to forget to Woody for assisting myself to bring up my shopping item to the room.I gave him permission to enter my room 531.
Right after I had a long day, I need a massage from Rock Spa and i met Pim.she is the manager if im not mistaken.She gave me some suggestions for the body treatment.She booked for me the treatment and slot the time.She assigned one massauer named Attam - young lady.Attam was very good in massage and pressure.She did a very good job until i fall to sleep all the way treatment time for 90mins.Thank you for both of them.Pim and Attam.
Rock Shop in Hotel and Cafe 
Thank you so much for Nina in Rock Shop at the cafe and Joy from Rock Shop at the Hotel.Both of them totally assisting myself for buying all the rockin' merchandise.Very cheerful personality.
I also met one of the Sales and Marketing Manager named Kawee Suwanchartphan.This gentleman totally rockin' and i had great conversation with him.Thank you Kawee for the hospitality service.
Last but not least , please extend my regards to the in house liveband group.They totally great performer.They are ROCKS!! really enjoyed their show.Kudos to Naqita Band Group from Indonesia.
For the higher management of Hard Rock Hotel and Cafe,please give them a round of applause to all of them.They deserve to have the credits from the management due of the hospitality service that they rendered and portray during my stay for 3 days.
They deserve to work there and please take care of them as well.All of them totally Rockin' crew. 
Thank you 
Muhammad Dziauddin Mahamud
Singapore

In the tradition of all Hard Rock properties, Hard Rock Pattaya is a cool, comfortable, enjoyable experience from the Rock Star free parking reserved w/ license plate number, Signature Smell in the Lobby to high quality bedding and in-room Bose bluetooth speaker.

We stayed at the family room with a King size bed and a double-decked bed for the kids and they really loved the space and having their own play area.
Go for the foam party catered to the family as well as the later one for the adults, both have their own themes and to us were the highlights of our stay (beside the food of course).
The pool and gym were great and they are not the typical ones you find in other generic hotels.
Any cons? ok maybe the price is a little on the high side

Maid forgot a pink tatter on the bedside lamp in our room .But all of this place, we had fun and enjoy the song and the staff at the cafe. We love the swimming pool and activity in this hotel. We spend time at the restaurant in the hotel. All the staff are very nice.

This is by far the most professionally run and friendliest "cannot do enough for you" staffed hotel we have had the pleasure of staying in, so much so, we are already planning a return stay towards the end of the year!
Our room had a view "to die for" and standard of furnishing, fixtures, fittings, facilities, food and more over the superb hospitality befitting a hotel costing many times what we paid per night if it were in the UK.
The executive manager John, made every effort to make this a special dream holiday for us, as I had given advance notice it was to be a double celebration for us on our wedding anniversary combined with a memorable birthday milestone of which he organised a surprise by sending up to our room as soon as we arrived, a beautiful celebratory cake for two! Absolutely fantastic customer focus here nit just from John, but all the staff! They are all very friendly and we wish to pay special tribute to Gina in the "Starz" restaurant, she is a great asset to Hard Rock Hotel Group and reason why we wouldn't hesitate to mention her name. 
Thank you John and the team at Hard Rock Hotel, Pattaya.....
Rock on!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Took me awhile to thank you for such a wonderful helpful host .
Assisted a guest to recover his passport from one of many money changer along beach front on such a short notice, plus arranging a taxi deliver the lost passport to Bangkok. 
It save me so much trouble and allow me to leave on schedule flight the next day .
Not to forget , your kind assistance helping me to purchase a set of ticket from Alcazar show , when we just check in the hotel with very little time to get organized over a short stay in Pattaya.
I owe you one CHARLES ! , and , look forward to be back to Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya again . 
YS - Borneo Islander

By far the best hotel in Pattaya,every department of the hotel has very dedicated and professional staff..I could not say one single bad thing about my stay..Special thanks to Quito and Anne,who both add real value to the hotel!

Excellent hotel to stay with family. Rooms were good but a little dated. Close to beach and central nightlife. Daily organised activities were a highlight, especially the bubble foam party. Staff were friendly and helpful and entertaining.

Location and services and view and price are good, the swimming pool is big and sure will have lots of fun....
Everything was good except breakfast, not that much choices and the coffee is too bad!!!!

Get a sea view room. You won't be disappointed. Will help make for a great stay here.The pool bar was one of the best pool bars I've ever been to. Eddie behind the bar made the holiday easy and fun. Breakfast was great with a huge range to choose from. All the staff were friendly and helpful, even when we where extremely intoxicated. I truly had a great stay at the Hard Rock in Pattaya. I WILL BE BACK. THANK YOU GUYS

My wife and I stayed for one night during the Songkran period. We enjoyed the pool, poolside bar, dinner and breakfast. We thought the service was excellent, the food was good, and the room was comfortable.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Nice hotel for the family, specially for the kids. 
Not probably the best hotel if you want a quite environment to rest. 
Since is for the kids I would also improve/upgrade the game consoles on the Game room. They are outdated by around 8 years.

Stayed in the hotel for 4 nights with family, booked deluxe city view rooms (connecting),be honors, I will not consider returning to this hotel.  
This is not the worst hotel I visited but just feel missing something here. 
Hotel is aged, as well as the amenities, towels are torn, using condemn towels; the exhaust fan filter in bathroom is full of dust, the pool, especially the beach side, slider area is dirty, full of candy wraps...
I booked 2 deluxe city view connecting rooms but can only see the roof top... My dad accidentally broken the gargle mug by dropping it into the washing basin, I informed Reception in case housekeeping get hurt by the broken glasses but I was told that will be a charge, but when I asked how much that will cost, the receptionist only offered someone to pick up the mug and I only found out that costs 30baht upon my departure. I just paid it off but feel like lack of courtesy as that’s an accidentally and only a gargle mug, staff concern about the replacement cost more than guest. 
Anyways, F&B staff are friendly, we enjoyed our dinner and breakfast there. 
The location of the hotel is very convenience but with loads of hotel in that area, I may stay in other hotels instead of this one.

I booked this hotel without knowing anything but rock stars. After staying there, I realized that this hotel was very friendly for every kind of guests, couple, family (especially for kids), young or senior. I was very impress with the front staff since I forgot my mobile phone at the counter and he tried to find me at last. Thank you so much.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Booked for 4 nights. Was really surprised about the dirty pool. It is not at all a 4star hotel, 3 stars would fit. If you know HRH better don't go there. Room was first floor with garbage view. Shower was dirty and there is no cabinet only a small"gap"
My room was pre-paid but I decided to leave after 2 nights. 
If you want a 4-5 star hotel better take the dusit, if you want a party hotel it's ok but rate is way too high.

Breakfast doesn't have many choice.
Room is good.
If it have shuttle bus to the walking street, it will be better.
Swimming pool is big but so many insect in it, need more cleaning.
The sun chair is wet after raining, better to use other material.

Been here three times, I love this place. The pool is great, the food is awesome and the rooms clean and fun! Pattaya is a horrible little town in places, very seedy and unpleasant. Generally we don't leave the hotel....and you don't need to! 2 hours from central Bangkok and you're at a great resort offering everything you need. Very reasonably priced also, check their website for good offers.

Holidays were excellent for all my family. My baby liked pools, waterslides, foam party, breakfasts. I and my husband liked everything:cleanliness, location. We did not hear our neighbours, Service near the pool was good.

This is the third Hard Rock Hotel we have stayed at. We stayed under the Kings Club option. The breakfast buffet was great with plenty of choices and the chefs were ensuring most items were continuously fresh. Breakfast at the Kings Club was much quieter and a much smaller choice of food. The pizzeria was fantastic, particularly the calzone. Buffet dinner at Starz Diner wasn't anything special with many differing choices. The sundae bar was great and plenty of sweet choices for desert. The happy hour cocktails and food were amazing and each evening there was a different selection of food. The pool bar was a lot of fun, the staff were friendly and more than obliging and the cocktails were delicious. The pool area and sun lounges filled up very quickly each day and most afternoons there wasn't much of a choice if any where to park your towels and belongings. The highlight of our trip was the Hard Rock Café and the current band NAQITA. They were the best house band we have ever seen. They were friendly and even learnt songs that we requested during our stay. Each night they made an effort to greet all the diners and returning guests. They also made each and every person feel welcomed. This trip was for my Husband's 30th and the band made it a perfect holiday. 
The only negative experience we had was when checking out; we were told we had to pay for using the King's Club the few times we did. We explained numerous times that it was included in the package that we had booked. The staff refused to listen to what we were saying and look through the documents we were given by our travel agent. In the end we payed the extra as the taxi to take us to the airport was waiting. Once checked out and on the way to the taxi, the staff flagged us down and explained that we were right all along and that they would immediately refund our money. This took another 30 minutes, making us later than we wanted to be leaving as well as taking over 24 hours for the money to be refunded back onto our card. We would still highly recommend this Hard Rock Hotel though. It is great for families and couples. We thoroughly enjoyed ourselves.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We have not stayed at this hotel maybe next time , from the views that we seen big pool looks like and great place for familys ,this was a night out at the hard rock cafe on the grounds of the hotel Great place for live bands, and cold beers the entertainment  was that good we stayed till closing time .

Overall a very nice experience. Was disappointed that the hotel of this standard had no business centre. Other than that everything was excellent. The staff was very nice; spoke English and were always there to assist.

The new pool is very good and it is wonderful not to be crowded.
 I liked the pool bar.
There is a convenience store and massage in front of the hotel.
We can easily catch the bus at the beach road to go walking street.

even thou we stayed only for a few hours due to an airline booking error (suppose to fly out Saturday night instead of Friday night), we enjoyed our stay due to the friendly staff (reception and concierge) and the very kid-friendly pool. would stay again next time.

Pattaya hard rock is located on beach road in a nicer quiet part, hotel security are amazing always guarding the entrance stopping none residents using the pool, the hotel it’s self is to die for with stunning decor and huge pool.
Will continue to use

my GF and I spent 4 days happily in Hard rock Pattaya and surrounds with an enjoyable swimming pool most days. Excellent breakfast selection looking forward every day for this. see you next time at hard rock
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Room smelt old damp and musty! Curtains dirty with holes in them and built up dirt on light switches, air con switch and door handles. I suggest opening windows and training cleaners how to clean. Boring room decor for a hard rock hotel. Disappointing experience
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I’ve been coming to Pattaya for the last 6 years. I’m always at the hard rock because we have come to know the friendly staff especially eve.
Thank you eve for everything. Without you I think we wouldn’t be there.

Room is not very clean, table and TV is dusty, room is small. 
Service is ok, staff is friendly, not value for money, considered expensive with this kind of room. 
Location is good, suit for tourist not for business traveler.

We had a great 3 day stay here in the Producer Suite which was lovely - 5 balconies! All the staff were good and friendly. Saturday night Buffet was excellent. Good fun for a range of family ages. Lovely pool.

and I am not sure I would return.
Rooms are OK without being exceptional, breakfast also was not outstanding and the music early in the morning was headache-inducing loud. The one saving grace was the Hard Rock Café which still makes some damn good burgers (as they should be for the money they charge).
The location is great though.
Service was a little lackluster at times, especially at the front desk.

The Hard Rock is a great hotel for holiday makers; especially if you are from the far east or Russian. You wont see many westerners here.
It caters well for families and does seem to look after them very well, especially small children, so if that's what you want go for it.
The facilities are of a very good standard and the rooms especially; large, bright and modern. I really liked the bathroom and shower.
Wi-Fi is free and was reliable during my stay which was great as I was on a business trip.
The breakfast was well above Thai standard with lots of choices.
I travel quite a lot in Thailand and am always impressed with the service given in the vast majority of hotels and guest houses. The Hard Rock seemed to go that extra mile; everyone from reception to housekeeping was wonderful and a credit to the organization. Check in and out was simple and you were made to feel welcome at all times. Its always a sign of  well trained staff when even after the first day they great you with your name.'
There are lots of other hotels in Central Pattaya which are a lot less expensive and to be honest, I wouldn't have stayed in the HRH had I not been booked in through my Company. Having said that I enjoyed the experience and would recommend it to anyone.

The Food is very good, also the people Workshop there. The Service was Great. The Drinks in the evening 6 PM are very good.and there are every das other Food. The view to the sea is also Great. 
The Cappuccino was delisees. We liked to stey in the lunch. We already bookted the next stay.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The location of the hotell is superb! We got a upgrade to a rock royalty level which was like a Vip! Seperate breakfast, noon snacks and dinner all included in rock royalty level. The pool was big and nice. Staff speaks good english
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
We all big family - 11 Adults + 3 child had great time with this superb hotel. 
We stays on King floor and yet we feel like a King!! King lounge got everything we need, we get everything we asks for. The lounge offers all day complimentary drink and finger bites for.  
Hotel very well maintanance, clean. All kids love the pool. Room was nice, clean. staff were friendly, helpful. Breakfast buffet with all we want!!! 
Hotel locates in good area, just few steps to the beach. easy get taxi to walking street.
We will surely back to Hardrock Pattaya on next visit.
They are many areas, cool + style where can take a shot to post on facebook, if you also facebook pictures post like we are crazy. This is a must hotel you choose stay!
Would recommend for family - and yes, to our friends.

We loved the hotel the location the atmosphere. The food was spectacular and the view was amazing loving to watch the boats and parasailing. I couldn't of asked for a better vacation. My girlfriend and I would definitely recommend it for anyone to stay
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Whenever in Pattaya I always stay at the Hard Rock Hotel. Reasons? Service is always great, pool is fantastic and the staff are always there smiling and willing to help!! Its location is great as its not too far from Walking Street but yet just far enough to be away from the bad stuff of Walking st too. 
Security there is great and even though its targeted at families i am never inconvinienced by small children making noise or getting in my way or anything like that! The rooms while need an update are always clean and the cleaning staff are fantastic too. The breakfast is good, everything you would expect from a 4 star. 
And the biggest plus? Its not over run by Russians like other hotels in the area!! Whilst there are some there being rude or pinching food from the breakfast area to eat at lunch time there isnt enough of the Russians there to ruin the hotel experience. I highly recommend this place!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Well I'm a regular to Thailand and I wanted to make sure my partner, who has never been, had a great time and she wasn't disappointed. We were upgraded to the executive floor that gave us access to a private dining room/club where we were treated to complimentary cocktails in the evenings, finger food, sandwiches all day and breakfast that were extremely tasty! Not to mention great coffee!! 
The staff always greeted us with a smile and greeting no matter where or when! And the service was outstanding, particular mentions to Matty manager on duty at times who could not do enough to ensure our stay was a pleasant one and Tony in the pool bar, always smiling!! And he can throw a basket too!! lol. Both a credit to to organization. I'm sorry that I can't mention all the other staff at the Rock but there were many who probably deserve a mention! My partner fell sick on the last few days as did I but the staff were always offering help and nothing was too much trouble. We will be back, the sooner the better! Thank you Hard Rock, great activities and entertainment! Only small complaint was, play some good old fashioned rock and roll around the pool.  Don't mind some new stuff but....
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Rooms were nice and all the staffs are very polite and friendly (from the security, front desk, house keeping, etc)Hotels were near to the beach. kids friendly hotel with pool activities and other games and entertained by staffs.

2th time stay at the Hard rock hotel feeling so good and amazing ... The rooms were clean and tidy , with nice shower and two double beds , big TV with many channels and movie, also can choose from and a stereo / CD player if you wanted to play your own music! The staff were super friendly and helping at anytime, my 3 kids like the swimming pool and kids activities so much, i recommend staying here because 5 reason: 1. Location near to beach(frondbeach) and Centara Pattaya Mall(300 m) 2. Nightlife around hotel 3. Many Restaurance and Cafe 4. Many 7-11 and Mini Mart 5. Centre main walking road...

Clean good location comfortable bed
Carpark convenience and enought parking slots,
The only thing is the lobby, a little old ,especially the lift, need doing some works,
Otherwise it seems not match with the whole atmosphere.

My wife, young son and I had such a great time during our last stay we decided to come back to Pattaya just to stay here for 5 days.  Again, everything was perfect.  The staff are fantastic.  The hotel is immaculately maintained.  The rooms are extremely comfortable.  The breakfast is great.  The location is ideal.  We truly have enjoyed our two stays here so much that we will definitely be back!
Thanks to all the staff for another wonderful stay!

2 girls staff from the front desk are rude and very arrogant, don't know guest dealing, they must be removed or transferred due to their behavior.
All other staff at concierge, pool side, road side cafe were very friendly and made the stay memorable.

This was our second trip to Thailand with friends and this time we decided to stay in a hotel located on the beach road. No other option was better than Hard Rock hotel. Its a beautiful hotel filled with fun. 
We upgraded our rooms from superior to deluxe. We got it done at a reasonable price as it was off season in Thailand due to rainy season. The rooms are very spacious and cleaned. The best part of the rooms are that they have sea facing balconies. One can sit in the balcony at evening and experience the beauty of sea. The rooms are decorated on a particular theme. 
The hotel staff is cooperative. 
The location of the hotel is excellent. Just in front of sea shore. Its located at the middle of the beach road. One can just walk down to Walking Street in just 10 mins. 
The restaurants of Hard Rock are amazingly built. Its heaven for Non Vegetarian lovers. Vegetarians have to hunt for food in the local market. 
The hotel has a massive swimming pool. Coctails and mocktails are served at the pool. 
One can do a lot more things at Hard Rock. Will love to stay again at Hard Rock. It really rocks.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The hotel is at a very good location. Beach is close and restaurants and shops are all around. Basically you don‘t even have to leave to hotel area though as the pool area is fantastic. It‘s a very kids friendly hotel with kind and helpful staff and modern and clean rooms. This was our 2nd. time to stay at this hotel and we could definitely recommend it.

Good services and nice location in the central of Pattaya
We found a cockroach in the restaurant when we had a breakfast. We already informed a waitress but she could not catch it before It was disappeare into our sofa to make our kids stop their meal
Water temperature in room is difficult adjustment, always too hot or too cold

Child-friendly environment,Great place to visit,Great mall nearby. Superb swimming pool,Awesome swimming pools,Fantastic pool side. Impeccable customer service,Attentive staff,Great in-room service. Awesome Brekky,Lovely complimentary breakfast,Great buffet breakfast,

I stayed at HardRock hotel Pattaya for 3days.
This hotel has good location. Not far from shopping center and beach.
A swimmingpool was also nice, newly renewed, well-equipped for family.
Staffs was also great. They were friendly and helpful. 
But, room was a bit small. I stayed at RockRoyal something room...
It was not smaller than other average hotel rooms.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Not much to discover beside music. However they have a great drink and food. Value for money. Nice area arounding and many attractive place to see. Would recommend to young people or whoever love some kind of this atmosphere.

This hotel is a truly 4 star hotel. It is across the beach. The room is nicely decorated with rock stars. It has a CD player in the deluxe room. Beautiful swimming pool. It also has a sand pool for the kids

Stayed here with friends for a week. We had booked executive floor and lounge. Booking in was so simple. The rooms were great and all the staff were really helpful. The pool is one of the high lights of the holiday always lenty of sun beds and staff members always walking around to take your order. Breakfast was very good with its own egg station. We used the executive lounge every day for soft drinks and a sandwich mid day. At night it was a good place to gather to decide where and what to do. The girls in the lounge worked very hard and were all ways asking if you wanted another drink. Top class, I can not think of a negative.

Without doubt the finest hotel I've stayed in during holidays both local and abroad.
The property is immaculately maintained. The seaview room i stayed in with its own balcony was spectacular. The room was spacious with a great size shower and rainwater head
The pool was an oasis of its own, perfect tempreature to sit in and relax after a tough day doing whatever you do.
Breakfast was a veritable feast, if you couldnt find something you liked you are a hard person to please with asian, indian and european food on the menu.. Yes even a jar of Vegemite for the Australian guest. Well done.
Most importantly the staff were the highlight of the stay. Simple things such as the doorman saying "have a rockin night" as you hit the town for the night. Congratulations to all the staff and management of the hotel

Stayed here for 4 nights. first impressions of any hotel is the reception staff, as usual in many hotels, never very welcoming, come on staff, "try and smile and be welcoming". Room was very chic, modern and clean, I asked for a balcony, sea view and that's what I got, very good. Personally I thought the buffet breakfast and the buffet dinner was of good variety and choice, very hygienic. Yes pricey for drinks and food, that's what your get at this type of hotel. Lovely big pool, plenty of sun beds during our stay. Great hotel to chill out and relax. Easy access to beach road  or second road, taxis waiting, no problem. All the on-site staff and entertainment staff were very friendly and made our stay very happy. Location, pool and modern room made this hotel for us, definitely stay here again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We feel HRP & HRCP are part of our family. Anytime when we come to your hotel we feel like we are going to our home.
