The hotel was worth every penny, outstanding. Would like to thank Eve (receptionist), Simon (bellboy) and Boom (our room maid), thank you. When we decide to come back to Pattaya we will be definitely staying at the Hard Rock Hotel again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: My husband and I have stayed at  the hard rock on numerous occasions and our son knows how much we love it there so he gave us a Christmas present of a 2 night stay at the hard rock. We thoroughly enjoyed it. Because we have stayed at the hotel a few times they gave us a gift of an evening meal in the restaurant. It was the buffet and it was absolutely delicious! Thankyou so much we will be coming again and we are recommending the hotel and buffet to all of our friends!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
We came here during the Songkran holidays and had an enjoyable stay.  The hotel has lots of free space for kids to roam around, yet you feel very secured due to the 
The service was great as the employees were very friendly and helpful.
Our room was spacious and clean.  The beds were very big and comfortable.
The buffet breakfast was very good as you can find a wide variety of both Western and Asian selections.  They have even added a new oven for the baking of fresh croissant, which was delicious.
The pool was very big and there were lots of fun activities organized around the pool.  Do check out the program of activities on the information board next to the counter where you pick up the pool towels.
Highly recommended for families with kids.

Especially on Saturdays you should not miss the buffet. Besides many kind of food,various and delicious seafood BBQ and Indian kitchen will invite you come again.No need to mention about Japanese food, cheese and dessert. You should try.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Just had many oldest man in pataya,maybe I am not going to there next time,but I like tom yum Kung in pataya.and mango,ate those every.when I came back don't forget it test.many people got there find young girl.

We stayed at the Hard Rock Hotel in Pattaya from 12th-22nd March. From the moment we arrived to the time we left we experienced exceptional service and entertainment from the girls at check-in through to the team at the pool, bar, spa and in-room dining.
I would like to thank the entire team at Hard Rock Pattaya for making our stay comfortable and a pleasure. 
In particular: Pinky, Kookkai and Top (pool staff). You guys have made our stay most memorable with your high spirits and being more than happy to inform us of the latest events in Pattaya. You guys are so on top of it!
Also, thank you to Aiwa and Adam in the kitchen and Vanda for always being ready to freshen up our rooms!
 
You guys rock!
See you next time!
Taufa and Mike. :-)

Hi I have stayed at this hotel around 10 times now- its excellent, staff are the best in Asia, they have just WON Hard Rock Hotel of the World - it really is rockin and their moto Love All Serve All is true to their word, kids are made to feel very special by the Rock Agents, Def the best in Pattaya

It was all ok.
Top service and all was ok, a littel bit high price for food and drinks but ok.
Maybe the food has not to much change it was allways the same.
For the party at 19.04. it was a very good place

We checked into two adjoining rooms. A bit slow at reception and when we got to the rooms one of them was already occupied. Luckily the guests were off doing something. There was an awful smell of smoke on the 8th floor.
I went to complain. Then they claimed they couldn't help because I had booked through Agoda which was not the case. They really struggled at reception to sort the problem and eventually moved us to a suite with an extra bed. A bit cramped but ok.
There were lots of weirdos in the hotel, after all this is Pattaya. The security is almost non existent. The staff do their best but its all a bit fake and not very professional. The club on the 9th floor is good, nice bites and drinks but suggest that the breakfast in the main restaurant is better than the limited fare at the club.
All over I will skip it the next time and boogie on down to one of the five star gigs down the road!!

The hotel is typical hard rock hotel... staff a bit grumpy. Rooms are ok but small. Nice pool and in front of the beach. The hotel is mainly catering for a certain category of tourists. For the price better places to stay in Pattaya!

Great location close to everything but quite. Nice comfortable bed and clean room. Hotel well run with plenty of attentive staff. Nice pool very clean. Food good with many options. Plenty of options for breakfast and good service. Check in and out easy. Would recommend.

This hotel is in a great location but is let down by by not meeting the standards of a higher class hotel. Staff were not overly efficient or helpful. The room was nice and clean but the bathroom was small, dimly lit and often suffered from an obnoxious odour emanating from the floor drain hole. The air conditioning barely kept the room cool. The club lounge was quite basic as were the breakfasts. Overall there was nothing which we thought was special about the hotel.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
We stayed here for 3 nights. We took up the Royalty Lounge Access with gives you alot of benefits. Do refer to their website. 
Everyone here is sincere and kind. Always greeting you and smile. 
We like the breakfast. They have different menus. (Not sure the difference if we were to go to the starz diner.) 
We have fruits and turn down service daily.
Clean pool. My kid has alot of fun. Used the gym. It was good. 
Had a very good stay. Thank you HRC. Will dropby again one day.

We’ve stayed in a different hotel in each of our past 6 visits to Pattaya and this is one we really loved. We’ll definitely be returning. 
The location for us is near perfect - the hotel facilities are great. Loved the pool especially - best times for us was around 2/3pm to 6. Between these times there are section is the pool in shade but water really warm still. 
Loved the pizzeria by the pool the margarita was good. Breakfast choice for us was relatively limited (being quite fussy vegetarians). 
Room decor - rooms were a little dark for out liking... I think lighting needs to be reviewed especially with the use of colour black in the rooms and bathrooms. Beds were good.

This place is still one of my favourite hotels to stay at. Suites are a little bit more expensive, but with a large sitting room it's ideal for the daughter to sleep on without the extra bed.
Breakfast is on the 9th floor and cooked to order, or can go downstairs.
Evening cocktails offers good selection of drinks, but very limited food.

Great entertainment throughout the day for children and very safe place to leave children in the pool

The hotel is on beach road so is at very nice location. Most of places of Pattaya are easy to access from here. Right from check in to check out my stay was pleasant. Staff were friendly and courteous. The check in was fast and we were welcomed with traditional welcome drink. 

Room was really very nice and comfortable. The temperature of room was well maintained even in hot weather and this was really nice. The hotel has large pool and one can enjoy a lot of time there.

Gym at hotel is also very nice. Staff there was also friendly and they were very helpful. The spa area was also nice. Complementary use of steam was there. 

Breakfast was tasty with excellent choices. They can include at least one or two Indian dishes then that would be wonderful. ;) 

Overall very nice and stylish hotel.

The swimming and fitness experience was good, and all service staff had a great attitude. Geographic location，The activity is very much, the accommodation environment is very good, but unfortunately there is no bathtub, there are always itchy when sleeping, stay three times this way

The hotel is Amazing! The swimming pool, activities, room, cleanliness, food, location, customer service and overall ambiance is great. The staff are friendly and helpful. The room and facilities are clean and well maintained. The pool, music and the recreational activities were the highlight. It is really a great hotel for families and group of friends.  I definitely recommend and will come back on our next holiday.

HRH hosted a golf tournament I played in and everything they did was fantastic. My only complaint was that due to the super high humidity, my room felt a bit damp when I first checked in, but after the AC ran for a few hours, it was perfect. Hopefully HRH will be hosting the Beaver Classic again next year.

nice hotel room and nice people .The breakfast was quite good with many options for Western and Asian. The noodles station and egg station were the best options as this was freshly cooked food.the best rocking hotel
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Nice room with a nice view. Inter Lounge you had an fantastic view on the Pattaya bay.
The booked massage was very relaxing.pools and animation where good.
Room where in good condition.
I think I would come back next time.

Good hotel for a good value. The service and facilities were good. The rooms were big, but not clean. Location is next to the beach but far from Walking Street. Brings rock flavour to Pattaya experience.

Truly enjoyed my stay in HRHP. Every service touch point was awesome, and thanks to the Front Office, Housekeeping, Spa, HRCafe, Rock Shop for creating that wonderful experience! Special mention to Eve, Oon (Front Office), Som (Transportation), Nina (Rock Shop), Lincy (HRCafe) for elevating the experience. Specifically, Lincy from HRCafe delivered an exceptional service. She was always attending to me, and came with a great smile every time. 

The hotel itself is well equipped with facilities open to family of all ages. Room is clean and organized. 

Will definitely be back for Songkran 2020!

Leonard
1643535515-1003"
column5: My son loves this hotels swimming pool area with its artificial beach and water slides. We rented one of cabanas they have next to the pool and spent whole day relaxing there. However a word of warning for parents who prefer quite place to stay, it can be very loud at evenings if there is any party going on at the pool area.  Also staff service level seems to vary quite a lot and this time we received quite rude service at check in. Still overall service is good, especially at 9th floor club lounge where Khun Paris was extremely helpful.

column3:
We stayed on the top (10th) floor here over looking the ocean. The room a bit small but cozy feel, you can also borrow a guitar from reception to play in your room as well. 

The bed kept me sleep til I almost miss the breakfast hour, comfy and soft pillows were provided. 

Staff were friendly and helps a lot, they made a good atmosphere around this place.

This hotel can be very nice. Only our toilet did not flush. We got another room with everything working perfect. The hospitility can be much better. Watch out: always book online, because they increased the price with more than 60 percent for one night extension. 
And the hotel is totally not fully booked.
Not customer friendly! We going to another hotel tomorrow and now the Hard Rock Hotel does not earn anything from us. In our eyes this is not thinking smart of this hotel. They miss their chance.

We stayed at the hotel for 5 nights and it was just amazing. Great hospitality every where be it breakfast table, guards or the reception. Everyone treats you very very well with a nice smile. Rooms were very nice, spacious and clean. We took deluxe sea view room and the view was mind blowing. Food is also very tasty. The main advantage of staying at this hotel is that every place is nearby. Overall a rocking experience. Will definitely come here again if visit Pattaya. Keep it up hard rock hotel!!

Revisited Thailand in November 2019 with a bunch of my friends for a girls trip. I couldn't pass staying at the Hard rock!
Booked rock royalty and upgraded to pool view upon check in.

Check in process is on the rock royalty floor. The staff were lovely and gave a personal touch by welcoming me back.
A personalised card was also in the room, welcoming me for being a returning customer.

It was lovely to be back, especially after a few days on Koh LAN, this place feels like home!

I really can't fault this place! The location is perfect, if you want to go to walking street, take the baht bus. Access to the hotel is from beach road and second road. Close to central festival, and short baht bus to terminal 21.

My friend fell in love and said it was the best hotel of the trip and we stayed at other resorts within Thailand. 

Pool staff were great fun and engaging, although it was quiet compared to the time I visited in March, they still made an effort to engage with guests.

Whenever I feel I need a break, I am always tempted to book a week in Thailand just so I can go relax at the Hard rock!

Great resort
Friendly team - the lady greeting guests at breakfast, Ms Yuyee would always greet me by my name each time I stepped in and out of the restaurant. Ms Yuyee, thank you to you and your team for such wonderful hospitality :-) 
Good location

While Pattaya beach may not be as well acclaimed as some of the white sandy beaches around the world, the Hard Rock hotel made it up with agenda packed activities in a resort setting sufficient for a memorable weekend getaway.

We came here in early June. We were given rooms on the 8 floor with sea views and balcony. The rooms with balcony aren't large so if you need more space then don't opt for the balcony.

The service from Kin was amazing. He helped us bring our luggage up and even gave us a map and asked us what we would like to do in Pattaya. Based on our interests, he make a few suitable recommendations. How's that for service! Thanks Kin!

The buffet breakfast was average. Enough variety and quality was okay. The room service was good and recommend the oxtail soup, pad thai and chicken tenders. 

The kids club only takes ages 3-12. So my 2 year old missed out. It's more a kid minding room rather than a proper kids club with hourly activities. The staff were pleasant and our 6 year old enjoy himself. 

The pool is lovely, especially the three slides for kids, suitable for different ages. The sand area at the pool is great for kids who love sand castles. 

Overall a good stay. 

Just a tip - if you book airport transfers pls be very specific about which airport and also if its international flight or not. The person we spoke to almost booked us to the wrong airport and also the wrong time. She just assumed it was Bangkok airport and assumed it was a domestic flight (different check in times).

We first visited Hard Rock Hotel in 2004 on our Honeymoon! And since then it became our first choice in Thailand! Services, staff, decor, comfort, pool area, rooms, balcony, view, location, everything is so fabulous that visiting Thailand is incomplete unless we stay at Hard Rock Pattaya! So mates you can well imagine that how beautiful our experiences have been! We are again planning a trip to Thailand and this time we wanted to go to Phuket but our children refused to go to Phuket because they love Hard Rock Hotel so much that now the Hotel has become a destination for us! We have stayed in many Hotels all over the world but the warmth and welcoming attitude of Hard Rock staff is unmatched! There is something for everyone. The pool area is a fantasy! From a huge pool to kids slides to jaccuzi to pool bar! They have everything! They even have pool games. We don't leave the Hotel at times and just chill around the pool area. The Hotel is right across the sea and a few steps away from the shopping area, street bars, massage centers. There is easy access to public transport and you can also rent a car from the Hotel. Their staff is extremely helpful and guides you for any query that you may have. I love the breakfast and so do my kids.They have a foam party over the weekends for kids and adults. Kids foam party is in the evening and after that is adults turn so everyone gets to enjoy. When you book the room don't forget to ask for a sea view room preferably with a balcony.  I can go on and on about my experience as I have stayed there several times but each time our stay is more beautiful than the previous one! Bravo Team Hard Rock! Keep Rocking :)

Me and friends stay at your hotel on Feb21-24 for 2 room The staff in Reception and Front desk are nice & helpful. The King Club staff very friendly. I will be back to stay with you on next trip
thank you for taking care me and my friends  That you guy doing a good for service 

Awesome

Sitthipong homchuen

Quality for Kings Club less than the old times. Service is not warm for reception and bell. Quality foods in King club is normally(Old Time is the Best quality) but price is higher. 

From Old Customer, We didn't impress this trip!!

Stayed in the hotel during a short visit to Pattaya. Hotel located on the beach side. Definitely worth to pay more for the sea view room which you can enjoy the amazing view. Staff are very friendly and helpful during our stay. We also enjoyed the beautiful swimming pool!

Good services, very nice room, all staff are very friendly.  They have service mind. And I want to suggest about breakfast, almost menu are good but you should have more thai food and 2-3 courses eaten with rice.

Excellent hotel of this class.... one of the best properties in this area( central Pattaya) and kept extremely clean. Front desk staff is very friendly and welcoming. Breakfast area is spacious and one of the best in Pattaya I have experienced. Fresh fruit (strawberries, blueberries, oranges, apples, and bananas) in addition to all the other hot and cold items for vegetarian it had many dishes like about 6 dishes and they were all amazing. We stayed here for 6N/7D from 9th March-15th March with two interconnecting deluxe rooms for my family.The room was pretty spacious with a nice overlooking view of city and beach, best part of this hotel is that this hotel was situated right at the beach from where you can see beautiful sunset and there pool is beyond imagination with a mini water park and a free form pool with a guitar deck, there sauna and plunge pool is damn amazing which I found very uncommon as compared to other hotels I’ve stayed. This hoteil is most prime location and highly accessible to your needs be it Indian restaurant, massage, 7/11 and family mart department stores and huge shopping malls. One more thing if you stay at this hotel do not miss the pool party which is held on every Saturday it’s one of the best pool party I’ve ever been to.I'll be back to this place again in December and highly recommend to others when in the area.

Friendly service, haven't stayed here for several years but the rooms have been refurbished and are clean and modern.  Pool has plenty of activities although crowded at a weekend and not easy to get seat. Food is generally  very good except the evening BBQ buffet which sucks on quality.

Great hotel to spend with family! Our request for connecting room was even accomodated. The children loves the pool, and spend half day in it. Foam party for the kids is quite nice, and the Saturday live band by the pool is great, I hope they play more hours instead of only an hour.

I managed to book two nights here. I must say the atmosphere here really is uplifting - fits the theme of 'rock and roll'. Breakfast was excellent and had varieties in the choosing. Quite busy in the morning, however eventually you get a seat. 

Staff were very polite, but English was a communication problem. Nevertheless it's part of the experience of travelling.

Hard rock Pattaya is located in downtown Pattaya, where all the clubs, bars, restaurants, massage parlors, and malls are located. This was very convenient. Taxi was cheap, but the real experience is in the motorbike taxis (you really must try them!).

The room I got had a nice touch that reminds me of the American rock 'n' roll themes back in the 80s. It would get noisy at night at times with doors opening and closing, however it's a hotel in a busy location so what do you expect.

Nevertheless, the hotel is a must visit if you ever come to this side of Pattaya city. The swimming pool and foam parties are also another thing you must experience (but stay away from the Sauna rooms if there are large groups as it can get very crowded!).

As you would expect from the brand, the rooms, facilities, service and entertainmennt were all excellet. However, the price of food and beverages is astronomical and way above anything else in the same category of hotel.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: It's ok, the staff are fine, and the food is OK like most hard rocks (they haven't tried to cheap out on the coffee)..with the usual US$ 20 burger (a bit of a stretch in Thailand) and all the other food similarly priced. It's no wonder at 9pm there are only 3 tables occupied during one of the busiest periods of the year. Also notice the Hard Rock Restaurant has been half-sized to a dingy lower floor, no entertainment, with the signature 'spaceship' upper floor reserved only for seminars, etc. There is no entertainment here - best we could do was water polo in the pool - surely we could that in any good hotel.. This place in no way compares with Hard Rock Bali.. so if that's your measuring stick, forget this place. The room are tiny (Deluxe Sea View Room - with smelly toilets, cheaps out on toilet tissue, no face cloths) with two "queen" beds more like "doubles" and the hotel charges for EVERYTHING else. The activities are very poor by comparison with Bali (and even charges for floatation devices for your kids = 10 dollars a day). The draught beer is Singha (one of the the local beers - IMO not good - no Heineken draught), it is overall very disappointing. Now, to give the owner a bit of a break.. I think part of the problem is that their Chinese cousins (most Thai business owners are Thai-Chinese) are Chinese mass tour group tourists filling rooms, so the Western Hard Rock thing kind of slips away to cash in on the Wei! Bow! thing.. Anyway what comes around goes around for these Chinese Thais. I will never stay here again.

I stayed at Hard Rock hotel for 5 nights. My room was lovely. All facilities was very clean. The breakfast was perfect for setting you up for the day of exploring Pattaya city, with a range of fruits, pastries, meats. The overall stay was wonderful and the staff who covered reception could not have been more helpful, assisting and giving advice. Thank you!

Thank You to all staff. As a regular, here is my feedback for this stay:
POSITIVE:
1. Keep up the good work. Chompoo wELL DONE.
2. Great location, pool & parking

Negative:
1. Need more staff on desk 
2. Steam room not working
3. Please change room service menu.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Very professional staff and nice sea-view room contributed to an enjoyable two night stay in March. Breakfast was very nice, but a bit expensive. Disappointed at having to pay for wi-fi internet access in room.

Pool is very nice, and there's access (free) to steam room and sauna.

Overall, a good experience.

My husband, myself and 2 friend booked into the hard rock for my birthday though we have stopped there 3 times previous. We love the place, fantastic pool and amazing breakfast. 
We were disappointed with the birthday meal we had at the Hard Rock Cafe as we had problems with the bill. Firstly after showing them we staying in hotel for discount which they didn't deduct till after we queried it and then them saying the service charge doesn't include their tip. Making us feel obliged to give extra for tip. Also in the room opposite to ours there were children screaming and playing in their room and corridor till after 11 pm until my husband has to shout be quiet . This was only a one night treat but normally we stay for a week and usually don't have any problems .despite those 2 incidents we love the hard rock hotel it's the best in pattaya 👍
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The staffs there are very nice and polite.They have manners and treated us like a star.They were trained well.The rooms are also amazing.The bed there is cozy.The hotel have a lot of great activities for families and friends.The Location is also very good.We can go out from many different ways.

Clean room , friendly staff , good location with restaurants, pub & bar around the corner. Hotel breakfast is good , suitable for family with kids and the most impressive is only few step away few from the beach ,
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Was made to wait for drinking water and ice, was made to wait in queue before being seated for breakfast. The breakfast hall was a huge mess and only leftovers were available at 10 am. Checkout queue was humongous.

The reception, service and other staff were sanctification with good in overall but feel un-satisfactory for the service of the staff from the item shop, they are not clearly mention about the VAT tax refund and also told that no discount on the guest price but we found there is a label show that it contain 10% of discount for guest.

We stayed at this hotel for two days and had an awesome experience as the location of the hotel was very good and services were fantastic. Ocean view from the hotel room was fantabulous. Great place for families and businesses too...........

We reached hotel at 2pm which is the actual checkin time but we were made to wait for nearly 1 & 1/2 hour as the hotel was overbooked. We were tired after along journey and had to wait near the swimming area which was very disappointing at the beginning. But as soon as we checked in the room, we were struck by the awesome interiors. We booked a kids suiteroom with bunk beds. Kids loved every bit of the room. The staff here was very courteous especially the bellboy "green". 

I would say this is the most happening place in pattaya bang right opposite to the beach. We reached at a time when the sangkron water festival was in action. Kids just loved getting soaked in water. The swimming pool here is just too good with all the slides in it.

The breakfast restaurant was too crowded and the menu was bare minimal.

But simply i would easily recommend this hotel toone and all. 

Hardrock simply rocks....

We spent two nights three days here. We opted for a club room which gave us access to the 9th floor club lounge. I would recommend this to anyone staying at the hotel. You have access to the club lounge all day. They have a nice assortment of snacks and drinks in addition to a free flow happy our every evening. You can even choose to eat your breakfast in the lounge every morning. All this is included in the club room rate. 

We went with a couple different families who all have kids. The kids had a great time! The pool is very nice and has some cool features aimed solely for kids. They have a sand bottomed sections complete with large rocks which the kids love to climb on. They even have a small water slide for the kids to enjoy.

Probably the nicest thing for families is the myriad of activities they run all day. These range from: pool kayaking to volleyball to rock climbing to golf putting games. All these activities are aimed at including the whole family.

The rooms are a bit small but adequate. The service is top notch and they went out of their way to make sure we felt comfortable and satisfied any request we expressed.

Made my first visit back in a few years - first with new remodel.  Improvements have been made in the room with the showers and you no longer have to step into the tile bin so to speak.  The lighting however is poor and very hard to see in the mirror, etc.  Front entry of hotel and corridors are nice.  Other areas of rooms have modest changes. I understand that many rooms have been expanded in space, but I still prefer a balcony and the space dedicated to have one.
Bedding is still decent.  One thing that has not been improved is the TV can not accept A/V components so you can not watch from your Ipod, Ipad, etc. Most hotels everywhere have this ability, but not at HRH Pattaya yet.  
Breakfast Buffet seems to be unchanged and is still good value if included with your rate.  That said, there were some unwanted little critters I noticed near the fruit area.  It's consistent I guess with the climate and region so I just shrugged it off.
Pool area is the winning component of this property and what has always brought me back.  This time, however, I found the service so slow that it was a constant struggle to get a drink or food at times.  Very, very slow.  We rented a cabana one day and that is a great deal - do it!  Chairs around the pool are at a premium and yes, on the weekend especially, they are hard to get.  The hotel sells day passes and this does not bode well for paying guests who want a chair to lounge and sun.
The prices both on the website and via contacting the hotel seem to be increasing by significant margins.  I am finding it hard to justify nearly $200 US per night to return and given the crowds, the main draw of the pool is turning into a challenge that I do not welcome.  Another little side note is the 15% coupon given at check-in. It is for 15% off at Hard Rock Cafe Restaurant or Shop.  On our departure morning, knowing the shop by the restaurant was not open until later in the morning, we went to the shop at the lobby to make our final t-shirt purchases. The coupon was not honored because it was not the shop at the restaurant.  Really?  Without being told the guests are supposed to make that deduction?  It is not the same revenue center at the end of the day? I thought that was pretty petty and to be honest, the staff did not seem to think anything of it. I have been loyal to the hotel, but find my next stay will likely see a visit to nearby new brand name hotel - just to check the competition.
I still love the staff and they continue to "Rock On!", but given the increasing price and declining service and relaxation, it might be time to stop touring for this roadie.

Hard Rock was Hard Core Fun !  Myself, wife and two children stayed at Hard Rock for 3 days & had a blast.  We stayed in the family suite which the kids loved from moment we walked in.  Bunk beds in their own bedroom, playstation and as a nice touch kiddies slippers and dressing gowns.  The King's club lounge is great with free snacks and drinks all day for anyone staying in the family or suite level.  Pool area is terrific and very kid friendly.  Best bit was the band playing beside the pool during afternoon and we got to dance in water to some rock tunes !!!  I am going back again in August for sure !!!!  Work hard, play hard !!!

we came as a group and we all had the best time ever. 
we even received some lovely mugs as a souvenir. it s this type of small and everyday attentions that make your stay memorable. 
foam party was a blast and cafe hard rock offers excellent band and perfect staff ! 
check out was a bit slow, but other that that all was perfect

This was my seventh stay at Hard Rock, and once again, they never cease to amaze me.  From the moment you walk in, you are greeted by the ever so friendly staff.  I was immediately recognised by several staff and their warmth and hospitality was greatly appreciated.  I was awarded an upgraded room instantly.  I was genuinely touched by this gracious offer.  I can not speak highly enough of the staff here.  At every turn, there is always a staff member eager to help you or just to say hello.  The rooms are spacious, well presented and clean.  The housekeeping service is awesome and they are always avaiable to help wherever they can.  The buffet breakfast is one of the best i have seen anywhere in the world.  The variety is endless.  They cover all bases from Asian to Western inspired foods and everything in between.  I couldn't imagine anyone being disappointed with what is on offer.  The pool is huge and very clean.  A great way to spend a day there is just simply relaxing by the pool.  Once again, there is always a staff member there to wait on you.
I experienced the Rock Spa for the first time.  The massage was very professional and relaxing.  I thoroughly enjoyed this.  The hotel is located in a quieter area on Beach Road, and is only a short distance away from the "glitz and glamour"of Pattaya.  I highly recommend this hotel to anyone

It is a good hotel for families to join.
I like a swimming pool for children.
I wish there were a table in the room.
Need friendly staff for customers with poor communication.
I'm willing to use it next time

A great place just to relax and have fun.  The service is excellent, and the pool area fantastic (recommend reserving a cabana which costs about us$15 a day, includes 2 beers, 2 soft drinks, and 2 waters, which is cheaper than buying the drinks on their own).

Hotel rooms aren't 5 star, but are clean and plenty of room, and food and beverage charges are a bit dearer than the beach area (but the food was good).

Overall a great hotel and would definitely stay again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Breakfast buffet got much worse in comparison with our previous stays, no variety at all. Dust on the lighting fixtures inside the room seems never removed. 
Positive: very convenient bed and pillows, great sea view from sea view delux room with balcony, floor 8,
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: this one of the best  hotel in pattaya  great deal  on internet booking  and  great staff  at  pool and    pool bar ,,,  super pool with a beach  in  the pool amazing,,,,,,i go ther  2  time a year  and  have  a great  time always
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I had a good memories during my stay in Hard Rock Hotel. All the staff were good and really helpful. The only problem was the Air Conditioner in my room was hard to adjust so the room was so cool. The breakfast was OK but need to provide more Halal foods. I am pretty sure to stay in this hotel again. Thank you
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Funny Hotel where you might feel like a Star as it is all oriented around Rock Stars history.
Location is fine, on "Beach Road" and about 30 min walking distance from "Walking Street".
Check-in process was fine, we first made a stop at the ground floor for ID verification and welcome drinks. We were then escorted very nicely by a staff called Paris to the Clubs VIP lounge on the 9th floor for Club Guest check-in where we had to wait for about 15min before being attempted.
Ralph, the man in charged was very helpful and I drove me to upgrade from Kings Club Rooms I booked online to a Composer Suite and cannot complain as the Suite was nice and had a beautiful view on Pattaya Bay.
First attempt at the pool restaurant was not so good as the food was not to comment. Staff was nice and friendly. Room was quiet at night time and my sleep was good.
Next day, getting  sun-beds in the crowded swimming pool was a bit more complicated but after some efforts and some time we finally got the three beds we needed and could enjoy a very noisy atmosphere, with loud music and kids playing all around.
On the next day I got a bad experience at breakfast time.  Staff at Club lounge where not friendly and they only think about the money they could charge. I then decided to go for international buffet at the pool level restaurant but found doors closed at 10:30 and 10:33 was not permitted...
A believe my bad experience came from the staff at Club Lounge. Indeed, Ralph, the thai manager was the only contact being very helpful and friendly. The staff at ground level was well trained as well at check-out time and nice to deal with. Anyway,  I decided to check-out earlier and to move on another experience in the Pattaya lodging adventure.
Final question: Will I go back to this Hard Rock hotel Pattaya ?
Well,  I don't think so as the  service & feeling was well bellow expectation. 
I may recommend this hotel for a vintage Rock & Roll couple having very young kids.
#NAME?

A fabulous hotel with lots to do for kids around the pool - games and competitions kept them busy all day. We hardly left the poolside (only to go to the Hard Rock Cafe for a delicious lunch). Staff were SO friendly and tried to accommodate any special requests we had - thank you. Rooms were spacious and had everything a travelling family needs. Well done Hard Rock - we'll be back soon!

Everything is good.. Value for money.. Services tip top.. Near walking street and other attraction.. Staff helpful.. Swimming pool is the Best.. Everyday have many activities to do.. I wtih my family really enjoy.. Thanks hard rock!!!!

Stayed at Hard Rock with my son for 3 days in March.

Booked my room via Agoda quite a few months in advance. Upon check in I was advised that my booking was cancelled by agoda although the payment was taken out.
I was extremely stressed and the lady at reception advised that she will contact Agoda however made me sign a document that I will pay for the room at the going rate and offered another room on level two.

I contacted Agoda who then provided me with another number which was in Hard rocks system. I'm not sure why this wasnt found by searching my name but finally was relieved that the booking was found.
It was clear that I was extremely stressed and was offered a wet towel and drink as my emotions took the best of me.
Reception advised our initial room wasnt ready and if we were happy to stay in the room on level 2. I stayed in level 2 as I was too stressed to pack up and move. Although reception tried to comfort me by saying everything is fixed no need to worry, I found this to be even more upsetting as I felt my feelings were not warranted, never less I decided to stay in the room to unwind. The tv froze, called reception who sent someone to fix it.
I was excited to see free movies as the last two places we stayed in had no English channels.
The TV's need replacing. The pixels have darkened so it looks like there was stains on the tv, and the movies always shuttered.
The room was near these loud fans from the building next door, did not sleep. Advised reception the very next morning and they moved us to a room on level 9.
If i am ever to come back to Pattaya I will certainly stay here again however will book pool or beach view to minimize the sound.

The facilities here is lovely.
Plenty of activities by the pool for families, food was great and my son still talks about the Power mocktails that was available at the pool bar.

He hates travelling however this place he enjoyed thoroughly. We ate from all restaurants including the cafe.
Buffet is awesome, plenty of variety, pizza was great from the pizzeria and my son enjoyed the burgers from the cafe.

I wish we stayed longer than 3 days as it is a great place to relax by the pool!

First time of all, we're a bit unlucky since we arrived in Bangkok at 8pm and the shuttle bus to Pattaya ends at 7pm. So we have to go to Pattaya from Suvarnabhumi airport by taxi for THB 1400 include for express way. Actually if you can take the shuttle bus, you only need to pay THB 106. It will take around 2 hours to get to Pattaya. But then, when we arrived to Hard Rock hotel, suddenly we felt homy. They greated us by name, since we're the last guest at that day (we arrived at the hotel at 11pm). They really know how to treat their guest like a real star. Please send my regards to Tommy at the front desk.

The room is quiet spacious and clean with a comfy bed.
Breakfast is ok, but the same varieties everyday.
The swimming pool is very big and they have so many activities everyday, such as water aerobic, golf, wall climbing, etc.
Service is just average for me, because not all of them can speak English well.

This hotel is near to  Alcazar show, around 10 minutes walk, and to Tiffany's show, around 15 minutes walk. They have a transvestite cabaret show. It costs around THB 600-850 for VIP seat, but make sure you choose middle seat, so you can see the show clearly. Maybe it's quiet expensive, but i think it's worthed. You won't believe that all of them are men. They are so cute, beautiful and girly. It is a very entertaining show.

Overall, i will recommend you Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya when you have an opportunity to travel to Pattaya.

We stayed one night at the Hard Rock in Pattya, have stayed there on  mulitple occasions over the last 4 years. But I would have to say that its over priced itself now. It has gone up by 1000bht since the last time we stayed (maybe 3 mths) Being it's low season in Thailand at the moment, and the Hotel was noticably quiet i thought 4600bht ++ was far to much. And would not negotiate.
Not good guys, i love your property but you are starting to get a little to greedy i think.
Stayed in the Hotel Many times consistent top quality and service.

Excellent service, friendly and helpful staff. It's my 5th stay in Hard Rock Pattaya, very enjoy staying here except the food. Since 2years ago, started to have issue with the foods. The "PRAWN" is not fresh. I did ask one of your staff Mr Putter to check on the PRAWN as proof that I'm not simply making trouble for you. Be more specific, this incident happen on 15May2019 buffet dinner at Starz. I really hope that this issue will be solve before my next visit.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I love big swimming pool. Foam party swimming in a big swimming pool good service and goid location in pattaya. My room on 7 th floor very fantastic nice seaview.  Very close to the shopping point and beautyful beach
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The ambiance n rooms were as best as the lobby n staff .... mouth watering food n rick shop all needs under 1 roof ... swimming pool n saunna bath full on relaxing with great beers as topping ..never to miss hotel

Good stay. Service and hospitality in thailand is excellent but i dislike watching some guest treating the staff rudely and with authority. I think these people should be barred for return trips. The staff does not report it, but HRH should impose such rules.

I will back soon, because I stay to May in Thailand. Your hotel is my no.1 choose in Pattya. I went to Penang at last month, so I Hard Rock Hotel, especially  your T-shirt.
Swimming design special colourful,
Beatles is my favourite  Band, love your Beatles wall picture in corridor.

The hotel location is perfect , the food is good and overall a great property in Pattaya ... The only disappointment we had that we had to wait for one of the room check in even beyond 2.00 pm which is the check in time . Otherwise the staff is pretty courteous and helpful ...

A must stay property ...

Excellent hotel with good facillities for wheelchair users. Great service and a good location. Breakfast was also okay but only inside the hotel. i would recommend this hotel to anybody, really nice..

Stayed for 2 nights at this hotel which made our 1st ever trip to Pattaya memorable particularly for my 2 kids. The kids suite was big enough with a great sea view. The club benefits that came with the room...lots of food and very accommodating staff especially Chanel. Lots of pool activities for the kids. We'll definitely stay at this hotel again if given the chance.

I stayed here for 15 nights and enjoyed the atmosphere the place offered, great service and facilities even though on the pricey side for food and drink, but given the location this s no problem as you can walk 1 minute outside to restaurants! Baht buses pick up right outside and drop of right at the back entrance, so getting around is easy.

Breakfast buffet is really good.

Pool really fun.

Rooms nice with soft beds.

Good for every type of traveller, family, couple, young, old, singles.

We had to decide to take the Hilton, or the hard Rock hotel for our stay in Pattaya. Because we already had a hotel with a infinity pool in Bangkok and we wanted a holiday feeling we booked the Hard Rock hotel.

******
Staff

The staff is all friendly and professional, reception personnel speaks good and understandable English. Most others don't.

Big plus for the animation team, and the staff at the Hard Rock Café (especially the big dude) 

*****
Security

I do need to make a seperated topic on this, because security was a joke. On first sight we thought we were driving to an embassy or something. We approached the gate with our taxi and the security guard made the stop sign. Then another security guard came to check underneath the car with a mirror.... It was a complete joke, it really was.  I do understand security but then do it correctly. 

Don't make a show out of it.. If you gonna check the car underneath with mirrors you need to do a full sweep of the car, also the luggage and everything..  Cause that's the only thing they do, they wall around the car with a mirror.. That's if, no need to open the windows or anything....

Next to that security I feel security is a really unnecessary thing when it's performed the way I watched it being performed during my total stay of 12 days at this hotel, not only at the entrance. The guards are very friendly, thats not really the issue though..

*****
Rooms 
Rooms are nice, comfortable beds.. We had a nice balcony with Seaview.

Bathroom needs a renovation.

*****
Pool

Amazing pool, really made our holiday. Got cleaned very good every day. Temperature is nice. 2 pools, one with sandpool and the main pool was a normal build pool. 

The sandpool has a swim up bar in it. We also attended to a pool parted that was held. There was a live music band scheduled at 07.30, it never showed up.. We waited for hours and at 09.30 a live band finnaly came through, but it wasn't any good.. 

******

Dining

We booked with breakfast, which was well equipped, and had enough choice for everyone. 

Don't have experience with the buffet that is being offered at the hotel. 

Snacks are Allright, nothing amazing or really outstanding. Was expensive though. 

******
Prices 

Hotel rate is good. Prices of the drinks are way overpriced especially for Pattaya means, it's allmost insane. And it's also a missed opportunity... I'm 100% sure that hotel guest would use much more beverages from the hotel itself if it was cheaper... Prices are 150/200% higher than sales in supermarket and 100/150% higher than the surrounding bars. 

We got our drinks at the 7/11 opposite of the hotel and drinkend them at the pool since we already had a hotel bill of 8000 baht that for 90% only consist out of drinks. 

For example we stay at a 5 star hotel in the middle of Bangkok now and the drinks are even cheaper here.. 

*****
Hardrock Cafe 

The hard Rock cafe is great, they serve many beers and have a nice airco to get away from the heat now and then. 

On Monday there is a great band with a nice volume to listen too. Rest of the week another band performs which is also a very good and professional band, but the music is way to loud when they perform, talking isn't possible due to the amount of decibels comming towards you. I would recommend lowering the sound for a bit. 

******
Overall

I'm really sorry my review is not as good as I wanted it to be. Don't get me wrong, we had a great stay at you're hotel. But looking back, I think some changes should be made to make this hotel a worthy 4 possibly 5 star hotel again....

Things that really should be addressed are the show that the security is performing, prices of the drinks, and if you host a show or event.. Make sure the time table is good and don't let people wait hours for a band that isn't comming.. 

Location is great!!!!!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We really enjoyed our stay at hard rock. All the staff were friendly and helpful without seeming fake. The swimming pool is gorgeous, really big, beautifully warm (early March, probably cooler in December- Jan) with slides, basketball ring and even a bar in the pool. only gripes were the bar prices were high, you had to pay to hire inflatables in the pool, and the booking page hits you with extras (taxes) right at the end of the process.

Rooms were clean, and rare design, which I loved, location was good to go everywhere, had no guest fee which was another pro, many events going on especially on Saturday. 
There were deposit to make around 2~4k Batt which, I haven't got it back yet after a day of check out, wonder when I'm going to get it back. otherwise, this place was fantastic. full of enthusiasm.

Great place to stay, lovely rooms, lovely food and right in the middle of pattaya. Convenient and well priced to stay, drinks are normal hotel prices. The pool Is lovely with cabanas and various areas to swim in, burgers etc available to the pooside.

Having stay here for 6 times, e really enjoy our stay. Always first impression from the start till the end of our trip. Authentic staff and friendliness from the front to the housekeeping. We were upgraded to sea view. Staffs remember us as we are regular guest. The service is excellent, the food is great, the pool activities are the most Funtastic. Love the comfy bed always, room is clean and modern ( we love it ) hope to come back again!!!

I have been visiting the HR hotel for ten years now and our family love it due to the fact the staff are fantastic and there are plenty of activities.. 

However over the last few years the food g has been on av stay decline to the point that we no longer easy the buffet breakfast which to be quite honest is awful.... If really don't know what's happened but if you like good value did and drinks, don't stay here... 

I currently have a booking for the beginning of April however we are looking to change hotels for better quality in f and b.

A recent stay at another local hotel showed how bad the food actually was at hard rock. For the price paid, I certainly expect a better quality product at all times of the day and I certainly don't agree with 130++ for a can of singha available outside for 33 baht.

This has also coincided with a change of senior management about five years ago...  

I just hope the pool staff don't change as they are the one thing that keeps us coming back.

To add though. You really should clean your pool this visit it was disgusting. 

Please improve

Hardrock hotel is one amazing place to  stay. it is located in one of the happening place in Pattaya and 1 minute away from Beach. Hotel offers best and high quality rooms and very good service. They have great pool to enjoy swimming. Food is very good in this hotel.

Best hotel with best location and excellent service. Faced some problem but it was resolved quickly. Hotel having the biggest swimming pool. Breakfast was good with different verities. Rooms are nice.

This is our 2nd stay this year.The room is trendy, neat and tidy. The pool is huge with many facility as rock climbing, huge floating balloon, sandy beach. The breakfast, pizza are delicious. The reason that attract us to come again are the staff there. All of them are nice, friendly and helpful. Once I walk in the entrance, the  staff of Concierge said 'welcome back' . The Front Desk staff Bew, Ralph, Ann, Lylar show us their efficiency to check in. We also appreciate the Kings club there. The Poolside rockers and lifesaver~ Villy, Quito, Joey, Sek, Nuck,Keng, Winner, Pinky, Kookkai, Mary, create enjoyable, and relax daytime. The SPA we have there is really nice. The security, Paiwun, he saids funny words and give salute every time we pass through the entrance.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Near the Sea,Location is good,Family Mart just opposite side,many restaurants new hotel(I try one India restaurant very good),supper big swimming pool(i like the basketball)  and bubble pool（children supper like it).The room is big and good sea view,only one thing i do not like is the shower is old and when i take shower,always have the cold water drop from the upside shower down to my body.I will come back to Hard Rock if i come back to Pattaya.

The staff are very friendly and helpful. Room was a good size and bed was super comfy. The hotel is not big so it's not crowded with big tour groups which made it very pleasant to hang by the pool any time of the day! Foam party by the pool Sat afternoon was great fun for the kids! Loved it, will definitely visit again!

Happy trip for the family. Nice room. Good service. Nice food but HR cafe food on the expensive side compared to KL n Penang. Quite a bit of sandflies near the sandy pool area. But nice big pool. The rocky area near the kids pool may need a bit more work as there are sharp rocks there. Gym equipment ok but a bit on the old side.

Front desk staff Miss Brenda is the best hotel staff we never met, she provide us a outstanding service and always have sunny smile to everyone.  We love her very much! The room of hotel is clean and all staffs in Hotel also helpful and remarkable. We came HardRock Hotel in 2015 and 2016 summer holiday, we will come and stay again in 2017!

Went for 13 nights here in July with my husband and daughter, stayed in rockstar Royalty room. We had access to executive lounge as part of our package.  Everything about the place was spot on, lovely staff, everyone always smiling and helpful, pool was great, not to busy so easy to get loungers at any time of day. Lounge great for breakfast as not busy, lovely place to go into anytime in day for complimentary soft drinks, sandwiches and cakes, from 6pm till 7.30pm it's cocktail and alcoholic drinks, all branded complimentary and hot snacks like samosas, dumplings, various cheeses etc. Well worth extra money to have access to this. It was my daughters birthday when we were there, they made a fuss of her, singing to her and providing us with a lovely chocolate birthday cake.  All in all we had a great holiday and will definitely return.

clean room, kind people, good service, nice location, good music, etc. all of hardrock hotel give me good memories. thank hardrock hotel for three days.  trip. if I return to pattaya, I will visit to hardrock hotel again.

Hard Rock Hotel has played a major role in keeping Pattaya trips, and I like both staff and facilities.
Also, it was easy to get around to other places to visit.
However, in the evening buffet, it is time to use until 9:30. It is disappointing that the food is exhausted too early even though it is 8 o'clock.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The staff were very friendly and hospitable. It would be great if Hardrock hotel is a member of IHG hotels. It will benefit me to claim points during my stay. The light in the room could be slightly brighter. Apart from that, I like everything about the hotel.

Hard Rock Hotel has stayed many times. Pleasant and pleasant atmosphere.
Impressed with the room and good service of the staff.
Good food, good service There are activities at the pool for fun.
Beach accommodation, convenient and like.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I and my family took a 2nights vacation here because the good looking location and nice place I saw from the web. Even though the room got some water dropped out of the ceiling air condition during the last day of the trip, we still enjoyed our time and had lots of activities such as table tennis playing, mt. climbing, swimming, etc. 
I asked my kids that "Do you like to come here again if having a chance?". "Yep", said the kids.

I stayed here when I took a short break with some college buddies earlier this month. The hotel is amazing - well located, clean, good service, good music, loads of activities if you decide to go with kids too. Dont miss their Foam party ... its a must do ... :)

My goodness, this is the hotel for families . 2 families travelled together consisting of 4 adults, 3 x 17/18yrs old girls and 2 x boys 11/12 yrs old. 
This hotel caters for all ages, when you arrive you are warmly greeted by the hip staff! The teenager's jaws dropped when they enter the reception of the hotel ..way out !!!! Also us oldie's eyes lit up, we knew this was the place to be .
The rooms were clean and spacious .
The pool is very big and there are plenty of beds. The boys were ecstatic when they saw the pool basketball net.
What made this hotel brilliant was that whilst you lounged around the pool, they had pool activities, such as polo,  aerobics, basketball etc,. The staff were not in your face and they did not force anyone to take part. The activities did not interfere with your peace around the pool. Our kids had great fun and it kept them occupied!. 
There is a room for the kids (forgotten the name ) which you pay 200bht a day to go in. It has a pool table, X-box games etc. This was a good retreat from the sun for the kids. 
I cannot critic this hotel . It is in a perfect location just across from the beach . The staff are fantastic and genuine. 
The management of this hotel are doing something right, because I have not got one complaint about any of the staff, they were fantastic and the service given was always with a smile!
The breakfast is fabulous, so much to choose from. 
ONE SUGGESTION - Pattaya is cleaning up it's act, but there is hardly any family friendly entertainment at night - it would be good if there could be nightly entertainment for families in the hotel. I am sure this would be well supported by people staying in the hotel and draw in others.
(Maybe they do have entertainment in high season, but it would be great for low season)
This will always be my first choice again if I visit Pattaya, especially if the kids tag along!

Really Nice people and Service. I stayed for 3 days. It was the Greatest memory of Pattaya.
If i go again to Pattaya. I will not hesitate to reserve this Hotel again. Location also very nice to stay!!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: the hard rock team make my trip so memorable n wonderful during my marry anniversary ^^ , there is nothing to be improved anymore due there is anything all u need is over there , for kid or adult !! hopefully will visit it very soon in future !!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
What can I say that the title doesn't? This place is truly exceptional. 
The staff are amongst the friendliest people I've ever met, in a hotel that has 322 rooms for a large majority of the staff to remember your whole family's names is a bit special. 
The hotel is spotlessly clean, superbly maintained and has tons to do.
If you're thinking of booking pattaya, do yourself a favour and stay here. You'll not regret it for a second.

Location is good, pool size large & attractive, room size ok,lobby very attractive  & graceful, gym not very large, security tight, breakfast not friendly for vegetarian Indians, very limited choice, we had gone outside for breakfast daily

The hotel is old and you can smell the oldness, like a mildew and mild smell. We have been staying at Marriott properties and have been spoiled. Hard Rock charges for everything. They charge for usage of swim toys and you have to check out towels. The rooms are very small and they charge for roll away beds. We booked three nights but ended up cancelling our reservation after one night. The front desk rep named Boy was so sweet he cancelled the rest of our stay without issue. We were given a different room with a pool view. Boy saved us from having to stay longer. Much thanks! 
Food at buffet was alright there is a large selection. The hotel was very busy during mother’s day weekend. The swim area lacks sufficient pool chairs and the swim pool is very deep at 1.5 meters. The kids pool area is dirty the water is brown. Service at the pool is excellent. Beem at the pool bar is so passionate and so nice and energetic. I wished I liked the hotel better I would have stayed because of Beems excellent service. Our room is next to the pool and the techno music blasts until midnight. I like techno but it might be too noisy for other families. 
However the children enjoyed the Saturday bubble foam party. That was memorable. Location is excellent and is close to Central Festival.
Pattaya is not a city for families, it is geared towards party goers. Beach is not nice and the city is crowded. We returned to Hua Hin beach which is better for families. If partying is for you then Pattaya is the answer.

We stayed for only 2 nights, Our Room was nice. I recommend to stay at a higher floor to have more quiteness especially through the daytime when people are using the pool.
Hotel staff was always friendly and helpful!
In sum everything was good, the only small negative thing was an issue with their booking special.
If you book directly on their website, they promise you an upgrade for free.
What I didnt know was, that the booked category was too high to upgrade.
So actually I wasted money and didnt get any upgrade - I should have booked one category lower so I would have received a free upgrade..
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Its a home away from home!!! The people, the service and specially the amazing care!!!!! I always feel this is the place to come back next time I'm on vacation!!! My children and I have a serious food allergy and all was prepared in advance as well as the care for our daily needs were totally meet considering the circumstances!!!!

Clean bedroom and very cold air-con. Staff are active and friendly. Wide variety of breakfast however dinner buffet has limited choice. Location is well situated in central area. And thank you for surprise birthday cake for my mom !!!

First of all, the staff was very kind. From the time of check-in to check-out time, we all greeted guests with smile. Room condition was very clean and pool was liked too. The meal was also delicious.

when i went into the hotel, i took a deep impress from the reception. all the staffs were so nice and kind. and they wanted to give us the useful information about the pattaya. so we can went on a pattaya trip easily.

Travelled to Pattaya for business trip around Dec 2014. Energetic and friendly front desk office during the check-in. Room was nice and hotel did send us welcoming letter individually. 
Breakfast was good with the choices. The only thing is the beach chair need to rent even hotel guest.

I had great fun last year at the Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya and just return from my 2nd stay at the hotel. Hotel service is still great, hotel standard stayed at a very high standard of service! Well done to the staff and management.
Read that they have a returning guest promo, wrote to them and no answer and did not expected to get the bonus, probably for returning guests that books directly to the hotel.
This stay was a family trip to Pattaya. My boy was all 100% enjoying the hotel facilities. He loved the music theme hotel, the room entertainment and the swimming pool. I personally love the gym. My wife loved the spa in the hotel, which there was a spa promotion package in the month of August.
This time got a Fender guitar up to my room from a good selection of Fender guitars and bass. This service has no cost, but a deposit is necessary. That's pretty fair, with the guitar and floor amp and stuff, really good equipment. My boy had lots of fun playing the guitar in the room.
The hotel is in good location, easy access to tourist attractions along the beach road.
Food was great, breakfast buffet was plenty to go around. The BBQ dinner buffet looks good too
Wifi was poor, but we were informed by the reception when we check-in, that's ok
I had no hot water one night, I guess that's because the Foam party just finished and hotel guests are taking shower at the same time. I did not encounter this problem on the other nights.
Great housekeeping team, room gets cleaned up very quickly and neatly. Good Job!
The remote for the sound system in the room has no battery, I guess this is the only fault I find in this hotel. The staff should check this regularly as it is stated in the website as one of their main in-room amenities.
I can say I really enjoy my stay with my family in Hard Rock Hotel this time! I will return if I get to Pattaya again. (Hopefully I'll get the returning guest upgrades)

Amazing experience, great staff. Clean venue. Awesome pool & gym. Staff helped with whatever I needed. When I wanted to do certain activities the front desk made it happen with convenience. I would absolutely come back again :) Thank you so much for everything!

Having stayed at the Hard Rock Hotel & Casinos in Macau, Singapore and Florida (Seminole) expectations were high for this hotel. Unfortunately it's not a great Hard Rock Hotel. It just doesn't have a great HRC vibe to the place despite all the standard ticks - music memorabilia and more branding than is probably necessary. The thing is it kinda feels like it's not terribly authentic - kinda slapped across a standard beach resort... perhaps this is what has happened. Strangely - the entertainment club is right next door and you get the feel it's run as a separate enterprise from the hotel and with lots of street traffic walking in perhaps this is the case as well. 
In any case - the hotel is extremely well positioned within Pattaya, the staff are happy and accommodating and most importantly for those travelling on their own dime - it is extremely good value for money. Enjoy and rock on!

The service & the food are excellent. It's a fancy hotel, with fun swimming pool. Beds are so comfy. BTW, the cigarette smells are everywhere, even on the non-smoking floor. The toilet has weired smells.

What an AWESOME place to stay!! The service from all staff at this hotel was outstanding!!  A great place to stay  for people of all ages.. My children had a ball participating in the daily activities around the pool.. There was always something going on..  I would definately reccomend this hotel!! I can't wait to go back again.

Amazing just the best fitness with new machine beautifull jacouzzi and the room is just perfect too anyway much better that bayview hotel for the same price and the atmospher is very funny great experience must go

We enjoyed our stay here in Hardrock, the kids enjoyed all the activities around specially in the swimming pool, Mr. Quito was the best guy here, all the kids love him, he spend all his time making them happy, also Mr. Tiger and Mr. Tao are very nice and sweet

The location is so great. It's located at the center. You can chill in the pool watching the sunset at the beach with nice cocktail. The room is amazing , clean , big and comfortable. The breakfast is very delicious and the hard rock cafe is very good for chill out if you have no plan to do in the evening. Recommended

Service and response was very poor.
desk operator and reception staffs were not responded during booking changes and price .
booking was cancelled  and not responded as I am the frequent customer.
I am not going to recommend anymore to my collogues and family.

We have a good holiday at this hotel . Everything in this hotel was impress us.
Hotel's staff very friendly and good service mind. I love the pool so much , Very big and A lot of activities around. The view over the swimming pool and the sea was very good if you stay in sea view room , Room is clean and comfortable . Delicious food at Star Diner and good breakfast , Relax time in spa and massage room. Thanks to all staff for our impressive holiday , Will be back here again surely. Love Hard Rock !

Overall my experience at the Hard Rock in Pattaya was good.  This was my 25th stay at the hotel as I tend stay there when travelling on business trips in Thailand.  This time I brought my family with me and they all had a good time.  I would say the pool is one of the best I have seen in a hotel for kids to play at and adults to swim, relax, drink, or eat.  I was amazed at how clean the water was when I went for a swim in the late afternoon.  Thanks to the pool maintenance staff for keeping the pool looking so good and the water crystal clear, even after a full day of kids and adults using it.  I stay in a lot of hotels, and many very nice, but generally in the afternoon the water gets a bit cloudy as the filters can't keep up with the people using it or the chemicals are not properly balanced,  This was not the case at the Hard Rock in Pattaya.  As a pool owner I know how hard it is to keep the chemicals at the proper levels and the filtration working optimally to give such good results.

Helpful & nice staff, all of them always wear a smile . I love the pool activities on weekend. My family stay all the time there. At the room, we love the Movie Channel. At least we take time to see a movie per day. But the shower tap was so weak, I hope that can be improve !

No toothbrushes or comb for daily wash up, the bath room has no doors so that the water can slide out and why don't every room has a balcony to see the outside sea view too.This can attract people to live in

Great staff and location. We were arrive early for check in at hotel, however the staffs were great try their best to allocate rooms for us. Although check in process about 2 hours, so lucky that all of our rooms are sea view. Great guitar shape pool and beach at the hotel. Good for weekend or summer treat.

We had a Deluxe Sea View room, great views of the pool and the ocean. Only niggle was that the bathroom was a bit small but everything worked well and the staff were fantastic. We rented the pool side Cabanas and my wife and I relaxed while the 4 year old and 9 year old boys had a fab time. Dad even got involved in the water basketball in the pool!!

a good property...nice staff...very neat and clean hotel..room size is also quite decent..it was on the beach road...all the basic possible facilities one looks for in a hotel were there...very good for family group also...

Very well done manage by all staff. "Great stay with u"
Swimming pool and all eminently are very well.near walking streets. Enjoy a lots with u.see u very soon .next time with my kids I will be back to stay in this hotel.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Well where to start.
So booked a room online as it was a great deal. 
Arrived at the hotel car park full so had to park in the other one which is far from the hotel. Check in which takes around 20 minuets !! Got to the room very small and a bad smell from the poorly designed bathroom. Then had to wait 20 minuets for my luggage.
On the plus side the bed was great as was the housekeeping .
Breakfast is downstairs in the buffet restaurant good selection but room too hot and staff too slow. One day I arrived late around 1025 and they told me I only have 5 minuets to eat !
Really 5* so I didn't bother trying the other outlets. But on the 2nd night found the cafe, what a difference staff great and fun. The band new colour were great too. Better than the other bars in Pattaya. They even came to my table to say hi. Look out for joe the guy with the dreads such a cool guy. The food is American and just what I had needed but be warned the burgers are big. I ended up spending the rest of my stay at the cafe. You must really check out the band as they are great.
Day 3 had a massage which was fantastic best massage I had in pattaya well worth paying a little bit more. 
So all happy and well until check out. The guy behind the counter was not interested and took so long. When I said I was in a hurry he just looked at me. Such a shame after the great time I had had in other areas of the hotel. I will be back to the cafe and spa but not sure if I want to stay in the hotel again

Great ambience. Next to the beach, beach is not really worth though. 
The lobby area is amazing with all those dresses and guitars. 
Pool was open, but was under renovation. Overall, we had a good time. 
We checked out Sat morning, missed the evening party at the Hard Rock Cafe. 
Family had a great time. Might not come to Pattaya again. But will surely explore some other Hard Rock hotel in some other city.

This is our 4th stay at the hard rock Pattaya in 10 years.
I must say that it didn't start off well. Firstly the hotel staff didn't give us a free upgrade even though it stated that they would if you book directly from their website. 
Also I booked around 3 months in advance and was not told at anytime during my correspondence with the hotel that the pool would be partially close  ( as in the children's section of the pool).
But thanks to Ann ( Manager), she managed to get us connecting rooms and smoothen things out for us.
I noticed that the staff (the one initially attending to me in particular) at the reception tend to treat the Caucasians and the Asians differently. This was not the case in our previous visits. So I hope that they treat all guests equally. 
That said , the staff at the restaurants and swimming area were great and the kids enjoyed their stay 
Rooms at the Hard Rock are small. I think what keeps me coming back is the pool ( and do please tell us the renovation period ), and the interaction between staff and guests.
Once I don't get treated right , I will just move to newer hotels. 
The next time I visit will be the deciding factor of whether I will continue to stay at this hotel in my future visits to Pattaya.

Plenty to do. Great location. As expected. Would visit again.
Negatives. Paying a premium for the brand always stings the wallet. Having to pay extra to use inflatable rings and access to the pool parties. Just another way for the hotel to cream more from its guests.

Did a 3 Days 2 Nights with Hard Rock Pattaya. Pool was awesome. What was great was the kids club which gave some me- time as we bumped the kiddos off for their playtime. Perhaps it would have been better if the team could have more fun than looking serious at the kids club. Breakfast spread wasn't fantastic. In fact the stay at Pattaya was a kick start to our 9days Thailand trip in celebration for our 12yrs anniversary. Rather disappointed as in comparison to the next 2 resort and hotel who arranged a nice surprise while Hard Rock had none on this little extra mile which could have perhaps gone a longer way..

The Hard Rock brand is a brand that is well known and for good reason. The vibe of the hotel, the decor, the facilities and staff are all great here. Beds were extremely comfortable and decent entertainment on the TV and the recently renovated rooms had very nice bathrooms with the theme from as soon as you step into the lobby continuing all the way into the room. Buffet breakfast was good with a wide selection of western and asian food with egg/omlette chefs and table service for coffee/tea.
Checked in on the Saturday night (July 28th) and after exploring walking street for a short time returned back to partake in the foam party next to the pool. Decent music, good crowd and all the staff at this event were very friendly and made it a really good night. 
The concierge staff in general were very helpful in organising a trip to Koh Larn (Definately do and rent a scooter and get to the lookout on top of the mountain!), parasailing, Tiffanys show, Sanctuary of truth and even had a contact for jetski rental that wont scam you (NEVER RENT A JETSKI OR GO ON A TOUR FROM THE BEACH MERCHANTS IN PATAYA) and were able to tell us DO NOT SPEND MORE THAN 20 THB PER PERSON PER TRIP ON THE UTES WITH SEATS ON THE BACK! If you say the name of your hotel they will charge 100-200 THB where FROM WALKING STREET it is a 10 THB fare per person! Just get on and hand them the cash when you get out, otherwise it can be classified as a "private fare" and they charge more.
Had alot of fun in Pattaya as a young couple seeing the sights by day and partying by night, with everything relatively close and cheap. Good food (ask for Moomaroi Restaurant) and an awesome experience, was a highlight of the trip to Thailand. So much to see and do, and staying at the Hard Rock topped it off!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Great location with the beach just across the road, and recommended for families. Great friendly staff and plenty to do, and space to relax. The club floor is worth paying the extra for and space to get work done.

A good quality hotel with nice clean rooms and good facilities, such as pool, spa, etc.
Also, the taxi/van service to sights was good and not too pricy. 
The only negative thing I have to say about the hotel is the windows, which is not sound proof, which can be a bit annoying, when your room is placed towards beach rood, which has a lot of traffic untill late in the night and there is also some noise from boats in the bay, when the time is about 9 AM.
Also the walls between the rooms was a but thin so you could hear the neighbouring room (but I had no problem with noise in the night from the neighbouring room)

Hi 
Thankfully we stayed just for a day. We stayed two days at Amari Ocean Pattaya but after the expectation set by Amari. Hard Rock stand no where. We reached hotel around 12:30 to check in at first they denied they don't have king size bed since they are booked but we booked the hotel around 3 weeks earlier. We asked for free upgrade then they provided us king size bed. Rooms were small !! No good view from balcony !! Some noisy voice constantly come from outside. The only best part of this hotel is pool and Saturday night pool party. When you go to swimming pool remember to take room towel else they take security for 500 Bhat for each towel as if we are thief and we will stole there towel. Customer service is 0 not curtious towards customers. Giving two star for swimming pool and pool party ! Rest not a pleasant by  stay !!

I felt very secure given there is a lot of unrest in this world - security is every where and not threatening in the least.
The room was very clean and of a high standard along with the services provided.
Every request was attending to as a high priority - there was very minimal wait time
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
The Shack Bar team is super good and really good service.
Reception must be more focus on customer queuing.
But overall I love you hotel and will go back again definitely!
Last time I tried your buffet but it's not good enough compare with the price we've paid so please check on that.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I must have known from the beginning that Hard Rock means something "rocks", so it's not supposed to be a quiet place to relax - so actually it's my own mistake to choose this hotel. They put the hard music on the pool - until 1 am in the morning on Saturday night, so  I really don't recommend it for a family with a young toddler like us.  I don't know what happened with the walls - we even could hear the other room's guests talking and even fighting! It's really annoying and for the first time in my life I had to use ear phone to listen to music from my handphone instead of listening the noise from the other room. 
They are doing the renovation, so don't expect a good napping since it's also noisy in the evening.
The food is standard, I might say we could get far-far better food in more reasonable price. But yes the staffs are helpful enough, and the interesting thing is they hold some activities for the kids - one of them is the foam in the pool in certain time.

This is the best property to stay with kids opp. to Pattaya beach, Its a kids friendly hotel that allows two kids, less than 12 to stay with the parents free. I stayed with my wife and 2 kids in last week of June 2018, a Saturday evening is a must when you stay in this hotel, as the kids are sure to enjoy the bubble pool party in the evening (FREE for in house guest).
