Various other kids club activities are also very good, location was good, breakfast buffet was well spread... the theme of rock star is very well setup and maintained, true to its name. I like the Hard Rock lingo, ("my ego needs some rest" - for "do not disturb"  and "Setup my Stage" for "Make my Room") Kids enjoyed the small water parks near the pool area, the artificial beach area and the Jacuzzi was also good... with very nice big swimming pool... with open showers.... Staff was very helpful and the Hotel really rocked..! Will surely come again.

We got nice room with the view of the pool
Too bad could not get the king sized bed but got two queens which was joined together but not very nice as not a whole big big bed. Overall very nice stay reception was very helpful and thoughtful when I forgot my room card inside the room was immediately issued with one more card.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I stayed in this hotel for 10 days with two weekends. Very nice hotel with different theme and lovely rooms with back side wall of your bed with larege posters of famous singers. I had a room with Elwys Preslis poster and romm decor is excellent. You also have your own music system where you can play your own music. Weekends is wonderfull here especially at the pool where they organise games for both in house guests and local families comming with children. The music pub / restaurant side of the pool facing the sea beach is a lovely place to spen the night dinner if you are a alone or with companion to have fun. the restaurant inside the hotel also is good and thai food for sure is best served here with wide range of buffet as well as alakrat. the choise is yours. The reciption area is decorated with music istruments of estwhile singes and their costumes which is really a lovely collection and beautiful to watch. The staff are very soft and cordial and you will have real good time staying here. They can also organise a day trip to the islands and water sports if you are interested. Th hotel is in the middle of the beach road facing the sea. Though the main entance is on the other street....you can walk to the the beach from the pool side whcih is just crossing the road. Its close to the shopping malls on the beach road and walkable to the either ends of the beach road which is having various hotels, shopping, restaurants ect., This hotel is like the center point on the beach road. Very convinient and good location.

This Hotel is what makes pattaya a place to be.
Near to the beach road and near the Ripley's believe it or not and the seasons mall.
The rooms are very well done with an eye for detail for towards luxury.
The food is good and the pool is real neat.
All in all its a fun place and highly recommended.

Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya, enjoyed a great meal here, very well priced for the size!! (Classic western sizing)
Drinks were affordable and the service was not over the top. 
Of course the great thing about a Hard Rock anywhere in the world is the music!! Its great to see all the pictures and costumes on the walls, and a great conversation starter... Very clever really... A place you will talk about...

We stayed at the Hard Rock for a total of 8 days in June 2011.  Part of the hotel was being renovated which we knew before booking our rooms.  That didn't bother us.  The room was what we expected, nice cozy bed, clean and roomy bathroom.  The overall services from the staff was great for the exception of their house keeping and Wifi service.  
My wife called house keeping for new towels and was told the staff will be right up.  Ten minutes later my wife called again to remind them and was told the same thing.  Now twenty minutes have passed and no sign of house keeping so I walked down to the front desk to inform them about the issue.  The front desk called house keeping and told me they'll bring it.  I got back to the room told the wife what the front desk said.  She got in the shower, minutes later house keeping shows up.  It took them 25 minutes to bring up two towels.  Another issue we had was when I called and request for some ice in the evening.  House keeping told me they'll bring it up.  They never showed up and we end up falling asleep.  
The wifi was expensive for the slow and inconsistent service it provided.  We paid for the week that was 1500 Baht.  Only to find out that we were allow one username and password.  Now both of us are taking online classes and needed wifi on both of our laptops.  After having the front desk talk to the manager, they gave us a second account as a complimentary.  The internet was slow, sometimes hard to connect and it drops in out meaning we have to log in to the Hard Rock web access site to continue surfing.
Hard Rock is nice but I don't foresee us staying here again on our next trip to Pattaya.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The hotel is centrally located and a swimming pool are impressive and the reception staff collaborators especially Ms Eve but the rooms where there are few honor.  Also do not forget the workers at the pool bar understanding and friendly and quick service.

We stayed for 7 nights in a Rock Royalty room - the first night in a city view room and subsequent nights in a sea view room. The sea view room was way better as it was bigger and had the view of the sea. The only thing was that we sometimes smelt cigarette smoke and it could be due to people smoking?
Chloe from the Rock Royalty lounge helped us make the change of rooms.
We enjoyed our visits to the Rock Royalty lounge everyday. The food was excellent, with cocktails and drinks in the evenings, while watching the sunset. We must say that it is thanks to team members like Chloe and Ik Kew who made all the difference! We were glad we booked the Rock Royalty room.
We enjoyed our buffet breakfast at the Starz Diner everyday, except one day where we had ala carte breakfast at the Rock Royalty lounge. The food spread and service were really good.
We especially liked the huge swimming pool, where the temperature was just nice. There were 2 lifeguards, and we saw one of them who sprung to action when one girl was struggling after falling from the 'walk on water' boards. So amazing and so alert!
The Shack Bar at the pool was another place we liked - they had happy hours during the late afternoons too.
We enjoyed the Pool Party on Saturday night - nice music from the live band and the nice foam! It was not noisy and it was really great music!
The location of Hard Rock was just nice - we could get on board a songthaew right at the door step! We could walk to Central, Terminal 21 and even to the Bali Hai pier if we did not wish to ride on the songthaew.
On the few times where it rained, we appreciated the umbrellas placed in our rooms and it was a nice touch!
There were so many nice restaurants nearby - eating indoors or outdoors, Thai food etc. It was amazing!
After eating all the food, we used the gym everyday and it was really nice, overlooking the pool.
When we return to Pattaya for our next holiday, we will stay in Hard Rock Pattaya again as we have had such an enjoyable time.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Service was great. Staff was very helpful and friendly. Breakafast buffet was delicious. But I enjoyed the pool the most. I plan on coming back since its so close to Bangkok. I will recommend it to all my friends

Last minute decision to go to Pattaya, did not realize it was also the same weekend as the marathon. Ended up in one of the suites which was great valve for money. The room was massive, only down side did not look out onto the pool, but could see the sea, Pattaya South & Buddah hill.
Check in was very quick & we just left our luggage as we were checking in before 12:00. Access card was handed to us & the luggage would be taken to the room later.
Around 3;30 got back to hotel & straight in the pool with the daughter, they have lots of activities going on throughout the day to keeps the children occupied. Breakfast was served on the 9th floor in quite room, great for just relaxing & the breakfast was cooked to order so no noisy tourists or long queues. 
The staff are all very friendly, and they know how to keep children entertained. MY only slight complaint was after breakfast coming down to the pool around 9;30 and all the chairs in the shade were already taken, & by that I mean had towels on them no persons sitting. For the next 3 hours we were in the pool which offers very little shade most of the chairs were still not occupied. Whilst talking to the staff around the poolside bar they then told me that the beach huts are for rental approx. 1000Baht per day, but you do get free cocktail so works out not to be that expensive. For me though it’s frustrating when all the chairs in the shade are taken before 9:30 and not used.
My daughter is just at the age where she is too big to sleep with us, but an extra bed in the room makes it small, hire a suite, the living room is huge & the sofa makes a great bed so she can have her own space & not disturb us. The suite is well worth the extra month.

Hardrock never gets old, this is the 4th time to Hardrock Pattaya and it was great. The kids love everything from the buffet breakfast to the Saturday night pork spit. 
The hotel rooms are great and staff are always more than happy to help. JJ at the front desk is friendly and is a great asset to the Hardrock. 
We really enjoyed the pool games and during Songkran the games are great. 
Thanks again Hardrock for a rocking time.

I love everyone's services in hotel. NO DOUBT!!! This is our 2nd Anniversary at Hard Rock Pattaya, we even been given a surprise "strawberry chocolate dip" as a GIFT. Sincere appreciated!! Will come again and also STRONGLY RECOMMEND to friends and family!
Last but not least, please check my deposit payment, that should be cancelled or returned to me, but I saw it charge to my credit card on 30/5/2017. Thank you!!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Hi, 
This is the 1st time visit to Hard rock hotel Pattaya and prior to that we have been to HRH Bali.Compare to that we have minimal excitement as HRH Bali was way generous in hospitality as they have provided a recognition gift and a card hand written by the general manager himself. We do appreciate HRH Pattaya as they have send a cake to our room as it was my birthday.still in amenities wise improvement and upgrading are required in HRH Pattaya .
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: like the pool sooooo much! clean and with lifeguards all the time. some fun games and party arranged at the pool. very safe and quiet in room. room's small but clean. ok breakfast. very helpful reception. security guarde with nice smile at each side of the entrance. like the hotel

We stayed in last week from 25th July to 28th July.That was a short stay but thanks to hard rock hotel it was a wonderful stay.We are normally would not say in the hotel room but this time the room was so relaxing and we spent more time in the hotel.
We stayed in a Kings club sea view room.The room was tastefully designed.nice and relaxing colours with mood lighting ,soft comfy bed and a great bathroom.Every day when we go out and come back to the room we had a nice surprise with cakes and chocolates.
The only down side for me was the breakfast there was so many meat options but not chicken unfortunately I eat only chicken.
We got so many things free here - WiFi,all day snacks at the kings lounge,cocktail in the evening,laundry ..ect...
Room service is excellent and very polite,helpful staff.
They have a nice huge swimming pool and a man made beach in side the hotel premisses.the beach and all the beach sports are available right opposite the hotel and you can even get the coral island trip.many street dining options are available around the hotel.all the shopping malls are in walking distance.
Thanks again Hard Rock !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I stayed for a for a few days in a Kings Club sea view room. The room was spacious and to international standard. However I would suggest that you ask for a room facing south, as there is construction of a new building next door on the northern side. 
The Kings Club lounge was fantastic. Check in was seem less and Ann was a pleasure to deal with. Her constant service provided was lovely. Breakfast, all day drinks and sandwiches were a real treat. Afternoon tea (3.00 - 6.00 pm) and evening drinks of cocktails, beer and wine as well as hot snacks and cheese (6.00 - 7.30 pm). Lounge was open from 6.00 am - 10.00 pm. 
I spent one afternoon at the pool. Hiring a cabana (700 Baht) for the day. The bar guys and waiters were great. 
Also ordered room service one night and the food was outstanding. 
In conclusion I had a wonderful stay at HRHP. The staff, location and atmosphere was so good.

In front of the beach, good swimming pool for kids, good breakfast, good security system. If you take a walk around make sure you bring the room keycard which you can hang on your neck so you won't be stopped by the security when you enter from the beach road as it's not public access.
If you travel with kids, book the kids suite room, so they get their own bed abd you get 4 persons breakfast

Almost all the staff are very friendly and welcoming, and respond quickly and warmly to our inquiries and requests. The hotel hosts for kids many different activities by the pool. No doubt it's very kid-friendly! Don't miss the foam party every Saturday!

It was good oppotunity for my children to stay this hottel.
They enjoyed kids pool and foam party.
But, it was not easy understand for us the price of instruments and activities at the pool.
We want to stay again.

very stylist, pleasant, happy, especially kids, location is excellent. easy access to the beach as well as beach activities. View from hotel rooms are great. We had the choice to have breakfast on the lounge. It was quite and pleasant for our family to get together too.
Buffet dinner was really a let down. Bad experience though.

It was a foam party the time I went there and we had so much fun there! However, the breadfast in your hotel is not so good like your room and service. By contrast, Centara Hotel in central world, Bangkok is very impressive, especially their Thai tea! Anyway, hope to stay in your hotel again.

To be fair, I had high expectations. I was at HRH Bali couple of months ago and have written a raving review about the hotel and their wonderful team. 
I was naturally looking for a similar experience. And I was disappointed.
The moment we got off the minibus from a 2 hours journey from Bangkok, you would expect a friendly staff smiling or greeting us at arrival. Nope. 
The check-in process was more business-like. The room was nice and clean.
The facilities were atypical of HRH, sandy swimming pool, full of activities to do thru-out the day, lots of music memorabilia on display and screens showing classic MTVs and concerts. 
But something was missing. The funk wasn't there. The Thais are supposed to be among the friendliest folks but they dun feel too happy here. There's no joyful banter, no playful chats and no random smiles as they walk past you. If it wasn't for Kart of the breakfast staff who was really fore-coming and Ann who was so friendly sending us off, I would have rated the stay much lesser. And I couldn't believe the hotel billed us for 2 towels that we returned late at night.  
Ah! Do try out the Muay Thai classes though, the coach's really a great guy. It's a mean work-out and definitely worth the money.

The room I stayed in was a bit old, the shower is unacceptable, there was a drain blockage and every single night I would need to take the shower as fast as possible otherwise there would be flooding !

While checking out I was stopped for a mug which was missing in my room . I had 3 rooms and we were having meals together , if room service must have taken why was I stopped.you will be given a bad room and then when u pay extra money than only u will be given good room. They should try to match standards of accor group which is the best in hospitality industry.sofitel Novotel A grade .

I expected to get silent room from outside especially when the next room close/open the door or talking during walk back to their room.
But for the rest or both clean and pool with service is very nice.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Good location in Pattaya, nice sea view.  Amazing pool facilities, good hospitality, staff are nice and attentive. Pool lifeguards are alert and we feel very safe playing around.
However, the quality of toothbrush should be improved
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We recently got married and had our evening party at the HRH in Pattaya. This invovled dozens of guests coming from all over Thailand, the UK and Australia. Everyone only had good things to say about it.

We love service from all stuff; waitress, pool guard, cleaner. All are nice, helpful and friendly. We think HardRock do very good training and hire the right person to work here :) Also we like the small details that RardRoack do as a Birthday cake / Small gift/fruits and chocolate ...small things but nice. Swimming Poll and activities always good for us and the kids.
Something that we recommend to improve is 1. cleaning the remote pls ( sticky and dirty) 2. TV screen is not clear, can see the reflection of another channel, every time always like this.

Nice hotel. Room was great and location is very close to the beach. It was very nice of the band member to leave us a note for our anniversary. Overall it was an awesome stay at hard rock. 1 night was not enough.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The room is good but not very big. The view is nice. The location is good. The swimming pool is nice. The pool activities are good. The staff are helpful. The breakfast tastes good but not many choices.

This hotel is a right beach facing and one of the most convinient locations in pattaya .Its full of activities for a family. The foam party is a great attraction and an experience to have. Rooms are spacious.

I have been visiting this hotel for about 5 years its the only place I like to stay in Pattaya so I thought its about time I write a review. Great hotel the staff is super friendly and the manager Ann always remembers me by name. They are very lucky to have her as a manager.. Super friendly, always smiling and always so polite and her attitude obviously rubs off on all of her staff. If its going to the pool or going down for breakfast I always feel great at the hard rock! Always smiles and staff that is smiling and ready to help with any problem. I really enjoy staying here! Thanks Hard Rock Pattaya :)

Reccommended by friend, service was excellent. Staff very helpful and friendly. We were upgraded to sea facing room with the best view of Pattaya as the staff said. Nice room with the best quality of bedding. Can't believe, don't want to move from the bed. Very comfortable bed i ever experienced. Pizzeria is my favourite, you should try Margarita pizza!!! Came back to our room and found a big cup cake for my partner' s birthday. This was beyond our expectation. Thanks to all staff for our fantastic stay.... See u again.

A great stay at Hard Rock. Very friendly staff. Arrived a couple of hours than required check in but they got us a room straight away. Very clean hotel. Great pools and massage facilaties. Would stay again. Rock on ;)
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I am not going to complain on having no club benefits due to the pandemic situation in which I do not find it reasonable whatsoever. During my stay, I have found some simple mistakes but important enough for the management to reconsider their actions.  1. Repetitive breakfast menu during high occupancy weekend with very limited selection, not to mention some quality and taste issues. 2. Limited menu in hotel outlet and room service. For example, Pizzeria without pizza and only 1-2 choices of pasta dishes.  Having no more than a few Thai dishes on the menu is a complete disgrace. BTW Indian set was good but I doubted if it's a hit or miss when the majority of guests now are local Thai. 3. About the pricing, can make it more affordable. While this hotel room rate barely touch

Overall service was still unacceptable , service persons have not much communicated well each other. Many incorrect information and delay when serving customer services. no flexibility to change/modify accommodation although a bit.

The best part of this hotel was the rooms with sea view and very helpful and friendly staff throughout the establishment - from the guards at the swimming pool to servers in restaurant and reception and concierge staff. The buffet breakfast was delicious - I can't imagine a better way to start a day.  The rooms are very quiet, clean and full of natural light. I had a great stay. Terry at the concierge desk was especially friendly and helpful and went out of his way to give us tips and advice on what to do and when.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I upgraded to Rock Royalty for a significant birthday treat. It was worth every single bhat!
The Rock Royalty Happy Hour each day was so enjoyed by me and my friend. Spectacular views over the bay at sunset. Lovely people - staff and guests!
I do travel, world wide, a lot - this is the best swimming pool ever! It is a perfect pool.
Will stay in any Hard Rock Hotel now on my travels.

Good location good service big pool sauna etc. too espansive bar and restaurant (190 BAHT for one espresso not so good  it's a lot not only Thailand but everywhere, it's almost 6euro!) Maybe only one very small bottle of bath gel for 2 guests not so generoys. But in general hotel is very good

This was our second trip to pattaya, last time aorund we had stayed at the pattaya sheraton(now intercontinental) and had found the hotel to be amazing but this time around we wanted to stay closer to the citys happening area. the hard rock hotel didnt disappoint at all. we went thru the reviews here on tripadvisor and selected hard rock as it is hoghky rated as a great family hotel. the service, the food,everything wasexcellent. their travel desk helped us plan all our local tours and it was reasonable and reliable. special thnks to rihanna aka jeb for the arrngements. whenever next time in pattaya this would be our place to stay with family.

It's close to the beach.You can go to the seaside for a walk in the morning and evening. There is also a shoppingmall near here.The hotel swimming pool is great, I would go swimming every morning. Smile to greet every waiters are very polite, and let me feel very comfortable.

The hotel is kept clean the breakfast buffet is excellent and the pool is one of the most outstanding pools you’ll see in Asia. Great hotel. Great room service. Great housekeeping service. The front desk is not the most caring but everything else is excellent year.

The swimming pool is very nice.
The sea in Pattaya is nice, but it was not as clean as i thought. The Koran island was not very good either.
However, the hard-rock hotel pool was cleaner and larger than any other hotel in Bangkok.
I'm sorry i didn't have more use of the hard rock hotel pool.
The breakfast was very good.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Nice facilities, friendly staff. Good location and like a check in experience particular on duty staff are friendly and helpful.Hope to see some improvement on restaurant foods, which look forward to have nicer foods for breakfast.

Best location in front of Pattaya Beach, more over they has their own artificial beach and stunning pool! The wify is very fast and stabil. Very easy to get halal food around hotel. I would reccomended to take twin room for family with 2 kids, because their bed is 160 cm per bed, great!

Great pool comfy beds and amazing service thanks to Eve and Anne plus all the staff  were great  good value friendly property amazing atmosphere and especially one of the best pools in Pattaya highly recommended

Everything was very enjoyable but only one thing people are noisy in the hallway. I enjoyed sauna very much. I want to come back with family. Location was just perfect with every direction. Most of all crew are very kind
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: One of the few properties located on the Beach Road, this hotel is a part of the Hard Rock Chain. Excellent pool facilities with decent rooms. There were many activities for young kids, hence they were kept pretty busy with them. The Foam Party on Saturday night is a must attend extravaganza which is not to be missed. The food is also decent with a decent BBQ dinner everyday. On the whole a good hotel with facilities for everyone.

This is my 2nd trip to Pattaya and again i brought my friends along and we stayed at the Hard Rock Pattaya. I would say HRP has never disappoint me.
As soon as we check in there was abit of mis-communication, still the Front Office team member Beau manage to resolve it and she never fail to give us all the beautiful smile on her face. She got us the room as requested. 
The rooms are simply unique by the design and comfortable beds. The hotel is just beautiful and amazing. The atmosphere was simply speechless. We love the breakfast spread, the live band music, the back to back games/event that was held at the pool. 
Thumbs up to Beau, Tammy for the swift check in. Nastya who even walk us out to the drive way while we are leaving. And definitely a big STar to Kevin who assisted us alot in the planning, recommending places of interest, places and delicious food area. Hard Rock Pattaya is fortuitous to have GEM team members like the 4 of them. 
I would definitely recommend anybody who is going to Pattaya to stay in this hotel. As it was quoted at the luggage tag. You can check out anytime you like, but you can never leave.

The hotel is across the beach.. can go though back door. Easy to find everything around
Staff is nice, food is great, pool is nice n we attended bubble party at the pool on saturday afternoon
recommended for family holiday

We dreamed of spending a night in one of your hotels and it was an opportunity to fulfill this dream for my girlfriend and myself during our visit to Pattaya. Great reception, team smiling and very welcoming.
The room was perfect, very clean and comfortable. We stayed one night and finally decided to stay another one more night cause it was hard for us to leave you.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: It is worth for us to stay at Hardrock more than once as both of my girls insist to live there for the second summer holiday! We live be in royalty level this time and it is more worth than we expected!

Staffs service at the breakfast area - Overall very poor! Unfriendly, not smiling, not courtesy. Example,  staff preparing at the noodle counter, i think his mind is not at the counter, no manners - staff preparing the eggs - no manners - maybe they over worked? Very poor !! This statement is attended to the staff that attended to my family and myself during the stay - this must be improved

The rooms very pretty good however even though my room was on a non smoking floor it had a terrible smell of cigarette smoke in the room and the bathroom. I called up the reception to change my room however they said they did not have any deluxe rooms with king size beds available but they would send someone with spray and ozone machine (and I would have to step out of my room for an hour while they did that !). I had no option but to head swimming and wait for them to clean my room (given the hard rock service standards I expected to be upgraded). 
Also, the staff could be more friendly. I felt they hated Indians for some reason ! The staff at the reception wore a fake smile and even the lady at the towel desk by the pool made a face when I went to collect towels and key card for sauna. 
However the swimming pool was terrific and so were the plunge pool/sauna facilities. The house keeping was able to process all requests efficiently ! I did check out after one day and stayed in a nearby Sofitel affiliated hotel wherein the staff was much more friendly !

So many Indians and Chinese. If you are okay with constant smoke, and unprofessional staffs, crowded breakfast, then you should go. Kids club was 100bht per hour. My cloth had been shrank as they washed it wrongly. I wont visit here ever again. Also complains are not accepted by staffs.

We spent only one night here and have to say the place was beyond our expectations! The room was simple, nice, and clean. The service at an international standard level. The pool was wonderful, big, and very family friendly. We were lucky to make it to the Family Foam Party which was pretty awesome (They have a foam party for adults later in the night too but too bad due to current situation in Thailand there is a curfew so those activities were canceled). Was very surprised to see many other activities and facilities were all very good and in good quality including the gym, steam rooms, mountain climbing. If you have children there a lot of things too besides the pool. The hotel seems to have these shows every weekend night for children which seemed entertaining. We also had time to stop by for the Dinner and Breakfast buffet which both was very good. 
We stayed here for only one night because we had a hotel voucher but we surely wanted to stay longer. We will surely be coming back again!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: All the staff members were all very helpful, calm, professional and fun. My daughter and I had an incredible time by the pool, where the lifeguards organized all sorts of great games for the kids and adults to play. I want to stay again soon.

Second visit to Hard Rock Hotel was as good as the first. Had a great stay this time as well. Breakfast is wonderful and tasty. 
Pool and staff working there is the main reason why we will return to Hard Rock again for third visit someday. Dennis and all other staff at the pool is great with kids and love to set up activities in the pool as basketball, water polo or volleyball.

It was a wonderful experience for our family though it is only for 1 night it was worth the stay.
We love the pool which occupies most of our time. Food at Hard Rock Cafe was good. 
The transfer to airport was a very pleasant trip too

I Really recommend  this hotel, staff is so kind and variable program are there, come and visit !!
Pool side is wide and weekend foam party is wonderful for kids or lover.  breakfast is so delicious.
room condition is good, and location is very good to move pattaya everywhere

The hotel does not blend with the Thai style hospitality that one gets used to in other Thai hotels. There are far better hotels in Pattaya a much more reasonable prices. The hotel is too Amercanised . You will like the stay only if kids are travelling . Hoghly overarted.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
The service is outstanding, the the decor is what you'd expect from the Hard Rock franchise. The pool is huge with enough room for children and adults to enjoy themselves separately. 
The room was large and the bed was amazing. The main issue is the rooms are very dark and the bathroom was even darker, makes putting makeup on difficult
The breakfast was very uninspired. It was nice enough, but dull. 
My main gripe is the cigarette smoke. There are dedicated smoking levels but the elevators stink of smoke and this wafts into the non-smoking levels as well. The hotel would do well to ban smoking completely.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Had a good experience. The staff were really friendly and the pool was great, especially if you have kids. The rooms and the hotel itself are showing their age. The breakfast was just OK. We got a good deal but not sure I'd go back at regular prices.

We enjoyed our stay at Hard Rock Hotel. Reasons? Friendly Staff. The facilities mirrored the theme Rock, although the rooms itself could have been more rocky. Our room had a wall picture of Carlos Santana. The pictures on the Hotel website with guitars and other stuff in the room are surely not representing the deluxe room. We were surprised about how goog it fitted for families. The pool is perfect size also for children, maximum depth 1,50m. We especially enjoyed the restaurant and there especially the breakfast. Thai and western dishes are really good quality.

The one and only decent live musc place , with decent nice crowd .
The drinks and cocktails were really good . The service staff was really pleasant and nice .
There is a foam party on satirdays near the pool , looked like fun , even though I didnt join

I like location and swimming pool. My kids, they are really like yo play swimming pool. And also the food  is good. Expecially I like swimmg actively and foam party. And There is easy to go shopping center.

Everthing is fine just for the breakfast you can put more food for international people likes please, you just put food which Asian people likes. you can put more beef and make more valueable omlette please

I have stayed in all the upmarket hotels in Pattaya but the one which I come back to is the Hard Rock Hotel. It has the most fun swimming pool, a great small gym, terrific spa and massage facilities, the staff remember your name and the food is great!

good location,good view,good music cafe,good swimming pool,good service,good breakfast. one reception know chinese language very well,make our stay very convenit.if i go pattaya again ,i will still book this hotel.

Booked a kids family room - made 2 attempts to check-in and was told on each occasion that the room wasn't ready even though it was way past normal check in time. Staff there tried to move us to a smoking floor which I declined because we have young kids. Eventually, we called it a day and left the hotel in complete disgust. The staff there did nothing to proactively resolve the issue, instead they continued to make it our inconvenience. During this 1 night stay, the hotel managed to waste 3 hours of our time, and I would never contemplate a future visit. This is a premium rate but very outdated hotel - I think they must survive mostly because of the 'Hardrock' name and not because of the levels of service they actually deliver.

Tired and thoroughly exhausted,I entered into the Hard Rock Hotel,only to be surprised.The hotel did manage to stand up to its name "Hard ROCK".
The hotel was magnificent. I was welcomed by a helpful receptionist,who guided us to our room.The room was extremely spacious and spotless. It overlook the swimming pool. The bathroom was pretty clean as well. What appealed to me the most were the wallpapers behind the beds.Behind one single bed was Bob Marley and the other was The Beatles.  A true fan..I was overwhelmed!.
The reception and lobby’s décor was also very captivating.
They had outfits,record,guitars of the legends. It was very attractive and looked amazing.
The services were excellent.They provided free wi-fi and room service.
The restaurant was very neat and showcased a lot of variety. It did not taste bad at all either. The spread was laid as a three-course meal and I had amazing Thai food- the best ever in fact!
The swimming pool looked beautiful. At the foot of it,was a tall sculpture of a guitar. The idea was very innovative. The pool had a view like that of a beach. There were palm trees and sand on the ‘bank’. The water was clear and appeard to be a beautiful blue.
The experience was memorable.The hotel was one that I can’t forget.

I was here With my Family, and I have been here before, and everytime its great. The hotel has everything, but my maine purpose is the pool because of the kids. It has a water slide and sand Beach. And also have activities for kids during the day, before it was only on saturdays, but now it seems to be everyday. I am a rocker and love hard rock, but the cafe play mostly pop and old songs, so my wish is that they start to play more hard rock, because the TV Channel int  he hotel room also have this channel, and tha is cool. And mention TV, i like the selection of free Movies, the best I have ever seen in a hotel.

The hotel is ageing. Not enough elevators to deal with a full house. And a few towel racks in the bathroom would be useful.
We were woken at night by some children ringing our door bell- they were from the room across the hallway. That was very annoying.

The toilet inside my room is dirty, they come make up our room when we still sleeping at 9:00 am.
The free slipper quantity is bad.
The swimming pool is great and big. Also the staff is nice.we have BBQ buffet dinner and the restaurant staff also is good.

Beach accessible cafe,make evening memorable by spending sometime in the cafe.Its very close to beach.Enjoy drinks or coffee with our beloved or friends there.Hard rock cafe has evening DJ music show along with drinks.its famous for couples and bachlors and very close to beach.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I have been visiting the hardrock hotel for many years,and if I always visit,what is it again...A family of friends who went with me two years ago-four of them-came with the baby this thim because it was born,and it was made in hardrock two years ago.That would be good enough for us to be a
hardrock fan.

The Hard Rock in Pattaya is in a great location right across the road from the beach. Everything is always clean and staff is very friendly. room are nice sized with comfy beds and furniture. Very large breakfast buffet served daily with lots of choices!
 The pool is one of the best in Pattaya, and one of the largest if not the largest. A little pricey sometimes, but you're paying for that party atmosphere. The HC Café is right there, and always has great cover bands. No negatives to share.

Best hotel ever in Thailand .cool staff and management super location clean room bigest swimming pool and super activat.evry one working in hotel try to help you and they are keep smiling all the time.. Thanks gus and be hardrock

We're regular visitors to Pattaya, having done the entire strip of star hotels on the beach road more than once over. With a new baby in tow, this time we thought of the Hard Rock and came away with the feeling that the resort has much more potential to excel.
Pros: 
1. Huge pool. The massive pool is such a strong draw that one is almost willing to forgive any other shortcoming in the property itself. The shallow sands at one end and the kids pool at the other are a sheer delight for all ages
2. Service Staff. The service staff are mostly a fun bunch. They seem to enjoy their work a lot and are mostly a smiling bunch of well mannered folks.The guard at the pool exit onto beach resort was a super friendly person who kept helping us with our baby pram all the time.
3. The Ambience. Relaxing with a very cool and modern vibe. This is not a new hotel but they've constantly updated the property.
4. The Saturday Foam Party. We were so excited about the party that we delayed our departure by a day.
Cons:
1. Some of the SeaView rooms are really No View at all. There is a construction sight and most of the sea facing rooms overlook that side. Be careful while booking.
2. The number of Balcony rooms is very less. We initially got a Sea view room that had no balcony and overlooked the construction site. Upon our request they put us on the 2nd floor (Smoking Floor) with a nice balcony that overlooked the pool more than the sea. That was ok for us.
3. The rooms need to have a proper closet and not a nook with hangars. Come on, Hard rock. At least put shelves on the walls and cover the nook with a curtain.
4. The food. I've been a regular visitor to almost all the Beach road hotels and by far, the Hard Rock comes last on the taste and value for money count. Small portions, which are low on taste didn't make me happy at all. You guys really need to give some strong feedback to your Indian chef. The Tikka masala was nowhere close to the real deal and the Papad was hardly roasted. Yes, I'm nitpicking, but feedback is feedback.
All in all, I was a bit confused about my stay. I did enjoy some parts of it, but some other aspects of the stay weren't that great as well. I think this place has potential to hit the Pattaya Top 5, but management needs to make greater efforts.

Very nice Hotel which lies near the beach and the Festival Center. The staff was very friendly. The room was very clean.  The breakfast was good and you had a lot choice of food. In the Hard Rock cafe  they play in the evening live music (Rock/Pop).

The staff at this hotel are very good, very helpful and spoke excellent English. It is located in the middle of downtown Pattaya on Beach Road with numerous shopping malls within walking distance. The room was excellent and we had a good view of the sea. The pool was really big and one night we were there they had a foam party!
Would highly recommend this hotel - it is excellent for families.

Always exellance service, the staffs are freindly, by the way i stay for 2 nights during 7 - 9 June 20019 I expected to have the breakfast provide smoke Salmon and black or Green olive but this time do not have its., its not the big point, I can enjoin other menu such as congee with crab and rice bold with fish. Once again thank you for good takecare during my stay.

Tired hotel, and lack of customer care. Allow additional time for check in and out. Don’t expect staff to provide additional advice or assistance without much prompting. If ordering a hotel car or taxi, allow 20-30 minutes. Very thin walls and doors.

As the name and image convey... you got to like music and this place delivers. We wanted to chill for 4 days and could not ask for a better place... Discrete and all amenities at hand.. LOVED IT ;-) and plan a return for the festive season... SEE YOU SOON AND ROCK ON ;-))

I just spent two nights in this hotel. Small room was given, i was jusr a walk-in as my friends birthday in Pattaya was to be celebrated. This revamped 25 or 35 year old hotel has had a major renovation, before the HRC grop took it over. Amenities and accessoires are plenty, but the structure is of 60's or 70's charme. Other friends stayed for hal the rate in larger and better rooms at cozy hotels nearby, the only thing they were lacking was the music memorabilia, which decorates the whole area within the HRH. Elevator noise kept me up half the night, a request for room change was ignored.
Gratitude in the adjoining hard rock restaurant was included as per bill, but the staff requested a tip-in-hand on top. reception reminded of the good old days, when customers were treated well, but any off-standard requests were completely ignored. The HRC group clearly constructed a profit center here, where they took over a hotel past its shelf-life and souped it up with colored outdoor lights ans some memorabilia. At half or a third of the requested price, I wouldn't have raised my voice, but this city full of hotelrooms offers better rooms, better service at fractions of their prices. My planned week-long stay was cut short then and i moved out to a better place, saved a lot of money by doing so.
After this experience, I dont trust just a name anymore. HRC in asia seems to have bought its stars and the charges are two levels up at least!

Friendly staff,smooth check in,7000 baht deposit on check in fair enough.lifeguard asks western women to remove clothing in the pool but ignores Indians and Muslims in full dresses! Good quality breakfast.would have liked an iron in the room,nevermind.I would visit again

it more than just a room !
the location is the greatest on Pattaya , you can choose a guitar and send to your room , enjoy yourself and it free , the staff make you a difficult own t shirt , everything is great !
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Our stay at Hard Rock Pattaya was our first at any Hard Rock Hotel. It won't be our last as we enjoyed our stay here because of the friendly and upbeat staff who served us... from the young man who greeted us upon arrival,  all through the guards outside  Beach Road.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
This was a returning visit, nothing much changed that we could notice. The pool is great, we just love it and being near the beach and shops is an added value.
We upgraded to the club royalty which gives access to the exclusive lounge where you may have your breakfast and actually eat and drink all day for free, very good value.
There are good staff and not so good staff as everywhere else. We appreciated the concern of the staff in the reception who took our call to get a doctor when our daughter got sick. When passing by the next morning they remembered and asked about her. Also the staff in charge of cleaning the room showed their concern over the next days.

The room is clean and tidy.  The staff in both reception area and restaurant are very nice and helpful.  The location of the hotel is quite good.  It is convenient for me to go to the shopping malls nearby.

Awesome hotel located at the heart of Pattaya, with the lovely and spacious room plus the spectacular view to the ocean, is what you need for a perfect vacation. Such a convenient location and you can find everything you need nearby.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I stayed here recently, based on the great reviews on this site.  
1. The rooms are smallish, and dorm like.  Although there is a balcony, the plastic white chairs on the balcony are unpleasant, and there is very little privacy since there is no shade, trees, etc. to block a guest who is on the balcony.  
2. The bathrooms are made of concrete, small and very no frills.  The very sunken bathtub is dangerous and hard to get in and out of.  My husband (who is 6 feet) actually tripped and hurt his foot while stepping out of the tub.  The design of the bathtub is also quite stupid since the only distinct feature is its deepness - its very narrow and unattractive overall (vivid blue color).   
3. Buffet is ok, nothing spectacular.  
4. Pool is ok, but surprised that there was NO landscaping, no trees, no gardens, etc.  around the pool at all!  
In fact, the whole hotel is like a big concrete mass, and not very pleasant, esp if you are looking for a relaxing sunny holiday.   Would not stay there again.

Stayed here recently for a business conference in July. The hotel and staff were exceptional and said hello at every opportunity. Rooms not overly spacious but i did not feel closed in at all. Amenities in the room were sufficient with the decor modern and being very clean.
I've stayed in plenty of hotels and i would say their pool area is one of the best utilised i have seen for the are it takes up. Private cabanas available or plenty of lounge chairs to use, take your pick. Swim up bar and kiddies splash area with a couple of slides as well.
Meals were great, both dinner and breakfast, the latter having plenty to choose from for all tastes concerned. Location is right across the street from the beach and i would say it is right in the middle of the beach locality. Plenty of night life abounds close by with clubs, restaurants and shopping as well.
Enjoyed my stay and would definitely stay here again, but for leisure next time.

The check was smooth. The front desk was friendly and good and everyday with a Smiley face Even during they bz hour. Respect for them.  Keep up the good job.  The room was clean and the Every day was make up. The breakfast was good.  The hotel was located in middle of the shopping center. Easy to go anywhere.  Overall This is the best hotel i ever stay so far.  I recommended my family and friend who is visit pattaya to stay in This excellent hotel and service.

Great place to stay , rooms have pictures of rock stars, a bit small in size but well furnished and plush..
no locks on the bathroom door -- a new novelty perhaps..
excellent swimming pool , 
the breakfast spread is to dream of.. extensive and superb...3 types of coffee on offer..
joiner fee of 900 THB--- for those who need the information.. 
was a pleasure staying here.. 
would come back again, close enough to the pattaya nightlife..
good service.... well stokced bathroom..

The location is great, easy to access the beach and the center of pattaya
staffs are friendly, the night show is funny 
My kids are enjoy the activity 
the view of the room are wonderful 
the foods are yum

Everything was perfect except I was on a very bad fever. I ask for paracetamol and the answer given was we dont have doctor in the hotel so we dont provide paracetamol. I have been in few other hotel. They also dont have doctor however they have first aid. By having first aid they have paracetamol. 
No doctor = No paracetamol???

Decent location in pattaya, right by the beach road, but check in from the other side, which may cause a little queue, if you arrive by car. Had a club room (suite) and was escorted to a private lounge for check in, no stress then, light food/beverage service while I waited. Large room with separate living room and bedroom, one bathroom and a separate toilet. Very good standard. Overlooking the beach and town. Was not much noise from outside. Always a lot of people in the lobby, busy hotel. Good amenities. wonderful large pool, especially for children. many restaurants. Great service from those who worked there, they checked up on me if I was missing something and straightened things out. Check out went quickly. A good stay at a great hotel, somewhat expensive?

My family stayed 2 nights, It's valuable time and perfect moment, 
Staff is always smile and help us. Breakfast us tasty and variety, sue we love it 
The most thing we liked is swimming pool, my daughter really loves it
Thanks 
See you again definitely

I am not a huge music fan but still took up hard rock on my trip to pattaya, and it turned to be an awesome experience. The staff is very friendly and keeps you comfortable right from when u enter the hotel. Rooms are excellent. Their swimming pool is the highlight of the property. We even used their spa and they had good masseurs. Right opposite the beach. Centrally located, awesome and must stay place.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We booked a suite! When we arrived at the hotel we got the offer to upgrade to Producer suite on floor 10 for only 850 bath extra per night. Then we also had access to the lounge on the 9th floor. Our suite was lovely 128 square and 4 balconies. Every day new flowers and sweets. The staff were wonderful, especially Dennis down in the pool who arrange different games in the pool everyday. We have stayed at many hotels in Pattaya but this is the best if you have family with children and while traveling as a couple. Do you want to live like a king, then you will live here. We stayed here for 3 nights and we will be back soon.

The location is right near the beach. The staffs are very nice and sevice oriented. The pool has activities on Saturday afternoon for guests to enjoy. Cabanas are available for rent. Adult pool party starts around 7-8 pm, while kids' pool party starts at 5 pm. Some weekends might have live music by the pool. Nice place for family with small kids to enjoy the weekend.

Trendy hotel located near to the beach front and with many local seafood restaurant just along the street. Room is clean and the staffs are polite. The pool is ideal for families with Kids.I believe this is one of the better hotels within Pattaya area.

I stayed in this hotel for 3 days.. Room and service are good, amazing pool, food & beverage was fantastic! Easy access to nearby shopping mall and most are within walking distance. Beach is just in front of the hotel.

Was a very good hotel.  I was there mainly on business.  But for a holiday I only gave it non-excellent rating as because it is not a "value" hotel due to its level of service and the location was just a bit north of the main entertainment district.

I am impressed on your staff service mind and activity for Children such as foam party, show for kids.
For pool is okay both parent and child, but for breakfast it is too crowd if it possible please expand the restaurant.

Booked 2 nights, spent the days at the pool.
  The beach/ part of the pool is great.
A great deal of children the 2nd day. 
  Some parents need to monitor their kids better.
 The hard rock in a bargain in the off season. They still flog the pricy menus at the food joints, and spendy drinks.
 Was hassled over a guest, by staff. Maybe the first time ever staying at a Major hotel chain. Never would happen at a hotel in vegas, USA or Europe I feel. Getting charged 500THB for a guest to stop by and hangout and visit was a slap in the face and I won't spend my money at hard rock Hotel in Pattaya again.

Thank you to the lovely staff at the Hard Rock Pattaya, lovely stay, everything perfect, room clean, food great service great, best hotel in Pattaya. The updated pool is great and its so nice relaxing by the pool with a beer or cocktail. Very good location, close to Central Dept store and shopping.

We stayed there for 4 days and our overall experience was very good which we shall cherish all through our lives..... the breakfast buffet was very nice and thought full to the needs of various nationalities staying there.....the pool was just amaizing espacially with all the pool activities arranged by the staff members.....the location was perfect, all the places were within walking distance....the staff was extremely helpful and nice, always eager to help and serve....the rooms needs a bit of up-gradation and the hotel room walls are quite thin, as we could hear the TV from the next door!! Although we were not with kids but there seemed to be fun activities for them as well..Overall a great place to spend your vacation...
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I really enjoyed my staying in this hotel the staff is very helpful they serve with a smile and kind the rooms are very specious and clean the facilities is superb i recommend this hotel to everyone whos going to pattaya P.S. i really want to thank one of the staff his name is nanthi he was very helpful and kind he helped us alot from the time we checked in to our check out

The slogan " Loved All Served all..." Is truly suitable for this amazing hotel. We decided to spend another 2 years in Pattaya and " Hard rock hotel Pattaya is our second home!!" We just cannot resist that this rockers hotel  had amazing energy to fill up your holiday...we confirmed!
Of all the places and hotel we had been experience " This rocker hotel had the most regular guest we have ever seen!!"  
For 7 years on and off .. and 3 yrs regulary visited.  We met other regulars hotel guest  each year.
The unexpected reunion for the activities at the pool area with the "Rock Agent team" is always fill up our in and out strength.  They are the coolest team !!!
Beside that.. the hospitality ..the food and drinks  and  never forget  the sincerely service is awesome !!! What more....
Let's rock again ... " YOU ROCK!!....

The hotel is very good, and the staff makes it great!The rooms are modern, large and have big soft beds. We stayed there with children, and it was fantastic. Pools that would meet every need, and a privat beach inside the hotel. The foam party was great fun for both kids and parents. The staff is marvolous with the children. Go and have a nice experience.

It was disheartening that complimentary drinks only given to 'long-stay' guests of 5 nights and more. In our group, some were staying only 3 nights and so were 'denied' the privilege, which was rather ridiculous I thought. Request to clean the room on one of the days went unheeded up to 6pm. Kids play area has to be paid for? Oh dear. Some leeway has to be given for family to enjoy snacks purchased outside of the hotel. On the plus side the pool was good and kids had fun.

For concierge team problem , we was stay hard rock in Bali in 2014, as beauty as Pattaya, we want to book service from hotel to AirPrort . One farmal staff said cannot do it,we said we came from airport als we used the Huihin company we offer paper Clyde the company number , we just want to let us try to ask has another company can do this service , a man said he can help us and offer the company name is Bell, the problem why not to try to call just reject very easy question ?  Exclude this one, the room the view the service is good that's why we chose hard rock again. Pls remember exciting customers, maybe can upgrade the room for them . Thx for all staffs
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I thought the staff were all very friendly especially Lucy. However when I went to go to sleep I opened my duvet to find a use condom packet in my bed. I reported this to reception on 4th June. I was told they'd investigate but no one said anything else. Very disgusting to find this sort of thing anywhere in a hotel let alone inside my bed!!! I've never experienced anything as disgusting or unprofessional as this before. I travel for work not a sex tourist!

Exceeded expectations.
I was reluctant booking this hotel due to the bad reviews & the ongoing renovation but was positively surprised.
The entire crew really lives up to the values of Hard Rock, giving 110% & putting the customer first. I really felt trusted, cared for and pleased. To measure the performance of the crew I must say they where extremely consistent and even some where visible driving forces. They believed in the product they where selling and was proud to be the faces of this international company. The crew did a great job. This is felt by the customer.
The rooms are small, even the newly renovated ones. You will trip over your luggage in the morning on your way to the bathroom, but they the bed is comfy and the rooms hold a high international standard including a high pressure shower.
The food - your can not go wrong - but some what pricy for Thailand.
The pool was clean with different possibilities.
The front desk Katya form Russia wanted to charge me 20 Bath for calling a taxi, some thing I find truly horrific after the amount I spend during my stay. 
Speaking of Russian, I wish the hotel could do more to accommodate Russian travelers as Russians are considered the most respected travelers world wide.
Here are some tips.
*Have a huge Hard Rock in Russian in the building.
*Russian language first on all menus with Thai & English as sub languages.
*More Russian vodka in rooms.
*Entire floors reserved for Russian travelers.
*Reserved parts of restaurants for Russian travelers so not to wait in line for a table.
*10 or more Russians TV channels
*More Russian speaking Thai's
*Russian food on the menu.
*Free Wifi for Russians
Anyway The Hard Rock is a cool place and we will be back but then we will book a suite and not standard rooms.
Traveler tip: Try the hot stone massage - just PREFECT!
Thanks
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Stayed for a night on 26 May with 3 other friends. Check-in was brisk and everything was systematic.
Security of the hotel is good! Guards at the lifts and at the beach entrance. Felt totally safe even though Pattaya beach was just across the street. 
Had lunch at Hard Rock Cafe. Food was great, but it was the service and hospitality that amazed us all. 
We were new in Pattaya and we were given some tips by one of the staff there (pity I forgot his name). Tall dude with dreadlocks, funky and friendly. You won't miss him.
We were happy with our room (upgraded from drluxe city view to deluxe sea view cause my friend had the "hard rock all access card") however, the toilet door was spoilt and toilet wasn't very clean. Probably that's why they were undergoing some renovation in the hotel. There were drilling sounds certain hours of the day (late morning till early evening). They have an edm on that information sent out together with the confirmation.
Did parasailing at Pattaya beach for 500bht each. We were brought to a platform in the middle of the sea by really bumpy speedboat and parasailed for about 3-5 mins. Was really exhilarating and we felt totally safe (you should have seen the number of straps they had on us).
The next day, we had a prearranged transport that didn't show up. A lady, I think was the duty manager helped us to call and clarify with the company. In the end they managed to arrange another taxi to bring us to Bangkok for part 2 of our trip. 
Great experience and we will definitely come back to Hard Rock Pattaya, maybe after the renovation is over.

I stayed 4 nights at Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya.
From check in to check out the stay at hotel excellent 
The service was great from Restaurant/Bar Staff
Thru out the hotel the service I got was great.
Recommend this hotel yes I do.
This is 2nd time I stayed at the hotel 
And yes, I be back again.
Peter J

Came here for 8 nights with the family. Having stayed at various Hard Rock resorts around the world this one is our favorite. Other Hard Rock resorts may have better facilities but the people working at the Pattaya location made all the difference. We thoroughly enjoyed our time here and will be coming back again for sure.

Among people from all the world we had a great time as usual every year......
We comming every year and will so do...We just love th epool the staff and the location....And the food efcourse.
Thankyou for this weekend and see you soon again
Eraybar family
Sweden

Staff very accomodating and considerable. Aviance and hotel scent was superb!
Perfect locations with huge pool and very good food! Room was nIce and neat and this was really cool place to stay with my family once again!

What an awesome place and could not ask for more to spend our your summer holiday .my daughter had a blast , she use to be in the pool the whole day and has enjoyed soooo much . The foam party is a must . The staff are always smiling and willing to help. Breakfast was very good ,they have too many pork items but on request they gave us chicken .Really enjoyed and thx for the awesome time .

the hotel is located at the beach and is very near to the central department store and 21 terminal department store . The hotel is a old property but is very nicely kept with all the modern facilities. the room size is pretty decent and is modern. 
this hotel has 2 pools , one is a regular pool with suitable for kids and adults and the other pool has sand in it to get a beach kind of feel with sliders for the kids. You can hire a big tube and floating mat at a price. in the evening they have foam party for kids and then followed by live music and foam party for adults. 
The room service is very efficient and the breakfast was pretty reasonable. 
overall decent place to stay with family.
This hotel is not as modern as the Holiday inn or the centara grand mirage but it is good value for money.
they also have a play area for children and game room as well.

Its all about the people! Thank you so much for such a wonderful vacation. Everyone was very helpful and always welcoming!!! The service is 5 stars. We have a family with very a serious food intolerance and all the hotel staff was caring and concerned about our issues. We had no problems at all and felt very relaxed. THANK YOU

Ive been going to Hard Rock Pattaya for 3 years now and each year it keeps getting better. Unfortunately the hotel is starting to date but renovations start in October which will be exciting to see. The staff are what make he hotel. They are great each and everyone of them. A big thank you to the boys at The Shack (Tuk Tuk, Dom, Hero, Charlie and Peanut
) You all were fantastic,l you never complained and were ALWAYS smiling which makes everyone else smile. The rock agents around the pool, where to start. Arm, Villy, Sax, Tedz, Bank, Jim, Quest, Tiger, Pinky, Kookaii, you all made my holiday a rememorable one. Always willing to help, fantastic with the kids and again always smiling. I would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Hard Rock Hotel was great! Love the rooms and the cabanas by the pool.

I stayed here in August for 1 week and had a suite on the top floor. First off all, the team in the executive lounge are truly awesome. I've been to many exec lounges around the world at airports and hotels but this team did a great job in making you feel at home. Just a heads up, I am 23 years old and did find the hotel a bit to family friendly and not very rock and roll (pool filled with kids and not much of a party scene)

The staffs here are so friendly and helpful with big smile. The bell boy greet me with a song, great fun. During The check-in process, they serve me a cold towel and welcome drinks which is really thoughtful. The rooms are also very clean and comfortable. I like the decoration very much, the wallpaper of my room is mj, its awesome! We also tried the food in hard rock cafe, it tastes good, about the decoration, same as their style, rock and vintage. At the night, we joined the foam party near to swimming pool, all of us had a great fun there! Overall, its a cool hotel to stay. I will come back here!

The staff and the Hard Rock premises are excellent. 
I like the energy and the friendly & kind way of every staff.
Food is great and the drinks better.
I hope to see you guys soon, ....perhaps in April 2019.
Thanks

This is by far the most professionally run  hotel we have had the pleasure of staying in, so much so, we are already planning a return stay towards the end of the year.Rooms are massive and well equipped.The location is good , just opposite the beach. The hotel room was clean and well maintained. Buffet breakfast was great too. This is place designed for having fun.Amazing hotel for family and solo adult people as well.....

Great experience on my first ever hard rock in pattaya. The location is good which all kinds of transportation is easy to get. The pool is great and equiped with lots of fun activity. Rooms are still awesome
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The hotel is really good & clean, never a problem, I always stay there when I'm in Pattaya, the best. It is great for all the fun in Pattaya being next to the beach & shopping malls. Good parking & never a problem.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
We were a group of 4 people who enjoyed the stay here.
The rooms were spacious
The mini bar was well priced 
The service was awesome
The pool is the beauty here, you can be here with kids. The pool games were enjoyable.
For vegetarians the breakfast buffet spread may not have choices. 
The welcome was warm the receptionists are ever smiling and ready to help.

This was my third stay at the Hard Rock Pattaya and will return. My son and I stayed there a week and had a great time as always. Everything was tops. Food, drinks, rooms, cleanliness, staff and most of all was the pool atmosphere. When you think of Hard Rock you think about adults. Not so here.  It's for everyone. Pool activities go all day. Free bottled water and coffee replaced every day. Only a 10 baht ride in a baht bus to the walking street. We will stay there again without checking out other properties. It can't get better.

This is the only one hotel in the nice location (middle city) have all everything is 'fun,enjoy and excite ' very big pool! and have beach beside.its was made the happiness for me. special feeling from all staffs service are so friendly...ps.I Absolutely love the breakfast and Special dinner buffet on Sat.one word it awesome

great breakfast with various choices of food and beverage! 
spatial pool and playground
clean room with plenty of minibar 
staffs are so nice and eager to help in every aspect
easy access to local transportation and convenient store
Nice for every type of traveller !
see you next time :D definitely return soon

Your beds are getting way too soft and old, need to change soon or I will not be coming back soon.  I would expect better than this since your a high quality brand.  I hope you change this soon. Really enjoy the rest of the facility and staff, top notch

Comes with the language choice function, cannot use the hotel to be good, is wrong room's thing, lets us very not be happy, affects the mood, moreover seaside holiday lacks sees not the sea, is not me, the reason is very depressed
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: My family friends and students loved our visit. Everything was perfect, so a happy time was had by all. You have a great team creating a memorable atmosphere. The 1960's memorabilia brought back many memories from my youth which I was able to share with students and faculty friends.

Stay for 5 nights, no complaints except that check-in is a little chaotic and has taken a very long time, due to our big group - 15 pax.  Would be great if some of the equipment in the gym could be replaced with newer version as some of them have a few functions no longer in operation.

As a regular visitor from Bangkok I've enjoyed going to this hotel on weekend trips for many years.
Food is excellent and service flawless. As much as I love travelling in Thailand, I found out that consistency is hard to come by over the years in most places here.
It's always a pleasure to go back to Hard Rock and see familiar staff welcoming you by your first name, which is a reminder that a happy staff makes a happy customer, props to the management for that.
I usually don't eat in the hotel I stay in but for Hard Rock, it's a different story. Form their breakfast, to seafood buffet, to pizzas or burgers you can tell F&B is another key element that makes for the popularity of the place, great value for the money.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
We usually go with the big chains like Starwood and Marriott so was looking forward to my first "Hard Rock experience". Location of the hotel was excellent and staff were professional and welcoming. There is an exit that goes straight onto Beach Road and it is just a few minutes walk to Central Festival Shopping Mall.
We ate in Starz restaurant twice and the food was excellent. On the last evening we tried out the Hard Rock Café, again good food but the drinks are absurdly expensive. Rooms were clean and had a very nice décor and Rock theme. Some negatives however:
- Our "Sea View" room was only a partial sea view room. The hotel is not parallel with the sea (more like 45 degrees) so in our room you can only see the sea if you are right at the window. This was not a big deal for us but when you advertise the room as a 'sea view' room you would expect to have the sea in front of you
- The television. Really poor reception quality.
- Breakfast. This was also in Starz but the quality and quantity of the buffet was not good. Western selection was very limited as were the Thai selection.
- Hard Rock Spa. We booked a foot massage for two. The service and the quality of the massage was great. Though for some very strange reason the chairs were the straight non adjustable type, so you cannot really 'lie down' and really enjoy the massage.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Hard Rock Hotel had kid's zone and kids activities and lots of other kid attraction. You need them especially when you are with 2 young kids. I believe that the hotel has one of the largest pool, great landscape. Very very friendly staff and reception. The restaurant was great and served good American Breakfast!
The Only disappointment, was the size of the room and bathroom. It was tiny sized room when compared to the price we had to pay for it. The bathrooms were even smaller and literally I had to make efforts to get in or come out (being a little bigger in size).
If you are resort lover, then this hotel is not for you. However the location is great and you may relate to your youth when you see all accessories related to rock music and those exotic guitars were simply amazing. You kind start relive those moments of childhood, if you are a rock lover. It so beautifully done as if the entire property is paying homage to the legends of the rock music.
Overall - Good! if you want calm and peace as the hotel is always bustling with activities.

Everyone should by now know what to expect from the Hard Rock brand and this is no exception. The location is excellent for Pattaya and although it is relatively expensive for the city, it is very affordable for most tourists.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Probably one of the bets hotels in Pattaya in terms of decor, set up, ambience and pool. The lobby has all the makings of a Hard Rock chain and gives you the best feeling when you enter. The room itself is quite good with a nice balcony. The touch of the music related posters and throw pillow is excellent! Tugs at all the hard rockers and music lovers heart strings. The bathroom is quite spacious and has all the amenities one would need. The pool is out of this world; probably reason enough to stay here even you are not into music! Do stay here for a wonderful experience.

The Hard Rock Hotel is excellent, one of the best hotels in Pattaya. You get treated with respect, friendliness and everyone can’t do enough for you. The service you get is top standards, from all the staff. We stayed in the Rock Royalty room over looking the kids pool, with balcony, and we loved it. We would recommend to everyone to pay the extra money and go for one of the rooms. From the moment you arrive to the minute you leave, it is a special holiday. As I said I would recommend this hotel to anyone. I would like to thank the Hotel front desk staff, Eve, JJ, Pavel and the Rock Royalty staff Patchy and the other people who also do so much to make sure your stay is perfect. The pizzeria staff Gina and Natasha, pool staff Sax and Biker, restaurant staff Kung, doormen PJ, X, and Kin, and our room cleaner Poppy. Thank you very very much, we miss you guys so much, but looking forward to seeing you all again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The steep hotel prices does not reflect the comfort of the rooms. The HRC was not as popular as the other worldwide HRC. Staff at the cafe were great but not so at the FO. We were a couple so the FO leader promised us that the twin beds would be combined but this was never done of the 3 nights we spent there. The hotel is centrally located near a nice shopping mall but the beach is across the road and it’s a public beach. Overall, it will take me awhile before I return back, if ever I do.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We spent 2 days in the hotel.It is located just near the beach.Service of staff is good. Food is delicious.Size of room is big and clean but bathroom is very small.Swiming pool is big enough to play and enjoy.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We enjoyed our family stay due to the pool and food facilities. However, the rooms were tired, with stains on the carpet and the TVs didn't work properly. I expected better from a Hard Rock, especially for the price paid.

You know i'm the one who love music and for sure the music hotel the best music history hotel is here every staff i love all of them and hard rock cafe the most part of the the hotel that i love and die to go there

The staff were very friendly and the swimming pool was attractive. The location of the hotel is impressive.
But someone smoked in the non-smoking room, and the smell came into our room, which made me uncomfortable. You should be careful not to smoke in the room at the hotel.

Everything is adequate and up to standard, although the room is not very big, I think all the staff are very helpful and proactive to assist. Although the price is quite high as compared with other similar hotel.

The rooms - not amazing but has everything u need
Pool - the best part i think! Well designed and they had loads of activities in the pool, which we thoroughly enjoyed especially the run on the water ladder
Service - exceptional. In particular we want to mention a guy named Tiger who does lots of the activities in the pool area ... Always friendly and jovial. Another person who we found to very helpful is the concierge Simon...He recommended Alibaba for breakfast, which I reviewed as well and he helped us loads throughout the stay. Attached a picture with Simon
Rock Cafe - good band but really wished it was open for longer. It closes at 12!

Generally speaking this hotel is great all-round. Particular praise goes out to Ann and Quito; Ann took time out of her day to help me to try and find a cinema showing a film my son really wanted to see - she didn't give up even when nowhere seemed to be screening the flick, her persistence and willingness to help really impressed me. Quito works around the pool and he gets people involved in the many games going on, initially my 8 year old son was apprehensive to get involved but he soon made sure we were made to feel very welcome. A little competitiveness is encouraged but it's not over the top and very friendly. After that he would remember your name and come over to say hello.
One slightly bad experience was not being allowed into the Hard Rock cafe because I wasn't wearing shoes. I think this is the first time in my life I've walked anywhere without shoes (we walked straight there from the pool). To be refused entry into the restaurant for the hotel you are staying at, when it is right next to a pool was just ridiculous. They have pictures of Mick Jagger plastered around this hotel, I wonder if they would refuse his entry for not having footwear?
In the end I found alternative great food a stones throw away at Gullivers, and they received my custom a few times more.

Here staying at the moment, nice hotel pool also nice, the good touch is the rock royalty lounge, it’s like a mini all inclusive. Centrally located. Staff also nice and helpful. Would return if needed, but been lots so won’t be.but would recommend the hotel it’s lovely to anybody thinking off coming. Thanks again hard rock

We had a great time here with the hotel facilities, pool services, breakfast and the location is very good. There are many restaurants and convenience stores around. Also we can easily walk to Central festival pattaya. Love this hotel and will come back again for sure.

We rarely hear your staff say 'Sawadee ca', 'hello' or 'Good morning' when they see us.  As a resort hotel, most of the staff do not have a smiley face.  The sink inside the bathroom is very dirty.  Shower gel and body lotion was not replenished everyday.  There is no garbage bag the bin so you can see the rust inside the bin.  A staff knocked on our room door at 9am on one day to request to tidy up our room.  there are still rubbish on the carpet after room makeup.  The bed is so soft and its time to replace them with new ones.  
It would be really helpful if your staff can tell us ahead about the facilities like locker keys and an entry card is required for going to the steam/sauna room when we rent the swimming towels.  
I have done a Hard Rock Spa which is just so so and it was a bit overpriced.
The staff did not attached the spending receipts to my hotel bill for checking.  It took quite a long time to check out even there is not many people.
Breakfast is quite good.  The staff in the swimming pool are friendly.  The pool is great and the daily activities was fun.

Overall is good. We like the room and the facility.  However, one of disappointed that we found a fly in my room until we leave.  This is impossible and unacceptable.
