My kids like the swimming pools and the silde.  However, they felt not comfortable due the slide have sands there.Hope.separate sands area is better.

Save your money. Better options available. Hotel is very old. IN USA its considered a dying chain. Public rest rooms are outside and a little further away. Normally ALL hotels have bath rooms nearby checkin/checkout.

The only thing that needs to change is the leather sofas at the lobby. It's quite worn out and smell. Other than that are just perfect. We enjoyed our stay here. The kids love the sand beach pool very much.

Hotel just renovated, location is perfect and smacked in the city center, walking distance to anywhere, the pool is huge and amazing with lots of fun-filled activities by their staffs. All in all, there is no other Hotel like this vibe in Pattaya.

The pool party was fun but we want to take just only one a photo with my friends at backdrop, the staff  told me that she could not support us because she already finished work!!!! so think we got poor serviced at Hard Rock Hotel.

We celebrated valentines day at this gorgeus hotel. We stayed at a Kings Club Lounge, and the room(s) was big and spacious. The view over the swimmingpool and the sea was very good. Included in the Kings Club was a seperate lounge-area where all the food and drinks were free, wifi was free, and had some other benefits. We had a wonderful stay at this beautiful hotel!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Always a good stay at HRH's. rooms were clean. Food good. great breakfast. helpful staff at all times.
having to pay for use of inflatables was an insult considering the inflated prices you pay to stay here.

Very friendly and helpful staff everywhere...everyone tries to make your stay memorable... Breakfast with good quality and the meals & beverages in the hotel complex are really excellent aus you know and expect from HRC. Hotel is well located

This hotel is an experience... to say the least. The entertainment for adults, the entertainment for kids, the food, the room... superb to say the least.
The drawbacks for me were 2.
1. There was no cupboard in the room that I was staying in... which means, if you are staying there for maybe 4 nights, 5 days, then you have to live out of your suitcase.
2. I have travelled the world and still do and this was the first time I was asked by the hotel reception, to leave the room, then the room would be checked by housekeeping and then only would my bill be processed... This to me was pathetic to say the least especially when I had to leave for the airport which is a 2 hour drive and then catch an international flight back home.
Overall, I think this was an experience... and yes... for those who have not been there, I recommend that you go there once for sure and try to stay there on a weekend and enjoy their foam party for kids in the evening and for adults post 9pm on Saturdays. Again, an experience in itself.

We like staff with hotel. Everybody was so friendly and helpfull.And then our yongest children Elsa hurt litlle you help and remember Elsa next day we like that so musch.we like yours hotel staff so musch that if we come next summer Thailand we want come back yours hotel. Best wishes Marko Toivanen and whole family.

We were a party of 12 females on a 5 night stay, I had liaised with the hotel back and forward for months before we arrived as we kept adding girls and they were very accomodating to get 3 of the rooms next to each and and one on another floor, all had pool views and a great view of the ocean, we squeezed a spare bed in each room so the rooms were squishy but we only slept there so it wasn't a problem and suited our needs. The bathrooms were great, enormous showers. Housekeeping were friendly. The pool was fantastic, great size, pool staff friendly and always music happening or games, breakfast staff were great and the food was plentiful, it's was very busy but we always got a seat. There was always baht buses waiting at the exit. The negatives ( which is with all big resorts) are the drink and food prices were very expensive and checking out was disastrous especially being such a large group, there were room drink bills put on other rooms, besides this we had the best time and would return in future. 
Thank you Hard Rock Hotel

We stayed at this hotel for 5 nights and really enjoyed our stay. We got a pool and sea view corner deluxe room with a balcony and we couldn't ask for anything better. I do not know to swim but the swimming pool was so tempting and inviting. It was huge and really really beautiful with a separate area for younger kids. The food at hard rock cafe was amazing but a bit on the expensive side. We had paid for breakfast buffet and the buffet spread was good with plenty of things. The staff at the hotel was very friendly. The only bad experience that we had was with the AC. It's cooling was really ok during the day but at night the cooling was not enough so we could sleep comfortably. We even set the cooling to the minimum but still it was still very hot in the room. The hotel was at a walking distance to Alcazar Cabaret and Central Festival Mall and beach was just across the road.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We had a great experience... Room was located on the 10th floor and had the perfect view of the sea. Besides the lack of food options for vegetarians everything else was spot on...foam party (happens on saturdays) are a lot of fun too....
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The hotel is very good and staff is great and next trip i will book in same hotel also my friend he stay first time in this hotel and he is very happy thank for all staff in this hotel and we will see you in my next trip to pattaya

The hotel is located right on the Pattaya beach..The hotel is the place to be if you are not too much into the walking road scene. The Hotel staff is excellent and will do all to help you out, we went for Bungee jumping and for flight of gibbon and all arrangements were made by the hotel staff right from pick up from the hotel and tickets etc.
The pool is excellent and the hotel is a nice place for the kids to be taken to...there are a lot of activities going around for kids...Also the Hard rock cafe is by he pool side so no need to roam about in pattaya for a good time in the night...All in all a nice place to stay.....
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Checked in to the Hard Rock & thought the staff were super friendly which they are. Lucy was really nice. Unfortunately what let them down massively was an empty condom wrapper I found under my duvet right before I went to bed. I reported this to reception & absolutely nobody apologized or even mentioned it. I understand Pattaya is a sleazy place but please remain basic hygiene standards. Absolutely disgusting. Would never recommend this place to anyone & will never stay here when on business again.

Located just across the beach in Pattaya. It is walking distance to Alcazar, the cabaret theatre.
It's a smaller compare to the one in in Bali. Rooms were also smaller. However, the service was superb. The staffs were friendly and quite helpful. The swimming pool was quite big. 
We love the variety of the breakfast, the food was tasty.

Before it was better. Now it is ok for one week stay. Cleaning was not like before. The Price is to high for that Level. Hope there will be soon a renovation for the hotel. Hard Rock Teneriffe is better.

We (I and my son,10) love to stay at this hotel. He always gets many friends at the fantastic pool (and there are many activities) and the staff is great.  It’s never getting boring here – like Hilton / Holiday Inn / Amari.
As usual:  nice, clean deluxe room with sea view. Good service. Nice breakfast buffet in the morning. It’s enough to eat, but I want more brunch style: for example more fish/pork/beef.  The fruit selection was bigger now in June than In December.   Yes, some improvements since last time!  Nice people working here! Really nice!
The Kings club is also great! With snacks and drinks.
 The managers are fantastic! 
It’s easy to say that Hard Rock hotel is our true home in Pattaya.   And of course we will come back!

i have a very good sty in the hard rock hotel pattaya
and i will come back soon in my next trip next year 
i raely like it . and tell my freand about it 
thanks a lot for the hight service and hospelty ...................................................

Best Hotel ever!   (our fourth time here in four years) .   The friendly staff always have time for a chat and are always smiling.  The entertainment every day around the pool is great.   The rooms are quite small, but I believe they are being renovated in the near future.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: A nice big hotel perfect for families with children located on the main street and has a lovely pool. The rooms are a little small for big families but the over all experience was pleasant. The kids had a great time in the pool and the activities organized in the hotel for the children in the pool and after that as well kept them entertained and happy.

The entire staff has been very co=operative and demonstrated great customer handling skills. I would any day recommend my friends to stay here as the service is great and the best location to stay at.

I was so happy in hardrock.
I want to go to hard rock again!
Formparty is very very fun!
Room is so~~~~clean and comfortable. So~ i love there.
If i go to pattaya again, i want to stay in hardrock again! Thankyou!

I have stayed here 4 times in the past 12 months and will be visiting again on 2 separate occasions in August/September.
I can not recommend this hotel highly enough.
From the moment you step foot into this hotel, there is an abundance of staff only too eager to greet you and assist you.  I have found that the staff have remembered me which only makes my stay more enjoyable.  The rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable.  The Buffet Breakfast is a great start to the day.  There is a huge variety of foods to choose from and all cultures would be satisfied with what is on offer.
The pool is huge, refreshing and clean.  Once again, there is an abundance of staff to help you with any minor detail or help assist you with any hotel activities.
The location of the hotel is ideal.  It is situated on Beach Road and the glitz and glamour of Pattaya is only a short walk or Baht Bus ride away.
Even though I don't have children, I found that the hotel is very children friendly and their activities do not intrude on other guests.
I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone travelling to Pattaya

Nice place ..good breakfast.. friendly staff .. my kids love so much the swimming pool .. got special area for baby playing water.. all the activities that provide was so cool.. also with the hardrock cafe & shop..!

Came here with friends to celebrate my birthday and we had the best time of our lives. We got the rock royalty rooms and they really treated us as royals. Just amazing and the receptionist on 9th floor, Gift she was just too helpful and amazing person. Hard rock has many activities and you can just relax n have fun in the hotel. Breakfast is really good with all the variety and if you are a vegetarian they will prepare fried rice or noodles for you. Highly recommended

Overall 
Outstanding location, great value. Cold lemon grass welcome drink is worth mentioning. Very refreshing in hot and humid Thailand. But AC at lobby could seriously need an overhaul! 
Service
English speaking staff, good security. Bill was carefully explained to me and compliantly laundry services.
Location
Outstanding! 1.5hr by car from airport, 1hr to Amata City/Eastern seaboard industrial park. Lots of food, shopping etc 10THB away by pickup Tuk Tuk from HRH. I would definitely stay at Pattaya the next time I need to visit customers in these 2 industrial parks. 
Room
Comfortable bed. Noise is not a problem for me as i stay on the 5th (non smoking) floor with balcony facing the sea. In fact, there was a private foam party just beside the pool. No significant noise during that. 
Cleanliness was up to standard. Only complain was the Wifi is not working very well for me and the hot shower takes some time to heat up. 
Food
Good spread of choices for breakfast although there is only a slight change in the selections. If you are staying here for more than 3 days, breakfast might turn boring. But again, you can always go out for other cuisine. 
Dinner buffet (same place as breakfast) serves up a hearty selection. But i wouldn't mind a bigger selection of grilled seafood. 
The location makes it very easy to eat at other restaurants. There is a Japanese place, 10mins walk (turn left from hard rock cafe) frequent by Japanese working in Thailand. Food and service are both excellent. Bill came in about 4000THB for 6 pax. 
Rean Thai restaurant (opposite Marriott) is also 10mins by tuk tuk and it serves up very a appetizing Tom Yam soup, tender pandan chicken wraps etc. Live Thai dance show was ongoing throughout the dinner. Warning!!! No AC at this place so dress lightly and bring your own mozzie repellant. Final damage was 3000THB for 6pax.

I booked your hotel many times , also no upgrade my room , I don’t think you think me is important client , and I also request once I check in , still haven’t change it to me , it is very disappointed , even I book one more room to my family in this time . And then no toothbrush provided , it is too funny arrangement , and the bubble party in swimming pool , it made me can’t sleep well in that night .

Jorge and his rock band are awesome! Thank you Onn for making sure our stay are memorable . Jamie make the best cocktail by the pool! Gif and ivy are the best receptionist at rock royalty level! Everyone who work in hard rock pattaya are too awesome ❤️❤️

my wife , oe year old son and I stated for 4 nights from june 30 to juy 4 of this year at his lovey hotel. we were surprised how family friendly it was; with a the bunkbeds for kids aand al sorts of toys. the view from the 9th floor from the family room was great of the beach and ocean too. we didnt go out much as the food was good in restuaramnt and the lesure facilaites such as the large pool, mock beach and gym meant we didnt have to. it was the break we needed.

Brought my wife and son to this hotel for a short 3 nights stay. Weather was perfect from July 27-30. 
Was greeted warmly at the front door by Maliki who gave us great insights on where to eat and places to visit. Superb staff of Hard Rock!
Check in was seamless and comforting. Staff was rightfully casual and friendly. Room was very nice with a huge King Bed for 3 of us. 
Breakfast was pretty good as well. Good varied selection. No halal food but you can make do with the other non-meat choices. :)
The best part of this hotel is its pool and activities. My son was burnt to a crisp in the pool. :)
Location is ideal to walk down to the Central mall & its surrounding markets. A lot of halal places to eat nearby including the in the Central mall. Average cost for a meal around town for 2 Adt 1 Chd is about 500-700 baht. 
Enjoyed greatly and will definitely stay there again when I'm in town. Rock on!

Stayed for 2 nights and got a sea view room, which was exactly how you see it on the website so no surprises ! Good decor and quality of rooms and cleanliness very good. The staff very very friendly and helpful and only downside was the building work going on at the cafe as it is the off season. A good band was on each night.The location is very good with a large pool and across from a busy beach and a short bus ride or 15 mins walk to Walking Street which is what you want. Lots of families and kids about.
Did a cheap ferry ride to hosannas Island which was worth doing.

The Hard Rock hotel in Pattaya are most excellent in all aspect for family stay. It is the outside that's make you consider. The staff are most excellent in service and always try their best for your request.

- Good locations
- Good view (My room 1031)
- Good Services
- Especially service room at 9 floor  is the best.
- Hotel staff very nice
- Hotel is the unique one that I ever seen before. 
Some comment
- Elevator is too slow

Both of me & my friends chose to stay here for twice in a year(1st time was last October)........and yeah,it's never make us disappointed,even they are on renovated and make lobby area so narrow. but the new renovated room is fantastic!
All the staffs have their own friendly style to respect customers ( looks not too stricted to respect customers like a robot).
Thank you Sonia (Housekeeping)that always take care us like exclusive persons,Yo(Staff at Pool area) who is very friendly &helpful ,and almost staffs that I cannot remember,they are all nice to us .  
Even the time I checked out,also had group the same time,I thought that may gonna take long time for check-out but I was wrong...express check out ,very smoothly..
I'm not wondering that Hard rock hotel gonna be my regular&favorite hotel in Pattaya!

Ive stayed at the Hard Rock hotel a couple of times and generally enjoyed my stay both times, the pool is lovely, the location is great as are the views, the food is excellent (esspecially if your travelling with fussy teenagers) and the staff are very friendly.
However, the thing that bugs me about this hotel is that its just unjustifiably expensive, its simply not worth the money!...the rooms are average and bathrooms below par, the '60's retro style rock and roll' ambience comes off as rather lame, plastic and cheap.
When one compares the price of a night at the Hard Rock with say the Royal Cliff, its hard to comprehend that they are charging the same rate per night as they are simply not in the same league.
It can also get quite noisy at night, esspecially at the weekends as its quite popular with the younger generation, during my last stay i could here the revellers from my 9th floor room at 3am for 3 nights running and was told there is nothing they could do about it so be warned.

Everything is fine except your swimming pool. It is very dirty. It is full of unwanted objects. I don't know that the swimming pool is cleaned always or not but it is very disappointed the condition. If your stuff checks the status of pool then surely you will notice the condition.
Good service, good hotel, very nice rooms !!! Need to walk a bit for walking street but worth staying..!!

Staying 4-6 august
Booking @ deluxe city view
complimentary upgrade to composer suite on 2nd night because of of the wrong procedure of just "2 of us package"
A very special benefit that management give to us taking full responsibility to us
We appreciate the most and thank you to Mr.Ralph FO Manager, Mr.Tuk Tuk Pizzeria Manager, and of course the man behind it General Manager
instead of the bad experience on 1st night,
Me and my wife get the whole experience of "just 2 of us" during 2nd night untill we depart from pattaya with complimentary pad thai lunch and tranport to bangkok
Thank You Hard Rock
"Love all serve all"
see you next time

The hotel located near beach. there is a security stop to check all automobiles and go through a open parking lot before reaching the hotel main entrance. there is a 7-11 near hotel entrance and many places for massage lover. behind hotel is the beach road. there are pretty of restaurants and bars.
The hotel has a nice and large pool, but currently partially under renovation. The staffs and services are good. The room nice and clean. The bed is comfortable and clean. The bathroom clean and spacious, but the shower water pressure not strong enough. The wifi is good and stable and only two devices are allowed to access. Breakfast acceptable. Overall is a good hotel.

After last years great stay we decided to stay at Hard Rock again.
We were well advised before booking that refurbishment was in progress and some noisey work at specified times so were slightly concerned.
We booked a new refurbished sea view room and it was excellent. Room layout great along with functional bathroom. Only thing is that the individual room balconies have now been removed and the rooms made bigger. Fair swap I feel.( Some rooms with balconies are to be retained and available on request.
Yes the hotel was under refurbishment and some noisey work was carried out at spacific times. But this was done with no disruption to us as guests and started and stopped exactily as stated.Shielding of work in progress was very professionally done and I would'nt hesitate to stay longer had we been able too.
As in August last year the Hard Rock staff were, with out exception - superb.
On the night of my birthday, a cake and card were delivered to celebrate the occasion - it was a total surprise and can only have come from our Passport DOB's held by the hotel.(A wonderful gesture!)
Special Thanks to Anne -Guest Service Manager,Kawee - Assist floor manager and Jo in the Hard Rock Cafe.
We will be back next year.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Fabulous hotel in a great location.
All the staff are superb and can not do enough to make your stay memorable.
This is our second stay at this hotel and we were made to feel really special.
I would like to thank all the staff for their hard work.
Also as a swimming teacher I would like to commend the pool lifeguards for their extreme diligence and hard work maintaining safety sometimes under difficult circumstances.
Thoroughly recommend

I've never stayed there before but I'm happy to say that the 2 nights I spent there were worth it. The city view room is comfortable, nothing grand but then again you hardly spend much time in a room in Pattaya. The hotel pool however is exceptional, great size, activities, bar and overall the unique beach side area within the pool with private cabanas were amazing. The staff at the hotel were quite friendly, some more than others. In particular, one of the restaurant staff (not the cafe) known to us as 'Flo Rider' as per her badge was very kind and welcoming, thank you for that. 
The food at the hotel, especially the Tom Yum Khum soup was the best I've ever had in Thailand, Its perfect in my books. Other than the hotel itself, its located at Pattaya beach and not far from the popular walking street so over all its a good locality. 
Being a musician, I think the hotel really feels like the right place, you can also take on loan some guitars from the lobby that belonged to famous artists to practice in your room, huge plus for musicians! so overall it was a pretty good stay. 
Was there with my wife in June 2014.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I've been into this hotel twice, 
and what I have to say is; those two times has been a great pleasure,
Special mention for The staff that are just incredible, everyone care about the customers, 
Lobby, Check-in desk, Bar, Swimming pool, Shop, Restaurant, BBQ, just everywhere the staff care about the customers... We even got invited to play soccer with some of the staff because they saw we were soccer fan (wearing soccer jersey)
I have nothing to say about the room, simple but efficient, 
I had some problems to wake up because you just feel really confortable,
always clean and that is what we all want in a hotel
The hotel's customers are family with children and young adults for sure, so if you need calm to sleep nearby the swimming it's not the right place...
WELL LOOKING FOR A THIRD TRIP INTO HARDROCK HOTEL PATTAYA NOW

The stay at hotel was a great experience. the staff was friendly and helpful. the location is reasonably (slightly towards the end of the beach road and abt 2 kms frm walking street. the only negative thing is that the hardrock cafe here was quite dull... but then again it mostly is
column7: Delhi, in, National Capital Territory of Delhi, India

column3:
If you like music atmosphere you cannot miss this "the Pattaya Music Temple"!
Hotel rooms are perfectly funished to let you feel the hard rock atmosphere.. sophisticated decorations and obviously singers performances pictures everywhere! 
Out of curiosity: each floor hallway is decorated with an interpretation of the famous Beatles "Abbey Road"! super! there is also an hall dedicated to performances dresses!
Evenif Pattaya is not one of the greatest Thai beaches, the hotel pools with inside little beach will let you find the relax and the peace balancing the outside croweded streets! the pool is very very nice! and to reach the real beach you just have to walk throu the street!
and once more: fantastic breackfast with one of the best choise of dimsum I have ever found! continental and Thai/Asian food available.

We decided to stay at  hard rock on our short stop at pattaya because of our pleasant experience while staying at hard rock macau. 
We were NOT disappointed. Everything in the hotel was great : from the staff  to  the food especially the fries and the beer (hehe). The band which  played during our dinner at the back cafe of the hotel was also great. If only if  were not foe my mama who has a sleeping curfew, we would have  stayed longer.
If you go to pattaya, stay at  hardrock  and book for kings club --- you will enjoy free flowing treats and drinks, that is, if you are not diabetic like me 😢.

During the time of COVID - they had closed for 3 months but just recently reopened.   I stayed here because they had lowered their price, but I left because they raised (more than double) the price for the weekend.
The first day I had to let the hot water run for over 20 minutes before the color changed from yellow to light yellow.  The first night, the hot water was turned off around midnight and in the morning when I asked the front desk they all but called me a lair.
The welcome message on the TV has been there for so long, it is burned in to the screen which means what ever you are watching, you can read the welcome message.
Staff, friendly during check-in.  Not so during check-out.
With all of the options available in Pattaya, I won't stay here again!

All the staffs were friendly and warm upon our arrival. Fell sick the last day of the stay the staffs was still concern about me. Really felt like home. Planning to go back there again soon to stay even longer to  enjoy the warm stay from the staffs
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The hotel is nice with attentive and cheerful staff. Very good facilities and very well located. The bar and cafe have a diverse menu and the dishes are well presented and delicious. They have quite good entertaining programs. The bands that performed during my stay were great.

This was our 3rd stay at Head Rock. And everytime the services provided are better than the last time around. Reason for us coming back to this hotel is the friendly staff, kids friendly swimming pool, easy access to pattaya's beach street and the pool bar(simply love it). View from the rooms is refreshing. Breakfast is great, not to many choices yet good. Looking forward to visiting again next year.

I moved from this hotel from the Amari Ocean Tower as I decided to stay one more night in Pattaya and wanted to try somewhere different. The original room I was given was not suitable and the only other room ready at that time was on a smoking floor which was not ideal. The room itself did not suffer from a smell of smoke but the smell in the corridors was a mixture of damp carpets and smoke. It really was a terrible smell There were even ashtrays outside the lifts - smoking in rooms is ok but I don't think it should be allowed in the corridors. The room itself was fine for the money paid.
I have to say that staff on check-in and check-out were friendly and there was always a friendly welcome when walking through the reception area. The pool area looked really nice but I didn't get a chance to use it unfortunately.
I'm not sure I would stay here again but if I did I would probably choose a higher spec room and definitely avoid the smoking floors.

Still the best hotel I prefers I Pattaya. Always nice to come back to Hard Rock in Pattaya.
Nice rooms with beach wiew and good drinks at the pool and in Hard Rock Café.
All of staff is always smiling and take good care of you, we will come back.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Overall, the room was very clean, nice environment! The staff very friendly, it is just when they asked for deposit, you better prepare cash instead of swiping your card coz it will take 14 days for them to return your money..

I spent a long weekend with my family of 4.  Since we don't have a lot of time, I booked and paid for a Producer Suite, supposedly one of the best (and the expensive room) with butler service. I booked this suite, expecting better service and good space.  While the room is very big, but the service is not as expected. 
This suite came with 2 free cartoon network water park tickets, so I booked for another 2 tickets for my kids and also the transportation for 4 to the waterpark.  I confirmed twice in the email and then paid extra for the tickets and confirmed again during check-in.  The next morning, cartoon network said that we have only 2 bookings for the transportation. After lots of confirmation, we finally got on to the bus.  Not over yet, when we arrived the water park, they said we don't have a coupon, so we are declined to enter.  I paid everything at the hotel and I was told twice that when I arrived I'll be allowed to get it.  Anyway, this tells a lot about their coordinating ability.   Wasted a lot of time to do coordination myself. 
I was expecting personalized service by paying extra for a nice suite, on the contrary, I ended up doing lots of those things myself.  
Very disappointing service level.  the location is good. but definitely won't go back there.

At first we booked the King Club Room for our 2 night stay, but unluckily the hotel officer (miss wanrudee aka anne) called us and tell that the room is under renovation then they offered us downgrade to the Delux Sea View Room but what i can say is..."from checkin to checkout we really enjoyed our stay"!!!
Overall, its a fantastic resort at a great location. This is a high standard hotel with ample space and friendly staff (excld the Hotel Megastore Staff, not that friendly and lack of smile). The rooms have a great view and the location is brilliant. The hotel is situated opposite a very lively beach, the night life around the area is always busy and moving. The main street with restaurants and shopping is only a 3-4 minute walk away. However if you feel like getting away from all the buzz of the area of Pattaya vibrant energy the hotel is a little calmness in the middle of it all. Tee swimming Pool is huge and amaze us and it close at 10pm every night..
finally, We enjoyed our stay and would be very likely to stay here again!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Stayed with my daughter in Hard Rock Pattaya for 8 days.  My Daughter and I really enjoyed the family foam party and various games organized at the pool every day.  Every staff member is friendly and proactive in introducing themselves.  The kids club is great, my daughter stayed there safely and has fun for three afternoon during which I can go to enjoy the spa.  The choice for buffet breakfast is good enough but not surprising.  Food and drink services by the pool are great, you can order everything even it is not on the pool menu.  I enjoy staying in this hotel and will definitely come back again.

the family suite is very spacious with 2 ensuite bathrooms.  if you are not keen on a very nice view, it's perfectly good. however many design details need to be touched up, they are not that kids friendly in view of the sharp edges and rocky tropical pools (the pool is not that huge indeed). the louge access for suites is great, wide variety of snacks all day through.

Great place to stay while in town.  Close to everything. It's across from the beach.  Food is good atmosphere is good. Not much more you can ask for.  This is my second time at the hotel. Guaranteed to stay again!

Needed a couple days get away from Bangkok. Everyone said "go to Pattaya". Great beaches, people are fun, lots to do. Stayed at the Hard Rock. I would highly recommend this hotel. Great location, excellent staff, good restaurants, pool with lots of extras, great gym and spa!

The only downside is a windowless room and a little musty smell.
The staff is amazing, always smiling and willing to help with anything.
Very good pool, lots of activities for kids.
A really good vacation, we will certainly come back

The pools and food was very good, staff were very friendly and helpful, kids could spend whole day in the hotel. The rooms need renovation as furniture and TV need major upgrade. The video systems around the hotel did not work properly from time to time.

Stayed at the Hotel for seven days in the Royalty Club level which is a great buy because it includes breakfast, afternoon snacks and evening beverage and small plate foods.  The service was not as good as the Penang Hard Rock nor was the club area as big.  At times it was quite crowded in the Club lounge.  Rooms are large and well appointed.  They have just remodeled and unfortunately removed most of the balconies to make the rooms larger.  I personally would prefer the balcony.  The huge Seafood and Roast Pig buffet on Saturday nights is worth a visit.  For June the weather was actually quite comfortable.  There is shopping and places to eat all around the hotel location but you could easily just stay within the resort and have a great time.

One of our friend recomended us here, it a great place to stay.The resort have its own pravite beach which was amazing for us , we didnt have to go to the main beach which over crowded.The rooms were very clean n all the staff was very helpful and spoke very good english.At breakfast the variety was very much.The hotel itself was in the center of everything.

Stayed in hard rock hotel for a holiday for 4 nights and had a really great time. This hotel is just by the beach, can choose to walk along the beach during sunset or just enjoy the pool. Its very near to central festival mall and also the traditional market. The night market and street bars are all around. It is a good place to enjoy, relax and shop. 
The hotel facilities are awesome, the rooms are very comfortable. Possibly the most comfortable bed I've stayed in. Breakfast was lovely and they had a great variety. Great service with the rooms and always well cleaned and staff always at hand to say hello and ask after you. 
The pool is probably the best feature of the hotel. The staff keep the pool and grounds exceptionally tidy and are always available to take your drink or food order. The highlight was the foam party that they held every weekend by the pool!
Special thank you Kevin from concierge was amazing. He asked us what we would like to do in Pattaya. Based on our interests, he make a few suitable recommendations. He made sure that we go back with beautiful memories of Pattaya.
Overall a great stay and would recommend this as a family friendly modern and clean place to stay in a great location.

A relax and enjoyable stay at HardRock hotel as it is located at central pattaya. It makes shopping and eating out is very convenient within 10 mins walking distance to central festival shopping mall.

This is my Second Visit to this Property and worth it to be there second time . As usual food was good and this time we enjoy a lot in pool . But have to little bit carefully when attempt to sift from the Regular pool to Kids Pool ( beach Type) the Hidden Barrier may hurt . Enjoy the sunset is must have experience .

Been to a few Hard Rock Hotels, must say that this one in Pattaya is not quite on the same level as the others.
Room is not actually spacious, bathroom reasonably sized though, but for me shower head n washing basin water pressure is a little too weak. No toilet bidget. No toothbrush n room slippers provided unless u ask for them.
Daily room cleaning not consistent, as in one day it looks well cleaned, second day our shoes n slippers n clothes were left exactly where we left them in the middle of the room without being moved at all, another day they forgot about the towels n we had to call for them after showering.
Bed was comfortable, but the 2 pillows provided was either too hard n high, or the other one too low n flat. Asked for another type of pillow but reception said they only have 2 kinds. 
Spa was expensive n not up to basic massage standard at all. Price not really a big issue but as someone who frequents spa 3 times a month, this spa is not up to standard.
Good points! 
- Perfectly located. Walking distance to almost everything u need from food to entertainment.
- Big n comfortable pool. They have a Foam Party every Saturday night, in-house guests only have to pay 200baht to join the fun. Well worthy. 
- Good varieties of choices for daily Breakfast buffet.
- Was SO relieved that their Soul Lounge was the ONLY privileged place which is allowed to serve alcohol during the 2 days of Buddhist Festival!!! Can't imagine a holiday without some Thai beer... (for those who can't live without alcohol during a holiday, pls check the dates somewhere in July every year before going to Thailand, the ENTIRE country is prohibited to serve alcohol during the 2 days)
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Fake alcohol at the bar! You pay top $$$$ for a drink and you expect it to be real not some watered down cheap scotch! The manager only said sorry, but they cant control every bottle that comes in. Piss poor excuse and basically admitted he knew about it

I check in on July 28, 2016 but the car park is full,  I ask the security staff where I can park my car I will check in today. He told me is full you can file by your self because if full. Unhappy for the fist impression
My husband go down the car and ask the bell boy where we can stop for the car we check in today, He told is can stop the opposite the hotel but we told him is full, He told us moment please will file for us, but he can file. Very nice but  I forgot ask  the name.

I will stay again by comfortable room. The bathroom is big and renew. Breakfast is enough and suit my taste. Swimming pool is big but it little bit ruin. Location is near Central street, around 5 mins where  many eating place. Walk to shopping mall around 10 mins. There is easy to take local trucks to anywhere.

My husband and I stayed for a night at the Hard Rock with our 5 children (we stayed with family outside of Pattaya but wanted to spend a night in town to shop). 
We had a kids suite which was absolutely amazing, with a bunk bed for the little ones, 2 bathrooms, an xbox, board games and books to keep them entertained. The room was huge and there was plenty of room for all of us. Shortly after we arrived there was a knock on the door and we received complimentary carafes of juices and 4 bottles of flavoured milk as well as a fruit basket.
The other room was just a deluxe room (too many of us to fit into 1 room) and that was also spacious and tidy.
The staff was AMAZING and they were so wonderful with the kids. We spent the afternoon in the pool and the older kids loved the basketball and volleyball games going on in the big pool. We also hired a cabana for the afternoon for only 500 Baht, this included 2 beers, 2 cokes and 2 waters in the little bar fridge. It was nice to be able to relax in the shade as it was hot.
Breakfast was included in our package at Starz, the food was pretty good and you can't go past the omlette bar!
Definitely recommend this hotel to people travelling with children. Our family will definitely be back again for a longer stay!

Booked a king room with lounge access. Upon arrival we were taken directly to the lounge and given a seat and asked to take a drink until someone could check us in.
At check-in I was informed that the hotel is very busy and they only had twin beds instead of the King which was booked. I pushed to get what was booked and eventually one with a sea view became available.
It would have been nice if this upgrade was just offered in the first instance rather than ask us to be inconvenienced. The room was lovely, spacious, clean with many little touches.
You get 4 items of laundry done free as well as the lounge access which includes soft drinks, tea, coffee and small snacks all day long. Just what was needed to recover from the flight!
In the evening they moved their happy hour downstairs to one of their bars. They offered a lovely menu of drinks including cocktails for 1.5 hours and were readily offering more drinks. The food provided was lovely and it actually wasn't worth going for dinner afterwards!
The hotel has a lovely atmosphere. Breakfast can be taken in the lounge on an a la Carte basis or from the hotel restaurant. This was quiet before 8am but after this gets very busy and loud with many Chinese guests. The food choices were really good and also nice quality. 
The pool is huge and there are always things going on including the foam party which we did not attend. The hotel is well located and not far from the mall and easy to walk along the seafront in Pattaya. It rocks and I'll definitely be back!!

I have stayed in quite a few hotels in Pattaya but this is by far my favourite. The staff are amazing, the location is perfect, the food is excellent, and the rooms and facilities are superb. I think I’ve stayed here six or seven times and I’ve booked in for 3 weeks at Christmas which I’m super looking forward to. I’m trying to book for April but my fear is that I see the price creeping up with some renovations and rebranding. Still, I love it here and you truly feel you’re buying an experience and not just a hotel room. Thanks for all the awesome experiences Hard Rock Hotel and staff.

Came for a relaxing time sprinkled with a few exciting nights out. Hard Rock turns on the hospitality, ignites that rock n roll vibe and leaves you excited to come back! The food and beverage team have got a fantastic menu full of western favourites and some of the best authentic thai delights. The service is superb and the rooms super clean and comfortable. Hard Rock also has the best pool in Pattaya and includes a fantastic fitness centre to help you balance out all the delicious meals. Totally relaxed stay, great views and hospitality number 1!!

Great Hotel, beautiful swimming pool , large rooms, very friendly staff, good executive lounge, the composer suite is very large and comfortable. the hotel is great for kids and familes
on the negative side, prices of the food in the hotel are on the high side.

I stayed one night on this excellent hotel, beatiful swimming pool with pool bar, nice bar and restaurant, very nice position near the beach, good entertainment. I will suggest to friends and collegues to visit this hotel.

Excellent location. I can easily to walk to any places in here. Also there is a beautiful pool. Many free movie at room. All movues are new and it allow us to enjoy it at room. However it is better to have a larger tv.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I enjoyed my experience in pattaya with your hotel, Thank you so much for this good quality and good hotel with good location, hope you improve your weakness to be the best, thank you so much again for the service

Fantastic room, pool, staff, location, and food. Is a kid friendly resort. I would have liked it if there was a curfew for kids and the pool. We where in the pool at midnight and unfortunately it was filled with small children.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: All staffs included reception, bell boy, room keeper, swimming pool staff, security, restaurant and rock spa all staffs, are very kind and helpful, we having a wonderful journey. I will recommend Hard Rock Pattaya to my friends.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I have just spent three very happy nights here on my second visit.
Stayed in room 1032 which was a Club sea view room. The room was a great size and view over the bay towards the Pattaya City sign. 
I recommend you utilising the Club level of room as it affords you the use of the Club lounge. Snacks all day including Coffee, pastries, sandwiches and soft drinks. Also cocktail hour from 6 till 7.30. With a lovely variety of cocktail food and cheeses. 
The pool area is second to none. You can hire a cabana for the day for 1000 Bht or use one of the many lounges around the pool. 
Staff at this Hotel are very customer oriented and always give you a pleasant sawadee krap when you pass. 
I have to mention the Staff in the Starz restaurant as I had breakfast (included in the room rate) each morning there. They were really great and by the second day were all greeting me by name. A very nice touch.
I will defiantly be booking here again.

Staff are helpful and friendly when called upon. Good location near to 24hrs convenient store not to worry that you get hungry at night 
Event manager Ann did a very outstanding when called upon on my special day that really make hard rock hotel bring out their rock-ttitude 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I booked this hotel cause of good comments from tripadvisor.The hotel is in North Pattaya and it's very near with the market,beach and also Central festival mall..(10minutes walk)a new mall in Pattaya.
The hotel is modern,very clean..and very comfortable...it has big swimming pool too.i was so grateful they gave me upgraded to club ( include breakfast and best club facility)

1st time stay at hard rock pattaya, I booked kids suite , I thought hard rock had more program but just so so, feel a bit boring here, room nice but my younger son dare not sleep in the kids room, so no point for me stay here in future, the buffet at Saturday night ok, but Sunday night buffet so so only, breakfast still ok. Wifi sometime ok sometimes not ok. The kids playground also so so, not much children want to join, I add on the kids package, I thought have anything special but nope, boring for our kids. King club tea time only for suite , just ok. Overall just ok for me. Not really like the location.

Rooms are a bit on the small side but steel nice and very well decorated with a great view. 
Hotel's staff were amazing, nothing was a problem and the staff of pool area were falling over themselves to entertain the gusts.
Pool area was amazing and lot of the activates for the kids and teenagers.
 Very bad breakfast buffet for muslims but I think it is OK for non muslims.
Liked — Lots of Activities, Great Pool, Location very convenient .
Disliked — Slightly on the Expensive side, breakfast buffet.

Excellent staff !!!!!
lovely place to stay professional service at the club floor,  clean accommodation, especially very friendly staff at  the pool bar.  Also hotel is located on the greatest location in Pattaya. Definitely come back again .

stayed at Hard Rock 7 days, the staff is very helpful, kind and service minded. find allways a smil when they meet you. we travel with a litte girl 1,5 years old, she loves Hard Rock espes. the pool. Hard Rock will be iur hotel next time in Pattaya

Loved this hotel, staff was very helpful and kind. The room's view are amazing if you are facing the beach. The BBQ was good and the waiters were extremely helpful, I was so grateful for that. I had a wonderful vacation in Hard Rock Pattaya and would definitely stay here again.

Good and smiling service personnel. Good food, especially breakfast, albeit prices on the high side compared to local restaurants. Nice, unique pool area. Good location on the beach, but a bit further away from the busiest streets. I also like the "Hard Rock" style interior and athmosphere. Generally good choice for families and business travel alike.  
Pool party on Saturday night was distrubing, though, as I could not participate due to 5 am wake up on Sunday morning to catch my flight from Bangkok. The party and potential noise was informed already upon arrival, so I knew it was coming, though.

We had our office Conference last month for 3 days and was fantastic stay. Awesome Hospitality, Awesome location and perfect for couples.... The staff was very nice and generous for any request. We had almost 20 rooms booked but it looked seamless movement.

they thought that we are bound to stay there n they reacted very vigorously we stayed there but changed the hotel..we shifted to imperial n its feel far better then hard rock..it was just next boundary

Please include more vegeterian options in your hotel , though Indian Veg curry was amazing but bread and curry was only option for pure vegeterian . 
My overall stay experience was simply aweosme , nicely maintained property , nice hospitality. 
More then five star , Take it as positive feedback and improve buffet for vegeterians.

Good location. Because i can walk to walking street. Hardrock hotel have Large and Good swimming pool ~ so i enjoyed it. 
 thank you so much ~ if i have opportunity to visit pattaya again i will choice this hotel again
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Yes, we went back again. Yes, most of the staff were already there on our previous trips - and still recognized us. Yes, rooms are clean and modern, service as fluent as always, quality of F&B offerings (the Wagyu burger is outstanding!) and Spa massages as excellent as before. Frankly, very few hotels we've come to know can maintain such consistency over years. An impressive achievement - kudos to the team! Yes, Pattaya has the charm of a sweaty armpit, but if you do go, this is certainly the best place to stay.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Good fun for kids. Pool was awesome. Breakfast was great with many choices of food. Great location.
But expensive if u want to buy a drink at the pool bar.
NB! Take long time to check in if you come with a large group.

Stayed 3N in the property as part of a corporate event. The journey from BKK airport is about 90 minutes, give or take depending on traffic. If your budget allows, book a comfy ride with the hotel limo rather than slog the journey in a taxi or a bus. Check-in was swift. Room was sufficiently large and well maintained, with cold aircon, comfy beds and speedy wifi. The centerpiece of the property must be the large pool (seems to be more than 50m lengthwise), good for long leisurely laps. Breakfast spread was generous. We ate the BBQ buffet at dinner time at the same venue. The spread was okay for the price. To get to the beach, you'll need to cross a road. The boardwalk spans >2km and is good for early morning runs.

All staffs are nice and helpful. My package didn't include the breakfast for my kid. Hotel offered 175b for 3 days to my kid. It was great! On the other hand, there has no ventilation in the the toilet. It will have the bad smell after ...

Excellent friendly staff, made it a good stay. The quality of the food was excellent, breakfast not bad, all the children seemed to be well entertained and taken care of,
areas of the hotel need repainting.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Amazing staff, good service, excellent spa team, very detailed and clean housekeeping team, unbelievably well trained and very friendly concierge team and  above all, a good value for money. A hotel that offers a very different and yet cool concept. Recommended for families, although Pattaya is not really a nice place for children, hard rock offers a wide variety of activities that you would not have enough time to take them outside the hotel. Also for couples and bachelors...
Must-try while staying at hard rock hotel to name a few; foam party every weekend, the aromatherapy massage, Saturday night buffet, don't forget to hang out at the hard rock cafe if you wish to listen to hard rock, lively metal music otherwise if you feel like listening to soft music then you must try the souled out lounge located just opposite the reception... Rooms are well maintained, reception is very welcoming and security team is almost everywhere so you feel well protected while you were at the property. Overall, the hotel offers a concept that is truly unique and canot be found elsewhere in Pattaya.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The staff--the hosts are very welcoming, warm, and helpful. We had a very short stay otherwise we would have loved to stay longer because of the generous hospitality. They provided delicious foods. Highly recommend this hotel for people who travelling to Pattaya.

This was our second time to stay here. We are a family of 4 with 2 kids aged 9 and 11. This is by far one of the most fun hotels I have ever stayed in. My family was in tears when we left as staff came to say goodbye to us. We hardly leave the hotel when we stay here as the activities all day by the pool are so much fun. Dont get me wrong the place isnt perfect and like anything you could pick holes here and there but on the whole we love this hotel. 
The pool is a great size and the pool staff are the friendliest I have ever met. They really seem to enjoy their job. Please say hi Arm if you have the chance. Great guy. He really took care of us, again. The activities are varied and spaced well, dont forget the kids foam party on Saturday. I recommend renting one of the private cabanas facing the pool for 500B if you plan to spend the day at the pool. You get some drinks included so it practically pays for itself. You can win free drinks by winning the pool games which is fun. We won 2-4 a day while we were there! 
My biggest complaint is the lack of a Happy Hour for drinks around the pool which is pretty stupid if you ask me. Every other hotel we have stayed in at Pattaya have a happy hour. I was told they will be starting that system in september. 120B plus 17% service charge for a beer is just silly. You can go out the front gate on beach road and just on the left have a beer for 40B.
We stayed in a family suite which is excellent. Two bedrooms, living room, two bathrooms and two balconies. Modern furnishings, comfortable beds, big bathrooms. The gym is nice and breakfast buffet offers a good selection. 
We met a lot of people that were returning for another visit and I think that speaks for itself. We will be back again, hopefully next August. Its not a cheap option but worth every penny. We have stayed at other 5 star hotels in Pattaya such as the Hilton and Centara Grand Mirage and this one is by far our favorite.

We stayed in this hotel with three other families late July 2012.
Good location, staff extreamely helpful and knowledgeable about the hotel and restaurants.  Pool great fun and breakfast had a wide selection of european and asian foods.  Rooms not overly big but used the space well. Hard Rock Cafe fantastic as usual.
Of course the hotel is 'Rocking' so be prepared for some late night music, nothing too late though.
We left a valuable bag in the hotel by mistake at check out but housekeeping found it and sent it back to us via recorded post. Very honest staff. Thank you very much.

Staff are all excellent . They are friendly and made my stay feel like home  . Room is clean , neat and bed is clean and comfortable . Love the pool very much but they should not charge for the float . Should have more varieties for breakfast or the menu should be different everyday . Overall it's a good and pleasant experience at HRH Pattaya .

Room is fabulous and we even got a surprise birthday gift.
The swimming pool is fantastic as it has a beach atmosphere.
The location is pretty good as it is nearby to Central Festival and Pattaya Beach. And lastly the staff is very very friendly.
Will be back if we decide to return to Pattaya.

Stayed 4 nights. Service was good, room was clean and surprisingly  quiet. Breakfast was avarage, but quite cheap comparing the other prices in the hotel's restaurants. Pool area is superb if you don't mind it is very noisy, due to childerns playing and yelling. I would stay here again.

At the  time of breakfast ant on plates roaming after even we informed the  staff nothing was done just a reply ok mam . Neither they took away they plate just gave a way to ant to move away. They should have picked up the plate

Had been looking forward to my first Post-COVID getaway with a treat by staying in one of their suite rooms, but unfortunately will not be returning to stay with them again anytime soon. The room was adequate, if not a little dated and the huge oversized sofa was surprisingly uncomfortable. The bathroom was enormous, but the shower was VERY tiny. Impossible to turn around without bumping into the fixtures! Also, we paid for a "seaview" but it was only possible to view the sea by leaning over the railing to look right. 
Further, they're taking the "covid precautions" to the extreme, even though Thailand has had no new local cases in more than 2 months. They've installed thick plexiglass at the check in counter, so it was impossible to hear staff without leaning over to listen though the space at the bottom. The rock royalty lounge is closed, even though other similarly priced hotels in the area have theirs open. The soul lounge downstairs and the Hard rock cafe on Beach Road are also completely shut down. Also, no happy hour at the pool and not many shaded areas to lounge in. 
Speaking of the pool, it was impossible to relax by the pool as their were kids' activities going on at the pool all afternoon with a staff member squawking into a poolside loudspeaker at the small same group of children encouraging them to run the same races over and over again. So if you "energetic" noisy children, then this is definitely the place for you! If you are a couple trying to enjoy a beach getaway...not so much!
Lastly, breakfast was underwhelming, and it seems like they may be cutting costs by skimping on food quality. The first morning we basically all got the same sad little plate of chewy bacon, cold sausages, beans and eggs. The second morning they'd opened the buffet and the quality had improved somewhat! Although, social distancing had gone out the window!

Spotted 2 baby cockroaches hiding in between in the pile of bath towels on my 2nd night. After getting rid of it, we spotted another in the bathroom floor. As it was already quite late and we were too exhausted, we couldn't be bothered to complain as we are checking out the next day. We did feedback this to the guest services on level 9's lounge.

good decent property to stay in Pattaya. swimming pool and kids water park are very good. Just parallel to the pattaya beach. good property to stay with family and good staff. overall satisfied with our stay

Room is clean. Breakfast is great. Staff were very friendly. Love the swimming pool especially they provided different types of activities daily. There was smoking area at the swimming pool but people can still smell the smoke of cigarettes around the pool. Hope they move the smoking area away like other hotels did. Water pressure in the shower room is very weak and hope they will improve.

I can only recomend you to book this hotel, very good service and the staff is very friendly. When you stay at the hotel, you have to go check out the hard rock cafe, the food is good and atmosphere is excellent 🙂. See you next time 🤘

It was a very happy trip.
I was very satisfied with the facilities and the space where the child could play so much fun.
If it becomes another symbol next time, I will visit again and have a good time with family

Nice view from my room, swimming pool & sea view in once. Very comfortable bed. 
For the taxi driver i booked from the front desk to airport, the driver should get a GPS, he not really aware of the road to Utapao Airport. Keep stop and ask for direction & go to the wrong way.

Great overall stay. Was always welcome with a smile and excellent customer service. The pool was fantastic for kids and good quality of food both for buffet breakfast and dining at any of the hard rock restaurants.

I really enjoyed staying in the Hard Rock hotel. Service was excellent the pizza at the pizzaria was great. We also enjoyed some live music at the Hard Rock Cafe. The hotel has great facilities and entertainment for all. Even a game room for kids. I also got some clothing from the shops. Awesome.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: It's been a long time since I returned to Pattaya, this stay will make you want to come back again. Hospitality first class throughout. Wide selection of good quality food. Good location, beach front, walking distance to street food, malls, pubs, massages. Cannot ask for more.

Unclear towels were left in the room. Also, I was embarrassed because the drinks I did not drink in the bar disappeared. Of course, it went down immediately to the counter and was resolved.
Everyone was kind and nice except for the employees at the counter. I made precious memories in your hotel. I will stay at your hotel if I get the chance. Thank you.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
This is my fourth time to stay in HARD ROCK PATTAYA. I love the hotel because staffs are very nice.
I can enjoy my holiday every time. The bubble party is great. Also the location is good. I will be back next time, I am sure.

I just cam back from a family holiday in Thailand with my parents. Every time when I come to pattaya I always stay at this hotel and it won't be my last time, because of the location (which is in a town centre and it took me only 10 mins to just walk to the mall along side with the view beach) and hospitality. I love that all the staff member are really welcoming and positive which bring such a positive anergy. Also the hotel food rocks I have tried a black burger it's so good. U guys totally have to check it out.

My daughter also very enjoyed to play at swimming pool area, especially sands area. In addition, Stuffs who are working at this hotel is nice and friendly. 
 Also SPA is good, small bud good service at inexpensive price. My wife also enjoyed it.

The room is not big, the bathroom is a bit too small, and there is no bathtub, but it is acceptable when considering the room rate and the location. it is on the beach road, so that you can go to the Pattaya Beach and enjoy all the marine activities there easily. 
Although the hardware is not the best in Pattaya, the service are really excellent. I love the activities in the pool everyday here. I and my mother did spend quite much time in the pool more than we planned because of the activities there were really attractive.
The staffs are always friendly and welcome you with simle. 
The buffet breakfast is delicious with plenty choices, but the restaurant is not big enough to serve so many guests there, always crowd, and the waiters were too busy to serve you better. 
I also had lunch (pizza) near the pool, it was also good although the price is a bit expensive. 
And I also enjoyed the spa in Hard Rock Spa, because the price is really reasonable. 
I will definetly stay here again if I return to Pattaya!

Overall stay was great the staff were very courteous lovely property  the only thing u ppl should look into is the food menu. if possible pls add veg dishes with no meat and no egg. excellent staff very helpful.

Checked in 3 nites ago and we are supposed to have a great final evening. We stayed on the beach and the hotel poo and came back. My wife noticed smell in the bathroom.I also checked and found someone must have smoked there. The exhaust fan filter is stuck and doesn't work from the day 1 and we don't think the duct invites it from another room.
As sometimes happens to us in this hotel, both operators and receptionists sound they don't care as if they wanted say it could happen.
It is a very sad experience after staying here close to 10 times in the past years.
Wonder if the management functions well.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Great team, excellent services and confortable room made my family trip to Pattaya like home. I love all band members in the hotel and all of them with smile on face, helpful and very nice to all of us!  Thanks team!

Ideally located in the middle of the beachfront. Access to walking street is far enough away to not even know it exists yet close enough if you want it. The area located closely to the hotel offers far better entertainment now and it looks like Pattaya is cleaning up its act. Some nice outdoors bars with the beer garden style concept and a few more shopping areas. 
The hotel has great rooms, food and swimming pool. Ideal for families and couples. 
Kids rooms are great for a family break and also on a saturday night, the pool party is good fun. Even in the afternoon, there is a kids pool party, so ideal for families!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
This hotel is located in the center of Pattaya near the beach. Good value for money, with large room and comfy bed. The pool is very big and clean, worth to spend the afternoon there.
Will be back soon Pattaya

The pool and the pool staff were great, they cannot be compared to any other place in pattaya. A great place for the children, as well as for the adults. Rooms were not cleaned regularly, inspite of making numerous requests. Beware of the room in the 2nd floor, which is just above their kitchen, you cannot open your windows and balcony. We got our room changed after the first night. The Lobby staff were very helpful , charming and they remember your names. Try to book upper floor rooms. Excellent location, and one of the most happening place in Pattaya, other than the walking street, suitable for family and children Security is good, and you feel comfortable. Spa was below average.

We have stayed in this hotel many times. Love the pool area and the activities for the kids.
This time, the checkin did not go too well, we got our rooms like 4 PM, so waited 5 hours. Luckily, we could spend it by the pool.

Let me start by saying staff at this hotel were the most friendly I have encountered in all my years of travelling and the service was second to none.
Facilities such as the pool, gym, steam room, sauna were always well maintained and manned by staff who were more than willing to help or answer any questions.
Staff at reception, cafes / restaurants, doorman & security always had a smile and a compliment to pay.  I was made to feel like a friend rather than a hotel guest and they always were interested in what I did everyday (such as my scuba diving trip, Tiger Zoo etc).
If you have children don't waste your time looking for hotels, staff here were better than any child minding facility I have witnessed.  All activities and games were well staffed and I observed how all kids were made to feel special & involved!
Thankyou Hard Rock, you definitely have me won over & on my list for next time I visit Pattaya!

I found it's very good place to stay next to beach road ,Rooms are very clean with nice bathroom with tele shower and kind of big rain shower nice room service very fast response. i like that welcome lounge stuffed with lots of guitar.
Most special and attraction is the pool they got an aw some pool with round the clock monitoring staff ,attached pool bar if you want to have beer or your wish drinks .It's a large pool with special accommodation for kids over all i found it very good for family and bachelor stay ....

We reserved a sea view room and I guess you can say we could see the sea.lol. The hotel has so much to do and awesome pools. Definitely  nice if you want to escape the hustle of Pattaya. Location is great with exits on both beach and second road. Been to a couple of hard rocks and this one had the best service
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: HRH was a great place for a holiday in pattaya. Hotel facilities all top notch and the whole staff were amazing, very helpful, friendly & cheerful. Would happily stay again and highly recommend HRH to anyone considering staying in pattaya

Amazing 10 days back in Pattaya and it was lovely that some
Staff from 2014 remembered my family. Made us very welcome and will be back. Black velvet band in Hard Rock Cafe were amazing too as was the food and service in all of the food outlets within resort

All most all the staffs are very friendly. Location is good and the hotel had a very nice big pool. We enjoyed every moment spent there in the hotel. The stay will always be a memorable one 😍 thank you hard rock.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Every year I come back to this property again. It does not loose quality. But if you get a room with an extra door the the room near you it can be loud at night when the neighbor can not sleep. But so far everything nearly pefect, especially the friendly staff.

Having sea view rooms gave an excellent view of the beautiful view outside . Very lively hotel especially the pool area , they keep u busy with numerous activities. Excellent property if one is travelling with kids . Staff is cordial , attentive and food is obviously awesome as  u have Hard Rock Cafe there .

The Overall is good and my Family and me also enjoy this trip, the pool side bubble party have surpriser to my husband and me, the VIP Room service is very nice , my kids want to Hard Rock Hotel again

1, Overall old impression
2, When you use a shower the water will fly to the washroom.
3, the bathroom faucet is fashionable but hard to use
4, There is no thing in Japan on TV channel
5, There is dust in places (insufficient cleaning)
6, There is no toothbrush (deployment mistake?)

My stay at Hard Rock Pattaya Thailand. From check in to check out was smiles and friendly star happy to asssist to make your stay the best of experiences! Room was up graded and neat clean with a picture view. Did have some issues with the electronic key not working several times. Result fixed and for the inconvenience up graded to Rock Star Club full access for rest of stay = WOW! What service! Breakfast included with our stay so every morning have a wonderful meal. Staff fantastic especially "Putter" and "Rose" who couldn't help enough and remembered my name from first day treating me with a big smile and goood morning Mr. Paul!!! :) Great location and pool. I would happily stay again on next trip.

I think hard rock hotel is not cleaned
Because i found big cockroach
Also only pool is good , other things is not good . Breakfast is soso.... Many kinds of food is good but tastes is not good .  I choose non-smoking room but smell bed
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: It was nice staying in this hotel. The beach is like 1 min walk from the hotel. Market is nearby with good restaurants. The hotel services are also gud. Hotel has the largest swiming pool in pattaya with all the theme parties. Its a happening place.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I came back to HRHP bringing 16 of my staff from the UK along with some family members with me for 10 days for a staff holiday whilst my bar back home was refurbished.
The staff here looked after everyone fabulously as ever and made sure all had a great vacation.

We have been to this hotel four or five times now, Pattaya isnt the sort of place you would think would appeal to families, but the Hard Rock is a nice break for the kids too. We book the kids eat free stay free, and we always book the buffet dinner on the saturday nite, its such good value. The pool at the hotel is huge, and the staff do a great job of entertaining the kids during the day, and even for a couple of hours after dinner. Staff are very friendly and the regulars always remember us. The hotel itself is being upgraded (probably finished now) and the new suites are nice. If you need a quick break from Bangkok its not more than an hours drive.

Stayed here for 2 nights with my friends. It is a nice property however it is slightly overpriced in comparison to other hotels in the area. The rooms, food and service is above average.. The location is an advantage if you want to enjoy the beach, shopping and the night life.

my partner and i stayed one night in pattaya and decided to go for hard rock as he hadn't had the rockstar experience before and im glad to say he thoroughly enjoyed himself here. service by the staff was excellent, especially Putter from the restaurant who ensured we enjoyed our bbq buffet. speaking of the bbq diner buffet, selection was rather limited with only one choice of each type of meat and the beef was rather tough but the service made it better. 
there is rather tight security as they did a bomb sweep on our car each time we entered and there is a security guard standing at the elevators which made us feel the hotel was safely secured. 
rooms itself are wonderful, huge selection of free movies and a clean toilet. the doors a bit thin so others may hear you as they walk past if you're too loud but otherwise all is awesome. hard rock never disappoints.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Good hotel and service but the floor in the room was not cleaned/vacuumed of any day of my stay from 10 - 14 June.
On one of those days during my stay, the house keeping came to make the room so late in the evening and took the dessert away when it has not been finished without asking and returned no utensil along with the new dessert set

The room is nice, comfortable bed, nice shower room. We went on weekend and there is a lot of people with family. Big and nice swimming pool. They had foam party at that day. They also have Hard Rock Cafe which is my favorite place. Overall everything is good. Location is good, beach is infront of the hotel. The price is a bit high.

The hotel was the most happening hotel I have visited with a distinct theme of its own and the ambience was really something that completely went with the name. The food was great as was the view from the room and proximity to the beach. A large swimming pool was a big plus

Easy check in , staff very friendly. My room reservation stated a free upgrade as I booked direct with the hotel. However, the check in said not available, this I think was an excuse as in the café next day the staff told me the hotel was only half occupied. Rooms were nice, good shower / bathroom. Bedroom was adequate but on the small side, the balance was staying for one night was ok. If I was staying longer I think I would need a larger rom, check the size of the room when booking. The room was clean but only 1 towel in the bathroom. The pool is very good. Large pool & its as simple as that - very good. Food was good but the prices were a little steep, The locality is good for Pattaya....overall decent place to stay....very nice staff at the hotel.
I would stay here again if my upgrade was honoured otherwise I would check straight out reason being you should get what you booked.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Let's me start with how sastifiled we are at this hotel from first walked in until we are almost Checking out. I can't say enough great things about this hotel. Perfect location right next to the beach ( only a road block away). We mostly spent our 3 days around the pool. I travel with young children and this hotel feel like we are in our own world. My kids love the pool. 
Pro:
--  cleanliness. I just can't believe this hotel has been opening for decades but it's still look modern and super clean inside
-- staff at the front desk JJ (aka Madonna) upgraded us to city view and he was super nice and friendly yet professional.
-- buffet breakfast oh my. Too much to choose from and all tasty with English and Asian style! 
-- pool was our highlight. It was huge and nice design. The staff here were spontaneous and helpful. They were so easy going and I felt like we stayed at all-inclusive hotel in Mexico. They did a great job. They deserve the raise for sure!!!
--- Room were clean and spacious with 2 twin size beds. Shower was modern and functional. Really beautiful
Con:
- In my opinion the price for the food and beverage are a lil high. I would suggest if they do happy hour and weekday special. They would catch more of the guests. 7/11 is only 5 mins walk which is lot lot cheaper. Why not spend less right? 
- all the activities here are not fee. Although the tube ( 300 per day) or kid room for kid to play ping pong (250 baht per kid) They try to charge with everything. I understand but I think it is too much. 
Other than this I think this hotel is one of my fav hotel. 
 
Ps. I stayed on the 8th floor partly sea view room 817

Enjoying my weekend stay at Hard Rock. Number of activities are available at Pool for all day long not to mentioned they also had Family foam party at 5pm. during my stayed on Sat.
Thai Touch still with service staffs even they are Rock concept. Receptionist are accommodated to your requested.

We were invited to a Wedding party at the Hard Rock Hotel. Kewarin and Adam decided to celebrate their Wedding with friends and family in the Soul Lounge. With a fanstatic selection of canapes as we arrived and a buffet of assorted finger foods by the pool area. It was beautifully decorated with 2 ice sculptures and enough room for everyone to move around comfortably. I can’t thank the Khun Bew the organizer enough. She was friendly, helpful and ensured everything was exactly how the bride and groom wanted. Very professional. Not to mention the photos that Khun Bew sent with the eThankYou cards were absolutely perfect. Some saying that they were better than the paid photographer. I’d recommend this place for anyone who wants to hire a venue for any occasion. Hen’s night, Engagement party, Birthday Party of just any party or occasion worth celebrating.

We only stayed here 1 night on August 3rd 2015 with my 2 daughters and I wish we had of stayed longer !!  This hotel is amazing.  The staff are nothing short of outstanding.  They can't do enough for you.  The rooms are spotless and have lots of little 'rock' touches.  The staff around the pool seem to love their jobs and get involved in pool games with everyone.  The hotel is opposite the beach although I didn't think the beach in general in Pattaya was anything to write home about !!  There are much prettier ones around Thailand.  The hotel is close to shopping and restaurants although Walking Street is a bit of walk but you can just jump on one of the little utes that go around and around !  The hotel has free in room wifi which worked really well.  We had breakfast included in our stay but that was a little underwhelming and absolutely packed with people !!!!  We didn't eat dinner here but we did have lunch and that was beautiful.  Did I mention the staff !!!!  Amazing, my girls didn't want to leave. I am a regular traveler to Thailand and I would not hesitate to stay here again in future.

Booked through our Tour driver on way to Pattaya from Bangkok.  Very pleased with room quality and staff.  Breakfast buffet was Awesome for all tastes (Euro, Asian, or American).  Quality of breakfast justifies premium in room cost compared to  alternatives.  Pool deck was big and clean, across street from beach - adjacent to hotel.

In general, this hotel was good (in particular, pool and location), although hotel facilities were somewhat old.
There was only one thing that I was disappointed at.
I asked a small event for my daughter's birthday and they promised to send us a small cake.
However, they forgot the event.

The hotel have an amazing pool. All the things are nicely themed on rock from pillows having a guitar symbol to your signature being called as autograph. Nicely located. Nice n pleasant staff great breakfast. Nice activities for kids a great place to stay in pattaya.
