column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Great experience and do have a nice vacation in the hotel.
TASTY FOOD.
WARM SERVICE.
NICE PEOPLE AROUND.
GREAT PALCE TO RELAX AND HAVE FUN.
Tasty drink and bbq buffer.
Nice swimming pool and good service.
I will choose this hotel for my next vacation.

Due to the pound being low prices are steep but their customer base is mainly Asian so its just one of those things.Room was pleasant and hotel faculties good although had add ons for pool party etc.Breafast was a little disappointing but restaurant food Middle to high end standard.One thing really surprised me, the allowing of smoking in the partially outside terrace.This is 2017 the chain need to change their policy.My food was ruined by a guys smoke blowing in my direction.If it was a bar fair enough.Inoticed your GM sitting smoking and drinking their everyday ! Not a good advert for a Manager

(1)Hotel Cleanness especially for Face washing table, have issue of water flow;(2)Arrange more Chinese Receipt for front table;(3)Some time sleeping would be affected by neighbor room noise;(4)For Child Swimming Pool(0.8 meter depth), no steps, which might lead to sliping

We have fantastic weekend here. Kids love the party and also the pools. The hotel locates in the very good location that you can spend 5 - 10 minutes walk to Central Festival and stroll away along the Pattaya beach. Love breakfast here, not yet try the dinner buffet and definitely try it next time. Will be here again if we plan to Pattaya.

We arrived a couple hours earlier than the check in time , but the staff in the reception still checked me and my friend in and let us store our luggage , so that's a plus . Also , the room was spacious and the beds were very comfortable , the ocean view was amazing . The complimentary breakfast buffet was not disappointing as it's filled with a variety of choices . The food at hard rock cafe was nice as well . The staff was very helpful , as we haven't been to Pattaya before , one staff named kevin gave us a map of Pattaya and introduced some places and activities that we can do ! We enjoyed our three night stay here a lot and definitely come back again !

The Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya Thailand is a tremendous hotel in town. The scenery is so beautiful.
I was here when I had a group tour with friends.
The hotel is so good for tourists.
The activities you can do at this hotel are:
-swimming
-gym
-running
-walking near the beach
-jogging
-go to restaurant
-go to outdoor cafe
-watching people doing activities at the beach
You can take selfie photos at outdoor and near the beach.
The staffs are friendly.
I hope I can come back again.
Please give LIKE if you feel this review is useful. Thank you.

It was a very happy time.
I enjoyed swimming and having fun with my family.
And my parents were sick, and the staff was very grateful to take care of them very kindly.
Your next trip will also visit your hotel.

Its perfect for a family vacation. Loved the activities around swimming pool area. All day long for all age groups. Kids pool is a delight and the sliders are perfect. Later at night parents can enjoy the bar and some good music.

location is very good.recection staff not very polite n welcome. pool area n activities are very good. very good for families with children. bathrooms need renovation n are quite dark... need more lighting

The staffs in Hardrock is awesome, friendly and helpful. 
The room is well kept and neat. Everything is provided for. We spend 3 days in Pattaya. Easy to go to the beach. 
I wish the breakfast can be better than this. I visited Hardrock Bali and Penang as well. I believed Pattaya can do better breakfast spread than this.
The executive lounge is beautiful setup and the staffs at executive lounge is very very professional and helpful during our stay. Checking in and out is smooth and wonderful.

Cant wait to return. Staff cant do enough to keep guests happy. Fantastic family room. Great food. Had use of the lounge on 9th floor. Nice place to catch your breath and recharge. Sushi was scrumptious.

We had a lovely stay at Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya. Very professional and friendly staff. It is a luxury hotel but with a cool, relaxed atmosphere. I mentioned my husband b-day and we were immediately upgraded to a better room and the staff served cake in the room later in the evening. Nice! It's great for kids. Lots of activities. Nice pool area. The fitness room is great (and with a nice pool view). The food is also very good. Excellent breakfast. I would definitly stay there again.

For a family holidays !!!
This hotel is the right choce!! The parent can relaxed and feel free. The hotel provided many outlets and activities for your kids.
For all types of couple!!
Gay..Lesbian..Biosexsual..
Hormonsexual..ext.
You will enjoy your stage I guaranteed😀
Forsingle!!!
You will not feel left out here the staff is truly friendly and very funny 😀
No entry for all kind of animals.
We enjoy it hope you do too😀

Stayed in this hotel for a holiday for 10 days and had a really great time. The hotel is located to the east of the town, about ten mins walk from the main bars and cafes and is just across the road the great beach.
The rooms are OK, if not slightly small, but are clean and modern. The cable TV is good with the usual selections of movie channels together with MTV's own music channels. The pool complex is excellant with a seperate shallow lagoon area that the kids can plan in, the hard rock staff also run games and play music all day which keeps everyone amused. Once a week there is a foam party which goes on till late but at other times the music isnt excessive.
The main restaurant is obviously the hard rock cafe but for lunch the best place is the cafe near the pool which offers excellant thai food as well as western stuff as well.
The best thing about this place is the staff who were really laid back but also genuinely helpful and they seemed to enjoy what they do which always makes a difference.
Overall would recommend this place to anyone who wants a great time in Pattaya....

We love to stay here right on the boardwalk across the road from the beach and the best swimming pool in Pattaya IMO.  The breakfast is great!  Treated like kings and queens each time we go there.  The good is great and the service is second to none!

Money was left in our room on the night table. Once we got our room done, the money was stolen. Mgt was advised and we were free dry cleaning. Which was total unethical, as it not the value of the money taken but the way we were given compensation without admitting fault

I stayed two nights at Hardrock Pattaya in the sea view room.  The bed and room conditions were nice as expected.  However, there was always some smell from the toilet which annoyed me a lot.  I changed the room for each night because of the different bookings i had (first night i stayed alone, second night i was with a friend in another room).  However, both of the rooms have the same problem.  
The hotel is situated in a very convenient location for all the night clubs.  Hotel itself was also very busy especially in the breakfast room in the morning.  Hotel staff all performed good job although they were always hands full.

Good service and good location, food is good, swimming pool is very good for children, we enjoy very good holidays in here, easy to find the service in the hotel. price is good, room is clean and good room service

Am currently staying in this hotel and this is the 3rd day of my 7 days stay planned in this property. Am travelling with my wife and son who is 7.
If ur planning to stay with kids then this is the perfect choice. Location is just right not too far from all the attractions and not too close to the walking street. Everything is walking distance and there is a convenience store right outside the rear side entry gate.
About the hotel, what makes this hotel stand out is the staff. Each and every member goes out of their way to make ur stay special. Special word of recognition for Ms. Natsya at the front desk who helped me get an early check in after an overnight journey. She even helped us change the room next day to give us our preferred room. Also to point out that she was extremely patient sincere and very courteous.
Another mention would be Ms Paew at the tour desk who arranged pick up services for us for tiger Park even when we decided to choose and buy the packages from tiger Park instead. Unlike other hotel tour desks. Also I would like to mention contrary to the usual hotels I found much better deals when booking through them. This is the kind of service that makes u want to write a review in the middle of ur stay. EXCEPTIONAL.
ROOM TIP : If ur big on the room space then opt for a room without balcony.
And if u don't mind a smaller room area then go for the rooms with a balcony. Either way rooms are the same. If u opt for a corner room then you would get somewhat an L shaped room which gives u a window as well as a small balcony.
Just a word of advice for the housekeeping department. They should keep a record of no. of guests per room. Everytime the room is cleaned we have to call and ask for an extra set of towels since we r a family of 3.

I stayed here for 3 days on business.  I was located on 8th floor which meant that I had the use of the Executive Lounge facilities on level 9.  This gave me my own check in and reception, with the use of a separate breakfast room.  There was also a lounge with complimentary drinks and snacks with up to 4 items of laundry included in the room rate.
The room was modern and clean.  I did have a problem with no water from the hot taps one morning and then when it came through it was a very dirty brown colour. Also there was a problem with my shower.  However having reported this I was then inundated with people wanting to make sure I was OK and everything was sorted – so much so that it was difficult to get ready later that afternoon.  The hairdryer in the room was good and there was a good supply of teas, coffee & bottled water daily.  Robe & slippers were provided.  I had a small balcony with sea views.
I had breakfast in the main buffet dining room rather than the Club lounge which had the normal selections you would expect at this level of hotel.  
The hotel is exactly what you would expect of something carrying the Hard Rock brand.  Energetic, lively, good music, young and interesting music memorabilia surrounds you.   
Pattaya is very busy and Hard Rock is centrally located near all the activity.  I have never seen so many water sports and sun loungers in one place as there was on the beach just across the road from the hotel.
The thing that made the hotel stand out to me was the helpfulness and politeness of the staff – always with a smile.

We had a fantastic week here in July 2016.
The roms are big and clean, service is very good, all the people working there are very friendly and nice.
The pool area is very nice, there is no problems getting a sun bed, they also arrange pool activities every dag , both for children and adults.
It is located in the city centre between the 2 raod and the beach road, so you can just jump on a bath bus wherever you want to go.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Fantastic and memorable stay.We would like to thank JJ coz you made our stay more beautiful! You are awesome n friendly.We enjoyed our stayed a lot and will surely come back soon. Hard Rock Pattaya it's the best.....
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We went to hard rock for my Birthday This year on 12th July...Must say the place is heaven.welcomed by friendly helping staff,refreshing welcome drink, and an awesome sea view pool side, clean rooms with good amenities were all perfect to delight me :). The Breakfast buffet was wonderfullllll!!!! The foam party on Saturday night was super duperr fun...it gave a great feel of a honeymoon tour...Must Stay place for all perfectionist and party guys!!!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Stayed here for a week.
The breakfast buffet is a must, especially if you have a more Western appetite. The breakfast buffet also has Eastern dishes and changes daily (Singapore noodles, beef soups, etc).
The pool is expansive and large. There can be a lot of kids during the day but it's quite peaceful at night.
The massage service is so-so.
The "break room" where they have ping-pong tables and video games... you have to pay extra money for that.
The other restaurants at the hotel are great. You can even request specific Thai dishes if you want. They will make it for you as well. 
Sometimes they have live music with slow jazz near the outside lobby, near the pool area. It is quite nice.
The foam party is fun. It is in an area away from the pool, so you won't be in water while experiencing the foam. The floor is just cement. But they had a live DJ with dancing go-go girls.
The hotel is right next to their Hard Rock Cafe, which you can room charge and get discounts. Food is great there and probably the best restaurant in that area for Western cuisine. Even if you walk down the road, Hard Rock Cafe was the best.
As for the rooms, the bathroom is a sliding door (so you will have privacy) but the shower is an open concept, so the ENTIRE bathroom WILL steam up and get soaked in humidity. Beware of that.
Also, the room (the one we got) smelled like sweat (perhaps the carpet from puke or something). Make sure you smell your room, and change if you do not like. But overall, the design of the room was good and you are better off here than some local/rundown Thai motel/hotel.
Their room service food was great. But sometimes they run out of items on the menu so beware.
Getting an ocean or pool view room is better than getting the city view. The location in the front of the hotel (which faces the city) is not good. The ocean/pool view faces the main road and is the "back" of the hotel.
If you are on your honeymoon, they do not provide good service. Just some some glass of juice and chocolate strawberries, which were not fresh.
Overall, come here for convenience of breakfast, food, pool, and some fun. Prices overall provide good value for what you get.
P.S. You can find an actually better deal on their main website for Hard Rock with special discounting if you book directly than going to those other 3rd party travel sites. Trust me!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Nice Location and design but very small room , it's really very tight swimming pool is great, Hard Rock Cafe is part of the Hotel, staff good, food good , beach front hotel, the only not really good is size of the room and room rate which is supposed to be less

We have been here probably 20 times. Our kids love the pool with sand floor, kids foam party, large pools, animation and hotel entertainment. Rooms spacious and clean. Take the cabana on the beach. Saturday night roasted piglet in the huge buffet. But very  noisy, if you want quiet take a city view room. Sat night adult foam party.

There has nice staff, good distination. The room was clean, but I felt sorry for the smell of cigarettes left in the smoking room. I couldn't sleep late because of the noise in the next room. I hope you have a good soundproofing.

My son and I stayed there 2 times and enjoyed it both times.  The pool is the real attraction with lots of pool side activities. Games every day. Rooms were clean and spacious. Mini refrigerator, coffee maker, in room safe and all the other amenities. On out second stay they gave us a new room and we didn't like it.  We asked for one not renovated and they gave us one. In the process of renovation they are doing away with the balconies. I'm not sure if all the rooms will not have a balcony but you might want to check if that is important to you. The hotel staff was very polite and helpful.  It was a good walk to the walking street but tuk tuks are cheap and plentiful. Plenty of shops and restaurants in the area.  We would stay there again.

The hotel is the main reason why we wanted to go to Pattaya, especially after reading all the reviews on trip advisor - and we were not at all disappointed.
Everybody in the hotel is very friendly and helpful -- The rooms are small yet cosy - we stayed very comfortably in a deluxe sea view (new) room. Awesome view of the beach front.
The part which i loved the most was the Beach Foam Party - which got over too soon :( 
The pool bar and all the band members at the bar were very cool (i got a free shot! :) )
All in all - an awesome reason to visit Pattaya - especially if you arent too much into the Walking Street scene - perfect place to spend time with your friends and as they say ~ Rock On...!!

I cannot recommend enough, all staff were friendly and nothing was too much trouble, pool spotless and staff amazing, prompt service in restaurant at lunch. Lounge Staff brilliant and efficient. Never a sad face from any of the staff. We will definitely be back ,only slight issue we were on floor 10 which was a smoking floor and you did get the smell through the air-con at times. Close enough for lots off amenity's but far enough out not to be disturbed at night. Thank You Hard Rock and Staff

Pattaya Hardrock makes every age person comfortable and at peace.Once inside hardrock you forget all where you came from.
The breakfast spread is awesome,the pool is so clean and beautiful and they have this amazing foam parties .Which is a must if you are in Hardrock.
The rooms are very neat and clean with very comfortable quilts and pillows.
Quality of sleep is very good and its view from the hotel is brilliant.
Cant wait go back.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Good hotel.. 
good service 
Good crew
Good place
If me go again 
I booking hardrock again..
Swimming pool also big and clean
Room also clean and bery cool
Restaurant is deliciousand clean
I think no1 hotel in pattaya

We stayed at this hotel in 1993 when it was still the Merlin Pattaya. We arrived and had to wait untl 13h00 for our room. This is a Funky hotel rocking!  We were allocated a beautiful clean room 100% germ free and quiet. My husband being on Chemotherapy pills needed special attention and thanks to wonderfull staff did not dissappoint.  I put my recommendayions in to management upon leaving the hotel. This hotel is a childrens paradise. The pool attendants and lifesavers see that they are entertained all day. Breakfast was good, but missed true Thai food. Plenty fruit and devine pastries, but my experence during our stay main courses was more for Chinse, Japanese and Korean cultures. Amazing decor with Fender Guitars all over. Staff all seem to enjoy their work and called me by name which was exceptional. Would love to return to this hotel when my husband has beaten the Cancer, as I could not explore more of the anemities except for the pool area. Thank you to all the staff for assisting and making our stay a memorable one. You All Rock, and keep on rocking.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Pattaya is always exciting and to bring more excitement we stayed at hard rock pattaya and guess what it was one of the best stay in pattaya. Friendly staff,prompt service.food specially veg was not that great. I had hard rock food before at many places but here it was not that great. Over all it was nice to be in hard rock.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Stayed at room 335, room was new and had a cool atmosphere... Lots of activities at the pool to keep me entertained during the day.... Parking space is big, however you need to walk a bit if you cant get the spot closer to the lobby...

The staffs are kind and helpful and they provide high quality of service. The environment is comfortable and tidy. The location of the hotel is convenient. It is located near the central city. It is a very nice hotel.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Need double check your number on room card key holder.
By yourself need to find your room with bad written number of your room.
No one care even you knock other guests room.
But Breakfast teasts wonderful with nice servers

Very nice place to stay with outstanding service too..
Very friendly employee. I had dinner with friend in starz dining..was a nice experience good food good service only the restaurant is not the right place for a romantic dinner.

A bit too big for my taste, but overall a very good place for both families with children and couples. Very nice pool area and lots of different foods to choose from. The room was nice but a bit cheaply built. Nice toilet though.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Good location and Swim fool. 
But elavator smell is really bad. They have to clean everytime that.
And Breakfast is just normal.
Exacutive lounge is Really badest. foor food and small place.
I dont want reservation Exacutive lounge again.
But Hardrock Cafe food was good.

Came here for a 5 day stay as it has an excellent pool area and it was my birthday so fancied a night at the HR Cafe. Our children also wanted to try out the Saturday night foam party at pool side. both plans went wrong as the foam party snd the Cafe have an age restriction of 20 years old and our children are both 18, so 2 out of our 5 nights pretty much spoiled, when asked about this rule both the foam party and the Cafe said it was a licence  issue!!!! 
The hotel itself is ok although the only nod towards it being hard rock were 4 photos in each of our rooms, the children were of course classed as adults when it came to accommodation so we booked two double rooms, good breakfast, the hotel appears to rely almost 100% on large Chinese tour groups, breakfast is bedlam and the hotel and pool deserted for the rest of the day which was a bit weird.
Good place to go if you have young children or are over twenty, pretty frustrating if you are 18.

Booked this online expecting it to be a 4 star hotel experience. I arrived at 230pm and was told my room was not ready and to come back in an hour. Left my bags at the bell desk had to visit them 2 times for them to take my laptop bag. Came back an hour later and checked in, looked like the bell staff had better things to do than assist customers. Walked into the back bell room where the bags are stored myself, took my own bags out, and walked them upstairs myself. Bell service people didn't even notice. Got to the room and found they gave me a "handicapped room". The in room safe didn't work, the light system did not work properly, the toilet and sinks where on sensors that would have them go off randomly (could not get enough water to brush teeth), there were also wall patches that you could see where not painted over properly. Overall the room was poor. Not 4 star quality. Also walls were paper thin so you could hear everything and everyone walking by in the hallway. The breakfast and pool area was very nice. Other than the bell desk and long wait to check in upon my arrival the service was commendable. Overall this hotel cost 8000 baht a night and you can get an equally nice room in just as good of a location for less then 1000 baht a night. This place relies on Toursits who go online and don't know any better to book.

I stayed at hard Rock Pattaya for 4 days and it was an amazing hotel. The room was kept clean, quiet and most importantly safe. The friendly staff also help set up tours for me and my friends in which we had a wonderful time. I highly advise this hotel and will be staying again. Special thanks to Miss. Sutharat Rattanathai (Mini) Operator section who made sure my room service and extra towels were delivered promptly after a night of fun on the town.

great Location in the center of the Beach Street strip in Pattaya.  The hotel staff was friendly and the music at the cafe was excellent.  My only complaint was during the entire 2 week trip the mini bar was never restocked..

Definitely will recommend to others. Rooms is nice. Food is good. Love the energy staying there. should give free airport transfr or city tranfer to big mall. Breakfast best if have more halal section.

Been staying here many many times and kept coming back. Our 3 years old little girl really loves this hotel and whenever we visited Pattaya, she requested us to take her to the hotel.  There are so many activities you can do at the hotel.  They've got a large pool including two sliders where the kids can play.  They even got foam party for kids.  Aside, from the kid stuffs, we really enjoyed Hard Rock Spa as it was really nice and relaxed.  
Guest room here is also nice and the bed is really comfy.  The hotel is located in Center Pattaya and really convenient.  The beach is just matter of crossing the road.  Hard Rock Cafe is a place you can always visit for good food and music.  So they have everything there for you and your family to enjoy at this hotel.
The only thing they can do to improve is their dinner buffet .  We used to love it very much but when we visited last month, we found that the food weren't as great as before. The seafood weren't fresh and it also did not taste as nice.  To make the matter worse, the staffs weren't very friendly also.  We were wondering what happened to the place as we used to loved it very much.
In all though, we still enjoyed the hotel and will be visiting Hard Rock Pattaya again soon.

King's club makes your stay really worthwhile. The swimming pool is one of the best in the world. Spa is a must!
The location of the hotel is excellent. Beach is bang opposite, shopping, restaurants are located at walking distance. The hotel has a lovely deck restaurant where one can spend lovely evenings.

I stayed in hard rock in Aug. Hard rock hotel Breakfast and Swim pool is really great~ and Hotel is located near beach, View through room windows is fantastic! Texi service is also great when you check out then get to airport~

We checked in yesterday as a couple.
The online portal was not able to accept credit card payment so the reception staff (though reluctantly) gave me the same rate as I showed them and the upgrade to sea view.
Location
The hotel is at a very central location from both entrances (front and back- beach road and central road) And has the Blue Baht bus outside each entrance which is very useful. Other than that it leaves a lot to be desired!
Let's begin with the rooms- 
Stained carpets and frayed upholstery.
Dust visible on a lot of surfaces(even after 2nd day housekeeping)
Housekeeping is clearly not good. We have a stained glass in our room with coke and food! (Picture attached)
We specifically asked for the bed linen to be changed but it was not (Picture attached)
The very very flimsy room slipper (Just 2 pieces of paper attached together) broke and we put it in the trash- it was not replaced.
Cushions not put back in place .
Towels have seen better days.
The flush has been leaking and making water dripping noises.
The bathroom is really really dark... So if you are planning to do any makeup or grooming, that will be challenging.
POOL
Very large, lots of activities for kids and rock pool etc. Very nice. Lots of sun beds with and without umbrellas. Fun pool.
They picture 8 floats and flat beds on their website but these are charged for use! 
Also the pool parties and foam parties that you see on the website are only on a Saturday.
The Room has so many things that you can buy, everything has a tag! Honestly for me that is a put off! Just don't place those items in the room as the store is below and can be visited by any patron who wish so! It gives you a very uncomfortable feeling that you don't know what you might get charged for!
The restaurant food is just average (which in itself is shocking for any eatery in Thailand as the food here is always amazing) and highly priced. You can just walk out of the hotel and find restaurant after restaurant in all cuisines.
Definitely not coming back!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Hard Rock Hotel was fantastic. I spent 3 nights there recently. It is perfectly located across the street from the beach and within walking distance to the "action" and "madness" of Pattaya, but far enough away that you can enjoy a peaceful time as well. The pool area is amazing and the staff were great.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: This is a great place to hang out in Pattaya if you want to get away from the less-desirable aspects of Pattaya. The pool is great, food very tasty and the service is very good. I have been to other Hard Rocks where there were too many screaming kids, but this hotel was good for that.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
As a european traveling in Thailand my number one priority is always safety. Above anything else I always prioritize personal safety and health. 
During my stay at Hard Rock Hotel I came to find issues with safety for hotels guests, at the moment I would not recomend families with children to stay at the hotel.
My major concern with the hotel is that Hard Rock Hotel, in my opinion, is a

Stayed here for 3D/2N with my friends for a leisurely trip. The design of the rooms stay true with the "Hard Rock" theme but not overly decorated. Beds were huge and comfortable to sleep at. Definitely what I need from a whole day of touring. Apart from the rooms, we also had the chance to use their swimming pool. We enjoyed playing some water sports (in-pool volleyball and basketball equipment were available) since we were a big group. Afterwards, tried their hamburger which is huge. I'd give it an average to good rating in terms of taste. Apart from those, we didn't really spend a lot of time in the hotel as we were always out. If you plan to go around Pattaya coming from Hard Rock, it is much more convenient to travel with a hired cab/van (which we did for 2 days) already. The beach is situated just behind the hotel but the other areas (Walking Street, etc.) require riding a tuk-tuk. Nothing much to do outside the hotel area at night other than their local 24/7 mini-mart. I think this is pretty much common if you're staying along the strip of hotels along the beach. Overall, I'd say I had a fun time staying at this hotel.

Very nice hotel whit high class, all room , pool area and public area are clean, location good in central Pattaya, all staff very helpsome, room good standard, nice Big breakfurst, price level little bit high but can warm recommend this hotel.

Services are very good there...all staffs are supportive and have full service mind.
We are happy with facilities there and services even only one day stayed there each time.
We wiil go back and Hard rock is our first choice in Pattaya.

The hotel environment is good. The room is clean. Breakfast buffet is good with many choices. Hotel service is impressive. Can see smile in all hotel employees. The hotel location is very convenient and near to beach.

This was my 2nd stay at this Hotel, Had a great & comfortable experience both the times. he location of this property is nice and also the friendly staff & the lovely pool areas. Would love to keep this hotel as a permanent stay for next visits too

Great place, we did not stay here but have been in at least once each day for a cocktail or food whi0ch has always been really good, just be aware that's its expensive anyway but then you get a little shock when the inflated price goes up even further with the 17% tax and service charge. The staff all around the place are great and will always ask you if they can help if yhey see you wandering around.
After a meal we looked around the pool and it looks like loads of fun with basketball nets and slides in the pool so we asked if we could use the facilities and for the price of 450 baht each (about £9.50) they gave us a wristband and we were welcomed in. There are activities on around the pool throughout the day, mini golf, pool games, connect 4 and a climbing wall to name a few and they give plenty of beer away as prices which adds to the fun.
I would of given this place an easy excellent but unfortunately we had to witness an English (possibly Australian) manager with a pink/orange tinted mullet bark at one of the bar staff like he was a dog, it was all very uncomfortable and the bloke clearly thinks hes something special and just came across as a bully who had zero people or managerial skills to behave this way in front of customers, I would suggest some retraining sharpish to avoid further customers having to witness this
all in all the place is fantastic and I would recommend it both for couples or families. Its fun and the cocktails are about the best we've found in Thailand
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
We stayed their for 2 nights but the stay was superb and want to extend the same but since we had already pre-planned itinerary so can't change.
I stayed in room 631 which was having one of the best view. The breakfast of the hotel was good with nice spread in the menu.
The pool was good and we enjoyed it a lot.

1) House keeping did a very poor job. The room was not cleaned in time in spite of me asking for it specifically.
2) The staff at the pool issuing towels was very rude and curt in her response. I expect better from a Hard Rock.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
My partner and I stayed in the hard rock for 5 nights in Decemeber. The hotel is lovely, very clean and the staff are so
Helpful. We checked in and within 20 minutes we were in our room.
Our room was big and very well decorated. It was cleaned daily and had a great view. 
The food was lovely, we had breakfast included however lunch and dinner was very pricey so we ate out regularly as the resturants in Pattaya are so cheap.
The pool was very clean and had a great atmosphere as youd expect with any hard rock hotels. 
Overall, we had a great stay at the hard rock and would return.

Had been looking forward to my first Post-COVID getaway with a treat by staying in one of their suite rooms, but unfortunately will not be returning to stay with them again anytime soon. The room was adequate, if not a little dated and the huge oversized sofa was surprisingly uncomfortable. The bathroom was enormous, but the shower was VERY tiny. Impossible to turn around without bumping into the fixtures! Also, we paid for a "seaview" but it was only possible to view the sea by leaning over the railing to look right.  Further, they're taking the "covid precautions" to the extreme, even though Thailand has had no new local cases in more than 2 months. They've installed thick plexiglass at the check in counter, so it was impossible to hear staff without leaning over to listen

I am appreciated on Staff friendly, All day refreshment, Exciting show, Fun swimming pool.
But i suggest the hotel to develop on the issue of Kids' club fee (it should not charge to hotel's guest) and the simulation sea area is not clean and I do not like the stone (it is slippery and hurt my feet).

My family and I had a wonderful time again at The Hard Rock hotel. Staff is exceptional very friendly and are always there with help and smile on their faces.We would love to thank all the staff in every venue for the kind assistance. See you soon again.

My girl friend & I really enjoyed our stay. The room was good. The service was fantastic. Great location excellent food. We booked directly through the website so we received rock royalty treatment, would definitely stay there again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I really liked that there was always something to do and that there were loads of activities both indoors and outdoors the room was nice and big the room was cleaned very well every day, and we really enjoyed our stay.

hard rock hotel is one of best hotel in pattaya its view are awesome.. a best intentional food with very comparative price and music are heart catching and well sever guest and good service women who make me feel like home

1st of fall thanks alottt for my birthday cake I really appreciate it & every thing was awesome ..stay to foam party,kids activities,pool area,check in & check out was fast ,beach side cafe ,location ....all superb will definitely stay again 👍

Check in was easy despite being early and passports being in our bags. We were allowed to get into our room and unwind and bring them down later. 
So far so good. 2 large beds and a welcome TV screen with a named welcome to us. 
Small but adequate balcony and lots of amenities, brolly, and bathrobes. 
Certain floors were designated for smokers so our floor was fresh smelling and even had mint fragranced corridors with great wall art at the lift entrance. 
The pool area was awesome, from young kids to older ones with free activities around the pool side. The pool itself was beach themed and had plenty of beds. The beach was easily accessed from it and walking through Pattaya itself I wouldn't venture out much as it was horrid. 
For supper there was two options...buffet at an extortionate rate at £22 per head or the usual HRC menu. 
We've just finished breakfast and I think we're all stuffed. 3 themes of food were Asian, Western and American. Everything was freshly prepared and plentiful. The servers were very efficient. Everytime a plate or bowl was finished the table was cleared within seconds. 
Checking out was quick and easy. 
All in all a cheap place to stay taking into account of the above.

Having made plans for romantic getaway, imagine our disappointment when we were greeted by an unpleasant staff at the check-in counter. After a long flight and crawling traffic to the hotel it made it worse when we had be given three different rooms before what we actually booked for materialized. What a disappointment! However we were determined not to let that dampen our holiday. However the next day at the pool bar we were treated badly by the bartender when we were asked to pay corkage charge for bringing a bottle to drink by the pool. At first we were trying to get them to reduce the charge as the bottle was only half full but then the bartender quickly got annoyed at us and told us to go back to our room if we weren't happy. By then we were taken aback by his remark as this is not a way to be treated in a five-star hotel. We had paid a lot of money to get there and to enjoy our getaway and to be treated such was no excuse. We were in shock that a hard rock hotel staff could treat a paying customer that way. I wonder if Hard Rock Hotel management is one that values its customers feedback. I guess I will know after this review is written.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Please you have to clean the toilets better mainly in the swimming pool and to put paper after washing hand A bin must installed every where around the swimming pool .An happy hours must be installed because all are too expensive

Fantastic hotel and a good representative of the hard rock chain! A+ for The decor, amenities, staff service etc. Good tv channels and a great breakfast. Was let down by the fact there's no bath and only a shower.. And you think that for the price you pay they would be able to supply free wifi in the rooms! Hotel is on the beach front so has a great location too.

I had the displeasure of staying at this hotel for 9 nights.  I had booked the rooms through an agency and pre-paid for the room.
The rooms are full various stains and extremely outdated.(especially the bathrooms)
You can hear the loud conversation of the cleaning staff at the hallway when they begin their routine check on the rooms at 07:30.
The daily in room internet charge of 600 baht is unacceptable if you consider the condition of the rooms.
The food at the main restaurant (buffet) is below average and overpriced.  I had the pleasure of collecting hair from my chicken dish. In return, the management was kind enough to make 10% discount on the drinks. 
The service that I received during check-out topped it all.  I had noticed that there was a internet charge of 1200 baht for one of the days I stayed in.  I pointed out this mistake (which could have been my fault also since you might choose the daily package twice!!). Extremely unfriendly, Mr. Paopong refused to listen to me and pointed out that if it was a mistake, it would not be on my bill. He was kind to ask me why this charge was on my bill??!!  I doubt any of the staff at the reception had any training in their fields or they hate to work there.
If you find yourself staying at this establisment, do not be too kind to tip the waiters since the hotel bills  you with 10% service charge on everything you eat and drink.
Finally, if you are single and got lucky one night, expect to pay 900 Baht to accompany your lady to your room :) this earns the hotel the brothel status and extremely insulting to the lady.
Overall, I strongly reccomend you to avoid this hotel.  The only positive thing that I can write is the fact that the location and the friendly staff at the pool area of the hotel. On the other hand, there are many other and better alternatives in the area.

Location is good. Many massage shops nearby are all at standard. THB200 per hour. Swimming pool is more suitable for children. Games are good for children as well. Two of us had a pizza tea set. Very delicious, it make immediately when you order. at 14" inches size. no teethbrush provided,  remember to bring it by yourself. Nice hotel to stay and I choose the sea view.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Good stay at hard rock,stayed many times before,still a good hotel and location,staff are always friendly and helpful,still think hotel is a bit expensive but good amenities and rooms,breakfast buffet still good but was very busy this time
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The hotel staff were fantastic  to deal with from organising day trips and taxi's to breakfast food service the pool lifesavers were friendly and very entertaining  that were willing to help in any way great food,  clean amenities , great central  position  thanks for a Great trip

Before check in, I asked for a long room in the elevator. It was the second floor, but the terrace swimming pool was good. There is a little thing, The floor was so low that i couldn't see the ocean. Room 223, was good. I'm afraid the room plumbing smells bad. No plumbing fan. I called in room dining service 0, but i am not good at english. I hung up on her because she was upset that she couldn't hear her. I felt bad. The employees who work in the pool are all kind. The most friendly employees are A nickname Mosquito, Kito? and Mike. Kito was very pleasant and kind. But be disired, I plan to visit again. Take some rest. Thank you.

We were concerned after initally booking that the hotel could be a bit too theme orientated.Not so and everything was perfect! Initial impression was wonderful and the staff are fantastic.( We are hoteliers in NZ and wish all our staff could be as great at those at Hard Rock.)
Regardless of whether you are travelling alone, with your partner and or children as well Hard Rock is perfect for everyone.
A relaxed but professional attitude and always a smile from the staff who quickly get to recognise you after a few days.
Ocean View room was furnished to a high standard and the clenthiness was to a high standard. On one occasion we neglected to return a large amount of cash, travel documents and tickets to our safe, leaving them all over the place.On our return, they were nicely stacked on our dresser.
I can not fault this property without being unfair! Meals, Pool, cafe, Massage, Bar, Security, all beyond expectation.
We wlii return next year.
Thanks Dave.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We only intended to stay two days before heading off to bangkok.  Our plans changed when my friend got ill and had to be hospitalised for four days.  The staff at the hotel where so helpful.  Where helpful in us keeping the same room while my friend was fit enough to travel.  They even gave her some dragon fruit when she came out of hospital.  They helped me to have one less thing to worry about.  The hotel has very good facilites and a large pool. Couldnt fault it.

I stayed with my old friends who never see each other for long time. Its great experience here, started from the lobby it was fanTastic looked like the gallery of the famouse artist its great! The reception upon check in was cool I like her hair style and her eyes draw. Look she asked me about our trip "is there ay special trip this time" thats the great question i ever had in others hotel its show that she care about the customer. All the room requietment we got from this reception such as non smoking room, twin bed and of cause good veiw for us that we can see the pattaya wording from our left hand if im not wrong it was 733 & 734. Room were great not really beautiful but nice decoration Oh! just the bathroom which not macth for the drain system the water come out easily but not the big deal. The swimming pool was great and stfff very attractive and fun especially "arm". I can say all the stff who i've talked with very friendly and they all active or because of this hard rock style. Last day we walked along the beach and it was nice weather so we'll come back here again especially hard rock i promised.

HRC hotel has really exceeded our expectations. It is conveniently located. Staff were excellent. Special shout out to housekeeping department.Cafe staff all very friendly and service was very good.Front desk staff also very professional and friendly.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We just returned home after spending a 10 day stay at Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya. We stayed in room 539, unfortunately not a sea view as hotel was fully booked weeks in advance. Best thing about the room was the kids bunk beds in a separate room, next to a small tv/lounge area with a balcony. The main bedroom was next to the tv room, with a on suite bath/toilet and shower. There are x-box console with one game, soft toys and loads of other books for the kids. Breakfast buffet had a good selection, could get busy if you go after 9am. We went for the BBQ buffet one week night, eat all you can pork, chicken, beef and prawns-also pretty good however no drinks included in the price. The hotel swimming pool is the best and fantastic if you have young kids. They have a "beach" side shallow pool with sand bottom, shallow enough for a 3year old to stand in, 4 slides and a mini play frame in the water. The large pool is nicely surrounded with enough sun beds and umbrellas. Pool bar offer drinks and food during the day. The staff are all very friendly and helpful. Kids club charges a small fee per hour to leave your kid under supervision. The service, friendly staff, fantastic family room and great pool set up will ensure we will be back soon. Thank you HardRock Pattaya for a great holiday.

When you coming in Hardrock you will received a smile and warm takecare all time as your family Hardrock many activitys Rock climbing swimming sauna aroma spa you will get a electric guitar when you have check in untill tou check out

We just came back from our holiday in Thailand weeks ago..and from a place we love to call home sweet home " Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya ". We went back to Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya everytime we visit Thailand. Many staff recognised us!! I found that amazing and  making me feel like coming back home! Services are outstanding as always! Especially, "Gino", restaurant staff -lovely..lovely lady! Food is excellent! I did try Singaporian Style chicken rice. Gosh! I no longer needed to go to Singapore for that! We went for a drink at Hard Rock Cafe on the fortunate evening! There were live DJs performing great selection of music! I couldn't believe to have such experience of exceptional musice in Pattaya. Though we'd problem with wifi but IT staff showed his enthusiasm helping us shooting the trouble. Will be back home again next year ; )

Maybe everything is awesome. But for swimming pool's insect. And hard rock cafe's meal is too salty. However hotel staff is so kind that almost I didn't mind about those problem. They seem to work happy by themselves

The hotel is so clean, very nice design, all the employees was very friendly and speak english very well, the food at swimming pool so yummy,  next time we will back here again, my kidz so enjoy and have fun here, the swimming pool and the attraction there so nice also.

Cosy room feeling as home sweet home with comfy bed and AC works well.The room provided full minibar with choice of beverages and some snacks as well.Need technician to check the ventilation fan in the bathroom might weak or wasn't works?

Actually I went to swimming pool and had burger inside the swimming pool as the bar is there . Only you need to sit on a rock while your half body inside the water . The bar man so funny . Its nice to had couple of beers and relaxation . This hotel has perfect pool parties with DJ 
In general its nice and amazing place . Eve good for family relaxation . Nothing goes wrong . 
Everything as you like and even more impressive.

room much smaller than expectation， security good with nite guard stand next to the lifts at ground floor ， price not so competitive with over 130 us per nite，  close to pattaya beach  5mins can walk to the beach

Only stayed one night, wish it was longer! The service from staff in the hotel is extremely professional and very efficient. The hotel itself, the room was clean, bed very comfortable, bathroom clean, good shower. A beautiful looking hotel inside and out. Staff within the Hard Rock Cafe shop, amazing service 👍🏻
The swimming pool is amazing, perfect for couples and families. Breakfast was amazing. Found my regular hotel stay for Pattaya.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: A group of us 6 lads stayed at the hard rock...and when I say this hotel.is amazing I mean its actually fantastic.  Starting from the breakfast which is massive followed by the amazing pool and really friendly staff. The hotel is really clean and I loved every minute of my stay. Your about 5 mins tuk tuk drive away from walking street but nesrby you there is plenty to do. I recommend both family and groups of.lads to stay here.

First I have to say the staff were excellent, from check-in, to room service, breakfast, security guards, the doorman and checkout, all very friendly and helpful. But that was it. The pool was large but ordinary, the pretend sandy beach not the cleanest and the organised pool activities childish. But the biggest let down is the rooms, we stayed in the new renovated water view section, first the layout of the room is simply stupid, the interior designer seriously wants to think of a career change but the biggest disappointment is the bathroom, first there is the scupper into the bathroom, this will break toes or remove toe nails for anyone not totally on the ball when entering the bathroom, especially at night when one is not quite with it and you simply forget it’s there. Then there is the bathroom lighting, very sexy, so long as you don’t want to put on makeup or have a shave, the apparent lack of extractor fans only compounds the problem when mirrors fog up. Then let’s not forget the toilet anyone over 90kg just won’t fit. All in all not a pleasant experience.  No free internet was a major drawback.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I must say that at the beginning I was not willing to spend more than 100 euro for a night in an Hotel in pattaya as there are a lot of good hotel with cheaper room rates.
But at the end I enjoyed the stay there.
It's a huge area with a big Swimmingpool, nice gym and spa. The restaurants Are also very good and it's really quite but you still are at the beach road soi 7!
The rooms are nice, the view of the city view room could be a bit better but maybe depends in which floor you are staying.
Only thing what was annoying was that there are a lot of security at night there.
May this is there way to make people feel more secure but it's a bit of an overkill! 
But so far a good choice!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: First time at a Hard rock and I know it's the name you pay for , room was not too expensive and decent , buffet was very mediocre for the price , not good variety , breakfast buffet better than evening buffet. Nice pool and decent gym. Drinks were crazy expensive ! 600 baht for small mimosa that wasn't made with champagne ! Beers 400 baht ! Tourist place though so people didn't seem to care , lots of restaurants nearby though so easy to go out and eat ,
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Fantastic evironment and atmosphere, staff were so enthusiastic and keen to help and make the stay  wonderful. Huge pool with plenty places to relax. Close to beach and other attractions and shops. Yummy breakfast.

very nice hotel..especially the pool area..is like a mini beach within the hotel area,
good place to chill out with beers..
the room is comfortable, cozy and clean.
they have good lives band as well at the cafe.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The guest service is sucks. I was disturbed by next door guest at 2-2.30am with loud music and noise. Called the front desk and no reaction for next 10 minutes. Had to call 2nd time to them. Just simply make a call to next door and didn't come to the level to ensue everything ok. In the end, I had to come down to reception and told them. The letdown is the staff attitude whereby not given me any assistance when I ask to change another room to sleep. Just asking u can move ur things urself right? I told him back that I don't need ur extra room but I just want place to sleep and tomorrow will give u back the card. It's so funny that midnight asked me to move my luggage and never offer me assistance. Will publish my review in TripAdvisor.

Very good and comfortable.The greeting from the staff is very good. May consider not to greet a customer who is eating and drinking, Very often I felt disturbed. Staff who greet when the customer is not eating and drinking.

All staff as great service mind, big pool and many kids pool. My children was very happy and have fun. Near 7-11 , near beach. Many type of breakfast. My kids have fun with fried icecream. Good place for kids and family.

Came back and stay in this rockin' so call home. Staffs recognized me and was thrilled to be treated as a star. Paid extra to get the room with Sea view which is great! Cool and chick Hotel... I like it!  Staffs are always friendly and obliging.
Seem like this Hotel always on the go to improve further. Cafe floor is under renovation for now, heard from staffs that would be ready by early August. The dining area and live band performance is located on the Mezz (just upstair of the cafe floor), great move with fantastic view of the sea. 
Take the tuk tuk only THB 10, and venture at night to Walking Street which is just about 10 minutes down the beach road from this Hotel. Again, had a wonderful time!

Highly recommended. The swimming pool and water bar were good. Game holders were nice. Waitresses in the buffet restaurant were nice too and very helpful. Fantastic barbeque buffet dinner was so attractive and of high value. Rooms were clean but the shower had some little problems but generally it was fairly good.

super excellent service, all of the staff greet you always with great smile and energy and ready to help for matter even sometimes put extra efforts to fullfil guest wishes
will definitely stay here again.

was there to attend my best friend wedding :) cool place...always love this old house of rock,,room was clean and tidy, the staff are amazingly friendly, ..the food on saturday night buffet dinner were great..the foam party was

While the whole staff was nice, the 'entertainment' staff at the swimming pool made all the difference. Being a 'beach person' myself, they made me stay at the swimming pool with the kids all the time - and had lots of fun doing it!
The Italian restaurant is very good (Pizza!) and so is the quality of the WI-FI. Room was great!

Excellent location to Terminal 21, Central Festival and even walk to the beach.
Great restaurants especially Hard Rock Cafe. My 7-yr boy love the music too :)
Wonderful charcoal BBQ dinner buffet with good price.
Amazing pizza at poolside and already miss the family splash party

full facilities with excellent staff ! very beautiful  swimming pool with activites. My kids spend a whole day in the pool . The buffet breakfast is amazing , there are variety of food. The location is in city center and easy to go out . I like the smile of the staff and this is not  our first time here and we definitely will come again.

There is nowhere in the world i would rather be than in the pool on a friday afternoon at the HRHP drinking cocktails made by one of the boys in the shack, rocking out to the band!
5 times now we have stayed at this hotel and it never fails to amaze the quality of service. From the moment you check-in, to the time you leave the staff are just awesome. One disappointment was there was no trampoline or inflatable slide in the pool. But thats okay, i had my giant thong,  which the pool staff kindly reminded me that footwear was not permitted in the pool! hehe
I cant wait to get back there next year again and see the rooms looking abit fresher as that is the only thing that lets this great place down.

I live just over an hour away. I saw a good price on Booking (probably because of the coup) so I thought I would try out the Hard Rock Hotel. 
The room was fine. Nice balcony, comfortable bed, good aircon and a modern design. On the balcony I see the outside of the hotel could do with a coat of paint.
Check in was fine, bags delivered to room. After having a quick shower we went exploring to find nobody at the pool. It was like a ghost town. We decided to go for a walk along the beach front and to a few bars in soi 7 and 8. To my surprise there were lots of people in Pattaya. 
After some drinking we went back to the hotel for a meal. Again the restaraunt very quiet. The food and service was good. Band OK. Heading back to our room it was still like a ghost town.
Check out fine with no problems. Not sure if I would come here again. It was OK. I have no complaints. Probably not.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Perfect hotel for family vacation, stayed in family suite,  and the executive upgrade is worth every penny,  nice and comfortable rooms and beds, and amazing  views over pattaya bay. Will be back in the future!

good - comfortable bed, clean room, nice view and variety activity is very funny. Hardrock hotel is best hotel in pattaya. 
location also excellent. near the central fastival. but pool towel corner is fast cloes.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: My cousin and I stayed in thie hotel for two days in May, and we both love it!!!!!!  The food in the restaurant is pretty good and offeres large variety.  Especially love the fruits for it's freshness and taste!!  We spend an afternoon by the pool, it was an awesome experience.  We then took a nap in our room.  Room was comfortable.  It wasn't huge but it's pretty good size for a hotel room in Asia.  Love the atmosphere of the room, it acutually gave us an at home feeling.  We had a good time at the balcony as well.  Location was awesome, staff are friendly!  The washroom on the main floor features an interesting sign.  Cross out a picture of a woman for the male washroom, abd vice versa!  Hard Rock Rocks!!!!!

Is a nice place to stay. Have a lot of activity at hark rock hotel such as bubble party. Strongly recommended. Will be back again on my next trip. Somemore hark rock cafe facing the long beach street.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: not bad people were nice and polite. They work the best they could do. The food was tasty also. The price was acceptable. The only thing that I think it can do better was water temperature in the bathroom.

The hotel certainly caters for families with a lot of activities going on. Stayed on the club level which is worth the extra open from 6am to 10pm ,and kids are welcome! The hotel location couldn't be better with easy access to bars, restaurants and Walking Street using local transportation (or walk)

I had booked 5 rooms with the hotel three nights first night was fine but on the 2 day firstly the house keeping staff does wait for your reply they just opened the door in morning then when they clean they forget to put water 3rd day again they don't clean the room when I ask they say there was a DO NOT DISTURB on my door so no cleaning but then how room service enter my room & put me a surprise birthday cake when I tell duty officer she say WHAT SHOULD I DO ? very easily very casual attitude so pls guys decide before booking

I have stayed at the Hard Rock many times so it will coke as no surprise that I wanted to stay again.
The staff are always very happy to see me and I am treated with respect by everyone.
I will be staying again in the future

Booked 2 deluxe sea facing rooms for a 3-night stay. Hotel lobby was spacious and check-in very prompt. The rooms were side to side with very good sea view indeed. Particularly loved the walk-in wardrobe where the safe was located. The bathroom was spacious. Each of the twin beds was a junior queen which sleeps an adult and a child comfortably. Breakfast at Starz cafe was adequate and up to standard but would be happier if they could include hashbrowns, wedges or french fries for kids. The pool was fantastic and we certainly had a lot of fun there!

I don't really like to write reviews but as i read the reviews below by others, notice that some of them are complaining and i don't know why. Below are my experience i had with the hotel.
Firstly, i arrived to the hotel after 6 hours ride from Malaysia to Bangkok and to Pattaya. Before check in the take two cups of cocktail for me & my fiance. After check in, we went in the room and we're loving it. Well designed, comfortable & multi featured tv. Right after taking shower, we went down to the lobby to enquire some questions about the places to visit from the receptionist. They are very helpful, besides providing the informations and make reservation for us, they also arrange transportation for us to go around the places we want to visit. Each and everytime i walk in and out the lobby, if i have anything carrying on my hand, they sure will offer to help me take it.
Later in the evening, we had our dinner in the Hard Rock Cafe and i can say that the food was excellent! Each guest/table will have their own Server/Waiter and the one served us was providing very good service. Each food then we're eating, he will ask how's the taste? do we like it?
The next day i went to the Rock Spa in the hotel. Although it was just an hour spa but i fell very relaxing. Me & my fiance went to the Hard Rock shop below the Hard Rock Cafe to buy some of the Hard Rock t-shirts too. Some of the reviews complaining the lights in the balcony very ugly. The lights are part of the Hotel design. I personally don't feel that its disturbing or making me feel uncomfortable. 
Overall, this hotel is a great place to stay. In future, if i'm coming to pattaya, i will definitely consider this hotel again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
We visited as a family in July 2019 and had a great time. 
Disabled friendly, so made life easier for my father. 
Amazing swimming pool with a separate area for kids. 
Easy access to the beach and a short tuk tuk ride to Walking Street. 
Would certainly recommend!

clean room and good service
staff's quick and efficient response
located at the centre of Pattaya, very close to shopping malls and restaurants
good staff who are very active to offer help
reasonable room fee
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Excellent staff with very good service and attitude. Rooms are average, quiet and cost over the average for the area. The hotels location is perfect with short distance to the beach area and most of the shopping areas in walking distance.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
we just come to Pattaya to party, never even thought of relaxing in this city. its always hit and run and back to Bangkok. well now I have a relaxing place to hide in this hectic atmosphere. the beds super comfy and the room is large. didn't care much for the bathroom but acceptable. they furnish each room with a CD player so its a good idea to bring some. the radio I found only two stations both in Thai.
 we never ate here so cant comment there. grabbed lunch at Central Festival (mall) everyday and is a 7 minute walk or jump on the baht bus if its too hot or raining for 10 baht. they also furnish two umbrellas in the closet which is good for rain or sun. we opted for the ocean view, good idea about 25 to 30$ more.
 the pool is large a bit shallow throughout with activities going on here and there. basketball, kids inside blow up balls running on water and the staff entertain with other tricks, toys and games. the hotel is kid friendly with kid zones and we saw a magic show. also adult friendly with the Hard Rock Cafe,
 I don't know what more to add just I was so relaxed in my room and lounging at the pool getting beers delivered that I wanted to give them the excellent rating. right now its to hot for a return visit so maybe again in the winter season. my rate was probably higher booking on a site that takes Discover card. 130$ a night, fair for our relaxing stay. comes with breakfast but slept right through them. oh yeah if you stay on a Saturday the pool turns into a foam party.

Being based out of Bangkok I come to Pattaya quite frequently for work. I have tried a few different hotels but after staying at the Hard Rock Hotel, I will look no further. Apart from being an awesome night spot with live music, great food and atmosphere. They also have some of the nicest rooms and professional staff I’ve come across. The entire hotel is set up in a way to cater for any mood you might be feeling and staff: Sofia, Noon, Tong & GM Totti go out of their way to make sure your every request is accommodated. 
10/10 would recommend! The Brancott Estate Sauvignon Blanc by the pool was also a nice touch.

Well what can I say about the staff Absolutely  The most friendliest staff I’ve ever  experienced in my times of traveling.  I’ve been to Paris London Rome New York Athens ect ect. I’ve stayed in five star hotels and  resorts  no one in all my travels have ever treated us as in my wife Lina and myself so special like the staff at the hard rock. Special thank you to Eve Sally Tat Gina and Natasha  you were all that 1% above everyone else.  Rooms are cleaned to our expectations every single day and we were there for 25 nights. We spent most of our afternoons in that magnificent swimming pool.  Centrally located  were able to travel to any destination in a short amount of time. Breakfast in the morning was amazing.  The only fault was that the Aircon in the gym room was not running properly and never got fixed from the year before that I stayed. So hopefully I’m sending out a message please get it fixed LOL Because I’m coming back there for 30 days.  To all the staff at hard rock you rock and you are all stars love you heaps.💯🙏❤️ See you all in 2020.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
A with/without kids hotel.   Full of rock and roll memrobilia.  Great cafés.  Bands. Come see the decor
Entertainment club in the day for kids.  We didn't have any kids with us and never saw any
Pool is half swimming and half sand, rock and water. Fab.    With large rings or bananas to hire
Fun fun fun.     Saturday night was a children followed later with a Saturday night adult foam party.
If this isn't enough your right on the beach. just cross a small road with your pool towels. Sea/sand Devine,  
As you can tell this was a great central hotel and we very much enjoyed our stay 
Staff are very helpful and  nothing is too much.  A must if going to Pattaya. We certainly will go back. Hopefully again soon.  LOVED IT ALL!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The lead name was incorrect on the booking the birthday cake for my daughter was a nice touch but on the birthday card they put the incorrect name even after several emails confirming the correct name

perfect hotel to stay in for youngsters, comfortable beds in the room and is just opposite the beach on the beach road itself , the first and the most beautiful view from the hotel window was that of the beach and the water sports
the restaurant had excellent food and a very nice decor and was full of lively people and the music was amazing 
nice courteous staff the hotel had exits on the beach road as well as the 2 nd road which was very convenient as well and the proximity from all most all tourist attractions make this the perfect place to stay
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I've always wanted to stay here after many visits to pattaya,  so I was looking forward to this stay, our room was comfortable and tidy, however the hotels free wifi was the worst I've experienced so far on this tour of thailand  !..the pool area was spacious and well laid out, our breakfast was like trying to eat in a busy railway station during rush hour  !...., very pleasant staff but very poor wifi  !
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Keep up the good work. The hotel is excellent and the service was great. Only one suggestion - You take a security deposit on the credit card during check in. The refund of the security deposit takes 2 weeks which is too long a period. The refund needs to be done immediately during check out.

So how much ever I talk about this hotel will be less. This property stands true to the feel and vibe of being A Hard Rock Hotel. 
The hotel has everything to offer. As you enter the hotel you can feel the liveliness of Hard Rock. The staff at the Reception and elsewhere is friendly and welcoming. The lobby is quite like a disco cafe. 
The rooms are big with super nice decor inspired by the Hard Rock culture. My personal favourite in the room was the music system playing nice retro music. 
the view from my room was also nice. 
The bathroom are done in black finish that eventually became my second favourite.
The hotel has a super big summing pool with two sections. One for adults and one for slides and kids that has sand at the bottom that gives you a feel of being at a beach. The Spa facility at the hotel is more than I expected. You have Sauna, Spa, big Shower area, indoor pool, steam and much more. 
Talking about the pricing, I feel that the kind of facilities the hotel is proving against what its charging, is really nothing.
The breakfast at the hotel is also grand. 
In all, the hotel is by far my best stay in Pattaya. And I recommend my 50000+ readers to choose this hotel over any other hotel in Pattaya.

Had a good experience. The staff were really friendly and the pool was great, especially if you have kids. The rooms and the hotel itself are showing their age. The breakfast was just OK. We got a good deal but not sure I'd go back at regular prices.

Hotel: Checked in the hotel on the 6th August. Was kinda pissed that i have reserve a seaview room and upon reaching there, was informed there was no sea view room available. Was offered the newly renovated room on the 4th floor. Room is nice and cosy and big. There are three problem in the room which is the scupper when u come out of the toilet, if you dont take notice of it, you gonna knock your toes onto it and that happens twice two my gf. The hot water was horrible. When we turn it on, the water flows more a few seconds cold and burning hot(burning your skin) alternatve until you completely using the shower.Finally, the toilet bowl and basin wasnt clean when we checkin. If Hard rock hotel could focus on the following, i would say its thumb up. The receptionist , security guard and all are polite. Check-in and checkout was fast and efficient.
Live band & Restaurant: Food prices are reasonable and the ambience is nice. The bands is good. Unfortunately when the lady singer sang, her voice was drown by the pianon and guitar playing. Hence on and off you can hear her sing which she has a good voice.
Foam party: Foam Party was good and lots of fun.
Breakfast: Breakfast was good with lots of varieties. Really enjoying it. The downside is that the waiter/waitress was not fast enough to clear the table. Hence you can see many plates with no customers lying on the table.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The service here was so good and the staff so friendly and so helpful. I enjoyed being at this place with my wife and I recommend it in pattaya i will defiantly come again
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I really like to stay at Hard rock cafe. There are many activity and all staff is very good. The food is good too. I like the location. I would like to recommend to every body. For si gle,couple ora family as well.

We liked our stay at the Hard Rock Hotel! The location is fantastic, the room was great and the staff ("band-members") were really helpful and friendly. There is a renovation going on at the moment but honestly, we didn't hear a thing! Breakfast was also good, just a bit crowded. Most of the guests are teenagers, but even "old" people like us (34+40) enjoyed our stay at this hotel!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Very nice staff. Good location. It's close to the beach, walking street and shopping mall. It's good choice for you to stay with kids. 7-eleven and massage shop are surrounding. I will come again for next time.

Overall a great return visit seeing that small issues from previous visits have been or are in process to be solved. Staff was super friendly as always. Enjoyed again the great location at beach road to get easy access to Pattaya shopping and entertainment.

The hotel staff are friendly, they are well-trained. Please keep up a good hospitality & services. I love the swimming pool, they have kids zone and kinda of beach area. The food is fine, cheese cake is awesome! Room is small but clean and comfortable.

HRH is located in the middle of he bustling heart of Pattaya Beach! It is just a walk to Hilton and Siam @ Siam who offer nice rooftop bars. Nightlife is happening also just around the corner. And of course HRC has its own Life Bands and events!

This will be our 5th stay at Hard Rock Pattaya in the last couple of years and it's like a home away from home. The hotel is excellent for kids, has great food and the staff is very prompt and friendly.

I live in Bangkok, and sometimes like to get away to Pattaya for a day or two. This hotel is one of my favourites, and is my number one for location and amenities. I like it better than the five star Dusit Thani just up the road. 
The staff are excellent, the location is as good as it gets, the pool is nice, the gym is well equipped and maintained. The rooms are comfortable and well equipped. Really, this is a great four star hotel, and a better choice than some of the five star options.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Excellent Hotel at Right place and very close to Walking street which is the Happening street for night life at pattaya. Rooms were quite good and well maintained. They provide Music systems for all rooms to keep you rocking.
Will come back again if i visit Pattaya again. Prices are reasonably good.

Well, this hotel is my all time favourites.
Good service, clean room & great location.
Foam party is nice, and able to get the new collection of the T shirt as i always do.
Should provide more smoking rooms because i am a heavy smoker & its too troublesome to go up and down for smoking. 
Will come back again soon.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
My partner and I stayed at the Hard Rock for 5 nights during our stay in Pattaya and I must say that I cannot recommend this property highly enough. We stayed in the King Suite and were treated like real royalty, from an immaculate room to fruit platters and access to the King Club which boasts amazing complimentary cocktails, food platters and sweets. 
The staff are so lovely and friendly, always smiling and saying hello and telling us to have a "rocking day". The highlight of our trip was meeting "Pop", who works in the pool area. He was a tonne of fun and my partner and him would play pool basketball every afternoon. He was wonderful, always recommending great places for us to visit and enjoy.
I cannot rate the Hard Rock highly enough, worth every penny!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Great location and perfect place for familys with active kids. The staff is very helpful and the guys working with the pool activities are super !
Unfortenately was our room too close the renovation areas which caused a lot of noice in the afternoons.

About average. We complained about the carpet in the room it had a big stain. Straff Said they would look into it but never 
did. Felt like the straff did not care and just Said it like that in all rooms.

Super clean, fantastic food, luxury beds and furnishings, uber massive clean pool, professional friendly and helpful staff, amazing sauna and steam room facility. Breakfast buffet is huge, yet quality offerings.

Great Location and perfect for families and young kids. Everything is within the hotel for a fun stay however it is minutes away from the shopping centers and the  beach is just across the road.Plenty of restaurants nearby if you want a change from the hotel.

Every time I stay at a Hard Rock Hotel it has been consistently a good experience. The amenities and customer service are top notch. The only gripe I have about this particular hotel was the room sizes were not befitting for my 6'2" size. In particular, the fixed shower head meant that I had to crouch while showering. Other then that it was a great stay - awesome food and pool. Keep in mind this is a family orientated hotel so there will be kids running around.

I have stayed in many hotels in Thailand over 12 years from 1 star to 5 stars. The problem with a lot of hotels in Thailand are down to staff I have found overall my experiences. The staff make the holiday and this hotel the staff was Amazing, Ann and the rest of the Girls in the Kings club Lounge really made our Holiday they was so good we me and my family, I would like to thank them so much! and also the life Guards who were all very well spoken and very helpful. Every Staff in this hotel was beyond my expectations. We stayed in the family suite sea view the room it was amazing just the room for a family. This hotel I would recommend to everyone. I can't wait to stay again. Thanks again for making our holiday!

this hotel has very good service staffs, staying has a very comfortable feeling.  food had been improve in some way.  and new renovate pool had split function which is good but entry to the pool a bit confusing and difficult to walk down to the water..
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Cannot fault the rooms, service, cleanliness, pool, breakfast, everything great. One disapointment though, the credit card deposit required at check in (fair enough) but was told would take 2/3 weeks to restore to my account! This is quite simply UNACCEPTABLE AND UNNECESSARY! Cheap shot Hard Rock!!

Staff professional and friendly. A bit inconvenient as some of the facilities requires extra cost. Still, we had lots of fun there in general. The Saturday foam party is fun for kids. The lobby showcases lots of personal stuff from famous rock stars, worth a close check.
