this is my 4th stay at Hardrock Pattaya. Previous experiences were excited, child friendly.
1st time I tried your tennis court, unbelievably disappointment - the floor were broken, bushes growing. Very badly maintained.
Breakfast buffet - much less varieties than my last stay.
Great dinner buffet especially sea food. cheese cake is very delicious. Near the beach. Swimming pool is very beautiful. Party foam is very fun. But noisy if u stay the lower zone.

All of my group had a wonderful time and the children did not want to leave. Our group of 24 people all enjoyed our meals at the Hard Rock Café. It was a very memorable stay and look forward to coming back.

we stayed at this hotel for 4 days and it was an excellent stay. this was our third visit to pattaya but a first stay in this hotel. 
the check in process was smooth, hardly 3 mins and we were guided to our room which was exactly we had asked for- a sea facing with balcony. 
the hotel staff was polite and always smiling. the property was in a very good location right in front of the beach, a large swimming pool with bar etc... A big restaurant and a pizzeria..  though not much options for us as we are pure vegetarians. 
the room was spacious, very clean.  we had some issues with the air conditioning system and was resolved within minutes. 
Overall a very good stay, would definitely come back.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The best facility of the hotel is the swimming pool. It is good for kids and adults. The bathroom in the room which we stayed was too small. It did not has a bath tub and door.The gym is ok but would be much better if it starts earlier.

Hope wifi of hard rock could  automatic connect to mobile is perfect after check in, always check the logon information is not very convience for customer before connect network. and the wifi will be expired according to the check out time.

Location! Location! Location!
Great location to explore Pattaya. Easy to access the beach road and second road. 
I heard the rooms were renovated. So clean and convenient.
Nice and big pools, so it seems to be a good choice with children, but it could be noisy if you want to be relaxed without kids.     
On Saturday night, it was very noisy with music from the bubble party at pool. It was very noisy, but at the same time, very fun as it's in the middle of Pattaya. 
Overall I was happy to stay at Hardrock Hotel.

I havent seen such a lively atmosphere in any of resorts or hotel i have been till now...
right u step you inside property kind of background music start goings giving awesome feeling..
hotel has everything for activities for kids.. adults families.. big pool, artificial sand pool...
beach just infront of hotel crossing a road...amazing interiors, reception .....and everything
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Every team member is on a mission to make sure the guests are well taken care of.
From friendly greetings to remembering your breakfast preferences, all work seamlessly for a perfect stay. 
Keep up the good work!

I have stayed at Hard Rock Pattaya many times, I think 28 and always find the hotel excellent in all respects. Location, cleanliness, service with friendly-helpful staff throughout the entire complex. Always
enjoy my stay.

I will come again with my family because the hotel have great swimming pool and playing area and many places for set around the pool with great menu from restaurant and drinks with very good service from staff

now our third time back here, and even though its quite kid friendly, we keep coming back even without any kids!
renovations look complete and yes the prices have gone up and we managed to get a good price for booking early,
service is rock!! admittedly, poolside food prices and drink prices are too expensive to my liking,
but other then that, the breakfast was so much better then last time,
thank you hard rock, we will be back again

Hi Jorge General Manager of the Hotel,
I know the hotel is under renovation, earlier I have make an reservation to stay at the King Club Seaview room which entitled for the access to the King club lounge and complimentary for the sunset bites and drinks and 2 buffet breakfast for 2, however I realised the  Pattaya Hotel website no longer have this type of room King Club sea view,  may I know my booking still valid or what is the room type replaced the King Club Seaview Room? I have send an email to reservation team to check for my booking but no response. Appreciate you can help to check with reservation team and reply me enquires ASAP.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I am very satisfied with the Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya...  The pool is fantastic... I will come back again for the staying but only for the rooms as The breakfast isnt suit me... You may just cross the road to reach for the beach... Very convenience...
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Had an interesting time at the Hard Rock in Pattaya due to the Thailand military coup that recently occurred.
I had a kings club room and that was handy for using the kings club lounge for evening drinks and canapés.  The room itself was clean and spacious.
I made full use of the pool and there are constant staff who are present who will not hesitate to place that food or drink order for you.
Location within Pattaya is ideal.  Just use the baht bus to get around the city.

All were good exept shower. Coz I should adjust hot water of the desired temperature.
I used for business trip. I used pool for my refresh. The pool was clean, safe, good temperature.
In the morning, I eat breakfast, that also good.

I just stayed at the Hard Rock this week with my family. We were disappointed to find the hotel in the middle of a year plus major renovation program affecting the whole hotel and not just a "minor disturbance to the club and deluxe rooms" as travelocity's description claims. The first morning we experience jack hammers drilling from 10 in the morning until close to 6 at night, the staff dealt with us very well, particularly Ralph, who told us that all travel agents had been advised of the year long renovation affecting all of the hotel. It's right in the middle of the pattaya beach road, has a great pool and activities, is different and good for families, but be advised that this area of pattaya is full of cheap bars and hookers, my teenage kids commented on the number of old European guys with Thai girls half their age they saw... I would choose somewhere like the Pullman for a similar price but a bit further away from the bedlam !

For £80 a night a had a sea view, excellent breakfast, rest facilities, loads of chill out areas in the day after a big night out. 
Only had a one night stay as passing through after 2 weeks of business was perfect to requirements.didnr have time to check out pool and gym but looked great also from what I saw. Will e back next month and hopefully get the same room for the same deal.
Will

I want to share my experience of conducting Party at hard Rock Hotel Pattaya. mmmm... no words to express the happy when i first visit the location . They are the true professional who understand your wish list well and performed accordingly with in your budget. They left no stone unturn. Very cooperating and friendly staff . Everything is planned and executed as desired. 
Thank you Hard Rock team :)

Stayed here before and enjoyed it.  Good location.  Great staff.  Super friendly !   More choices for beer this time as well !  Not too crowded so able to hang at the pool this trip. We’ll certainly be back   Thanks
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I always bring my family members to spend my holidays at here because we can stay all day and night with activities in the hotel, no need to go anywhere else. Spa for my wife. Small pool for my kid and big pool for myself. It is such a truly vacation.

Large Room, Comport Bed, Unbelivable View, Nice staff, Best Location
Large, Cleam and funny Pool,
Even the reasonable price
So i think the Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya is the Best in the pattaya
I recommand the Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya.

Overall, a very good experience. Guards were helpful in helping us find a parking. Bell gentlemen were very efficient. Room was booked on 8th but replaced on 4th floor with one greatest view. Promise to get us on 8th floor when we return.Mattress is better than Holiday Inn. Restaurant services shine despite food is b/w 3-4stars. Pool is the star here. Went to HR Cafe on Buddhist's Lent Day a bit quiet but it was a good exp. Checking out with Manager K.A+ was smooth& touching. Bathroom could improve its safety and hygiene (too damp)! Will return. We stayed in Pattaya for 2-day Sattaheep trip.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Just back from the Hard Rock - third visit.Hotel is now finished major refurb and is terrific.
New dinning room is top class and very functional.
It was nice to see familar faces from previous visits and special thanks to Anne - Guest Service Manager and Adam Restaurant Manager.
As always Hard Rock Pattaya made our 10 day stay especially enjoyable and the refurbished hotel is terrific.
Thanks.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Professional service and arrangement for the seminar. The Frame A Hall is the suitable location for the variety event and adaptable. All functions service integration have accomplishment and excellent achievement. Thank you for warmly support Aibel (Thailand) Ltd

Hard Rock Hotel is and should be the only choice in Pattaya! I have been going to Pattaya since the 90's when there was nothing much in Pattaya and now when it is thickly populated, there is a huge choice of Hotels. Amongst them all I recommend Hard Rock because of various reasons. This Hotel is strategically located, main entrance is from the 2nd road and back entrance is from the beach road. You step out from beach road and the bus stop is right there. You can get Baht buses from there or grab a cab if you wish. But everything is at a walking distance so walking is highly recommended. Central Festival is hardly half a km away, Central Marina is less than a km away, Mike shopping plaza is about 1.2 km away. Massage Centers are at every nook and corner. You can get speed boats from across the road.Inside the Hotel is a paradise for children and adults both. I was travelling with my husband and kids. There are so many activities through out the day that you would not even want to step out! Their pool is the best in Pattaya with a mini waterpark and slides as well. My children spent 4 hours on an average in the pool which is too much! But you can imagine that how great it would be for kids to stay in the pool for so long. Each member of Hard Rock staff is extremely courteous and friendly. You just feel at home over there. Its like a big huge family. I go there every year and each year number of days keep on increasing. Comfort at its best! Vacations are all about fun and comfort. And our vacation can never be complete without Hard Rock. Its a highly recommended choice in Pattaya!

The Service is very excellent and great, Room is clean and big, environment is so nice.
Convenience and a lot of shopping mall which make the trip is perfect and completed. 
will come to visit this hotel if there is any chance.

There is a a nice pool for children who can slide and swim on the same floor.   The dishes at buffet breakfast would be refilled even after nine a.m.  Many funny activities are arranged for kids, e.g. foam party, toy duck hunting, climbing ...

A few hours drive from bangkok, the hotel quite far from the shuttle transport from Bangkok to pataya. You do need walk a bit from main road to lobby entrance unless if you get a rent car from bangkok. And some how a bit confusion, however a little hassle it is pay off after you reach the room. The room its quite big for your self, choose the view over the sea. They have 2 swiming pools, bar, cafe and restaurant. Breakfast also serve variety of foods to choose.

I enjoyed the stay at this hotel. The room design and bed was comfortable. The location was very close to the beach and nearby to a shopping mall Central Festival Pattaya. The staff was very helpful and friendly as well. I did not have the chance to sample the buffet breakfast as my booking was not included the breakfast and i am not able to comment on it.
Overall an enjoyable stay at the hard rock hotel.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The pool is great, the food was nice but there are too many extra charges for things that should be free. You charge for using floats in the pool, for rock climbing, to take part in pool zorbing, the kids club room. As a family hotel these things should be included. The room charge is high compared to other hotels and these extra charges especially when you have 8 children in your group really add up the costs. Oh and we saw two rats in the pizza area during our 5 night stay hence the cleanliness score.

Great hotel great food great staff. Beautiful pool .. Girl friendly.. the food was delicious. The breakfast buffet was second to none.. Beautiful view of the bay... To get on the 10th floor or 9th floor

Stayed in this hotel a couple times real trendy place to stay good fun, good security great pools cafe like any other but good booze and food great atmosphere and music as always it's buzzing with action very popular

no water, the first time I called the recepetion to ask for water. the second time, I leave message to ask for water to house keeping, but still no water. and no slippers, no face towels. why, I pay the tip already.

My Experience at the Hardrock Hotel pattaya was fantastic.The Room was Sea facing and the view was gorgeous.I Love the music theme-Throw pillows with genres of music printed on them.Beds were super comfortable.The lounge area and hall of fame area were spectacular.The Display of Memorabilia belonging to various music Icons, the collectibles were worth visiting.The breakfast buffet was enormous,it had huge variety to choose from ranging from traditional Thai/Oriental cuisine as well as the Famous English Breakfast.The Beach Foam Party from the night before[saturday] was exhilarating and exhausting.Overall had a brilliant stay.

Every thing is good food, Room and overall of Hotel because Hotel nearly Beach and Market and service customer very good. Swimming pool and Breakfast., We can choice more food and good test for food. and room very clean.

Excellent facilities. Great staff. One of the best hotels I've stayed anywhere! The weekly pool parties are fantastic. Only made it to breakfast a couple of times during my stay but that was great too. Seriously no complaints from me at all. Pricey but you get what you pay for.

I love the environment of all the requirements and services!
They are all kinds and nice.
I could not use the pool due to the personal issue, but it looks really good.
Even I went to Bangkok and stay the hotel, I would like to recommend Hardrock Hotel definetely!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Every thing is excellent location is too good very near to walking street and night market.
Breakfast is remarkable as we have very short stay but very lively hotel pool is spacious staff is very humble :)

I think in one of the best hotels i've stayed in with friends; The staff was so courteous and helpful; Reached at 7.30 am in the morning and even then the staff arranged for a room to rest till 12.00 noon before checking us in our room;
I think food is one of the best in across Pattaya;

hotel service and facility is more than excellent for us.
very nice and helpful staff - they all kept smiling talking to every gust.
Bed is very cozy and the room is very clearn
breakfast is great and delicious

Service very poor when check in and they gv disable room (smelly). Most of the staff not friendly especially  at front desk. No information shared to us as guest on the facilities there during our stay. All needs money even we stay there as guest.

Spent a weekend here in June 2013. Booked a deluxe sea facing room. Whilst the balcony was small the room itself was well appointed with a very comfortable bed. Large shower also.
Whilst the breakfast was ok the food in the Diner restaurant for lunch was very good. Staff friendly and efficient.
If I got a good deal again I would certainly have a repeat stay.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Stayed here before... the thing that swung me to staying again was their beds... they are awesome! Rest of the hotel is pretty good too. Breakfast (although noisy) have a huge variety of dishes to choose from (their Egg Bar needs a bit of work though). Food is very good overall, although food and beverage pricing is very much at the premium end for Thailand.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
HARD ROCK HOTEL PATTAYA the ideal for a holiday. Let's live together here with close friends or your family. And don't forget to have a private time to absorb the feeling and good impression and bring it back to your home. 
I’m impressed by the definition of the word “Rock Never Die” is fun good and happy. HARD ROCK standards are very high in terms of quality and service. When we meet the staff, they always say hi with my name, It’s greetings, Say good night, etc. I think it’s a little detail, hard to create, but they’s can, and it's here to create the spirit of being a service. No matter which department you are in, you can always find a good solution. It is like the hostess who takes care of guests when they arrive at the home. And don’t forget to release a feeling joy with HARD ROCK HOTEL PATTAYA.

We arrived at this hotel on the back of a 2 hr internal flight and 2 1/4 hrs drive from Bangkok. Wearily we entered the lobby and it was there that everything changed. Our teenage children whooped with delight at the coolness of this hotel from,the lobby up. Music memorabilia adorned every part of this hotel from gigantic guitars to murals of rock bands from the past.  
This hotel is definitely designed for families of all ages and as such it ticks all the boxes.
Rooms: these were average could have been a bit cleaner. Lack of wardrobe and drawers. Fine if your stay is a couple of nights, poor if your staying longer. Where they score is the tech in the room , so you get a dedicated music channel to choose from and a huge speaker system to plug your iPod etc in. The tv has a movie channel and a few other free channels to amuse yourself with . If you want current films then they are on a pay per view system. 
Breakfast: Amazing choice.. Something for all nationalities. 
The pool area is simply amazing. Cabanas to rent. One side is designed like a beach which winds into the swimming pool. Games such as water aerobics/ polo/ basketball. are arranged with the guests throughout the day. My kidz thoroughly enjoyed this. Little boats, rock climbing wall, and a teen club with x box and table tennis etc were available for a daily supplement. 
Whilst sunbathing staff would continually ask if they could fetch us a drink or something to eat. This was a nice touch as they were'nt intrusive. Cocktails were good. 
All in all would definitely come again. Family friendly hotel with a good vibe.

HadRock is great place for Holiday 
Sea-Beach View rooms are Great 
Poole id very well maintained 
Kids pool is also great fun for kids
staff is very helpful and always smiling 
Pool party on Saturdays
Food is excellent

The hotel was perfect for our kind, young people. Great staff, and the hotel itself is very good with a lot to do. Nice swimming pool with a lot of sun beds. The breakfast was above average. Good rock music all over the hotel, this was very relaxing. At the end of the main walking street, but very relaxing to walk from the hotel and down the main road. If you don't like to walk there are plenty of busses that passes the hotel. 20bath for a ride down the road. Recommend this hotel for anyone that is going to visit Pattaya!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Great hotel been before, 2nd time at the hotel can only fault it in two ways, my overhead shower was not working, also I find that the deposit is very high  £156 which you pay right Away at check in, which I don't have a problem with, but you have to wait 15 days roll receive it back on your card if good enough to take right away should give back right away as nothing is damaged etc... So this is why I would give 9/10 ....but great hotel and faculties......
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Conveniently located within 5 min walking distance to Pattaya beach walk, hard rock hotel is the place to be if you like to stay up late! You can take your time to explore the whole beach walk and grab food for supper from anywhere along the beach walk. 
In the afternoons it's best to lay around the poolside and also enjoy the sauna / steam room and cold plunge facilities at Hard rock hotel. However, floats are on a rental basis. 
The Rooms are very spacious and comfortable! What I loved most about was the personal greeting on the TV! "Hello, xxx" plus the cute red pillows with "PUNK" and "TECHNO" on it! Did you know you can also call room service for a guitar to be sent up to your room for a lil jammin' session? Cool huh! 
Ohhh and did I mention that the Hard rock hotel staff were very polite and helpful? Everyone greets you with a smile and greeting wherever you are! :) 
Breakfast spread was adequate and note that it ends at 1030am! Ps: The waffles and pancakes were delicious!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Room is clean and spacious for family.  8 minutes walk to Central Festival for shopping and dining.  Good massage and bowling nearby.  Kids had great fun at the pool but suggest that the floaties can be offered for free.

The friendly service and location is superb, easy access to nearby restaurants, mall, money exchange. Breakfast menu and food quality can be improved (please note that child above 4 years old has to pay 175baht for breakfast even if you book for room with breakfast).

Every vacation, my family and I have chosen to Hard Rock Hotel, this hotel has lived five times domestic natural old hotel room number, but I'm a little better than a sense of belonging in the class room balcony view afar, you could see the entire ballet Habitat color at Pattaya Bay, moderate hotel's location, most appreciated the hotel swimming pool, facilities are suitable for children to play, very good pool bar juice drink, warm smile and attentive staff, happy happy every time, the next vacation again come to this hotel.

This is my 3rd visit this property during past 9 months.  We love Family Type-of-room.
Party Foam on Sat seemed so fun for our kids.
Breakfast was so tasty and we could ask for hot chocolate our kids.
Large swimming pool, Kid's club (small fee), bargain dinner buffet (free for kid)
Walking area to Big C, Central Festival Beach, Bowling, Alcazar, Tiffany, Top Supermarket, Subway, McDonald, 7-11, etc
Return for sure.

it is trouble for me to be asked to check in after 2p.m
lock of room door is not good,try mang times to open the door
no blanket for me after swimming
romm is a little small  
my room is of no view
what else is ok

Very friendly staff. Very stylish, eccentric, boutique hotel. Completely what you'd expect from Pattaya's instalment of the Hard Rock Hotel.
The room service is fast, reasonably priced and scrumptious. Portions are generous and drinks are inexpensive.
The rooms themselves are spacious, bathroom is excellent and beds are comfortable.
The pool is to die for - definitely one of a kind within Pattaya. The pool itself is half pool, half beach. There is a whole section covered in sand and bungalows, a volleyball net, and parties at night.
Would not recommend this as a business hotel as the pricing is a little higher than you'd like to spend, though I would definitely recommend this to Couples and Families.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Really enjoyed our stay ! Great beds and rooms were great. Staff were good and enjoyed all the facilities . Location was good and easy to walk to the beach and great places to eat local food around the corner.

I just stayed here for a week. When i arrived there was no one to help me with my bags and there was a long line for check in. I must have waited around 20mins. Once I checked it it was Ok. The staff at the pool bar were good but the wifi in that area kept dropping every minute which was fustrating. They have no direct line for room service, you need to call the operator and someone from room service will call you back. They messed up my order once. The buffet was average and someone kept following me around, i had to tell them to stop following me. I felt it was a bit overpriced. Ann from reception was helpful. The royalty lounge upstairs didnt have any food one day when i visited it. May return in the future. I had a nice stay I guess

i'm stay 24 june 3night
this hotel is swim, rest, spa, dining
it's the perpect expierience hotel in pattaya
and room is very compotable
so i have good vacation
i want rebooking hardrock pattaya
thank you

The atmosphere of the swimming pool is very good. They have different pool games such as candy games and bingo. There are some other pool activities such as bubble night for kids and free rock climbing lesson. The life guards and waiters at the pool are very nice.

It was good oppotunity for my children to stay this hottel. They enjoyed kids pool and foam party. But, it was not easy understand for us the price of instruments and activities at the pool.  We want to stay again.

Hardrock Pattaya always makes my vacation perfect. Two years ago, I visited Hardrock Pattaya for the first time. This time I was happy to meet the staffs again. Always smile, always kind, thank you! I will visit again soon. See you next time.

If we can have toothbrush in every room, it will be much helpful. 
The room slipper needs an urgent improvement too. I cannot war those and the quality/comfort is very disappointing. 
Food is very good.

Very good place to stay in Pattaya with a nice view from the a very friendly staff. There is a large swimming pool with activities during the whole day. Not necessary to say that for the hard rock cafe fans it is a must to stay as you can enjoy the bar. Recommend.

Me and my husband have been visitin Hard rock Hotel Pattaya for several times now and will definately come back next year. The hotel staff is the best! Special thanks to Pinky at the towel station, she is always smiley and friendly :) also thanks to the staff at the rock roalty lounge. They made us feel the most welcome. The whole hotel is well maintened and clean.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The rock royalty was great. However when i had a small request to borrow an cable to charge my phone, I was referred from Level 9 to the Level 1. When i got there, the lady (Lucy) at Guest Services without asking me what I wanted, referred me to Reception. When i asked the reception staff (Pawel?), he referred me back to Guest services. It greatly frustrated me. I walked off and got ready to check out.Ann was great though. I was going to gift my brother a stay here instead next month but I told him I might not. The last impression left  a bitter taste.

taveragely it was super stay, but too much aircon in the corridor at floor 9 - cold like Siberia!! I catched the cold !
I liked the swimming pool and also the staff were very nice, the ladys in reception and also very much thanks to Guards at the elevator, they were nice and i felt very safe. They were 2 angels lloking after our safety, thanks

I like the location, the area, the free upgrades of this room. my son like the swimming pool. but only no bubble party during our stay. should be add more to attractive the customer.or maybe add some more facilities for the swimming pool as a water park.

It was our first time at hardrock hotel. there were many activities that we could enjoy at the pool. it was very fun. my kids also had a good time at the kids clubs. they said that the lunch was delicious and had a very fun time. Pinky took good care of the children.Breakfast was also good. Beds and pillows were comfy.The location of the hotel was great.

We were thankfully in Pattaya on a Saturday night. We paid an entry fees of 300 Bhat which included a drink. The moment we stepped inside the party scene was completely different from the rest of Pattaya. 
There was great music, good crowd and most of all, there was a foam pool party. which even had waterfall or rather a FoamFall that happened every couple of minutes..
The music set the mood right for us to jump right in. People in the pool were very amicable and the gentle drizzle was just a cherry on top of the cake. Soaked in the foam for over 2 hours and with our skin all shriveled, we were like kids wanting more candy. No one left the pool until the foam was sucked out of the pool. 
The showers right outside the pool were a blessing.
We highly recommend this place once atleast.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I've been there 2 times and the last time was last year. I went with my family.We like to go there on Songkran Festival. Because there are many activities during the day. And at night there are auction packages that will have prizes inside.We have fun all day. The reason why i like this place the most is they'll have a foam party every Saturday!

Pre arranged transport at the airport booked through the hotel was tricky to find. No one holding a sign with your name on it as you exit the arrivals hall. Had to go searching through the airport to find a A4 size hard rock sign then work out who was the hard rock representative was. Sorted eventually and took off on the one and a half hour drive to the hotel. Car was nice. Driver polite and friendly. Once there, the check in process was quick and smooth. I booked a rock royalty package so was taken to the check in desk on the 9th floor, room was on the 10th. Was a smoking floor which I wasn't aware of when booking (didn't think to specify non smoking) but apart from the ash tray by the lift, you couldn't tell. No over powering smell of smoke in the room or passageway. Room was awesome. Huge bed, big walk in rainfall shower and a view over the sea. Breakfast was in the rock royalty lounge. Made to order or help yourself-delicious. Had a massage at the rock spa - fantastic, didn't want it to end. Buffet dinner at stars was ok. Pizza at the pizzeria was delicious as to was the lunch and cocktail from The Shack. Day spent by the pool in a cabana was a highlight. Staff so friendly and nice it was a shame I had to go home. Already planning my next trip. Wouldn't stay anywhere else.

Good & nice view . Face to the Pattaya beach . All staff are kind and nicely.Smiling and greeting all the time! I enjoy my holiday and staying at this hotel . Swimming staff are nice also , they always prepare some games for us when we are swimming.

The security,Service,room, cleanliness, location an many activities for adult and children are  everything was nice for this trip, but I didn't  like the way that the hotel charged us for entering the pool party.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: First time in Pattaya, but definitely not a stranger of hard rock hospitality. Staff were friendly and able to communicate in various languages. Buffet breakfast were lined up with a huge variety of cuisine, from local Thai to Japanese fare. State of the art amenities were well maintain and made the whole trip really enjoyable. All in all, one of the best hotels along the stretch of Pattaya beach.

AC a bit to cold. Otherwise perfect stay if you are going to Pattaya. Excellent pool area, nice rooms, good beds, good food in the restaurants. Located on the beach street with beach view, close to, but not to close to happening area.

From the moment to check in you feel like a star. You get 5 star treatment and 5 star hotel. Very friendly staff,very professional and polite,everyone from the cleaning staff,security,wait staff,reception to managers. Nothing was a problem. Very pleasant stay,lots of animations in and around the pool. Awesome foam party!great pools and really nice choice of cuisines.live music in the Hard Rock Cafe. Right in the beach road. Only 5-10 walk to Central Festival where you can find anything. Hotel is very family friendly. Room i stayed( kings room) a bit on the smaller size but that wasn't a problem. Plate of fresh fruits or sweets everyday. Room cleaned thoroughly.overall very memorable and relaxing stay. Will be back:)

love this hotelI offten stay here when I arrive pattaya I think give this hotel is the best of pattaya hotel 
can reserve car parking big swimming pool love cafe but cafe too rock can't dance lol good sleep good place
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
what a lovely all round hotel
me and my partner stayed here April 2017 for a few nights 
was lovely hotel right opposite the beach and in the pattaya upmarket area really
the pool area is fab lots of sun loungers and the food is amazing.
Really good quality hotel within walking distance to everything 
The room was really big and comfy beds 
there was good entertainment especially pool party they had 
and the restaurant o the beach was fab with a live band amazing fajitas 
would defiantly stay at this hotel
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Check-in was fast. Room was excellent and the view was satisfied. Convenient to the beach and the location was great. Breakfast was good. It could be perfect if there is some more Thai food choices for breakfast.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: My third time here. Fun for kids. Good location and very enjoyable. Just a short walk to the beach and food market. Staffs are nice and service-mind. Enjoyed my stay every times I visited this place. Will definitely come back.

An overpriced, overrated hotel quite a distance from the walking street area. The swimming pool was nice and the gym was not bad. The pool side bar staff were eccellent, especially the girl with short colourful hair!

I stayed for 2 nights in August as a stop over with my partner
I was disappointed that 3 weeksof trying to get a response back about trying to make a booking was ignored and that I had to book through agoda ( i think by memory)
when we arrived - the reception staff where too busy talking amongst themselves to notice i was waiting to check in
Breakfast was ok - not much variety - and the juice was disgusting - fake orange juice by the taste of it
pool area was amazing
great activites
tv was good
room was fine
also agree with someone else' review about the bathroom - no fan - and the step in and out was horrible - i almost fell a million times - and the shower screen is useless - the water goes all over the bathroom floor so we had to use our towels to dry the floors so we would not slip - bathrooms are terrible designed for safety - could not imagine having young children stay there for that reason
we also had to repeatedly buzz reception to ask for new towles ( we made 4 calls to reception in 2 hrs asking for new towels and explained that the bathroom floors where wet from the shower being poorly designed) and to collect our luggage - even though this was pre booked - our driver was waiting 45 mins - and we where charged extra by the driver- 
reception staff useless when it came to asking them about the hotel facilities
no info in our room
no menu for room service - we aksed several times and i even went down stiars to ask staff - but lack of english skill didnt help
we didnt like the fact that wifi was not provided free of charge - never has this issue at any other hotel i have stayed in thailand - and internet was very expensive to use
also - place was a bit pricey for thailand - i have stayed in bigger places with 4-8 swimming pools in thailand with many bars restaurants free wifi balcony and bigger rooms at hakf the price
with all negatives aside
loved the place it looked amazing
rennovations didnt bother us - we didnt hear much going on
loved the swimming pool area
very clean
pool bar was great
staff there were amazing - Jamie was very helpful and gave us alot of info about pattaya and hard rock cafe and so did the other staff
security were very nice smiles all the time
the hotel beds - some of the best sleep i have ever had!
ashame no balcony for us smokers
overall i give this a 7 out of 10
place needs better bathrooms
better reception staff
and more information available for tourist incl info in the rooms
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We stayed on holidays in your hotel on July. Everything was great. We spent a very wonderful time.I hope we'll come to your hotel next time.By the way, our elder children are going to come to you at the end of August. See you. We wish you all the best.

Worn down room and facilities 
Location is good though .
Room was smelly thus unpleasant . Check in and out was fast.  Stayed the room with lounge access . Not much of benefit unless u want alcohol. Didn't even offer to carry luggage up to our room which was a let down of the service
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
One of the best places to stay when you are in Pattaya. Beach property with decent restaurant in house. Excellent pool, Spa and activity area... Amazing view from sea view room... room are specious and clean...
Only problem faced during check in as at 1400 their standard check in time room was not ready... we were promised to give nice room if we wait for some time... after waiting for 2 hrs as well room was not ready... and after compliant the reception staff mentioned that they are arranging a sea view room were in we have booked for one...
finally at around 1630 hrs we got our room key...
Next day met by GRM she was polite enough to apologized.....
Over all good stay however would have been excellent if check in was smooth. Please train your front desk staff to handle sold out situations and ensure that room blocking is monitor as per guest check in check out timing to avoid this discomfort...
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The facilities of the pool were substantial, and the correspondence of the staff was also very good. The location was convenient as it was along the beach road. In addition, there were many kinds of breakfast and it was delicious.

ting card was addresing to somebody else. We were not sure how long did the welcome snacks had been left in our room. Luckily nobody got sick after eating the welcome snacks.
2) No replenishment of drinking water even we had 3 empty bottles. We needed to ask for the replenishment.
3) the design of washroom is really poor. No place to hang the face towel and hand towel.
4) delicious foods and enjoyable swimming pool.
5) Staffs are nice and helpful.
6) Good location to Pattaya city area.

So I visited the city that is trying to rebrand itself from its 75 year history on one leg and seemingly new family image on the other -- mostly to free myself from the shackles of Bangkok traffic and see an ocean without driving too far.
Having seen a discounted booking online for the Hard Rock with an ocean view, I gave it a shot.   Oh well.  Sometimes these things work out and sometimes they don't.
The room appeared clean.  The bed was comfortable. There was a  couch.  There was parking, but you had to walk 100 meters to your car.   I accept these things.
The 2 issues are foremost:
1.  Ocean view refers to keeping your face less than 0.5 meter from the glass at the distal most end of the room to the glass window and then forgiving the trees which occupy the bulk of the water presence, enjoy what limited observations one can make of the water from this location.
From the bed. No view.  The ocean is party visible through the trees only from the limited corner of the room.
2.   The smell of urine was strong in the toilet and the smell permeated into the room.
The property had its positives but this is not a property I would visit again.
I would add however that the staff training in English is far superior to the vast majority of Thai hotel properties I have encountered and give credit where it is due.  Nonetheless, the lack of proper view when one's only purpose in such visit was an ocean view is hard to recover from.   I also prefer not to smell urine in the room when possible.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
July 8, 2017 at 10pm.  ambiance tonight at the hotel 
Very classy. Service is great, hotel is great and a pool party at night, can't ask for better. The hotel is a good place for special occasion such as birthday parties, anniversaries, etc. Even if you are staying in another hotel don't miss to visit the Hard Rock hotel cafe 👍

My family and me like Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya very much. We very fun in pool , happy breakfast and fast sleep. We think restroom so small room but clean. Your reception give me fist impression and smile be in good spirits.

Stayed here with hubby and daughters age 12 & 8. Rooms do need updating (which I am told will be happening in the not so distant future). We were on 6th floor, and can't complain. We had a lovely view of the sea and the room was comfortable enough. The pool was fantastic, drinks and food are quite expensive, but I purchased the stage pass prior to arrival which enabled us to get 20% discount (10% in Hardrock cafe) on all food and drink. There is a small gym which I used quite a few times and a spa, which unfortunately I didn't get to use.
 The one thing that makes this already great hotel even better are the staff. There are so many to try to remember, but they all work very hard. They seem to work very long shifts but always have a friendly smile for you. Nothing is too much trouble. So thank you HRHP, we had a fantastic stay and were very sad to leave. We will be visiting again. Although I can't name every member of staff, I would like especially to thank Tao, Sophia, Tedz, Tuk Tuk, Charlie, Boy, Dom, Joe, the guys at the cafe and all the other lovely people who made our holiday a totally amazing experience.

There's something about the Hard Rock Hotel. I got a good deal on the booking as in the middle of the rainy season in Pattaya. The room was beautifully furnished, and the rock theme was evident throughout the entire hotel. Meals and spa at the hotel were undoubtedly pricey, but the ambience and quality were definitely worth the price paid. The hotel itself is located fronting Pattaya Beach Road, and there're many food options available. Attractions nearby are two shooting ranges, one located up the road at Tiffany's, as well as the Pattaya Central Shopping Centre, further up.

Hard Rock Hotel this is not complain this is fact.
We go to hard rock cafè's when ever we can. But this was the first time we had stayed in one of the hotels and it was disappointing. Maybe our expectations where unrealistic but the hotel didnt come anywere near what we get in hard rock caffe's. I guess staff need to be trained they are far behind the staff in hard rock cafes , bartender and staff in the shack bar (pool bar)  avoid any eye contact and conversation , some example that won’t let me back to hard rock hotel again: as I mentioned staff (almost all) except housekeeper and carpark guys , which were very friendly and nice, kids club , breakfast , just wonder why dinner buffet is so good with great food and service and very friendly and attentive staff specially the grill chef , but breakfast buffet is exactly opposite? is it because breakfast is included or free ? breakfast is chaos.
 You did not need a room card to use the lifts, which is a serious security issue. There was not always a security guard at the lobby.
Bathroom need fan it was a fan vent but not sure it was really working , from the steam and smell I assumed  fan wasn’t working. My room number was 818 , and the rain drip shower and shower head working at the same time, even I tried to stop one by pressing the button but nope no chance also the hot water in the shower has a mind of its own so be very careful with children as they could get a nasty burn.
Kids club all the hotel I have been is free for customers stay in the hotel but Hard Rock Hotel charge 100 Baht per hrs.

Hard Rock Hotel is an oasis in the bustling Pattaya. It is so nice to come back to somewhere with reliable international standards of comfort and hygiene. Great pool! Like all other Hard Rock hotels, this one is themed and very well decorated. Shuttle from BKK airport brings you straight here.

Great place to stay, my kids enjoy the stay in hard rock hotel, definitely l will be back to stay again.
Nice swimming pool , enjoy the hotel activities, excellent service from the staff and in the end thank you staff and management.

We arrived when it was dark so didn’t notice but the next day noticed that someone before us had cut there toe nails at the end of one of the beds and it took 2 days to be removed 
Clearly not hovered up and left

Hard Rock Rocks  ! Thoroughly enjoyed the stay at the hotel. Centrally located. Would like to stay with Hard Rock everytime we are in Pattaya. We will strongly recommend it to our friends visiting Pattaya.

well trendy rooms and corridoors the pool area was fantastic , great eating and bar areas but as other people have said for a top hotel like this the wifi was scandalous this nowadays is a must for a hotel to survive and also when the hotel is busy the breakfast area can become very busy but they do have a great choice of foods.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I was very happy with my stay at this hotel.  This was my first trip to Thailand so I really relied on reviews like this one to guide me in my hotel selection.  The room was clean, modern and the staff was very friendly.  I'm not the type of traveler that expects employees in foreign countries to speak perfect English so I wasn't put off when they couldn't.... I worked around it by letting them get someone that spoke English a little better...  I really didn't have that problem too often so wasn't really an issue.  

I included the breakfast and wireless internet... I was pretty happy with both.  I chose the lower price of the internet options available and was able to do everything I wanted.  Plus I could access it all over the hotel...except in the Hard Rock Cafe.   

This hotel is not very close to walking street which was OK by me because I wasn't very interesting in going there.  The hotel is about a 15 to walking street but they have truck taxi's that run constantly at a standard cost of 10 bot so no issues with transportation.  I recommend using these.. just get on the back and ring the bell when you make it to your stop.  Don't tell the guy you want to go to a specific place or he will charge you more.

3 times in this lovley hotel
Every thing is amazing in hard rock
Im in love with the big swimming pool 
I didnt have chance to see the foam party :(

But only one thing is bad (Reception staff)

I like the location its far from walking street
Very good Breakfast

We wanted to experience the MXGP Thailand... So we decided to stay again @ HRH Pattaya for 2nd time......we even recommended our couple friend who travelled to Pattaya for first time to stay with us at HRH Pattaya during this trip.

The 2nd trip was as great as our first one!!! It's now officially our FAVOURITE hotel if we are traveling to Pattaya, for our annual family vacation.......

LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!  Enjoyed the Complimentary Buffet Breakfast, my lil 3yo babygirl loved the refreshing Gelato, convenient kiosk by the alfresco pizza eatery, especially nice to have on a hot sunny afternoon after some fun in the sun & some pool time!!!

The staff are all so friendly, we always stay at Hard Rock Hotels during our travel, but we must say, HRH Pattaya definitely has the most welcoming & friendly staff.... From the concierge, lobby customer service & intern restaurant staff.... THUMBS UP TO ALL!!!! They deserve a big fat credits for their hospitality...

I also enjoyed my session @ the spa, even chatted with a masseuse & manager, saying I saw them during my last visit there... Friendly ladies there too!

Awwww.... I just seen the review reply from Mr Jorge (GM)..., shud hv asked them abt the Kids Suite so we could have take a look while we were there.

But it's OK, definitely going again.......But it will be nice we can get free room upgrade next time, since we have been there 2x so far, & no doubt, Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya will definitely be our go-to whenever we travel to Pattaya!!! 😊

Everything was perfect for us, everywhere you can go not far, and many massage shop around there, There is a sea in front of the hotel. 
Very kind of staff, nice room condition, and breakfast was very good

During the time of COVID - they had closed for 3 months but just recently reopened.   I stayed here because they had lowered their price, but I left because they raised (more than double) the price for the weekend. The first day I had to let the hot water run for over 20 minutes before the color changed from yellow to light yellow.  The first night, the hot water was turned off around midnight and in the morning when I asked the front desk they all but called me a lair. The welcome message on the TV has been there for so long, it is burned in to the screen which means what ever you are watching, you can read the welcome message. Staff, friendly during check-in.  Not so during check-out. With all of the options available in Pattaya, I won't stay here again!

Excellent deal by booking through their website. Lovely pool.. fantastic location right next to a beach.
The rooms are nice, breakfast is great and the hotel is well maintained. Staff speak good English and  service is good.

This is a beach front hotel with convinience location. 10 minutes walk to the Central Mall and 15 minutes walk to Walking Street. Stay for a couple days. Not as 'rock' as Hard Rock Bali, since its look like a conventional hotel converted to hard rock concept. Lobby is a bit gloomy, but room is large with a sofa. Buffet at Star Diner and Pizzeria are good. Staff are warm and friendly. Overall is a good hotel.

Great place to stay in Pattaya. very helpful and friendly staff near to the shopping mall and the beach. My family enjoyed the stay Great swimming pool for the kids Good space of the room and very comfortable and clean

Beat Location close to the beach just walk across  the road, Hard rock band members have good service mind no mater what your request is, they  will promptly service you as quick as they can.Just one more thing, toilet have a little bit smelly

It is a nice hotel with clean rooms and excellent pool. However, it lacks professionalism when it comes to staff. There is usually a lady at travel desk and if you require travel assistance she will point to bell boys, who will try to fleece you by charging exorbitant rates when they arrange taxis. They will negotiate with you for taxis and other trips and then call the cabs to hotel.

Other than that its a good hotel, sometimes noisy.

This trip is holiday with my lovely family. I choose hard rock pattaya for my trip. 
My children happy so much and I will come back sure.
A little about dinner buffet . I think it have a little food. if possible hotel must have food more than it

Cannot have enough nice things to offer about the hotel, but I will highlight some of the better things. 

The price is great. What's better is the value. This is easily a three star hotel, with some four star rooms. There is definitely a resort feel to the property with on site fitness center, massage parlor (no soapie), activities schedule (adults and children both), a beautiful pool (that was being renovated during my stay) a brick oven pizzeria (pretty good authentic Neapolitan style), a Thai boxing gym with trainer, two bars, a recreation center, and two live show theaters. Quite a bit for your money. 

Breakfast is included and a challenge anyone to find a better  buffet style breakfast (7-11) in the city. 

The air conditioning is great. 

The location is also very close to large malls, walk street, and opens right upon the beach. 

Highly recommend you stay here, you won't be disappointed if you do.

The hotel is good as well as the location but the problem Indian has to face it does not have good Indian breakfast as lots of Indian visit this hotel they should consider for a good Indian breakfast as we all faced a lot of problem during our visit

The hotel has also become less than 10 years ago. Much has changed. There is no beach with the sea. The cost of four stars is expensive. Good attitude of the staff well through the force. And the ambivalent impression of the hotel service I speak as a professional as a travel agency. For such money, I would like more bonuses, later I will publish a detailed video and photo report on my pages.

The breakfast needs to be improved a bit, it was very typical and not much of a choice. However, the restaurant menu for lunch and dinner was awesome.
The pillows needed to be a bit more softer side. We found it too be hard!

The hotel is based in a excellent location walking distance to everywhere. Nice friendly staff and decent rooms. I did not have any bad experience at the hotel. I will definitely stay at the Hard Rock hotel next time I visit Thailand

Great team, every staffs is wonderful.  All serving you with warmest greetings. Not good is I found the bedroom has a little dirty but it's acceptable, otherwise it's perfect.  Surely I'll come again or recommend to my friends.

Great sea view room, spacious.  King size bed comfy   good wifi  nice and clean but could do a better job on glassware mirrors etc and the bedside tables. apart from that good. Annoying security guard on entry to hotel.... just a bit too familiar.........great band at night from 9pm   Expensive beer. great Angus burger..........great staff.

You get what you pay for.. some cool gear in the Rock shop

A good hotel, on beach road in good location away from crowds but close enough, huge pool and all good facilities. Breakfast OK. Hallway has peculiar smells, toilet not fully cleaned and smelled, TV had large shadow across screen. View with balcony at back pretty nasty.

Still have fantastic staff , great service by all staff except for the restsurant staff at Hard Rock Cafe outlet (very unfriendly) . 
Great water activities for kids. Staff are there to entertain your kids. 
Need to stop booking in too many tour groups .

Thailand is land of beautiful people with big heart. Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya is not different. Special mention of manager Kitty who is extremely professional and understands her guest’s well.  
Highlights to make your family stay comfortable:
-> Great food - imagine a scrumptious HRC burger with Thai touch.
-> Vast pool that has basket ball, kids zone and giant ball game.
-> Kids Club 👍👍
-> Activities all day long (Rock Climbing/ Giant Jenga/ balloon twisters, etc)
-> Comfortable rooms, - love that cologne smell
-> Happy and pleasant staff
-> 2mins walk from the beach
-> right in the middle of city
-> Quite rooms equipped with modern amenities. 

Who says Pattaya is not for families, Hard Rock Hotel is right in the hear of the city and is a game changer in family hotel category. 

Highly recommended for families/ couples/ business travelers.

Stayed a single night at Hard Rock in Pattaya, so my encounters with the staff were few. Everything looks very nice and clean, and for the price you can't go wrong. The rooms are rather small, but for the price the value is great. The interior decor is modern and up-to-date.

I was looking forward to trying their burgers in the restaurant, as I was told that they had the best burgers in Thailand. I went for the classic burger priced as 390 baht++. Presentation was stunning, and I was looking forward to putting my teeth into this wonder of a burger. Sadly, the burger revealed itself as being rather tasteless. It was as they had forgotten to put any flavor into the meat. It was like I was eating a bun with some salad. Very disappointing.

Will I be back? Probably yes. Great location and fair prices.
column7: Hua Hin, Prachuap Khiri Khan, Thailand

column3: This is the first time we stayed at Hard Rock Hotel. Staff are very nice. Room is clean and cozy. Breakfast has lots of choices. BBQ buffet is delicious. Band member (This is how the hotel staff called themselves :)) sent a birthday cake to my birthday girl, what a surprise! Overall a wonderful stay.

I believe it's a great place to stay and super location. This could be good or bad but it was much more family oriented for my liking as an individual. Second thing is for a place to party where you go to sleep quite late, it doesn't make sense to have breakfast end at 10:30am. I missed 4 out of 7 days...
Employees are great, very nice.

don't know where to start... the room is big and look really nice. it look more bigger when we booked an connection room. room service is good. food are really really good. is really fun to be in the pool, they have many activities for kids and adults, also the ''shack'' or bar at the pool is really nice. all the workers are really nice and play with kids and entertain them. Saturdays at hard rock is really special, they have foam party for kids and adult. they also entertain kids with cool and funny role play. food at hard rock cafe is top

Check in and check out for a long time.maybe can be quick! Other room service is very good! I like Breakfast with hotel is so rich !and the swim pool design is so good.and I like the party!so crazy! Convenient traffic！

クラブルームに10泊しました。
チェックインからラウンジで対応。
ティータイム・カクテルタイムと散々利用させて頂きました。
すごく居心地の良いホテルです。

City viewで予約していたが、sea viewに変更してくれました。
絶景をありがとう。
立地はセントラルまで徒歩圏内。昼も夜にも便利な場所です。

家族連れが多いです。。。

そして、一番のお気に入りはラウンジのスタッフ達です。
皆フレンドリーで、オススメスポット等教えてくれました。

また利用したいホテルです。

Thank you very much Mr.CAP

Thank you kind support

ขอบคุณครับ♡

This is one of the best hotels in Pattaya, Thailand. The rooms, pool and the other facilities are excellent. 
The Foam party rocks, but is only on Saturdays.
Food is something that needs attention, they need to have international cuisine.
Drinking water in the room should be complimentary.

The person often played instead of serving customers, both the pool and hard rock restaurant staff. A boy at the reception tried to cheat on the cost of the taxi. In a hotel so it does not have to happen please take action

Good place to stay in Pattaya, good facilities, good environment, good staff and good services. Only a walking distance to find souvenier shop, bazaar, restaurants , massage center and of course beach area.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Newbies at Hard Rock Pattay but absoulutely loved it. Beds are super soft ( a rare thing in Thailand), staff are incredible, pool and leisure facilities awesome and the food and drink is world class. We will be back baby.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We had high expectations of this hotel which was recommended to by local lawyers and businessmen .. We booked a room on the 9th Floor paid around $180 so it needed to be good, unfortunately it was not.. Reception on the 9th floor was excellent, but we wanted a non smoking room but ended up with a smoking room, staff gave us air purifier but this does not get the wretched smell out of the pillows and bedding.. Room furniture was ordinary and deviod of quality, we were entitled to breakfast in the 9th floor lounge but decided to go downstairs instead.. The dining room was like a factory canteen, hot food was cold and had been cooked for far to long, there is nothing worse than a cold runny fried egg served up by a person who did not really give a toss, all in all food was unappetizing, no table covering just plain old plastic tables.. There was cutlery, wrappers and rubbish under tables and the whole room looked like it lacked from any form of management or supervision.. This was one of five hotels we stayed at during this business trip through Bangkok, India and Singapore and was the worse by a good degree and was the most expensive..
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: My family stayed there for two nights. Lots of activities for us; kids love pool, water slider, family foam party, my wife loves hotel nightlife, whilst I fancies fitness and spa. Room was quite average in size, but modern decoration. Many place provided better rooms. Breakfast was OK but should be better. However,when put all facities in my calculation, it is worth to stay here at Hard Rock.

All the staff were tremendous, especially at the 9F Club Lounge, even making an emergency repair to luggage, nothing was too much trouble.
However.....not a foodie experience....the breakfast was not up to 5 star standard, I can only assume a recent review was from someone not used to high end...and the food at the club lounge was certainly not....work to do here....
Great location for families and young couples.....

Great location, great facilities, specially for children. lovely pool area for young children. breakfast was good too. Only downside was that check in and check out was long and we were slightly early (informed in advance that we will be an hour early than check in is allowed) but we still had to wait even though we have young children and old people with us.

I booked a sea view room and boy what a mistake. Extremely noisy rooms, my first night the sound of party music from the beach ended just after midnight. Sound was loud and clear. Saturday night was the pool party so again I could not sleep!!! The issue is why not have double glazing on the windows focus on the ambience. For this reason I doubt I would recommend this place for families, Be prepared the sea view rooms on the weekend have one guarantee and that is noise. Had I known how bad it would be I would be willing to pay for a sea view  and accept a downgrade.

This would be a great place for a birthday bash, hen night but if your after sleep forget it.

we stayed there for 2 nights......but were very unhappy with the overall environment of the hotel....we hated the colored lights outside the hotel...in the balcony...
the rooms were very expensive as compared to the services rendered and the quality of rooms...
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
excellent location bang on the beach. has 2 pools for kids to have a blast. Theres an artificial beach with cabanas also created within the hotel which is great. rooms offer city or ocean view. slightly tight but OK. breakfast was nice.
Overall a great 4 nights.lots of bars and restaurants round the corner and a very well socked 7/11 just outside the hotel.

I found the Admin staff not to be very friendly (though the other staff were fantastic) and we were not given our upgraded room with prebooking, nor were we given any apology or compensation. The foam party was great and the facilities seem really primed for families and couples alike. It is a shame that our certain situation was handled poorly.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Wonderfull Family hollydays , Great Time at the Pool, Great breakfast , Great People , relaxt and a lot of fun ! Great Time at Foam Party , Kinds Love to Play at the Kids Club we come back to stay at the Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya

It was okay. Though I pointed out some insights on my overall comment.

I liked also that there are stored movie. 

Though I requested that my room is beach side but I think I wasn't assigned on the beach side.

I was a bit frustrated regarding that. I also asked for a smoking room. But during my stay, it wasn't available.

All over feel good, but poor cleaning of bed facilities, We are feeling flea bite a whole night unable to sleep very well,hope must be improved, since I have planning will come by next year.I like swimming pool , especially for swimming pool with massage function.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
It's been six years since I last stayed at the Hard Rock Pattaya and in the mean time it's undergone one impressive refurb, re-opening just 6 months ago.  Have to say that they've done a really good job with a complete re-fresh, re-brand and re-launch.  Hotel is in a good location too, right on beach road, with but a 5 minute walk to Central Festival or 15mins down to Walking St and that part of town.  Always pleny of taxis running past if you're wanting to head to Jomtien or some other part of town!

On arrival, you get the impression you're stepping into some sort of VIP lounge with the dark mable and decor etc.  Whilst the english of the check in staff wasn't great it wasn't bad either, but check in was efficient and helpful.  Rooms are definately more contemporary looking now, and staying in a club room, was impressed with the amount of toiletries and products available in the bathroom.  Really comfortable bed too.  Only thing that stops me giving those hotel an excellent rating was the range of snacks and beverages at Happy Hour in the Club lounge, felt that this was really limited and disappointing.

Even the pool has had a refresh with new loungers and cushions etc. The hotel wasn't that busy during my time there, and whilst there are a reasonable amount of sun loungers, I think you'd be hard pressed to find a one during peak season.  The pool is one of the best features of the hotel, and one of the largest hotel pools I've seen in Thailand anywhere.  Great beach feature.

Main hotel restaurant offered a good quality and varied buffett in the evenings and the breakfast wasn't that bad either.

Good stay in a fun hotel.  Just shame I missed the weekly foam party on the Saturday night!!

We (family of 4) have been going to Hard Rock on and off for about 6-7 years now. It is a great place for families. Lots of activities for kids including dance, water aerobics, water volleyball, water polo, painting etc. Huge pool and a games room which has x-box, Wi-fitness, pool table and ping pong. If you want to go somewhere in Pattaya for a few days and avoid the sleaze then this is place. The F&B is good and affordable. They have kids menu as well. The only downside that I notced just this last weekend is the huge number of tor groups they seem to have there. I haven't been for a few years and now the place seemed overrun with Korean and HK tour groups. Really noisy and many seem to be able to shout, eat and smoke at the same time. Actually the smoking issue is really something that management should take a look at because of the tour groups. They smoke pretty much everywhere in the outdoor areas where there are usually lots of children. I think mgt. should designate some non-smoking areas adjacent to the pool and in some of the outdoor eating areas. We stayed on the club floor which was OK because the downstairs breakfast area is like feed time at the zoo in the mornings. Again, lots of tour groups all shouting across the retaurant at each other. It is a scourge. Otherwise the hotel is good. The staff in particular are brilliant. Sophia, Sax, Quest, Arm, Anne and all of the staff work really hard to make all the guests feel welcome and comfortable.

Perfect.......
location
food
pool
theme
friendly
quiet
great pool parties.......
if I have to complain then well the watermelon is not seedless. that is it, my only complaint. Now plan,book and go and enjoy Pattaya rocks

It is very good to stay in this hotel. Everything is very good for the whole family. We enjoy the breakfast time, the family of nine with kids and elder ladies, all food and service make them happy and memorable. Swimming pool is big and fun. The kids already asking when to go this hotel again.

Total value for money, professional and friendly staff, location, food, service was outstanding. Real Thailand! Can't wait to go back there. Loads for the kids to do and pool was clean and well maintained.

was a very gud experience and i make sure revisit again.had a wonderful stay with many more memories .thansk for making the stay a nice and sweet one .

I will recommend this next time to my family and friends .

My only complaint is that I accidently booked the room for an extra night and they would not refund me.  I asked If they could put that price towards an upgrade and they would not do it.  The rooms are great.  This hotel is very extra guest friendly.  They have great food, spa, gym, pool and an amazing location.  For you technology addicted non life living people the WIFI is great.

I really want to provide a good review if this place as the front desk are helpful beyond what is expected and the pool facilities excellent, however, the bad points outweigh the good points. The rooms are designed by a madman! The sink is pointing in the wrong direction, there is very little cupboard space and the small rooms leave you feeling dizzy because of their weird shape. 

The hotel has many rules, only some of which are enforced apparently based on your country if origin. Guests of a certain faith are allowed to use the pool fully clothed, guests from China can do whatever they want including bringing street food to the pool and consuming huge quantities of it. I take my 19 year old son to the Hard Rock Cafe and we are escorted off the premises by three members of staff at 1 minute to 10 as the rules say you need to be 20 years old to be in there after 10pm.

The hotel is just a bed and breakfast for unruly rude Chinese tour parties, breakfast is a scrum involving hundreds of people, for the rest of the day and night the hotel is deserted, might be a good idea to look at F & B prices to encourage a few guests to stay in, nearly £40 for an average buffet and £6 for a glass of beer.

We will not be staying there again.

We had a nice experience at this hotel. The team that served us and the service provided was very pleasant. The rooms are also very unique. The location of the hotel is very close to the beach. Keep up the good work.

First visit to the Hard Rock Pattaya. Very impressed with the staff who went out of their way to be helpful. The buffet breakfast could be a bit daunting but the staff consistently kept their cool and the variety  of food on offer was excellent and high quality. Outside the hotel is immaculately maintained and the swimming pool a real delight.

I would highly recommend this special place, with a staff devoted to deliver extensive service level.
Everyone at every level is polite and service minded, doing their best to please every guest.

Location is perfect for a Pattaya stay, Hotel and Cafe is Hard Rock genuin.

Can't fault anything. 
Comfy bed, clean room, spacious bathroom and English speaking staff. 15% off food in the restaurant too which was a bonus! The portions are huge too! A taxi was only 120 baht for three people in to the main nightlife. Would definitely recommend x
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Unforgettable stay , just exactly what we want ,great location , near beach , fantastic pool too , we get amazing sea view room  , what to say more ...
Oh yes , main shopping malls and lot restaurant is in walking distance 
Best choice , will go again ,for sure .
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Great staff, Great atmosphere, Great services!!! All the staffs are passionate and helpful which made my stay a wonderful and unforgettable one!
Starting from checking in, to the room services, the pool services n atmosphere, also the dining experience! Everything is PERFECT!!!

Everything you need is here.
I have stayed many times, but I feel very calm.
I think that it will fit your taste.
In addition to Pattaya, I think that it is the best hotel in this country, including the hotel of Bangkok.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: On my last stay in Pattaya, I chose this hotel for a night stay. It was quite decent. The place is in crowd neighborhood and opposite of the beach, many restaurants, stalls and bars. Within 15 minutes walk to the shopping mall. If you search for a decent price, maybe can consider this hotel. Eventhough there is a high possibility on the weekend, a foam party would be held here.

Overall this is a good hotel with great wifi and nice pool for your family and friend. This hotel location is very strategic. In the back you can just walk across the Pattaya beach. And if you prefer nightlife, you can also just walk around 2 km to Walking Street.

We have stayed in many hotels in Thailand and decided to treat ourselves to Hard Rock.  It is a good quality 4 star hotel with great facilities but prices to match.  We had a great room but the jury is still out whether it worth 3x the price of many other good quality 3* hotel we have stayed in.  Amazing pool, gym and breakfast.  We didn’t dine in the hotel in the evening due to the crazily high prices compared to local restaurants.  We paid around the same for 2 meals, drinks and tip in a local restaurant than we would have paid for a single cocktail at the hotel.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Myself and my wife stayed at the HRHP in June 2011, and yes the are doing some extensive refurbishment but this didn't put us off or spoil our stay!! However if your into staying in bed until midday forget this hotel until after December 2011, as the guys do start knocking and banging at 9am each day on the dot!!! The Hotel is in the best location to explore Pattaya, central to everything and like most of the previous reviews, I agree the pool is the best in town! The staff are just great and always up for a laugh, the guys around the pool organising activities all day work so hard and are so enthusiastic you can't not want to join in! Overall great hotel, and the deals they are doing now because of the refurb outweigh and slight inconvenience.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Hi I stayed there with my family from 14th to 17th of June..and I must say it’s the best hotel in  Pattaya from swimming pool to its staff,food...everything is so perfect.
The girl named Paris on their front desk was so kind to give me an early check-in upon my arrival..really thankful to her..
Awesome property with awesome people...will come back again for sure ...keep it up !!

I planed the trip several months in advance, and choosed the Hardrock by detailed comparation. Though the price is a bit higher than my expectation, but the service and rooms is very satisfatory. 
Old family memebers and kids enjoyed a lot staying in the hotel. The only advise is that beds in the family room for kids are a bit smaller. hope they will be bigger when we come back again in the future.

Excellent place and location. We travelled with kids and the hotel had organized family activities. We had a great time. On Saturday nights there is a party going on until late at night. My wife had a hard time trying to sleep. If we ever come back to Pataya, HR will be our choice to stay with no doubt.

Every year when I go to Pattaya , Hard Rock Hotel is still my first choice of hotel, The staff are nice and friendly, I love the swimming pool is big and clean , also there location is good about 5 mins walk to the central festival .

We enjoyed the activities by the pool on Saturday very much, particular the foam party.  The breakfast and dinner buffet are good and have a variety of choice.  The only cons is the room at Hard Rock is generally small and without a bathtub.

Upgrade to King Club. Excellent service. Excellent cocktail party at the evening. Great breakfast with good services in King Club. Amazing swimming pool with different activities. Room services food is also good. Need beach and Central Pattaya. Beach water is dirty, better swim in hotel swimming pool. Love this hotel and must stay again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
The hotel is located in the central of the down town.  It's just behide the beach and only take around 10 minutes from to either Big C or Central Festival Pattaya etc malls.
Swimming pool design is particularly for family with kids.

Had a great time here. All the staff were great and helpful. The pool is amazing and we spent 4 days hanging out by it. Good location and easy access to all the main spots in the area. Very comfortable room. Breakfast was good.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: If you want a perfect stay in Pattaya chose Hard Rock hotel and be sure you have everything you need. Spacy room , lovely breakfast and perfect dinner either in Starz restaurant or at Hard Rock café. If want to relax take a swim in the pool , and of course enjoy the Saturday pool party.

Booking online a week before arriving, I made a request and paid extra for a high level sea view room for a 5 night stay. On arrival we were offered rooms on the low level, and not even sea view. The hotel was certainly not busy, but this sort of cheating colours any sort of stay. We ended up on the 4th floor of the 8 storey building.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Nice place for family. Lovely and polite staff. They can help us to feel comfortable while staying at there. My son fell in love with swimming pool and also all of family. We have a plan to stay there next month. Thank you

It was obviously that the Hard Rock Hotel takes their staff training seriously. The organisation at breakfast was impressive as it was one of busiest time of they due to a Thai holiday but they found tables for us quickly and took away used plates promptly. Breakfast was also good value compared to other hotels.

The pool is good and they have plenty of activities for children.

Excellent service. 
Room was clean. 
Both breakfast and dinner had variety of food to choose, especially dinner. 
Party foam for kids was really great. 
My kid was having a very good time. 
Overall is good. We will definitely visit again if we have a chance.

Good location is perfect, centrally located in the city centre, short walk can reach everything you need. impressive BBQ buffet dinner & good resort hotel facilities, particularly, suitable for family stay with your kids.  There is cozy kid's club.

It was a very tiring Monday and I was yearning for a good night swimming. Sadly, the pool is closing in a few minutes. The frustration lead to a good conversation with the lifeguards. I became good friend with P'Tat. He even treated me to an authentic Thai Restaurant and showed me around the area. I'd love to stay again at Hard Rock when I get to work again in Thailand.

The ambience of the place delightful  The display of guitars tastefully done.  Very comfortable bed. Views from the room were good too. Staff were good.  Breakfast catered for locals and foreigners was adequate .
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The car which I rented has problems and I need to change the car .i can't speak Thailand language,so the staffs help me a lot thanks them very much.the breakfast is very good just as the other hard rock hotel in the other country,but the pool is so small I think if it's bigger maybe better

We requested early check and was provided a room when we arrived. We had a nice small birthday cake for my child birthday in june. Our family and friends had a great time exploring the kids club and nice food just right outside the hotel!

Over rated, Was told I would be given a late chek out of 2 pm, but was called and told to check out at 12 sharp or would be charged extra, Hotel is located just off the beach and has a beautiful swimming pool

I only stayed for one day whilst I was visiting Pattaya and I can say without a shadow of a doubt that my stay at the Hard Rock Hotel was fantastic, from the staff to the food.
