Breakfast is just fine but nothing special. 
The shower on the roof was not working, so I had to use the hand shower.
What is amazing is the chance of have one guitar on your room to play with it. They have around 15 fender guitars and you can choose one, after one deposit of 10,000 baths.
They take this guitar to your room in the suitcase, with a guitar effects device and earplugs, so whatever your rock style is, you can have fun in your room!!!
You can have disscount at the restaurant and the shop, but I had to ask about this, as nobody told me when I did the check in.
Location I think is one of the most competitive advantages. You can go by walk to the main hot spots in Pattaya. But also you can rent a scooter and keep it in the parking lot.
All the staff is amazingly friendly, but this is Thailand! People is friendly everywhere.
I went to the restaurant twice. I saw the band playing and their performance is nothing better than the average bands you can find in any other street bar.
Swimming pool was under maintenance, and maybe you don't need it, and for sure after this repairing will look awesome.
Bed sheets were not really soft.
HRH claims take care about the planet and save water, as many others hotels they ask you if you want to keep the same towel just leave on the hanger or somewhere else and if want to change it just drop it to the floor. Everyday I kept my wet towels on the bed, the chair or hung in the bathroom and everyday I found a new towel perfectly dry and folded. I appreciate the attention of the room keeper, but makes me thing HRH don't walk the talk about saving water.

Good service!  Rigorous and meticulous！Near the sea，Comfortable climate。Beauful courtyard ，
Humidity in the room needs to be addressed，It would be better to be able to open several shuttle buses，For example :Station 、airport、famous scenic spots……etc。！Look forword to the next time。thank you very much ！

I came some friends for holidays it was really great experience in this hotel the personnel is friendly and efficient. Nothing to complain. The hotel is well located with 2 access to be able to go in the two Main Street with a taxi or other type of transport.

good and clean room. friendly service and hospitable overall. 
Not too happy about service received during breakfast but food was good.
It doesn't hurt to smile and greet a customer. Especially when we are asking for something like a fork or spoon. A simple smile when responding makes a world of difference and won't make a customer wish why bother asking in the first place.
Not sure if it's a cultural thing, but guys, you are the Hard Rock Hotel.   
cheers.

We only had one night in Pattaya, but this was my second stay at the Hard Rock hotel. Booked at the last minute: and while not the cheapest pricing for a 4-star rated property on Beach Road, I've really enjoyed my stays. There was a problem with my room, so the hotel upgraded me and gave me an extra device for WiFi. I've stayed in both Deluxe and Rock Star rooms, and didn't notice any real difference between the two. I suppose the extra money is for access to the lounge --which I didn't get with the free upgrade. Nice pool, spa, breakfast buffet. Friendly, accommodating staff.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Pool area is the thing in this hotel. Sand area and activities are really nice. Rooms are bit small and sea view does not necessarily mean a real view to pattaya beach  (my room had only like a small corner to sea).
Lounge service is good: warm food and drinks. Bar is quite expensive, luckily there are miljon bars across the area.

Excellent customer service, location is near Walking Street so easy in easy out for the crazy Pattaya nights.  Has an excellent pool, pub and food.  Definately recommended and I will be back! Rooms are super clean, security is definately helpful.

The Hard Rock hotel staff  were brilliant and my Grand kids had great time thanks to them. I would advise using the Rock Royalty lounge, the extra cost is actually great value, especially if you have kids.

Very relaxing hotel with excellent staff. Close to excellent eating spots and night life on the beach.  Lots of things in Pattaya other than girlie bars to enjoy. Easy to get their from the airport with buses servicing the route. Recommend Bells as the provide door to door service which turns out cheaper than the other bus services.

Stayed at the hotel, the staff was nice, ok size rooms. They had me with all the promotions, etc. Time for me to go back, they send me something saying if i book 21 days in advance, it's 60% off so I think, I will stay again right?? Wrong. The promotion is a rip off, if you go to the site and enter your dates without a promo code it was 1400, when I go back in and log in with the promo code, it was still 1300.00, they tried to tell how much more expensive it would be without the promo but their math did not add up, so I will stay somewhere else!

I stayed at the Hard Rock Hotel, Pattaya in OCt 2010 with my friends and had an amazing time! 
It overlooks the beach, the hotel is only a short distance away from the lively Walking Street and you can just hop across the road an lay on the lovely beach!
Hard Rock epitomises the word Rock and Roll with great decor in their lobby ...real memoribilia of all the famous music icons! 
Staff-The reception, the housekeeping and the restaurants' staff are all very courteous, friendly and extremely helpful
Rooms- The room we stayed in a standard room was slightly small in terms of where to keep luggage and stuff, but the beds are very comfortable and spacious and we had a balcony that overlooked the pool!
Food- The food at hard rock is slightly overpriced, but the hard rock website has some good offers n promotions that give you breakfast and room combos, bbq dinner and room combos and other offers. The BBQ dinner is amazing with a great spread of meats, desserts and main course. The only downside is it was open only till 10pm which is too early for a dinner to be shut! 
Activities and entertainment- Hard Rock Pattaya is a great family hotel which has a wide range of activities for kids and adults. While adults can take part in water polo, table tennis and other sporting activities, kids have lots of options throughout the day from face painting, to kiddie competitions.
Spa- The spa at hard rock is heavenly with a wide range of treatments though on the slightly more expensive side. Great for couples who want to relax!
Location-HArd Rock is very ideally located. Public transport is available right outside the hotel. There is ample parking space if you are hiring bikes, cars during your stay. Since Pattaya is quite lively it is pretty safe to walk around as well.

Ideal Location, close to most facilities and easy service for longer trips. The environment was great, and easy to use. The only thing was a bit disappointing is the fore shore re-work in progress. However I believe this will be completed next time when we will return.Love the music and entertainment..Rock and Roll, and all for one.Bert
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: When it comes to tourism & hospitality, it is not easy to beat Thailand. Its services is far better compare to when i check in at the Hard Rock Hotel Penang last month. The food is great and its staffs are simply excellent which i will definitely come back to this hotel whenever i will be coming to Pattaya. Rock on!

We live in Bangkok and wanted a 3 night getaway not too far away, we booked direct with the hotel a couple of nights before arrival. We have been trying a few hotels in Pattaya over the last few months searching for the one that meets our needs. We have a 3 year old son and it's important for us that he has activities and a good pool to enjoy. We had paid for the Kings club package for the duration of our stay.
We arrived early and were quickly taken to the 9th floor for the Kings club check in. What can I say but the check in was fantastic, quick, given an overview of all the hotel facilities and club package. We were early and didn't expect our room to be ready but it was and shown to our room. We booked a deluxe city view, it was very clean and modern, perfectly big enough and was a high standard in my opinion.
We went to the lounge at 6pm for package cocktails, beer and food- it was fantastic and a special mention for Chanel who was so very friendly and looked after our drinks orders. The food is great and other hotels should aspire to this level when doing a club package!
Breakfast was included in our room rate, again choice of food was great- fresh, loads of choice and so very clean with attentive staff. 
The feeling of great customer service is all round the hotel. The pool is fantastic, a great concept of a beach area which our son loved, we rented the cabana for the pool party and its great!
This hotel is a credit to the manager and his team, it's now become our weekend getaway! We loved it all and this has my ranking as my favourite hotel in Pattaya, thank you!! Book as I don't see how anyone could be disappointed.....
My tip is to definitely book the club package as its great value for money

Very good Hotel accommodations, and superb services, friendly staff. Very good property for staying in Pattaya, to enjoy the beach view, water sports. Located in heart of the city. Amazing food and hospitality.

Went alone with my 2 kids aged 5 and 8 and couldnt recommend it more. The facilities were great for kids and adults alike; huge pool, slides, floaties etc etc. The pool staff were also fantastic, very friendly, happy to have fun with the kids, they really made our stay special.Food was excellent too, great breakfasts and daytime menu.

My family stayed for a week in August. We have 2 children 8 & 10. Its perfect for families. There are lots of daily activities by the pool all day and the staff were wonderful, especially Mr Arm. The Friday foam party was lots of fun. The buffet breakfast was well done. The gym was clean and quiet. You are a 2 min, 10baht ride from the 3 main shopping malls. We had the family suite which was excellent. Two large bathrooms, 2 bedrooms, very comfortable beds, a living room and 2 balconies all tastefully decorated. A very clean facility and no problems with check in/out. The pool is fantastic.
The only drawbacks are the silly, expensive, laundry and restaurant prices but you can walk out the front door and its all there for you. If we return to Pattaya we will be back. Thank you for a wonderful stay.

Beware when you check in they take room deposit, it's actually taken not just held like other hotels do, after check out you wait two weeks for refund, they blamed banks ha ha, if you pay cash it's returned instantly at check out, they need to inform all guests before check in, I had small amount of cash on me so as normal used visa. This practice gives them a lot of guests money always in the bank, they have both the oncoming and outgoing ! I think it's a scam and will be reporting this practice for investigation.

All staffs always smile. And, they're also helpful.
but, we need to remind that your door system is bad. I stayed at here 3 days. our room keys was failure twice. they reported that their room key can't be placed with Credit card or Mobile phone. I can't believe it @@@@ What's system they have!! who don't have mobile phone or credit at that generation!! If you door key system like that, I think you need to provide special holder for each guests : 0

This has to be one of the good hotels that me and my family have stayed in from the service and the duty manages very caring and understanding especially having my one year old with us was there a couple of months ago and booked to go back in November would highly recommend to the public

great staff and the place was impeccable loved every second, would recommend to anyone and wouldn't think twice about returning, food was good and was very sad to leave, If you are going to stay anywhere in pattaya stay here

This hotel seems to lack a bit of soul. Room was okay but not amazing. Bathroom was small with no fan. Shower overhead didn’t work. Laundry was expensive. Restaurants were underwhelming. If you like a pool fill of kids this is your place. On a positive, staff were great. Special mention to TBone who was outstanding. He was helpful and took the time to make a connection, so really appreciated that.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Stayed here for two nights when i left hospital after eating a dodgy Mcdonalds..two days on a drip..
Anyway the Hard Rock ... lovely rooms enthusiastic staff.. fab view from the 8th floor over the bay.
Great breakfast .. nice food brilliant service..bar prices a bit steep... lots of rock history and guitars
   dresses.. suits etc and pop  memorabilia very interesting.. reasonable wifi. great tv channels and free movies.. if you have the time to watch them.  very clean.. room staff esp Paula very friendly and helpful.. makes me want to go again.. and this is my first choice when i return to PATTAYA
without a doubt..rooms very comfy bed nice pillows.. quality toiletries...cant fault it.
Ill be back...

I stayed at the Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya recently and had a great experience there.
I bought a King's Club membership in advance and as such I was greeted in the beautiful hotel lobby with a glass of wine. I then was taken up to a special floor for King's Club members where I received expedited check-in service and access to a great lounge/business area with free coffee, snacks and internet access etc.
The rooms here are great... very large by Asian standards, clean, modern... complimentary beer in the mini-bar etc.
The outside pool area here is amazing too... I rented a cabana one day and just lazed around the huge pool all day long. You can also order food service directly from your cabana!
In the morning I had the complimentary breakfast buffet which was first class.... several chefs served up personalized omelets etc.
Outstanding food!
Overall this is a first rate hotel in a great location... right across the street from the beach and a 10 minutes walk to downtown Pattaya. It is just far enough away from the madness of Walking street etc. that it is suitable for children and families.
Highly recommended.

When i checked in, the curtain at my room had a lot of blood stained plus the room is small and too compact. Then the hotel changed me to another room which bigger and facing the pool since they cannot replaced the curtain immediately.

The kindness of the Korean staff at the information desk was a very good start.I was very kind.The food was so good.Time at bubble party and hard rock cafe will be a wonderful memoryThe live music of the Hard Rock Cafe was so much fun, but the kindness of the manager was very good tooThank
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I did enjoy my stay at Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya very much. Thanks to all friendly and helpful staff! Hotel room and amenities are very nice. Spa staff are very polite and efficient. Great food. I love dinner beffet!

Front counter folks were ok. Dining support staff were very good. Room pretty clean but smelled of mold/mildew. Seemed to come from the vents. Nice to be close to beach and other pattaya attractions. I would cautiously recommend it.

Its been a few years since I last visited this Hotel. Just awesome as always! The staffs were just excellent. We stayed in the Rock Royalty (or club floor) and it is all worth it. The foods and services at the Lounge (located on the 9th floor) were fantastic with the full view of Pattaya bay/beach at sight. Although the pool is closed till end of Oct, they do provide free transfer to Saad Kiew beach and Cartoon Network theme park too. I would have no hesitation in recommending this Hotel to anyone. My families and gang just luv this Hotel for everything! Welcome home hard rockers!

The best place to stay in pataya.
The Hotel very near to Beach and major tourist attractions in the town. The rooms are too spacious and attractive. The swimming pool is well maintained 
There many parties arranged in this hotel which is very famous and special

I love it here. The main drag is a short walk away. I can't speak to the food at the hotel, but the pool and atmosphere are top notch. The rooms are modern and fun. I'm now a fan and can't wait to stay at more Hard Rock resorts.

Thumbs up for the great location (right in front is the beach)! Love the breakfast and the comfortable bed! Definitely will come back again soon for a short getaway from the cities. 
Wish the WiFi is less hassle free as I have to asked multiple times for userids and passwords for different gadget every day.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Food quality needs improvement. We had pizza and it was tasteless.
Also breakfast quality needs improvement.
Staff is efficient and friendly.
Location of the hotel is good.
One of the highlight about the property is the swimming pool.

Staff are very friendly, very polite and with warm smile all the time. Hard Rock is having great pool area which is family oriented. Kids enjoy the slides and the activities at the pool side. Nice resting area at the pool side (with bangalo on the sand section). Nice dinner BBQ buffet.

Its a very nice hotel where single couples and families can have their fun 
The location on its own is something to admired , its a very live place and full of things to try 
From street entertainers to stuff that wont be suprising yo see since its called sin city, its great from every aspect 
I would definitely come back to it no doubt
The security was good 
Of course this my experience ffom the last time i visited the place so things might have changed

great place good food great club close to all the bars on beach road a short taxi ride to walking street.  Great service all around pool area very nice good little bar inside.  Only negative is guest charge for room 900 baht each person.

I have stayed at the Hard Rock in Pattaya many times.  Generally the staff is very nice and accommodating.  This trip the lounge staff on the 9th floor was pretty good, but not as helpful sometimes as in the past.  Most were very nice, but there were one or two who were a bit busy on their computer or talking to others and not paying attention to the guests.  These people were the exception.  Most were really good as usual.

This hotel worth to stay especially the staff Keng who guide us how to use the gym equipment. Awesome stay and all the staffs is friendly and helpful. Strong recommended for family and business travellers.

Yet another pleasant stay at Hard Rock in Pattaya. I'm here for business and all my business guests visiting love being here and be served by this professional staff.
Hard Rock have good facilities for meetings in private meetings rooms.
Dont stay at Hard Rock if you want a quite stay. It's ever never quite here, always music and entertainment. In the weekends it's especially loud.

Excellent beach facing location...good facilities....service is quick and good....superb ambience.....excellent value for money!!!!! I think it is one of the best hotel options in Pattaya. Overall a very good experience.

Our family has been visiting the hotel for many years as we loved the energetic vibe of the place.  This is our first visit since October 2019 and Covid outbreak.  The hotel and the rooms were very clean.  The Covid preventive measures were put in place and we felt very safe.  They have renovated and upgraded parts of the pool area.  By the way, we always enjoy our time in the huge pool and the slides.  They also organised poolside activities and games, which made the place very lively.   We have always enjoyed the wide selection of food available during the buffet breakfast.  However during this stay, we have noticed some of the Western selection like cheese, cold cuts, french toast, etc were missing.  On the other hand, there were more Thai dishes like sticky rice, grilled

First time visit Pattaya, all staff are friendly and helpful. 
The door boy and the staff of customer information counter are funny and advice us a lot of useful information in Pattaya.
Those experiences make us feel welcome.

the hotel is pretty good.Near the beach and the central festival.The room is quiet and clean.The Hard Rock is a five stars hotel and its‘ price is cheap.I will order it again when I come to pattaya again.

What a great Funky place to stay. I love the Hard Rock theme for a place to stay in a foreign location. The rooms were fantastic. Lots of space to spread out and enjoy your stay. Breakfast was a high point of our stay. Each day they offered a varied selection that gave us a great start to the day. The pool was fun with many planned events to fit everyone's need. We enjoyed the spa on several visits. All very reasonable. After eating the local cuisine on most of the days in Pattaya, we decided to have a good old American Burger in the Hard Rock Cafe. I have to say, this was the best burger I've ever had!

Good location on central pattaya, near pattaya beach.  
Arrived the hotel about 2 pm. and was informed that we have to wait for the room about 40 mins, which actually drag to about an hour. That was fine for me considered it was long weekend in thailand and I just drove from Bangkok for hour and a half. If I had traveled for a long time and want to rest badly it would be different. The front offered a late check-out which was not neccessary for me. I would much appreciate some softdrink while waiting. The front were polite and cared to keep me informed for the progress. Hotel decoration was unique with superstars' belongings. 
The room was clean and has a nice view of pattaya beach, except for the carpet still wet on some spot, not pleasant to walk barefoot. I booked a room for 3 ppl but there were amenities only for 2. Not in the mood of complaining I just asked for a towel, bathrobe and extrabed, which took forever to delivered. I had to ask many times. The housekeeping needs more improvement.
I like the bathtub it was like a tiny swimmimg pool but quite high for an elderly, must be very careful to step in and out.  
Big pool was a good part of the hotel, there was an activity for guests to join in. It was fun to watch. 
I'm not so picky and usually don't want to waste time complaining. The (very) delay in check-in and the guests' booking details should not be this poor. I would try another hotel next time I go to pattaya.

Overall, the trip in Hard Rock was very good. It was very convenient for going to other places. Also the dinner buffet was very excellent. But we have a suggestion if there could be a door for the bathroom such that the washroom may not get wet.

Already my second visits here. Always feel like home. Location is near to Central Festival mall, beach road and the night market. Lots of Restaurant and Bar nearby. Luxurious lounge and cafe, have a very good time with some friends there. If I would visit Pattaya, I would go back to this hotel

The swimming pool is nice but we have no time to enjoy it. The hotel seems very special, close to beach, and many bars around that area,a little bit noisy in the night. Also  it is hard to find a good place to massage nearby.

Well stayed here in oct for 3 days.
 Hard rock itself is a big brand name and you expect nothing but the best from them , 
Ive tried to summarize all the ponints and mentioned them in short. 
Pros :-
1) Very good location , just 15 min walk to walking street and easy access and taxi availability on both sides Beach road and 2nd road.
2) Huge pool with beach theme.
3) Rooms are clean and sea view is great.
4) Breakfast has a huge variety.
5) Sat foam party is one of the best party in pattaya.
Cons
1)  front desk staffs were not welcoming and friendly. I loft my key in my room and when i asked for duplicate key , the lady made such a bad face as if i have asked for her life .
2) Service is slow , just to deliver a tooth brush it took them 20 min
Would recommend to stay here for max 2 days as it gives a different atmosphere and experience

Every morning around nine o'clock, the staff was working outside of my room but it was very noisy. Moreover, there was no slippers provided? I realised that the swimming pool was under construction before I came, but it was hard to find the beach where ur area. In short, everything is ok in general

We had a few days to spare before heading back to Bangkok so we decided to splash out and stay here. It wasn't cheap but we got a good internet deal a couple of days before we arrived.
Pattaya itself is pretty hideous - imagine Benidorm plus a depressingly active sex trade.
However, the Hard Rock is without a doubt one of the best hotels on the beach front, with a gorgeous pool area and rooms overlooking the stunning beach. There is endless entertainment for both kids and adults, plus of course the plethora of eateries on site - including the actual Hard Rock Cafe Pattaya. The breakfast was the best I have ever seen offered in a hotel and although very little Thai food was available, this seemed to be the case across Pattaya - it is very much aimed at the Western tourist.
We only stayed two nights and didn't really leave the hotel as we weren't up for all night drinking sessions and there didn't seem to be much else to do, especially in the evenings.
The staff were amazing and the hotel is clean, well designed and generally a lovely place to stay.
It is fairly noisy though - mostly during the day - so if you are looking for a quiet, secluded spot this is perhaps not for you.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Hotel location is good. Staff is friendly but not well trained in some aspects. Hotel is old and no landscaping. Wasted the valuable land area in front of the hotel. Room is noisy during party night and no sound insulation.

Best ever stay... Surely will stay again here when come again to Pattaya. Location was perfect to nearby popular landmarks. Has a halal restaurant. There was plenty facilities offered here. Have a sweet memory when celebrating friends birthday here at Hard Rock Cafe.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Great location, bed is nice to sleep, room is spacious, staff is friendly & helpful.
Walking distance to Walking Street, Central Festival Mall, restaurants and many more.
The most great thing is situated opposite the beach.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Hotel is in dire need of a facelift, nothing has changed since I last visited years ago. Check-in took forever. Selective smiles on selective faces. I guess not everyone enjoys the service industry as much as the establishment believes they do.

When in Pattaya, we can recommended the hard Rock Hotel! the breakfast is awesome, the room was spacious and clean (we had a massive King size bed) Staff is very friendly and helpful.
They also provide a great child minding service that would allow you to relax and do a bit of sightseeing on your own...

I was looking for a hotel with a big swimming pool for my child to play in.The hotel room was clean and the staff were kind.It was convenient because there were many shopping centers around.If I go to Pattaya again, I want to visit again.

This was probably the best stay option on our whole Thailand holiday, and i guess for the price this is the best place one can choose to stay in Pattaya.
The hotel is huge with so many activities for everyone. We were in Pattaya for 2 days and trust me this hotel made us feel a week would be less to see pattaya and enjoy this property
We were given the sea view rooms and the rooms were very neat clean, smelling nice and spacious.
The front desk staff was a little slow in check in process, but while we were had to wait we were welcomed with really hot face towels which freshened us after the drive from BKK, they also served us some welcome drink but the way it was served was weird. firstly we were 6 of us and they served only 4 portions, secondly they use a relatively large glass for the serving and hence fill it only till like close to 1 quarter which when served looks bad, i mean one could use a smaller glass and serve the smaller helping rather than use a large glass which almost looks like the left over of the previous guest.
But anyways finally we were allotted our rooms and since the rooms were good we were happy.
A quick short nap and then we were all ready to take a dip in the pool, they have a very nice huge pool in about 3 segments, with a few pool games and a nice bar serving drinks while you chill in the pool or by the pool.
the hotel is situated in the middle of everything, so all you need to do is step out and take a tuk tuk or van and hop off where ever you want
Breakfast was lovely with a huge spread and a good selection for kids too.
i would definitely recommend this property to anyone for a very very good comfy stay in Pattaya

The service is excellent, the price is fair , must go if you're a big fan of Rock n Roll!Highly recommend !! And find KIN !Best staff in the hotel, treated customers like friends!
Inquire him for more information if you're looking for somewhere special😏😊

what can I say this place is great spend a little extra and upgrade to kings club free drinks and nibblys turn down service and just fantastic people great pool for all family plenty of activities all day the staff out side are really friendly  every sat night foam party great fun kids will be beside them selves

This is my five time live in hardrock hotel.The hotel is near shopping center,comfortable,the room is clean & staff polite.The breakfast is also very good.In outdoor of swimming pool,the watervolleyball game is my favorite game in hotel.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
We had received our stay as a gift and were looking forward to utilising the pool for our toddler to get out of Bangkok.  We knew it was a Hard Rock Hotel and expected it to be a little louder than our usual hotel experience.... louder whoa!  We had checked with the staff as to the pool party finishing time and were told it finishes at 9pm and don't worry the rooms are soundproof!  Well we kept our toddler up til 9pm with a late nap, a longer dinner and activities which were great.  Then retreated to our room for the evening.  Then the music started!  I felt like I was in the middle of a nightclub with an 18month old.  The room was in no way soundproof and if our toddler hadn't been such a little gem we would have left right then and there!!
Such a shame as after a great day by the pool, we were exhausted with little sleep to follow.

Location food pool rooms this hotel has it all. Staff are great friendly and helpful rooms are new well appointed and the food is to die for. I'm sure you to will have a rockin stay.
Life guards on pool duty keep swimming area immaculate, check in staff are on top of things sometimes its nice to see how staff handle a hurdle when you arrive but here its not even a speed hump they just rock on.
Love to note left on my bag 
"you can check out, but you can never leave"
 Rock on staff I look forward to staying at any Hard Rock after this one 
Oh and I special thanks to Piawum the security guard every time I walked in or out there he was a hello or a rock on a smile a welcome and if you need any thing I'm sure he would be more than happy to help strangely he had the face I took away from the hotel.
Thanks for a great stay see you all soon

Incredible rooms with god views of the beach. Food is good and bar is excellent.. if u are a hard rock fan u get a chance to buy a lot of memorabilia.. access to all the good hotels in pattaya and the walking street is close by.
Overall a good hotel and well worth the amount you pay...

Excellent hotel! 
Perfect location!
Excellent & superfast service!
Great breakfast! Great Family hotel!
Beautiful swimming pool with beach style Cabanas!
Pool foam party on weekends not to be missed.
Hard Rock Cafe - cant go wrong with this!
Nice clean rooms with balcony in several rooms.
Superfast wifi in the room and everywhere in the hotel.

Tell the cleaners to be more quiet. I also ate at the buffet breakfast and got food poisoning spent a day in the hospital. The staff were about the only good thing about the place I will not be recommending this hotel to others

Excellent hotel!  Great staff, service, facilities and food!
Staff very helpful with booking tours. 
Rock spa was great!
Hard Rock Cafe has awesome food! 
We had access to the Kings club which was excellent!  
Could not fault! 
Enjoyed our stay!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Love the hotel interior deco & outdoor pool,unfortunately hard to find halal thai food at this area..mostly indian food only. Great shopping place with walking distance. Near the beach for tourist spot. I love it

I stayed here with some mates and was treated to the stay by one of them so I cant say I was over charged but had I been paying myself there are a lot more better value places about in Pattaya with larger rooms and just as good service.
The food is fine and tailored to the western palate I am sure, again it is Thailand and I wanted authentic Thai food so sorry chef you just dont fit the bill.

Hard rock rocked our stay in Pattaya as usual, never doubted our stay!
Thanks to their amazing staff that were entertaining, helpful, funny and awesome. 
Thanks goes out to Sax, Quito, Keng and Willy from the pool's staff. 
Ciara, Ann, Paris, Som-O and Channel from the Kings Club's staff.

My husband and I just had an overnight relaxing break and stayed in a deluxe sea view room which had an amazing view! The room was so comfortable and had a lovely balcony. We had access to the Rock Royalty Level Lounge where we enjoyed afternoon tea with again an amazing view . We also had breakfast which as usual was delicious will something for everyone. We will be back again very soon !
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
everything is good. near to Central world. where you can eat at the food court, and do your shopping. friendly and helpful staff, 
1st time staying in Hardrock hotel and we enjoyed that.  Pleasure surprise to receive a birthday cake from the hotel to celebrate my partner's birthday
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Very nice hotel with characteristic design, and of cause friendly stuff that helps us to arrange our daily activities.
Special thanks to jj and simon for  introducing great attractions to us!!
Last but not least, although the pool is under renovations,the hotel bring us to sai kaew beach, good job!!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Overall, It's a nice hotel and value for money. We were quite comfortable stay with complete facilities both indoor and the outdoor. we also enjoyed the varies events very much and very satisfied with the services. The staff were very friendly and could do enough to make our stay enjoyable. The room was very well equipped, clean and modern. The food was great with lot of International and Asian choices
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Really excellent experience. The accomodation is modern and unique and the staff are helpful and freindly. Only downside was that the pool was closed for renovation but, don't worry, it's open and brand new on the 31st October 2017 and the beach is only a stones throw away. Food and service in the hard rock is also at a very high standard. Highly recommend a stay here if you are visiting Pattaya.
Dan J

The best Stay in pattaya!! we stayed in july 2019. The hotel is at great location with super awesome interiors. Rooms are clean.Awesome breakfast. Best hotel to stay with kids as they have separate swimming area for kids.Also have activities for kids. They provided us with a cake for our kids birthday too! fridays/saturdays they have pool party for kids as well as for elders. Beach is just at a distance of crossing a road. the hard rock cafe is awesome! Also would like to make a special mention for the SPA facilities which were awesome. Thank you Pim and the team for the wonderful service at the SPA.

Hard rock hotel Pattaya is best place for  Staturday night pool party is best part of hard rock you can really enjoy it  and Good place for photography also its location is  near to market , beach........

The staffs of this hotel are awesome! Very helpful and genuinely friendly towards us..love the ambience of the hotel's entrance..love the indonesian live band on HRC..easy access to the beach..we really enjoyed our stay!

This hotel is just by the beach. I can choose to walk along the beach during sunset or just enjoy the pool. Its very near to a prominent central festival mall and also the traditional market. The night market and street bars are all around. Street food is fantastic and clean. It is a good place to enjoy, relax and shop. My trip with my spouse is definately great. There is floating market to visit and several farms nearby. Get ready small change as I go along and buy food on the street and buy some souvenirs.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: It is a good location, one of the top in Pattaya. Employees are very friendly and the general atmosphere is relaying . Food was very good and a variety is offered. Among all the employees from reception desk to the cleaner, no one could be highlighted, they all were very professional.

Nice rooms and clean enough, location is good one minute walk to the beach 
5 minutes walk to the mall many restaurants around the area, But service is horrible, none exist to be exactly. If you looking for good quality service at this hotel please go somewhere else. But if you looking for fun night getaway it ok to stay here, overall it fine hotel just didn't have service at I expected specially for a "Hard rock hotel"

All staff are trained very well and made us feel very comfortable with their neatly service and politely welcome. Nicely seaside pool and sea view room (519) Thank you so much for you guys hospitality. Keep it up your good works!!

There was not enough room for smoking rooms on the smoking floor.
It was a non-smoking floor. I asked for a room change because I had a smoking room, but I was told that I could change it the next day.
I think it is very difficult to change the room the next day, and I think the answer is the same as the answer that you can not change. I thought that compensation for these damages was natural, but I was dissatisfied with the end of beauty.
I am satisfied with the other parts. The staff was kind and satisfactory. The pool staff helped children to swim and play safely. I am grateful for helping me to have a pleasant day.

Close to shopping, reastuarants, bars, and beach.  Decent breakfast, and other good dining options available right at hotel. Hard Rock café is located on property with live music every night.  Large pool and good lounge areas.  Acitivities available on site or for booking with hotel.  Entire staff was friendly and helpful.   For improvements , the rooms could use an exhaust fan in the bathrooms to vent air during hot showers.  halls could use a fragrant deodorizer-to alleviate the slight hint of odor from the humid thai air.  Overall highly recommend staying here.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The best hotel in pattaya and I will come back in the summer with my children because I am interested and the swimming pool it was very nice with sawna and the beach near the hotel finally you have many choices for shopping

I was there with my family, and we have checked in to the king club. Rooms where pretty standard, as expected of a great hotel. Love the service at the club lounge, it was amazing. Each and every staff greeted us with a smile. 
We were staying for 5 days, and it was great service all the way. dining at the restaurant was good too. The tom yum blew me away, it was delicious. 
The location of Hard Rock Hotel in Pattaya was great too, it was just nice , not too far from all the action, but far enough to be away from the noise. 
The swimming was great, as my nephew loves to swim. It was a huge pool, and we spend most of our time lazing around the pool or going for a dip. 
Great Hotel!!!

Great Location, Value for Money , Excellent Service, from the check in Ms Lucy professional with a smile, to the Pool service and general the whole team .strongly recommend the BBQ Dinner, and selection of Breakfast goodies is Delight full . Keep it up.

Stayed late September for 6 nights,travelled on my own and made very welcome from the minute I arrived,all staff from security to night desk reception very friendly,room great,hotel has great friendly feel and my guests were made to feel welcome,have just booked again for march

Really i don't have any bad word to say about the Hard Rock Hotel in Pattaya.
It's the best hotel i have ever been in.
The staff are extremely nice and caring.
I came after a motorbike accident and they didn't stop of taking care of me.
The hotel got all the services.
We got room service at 3:00 AM and everything was great.
You have to be very petty not to like this hotel.
Such a great experience to be in such hotel.

Hard rock is awesome place to stay in pattaya, specially for family and couples.
My room no. ws 723. which made this stay much more special.
all major areas is near to hotel say beach, walking str, restaurants, art in paradise, etc
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: great place to stay at from the room showers food well done would stay again...pool was big ...pool party was awsome.. staff was great ...food was nice very clean value for money location is great.sleep was good no noise..rooms are big and clean...

Our journey did not start well. Our airport transfer was not there upon arrival. We had to wait for another 45 minutes. The cost was about THB2800. Luckily the checking in & out was quick and smooth enough. To access to your floor, you need to insert room card upon entering the lift. Good system to have! We discovered later, you don't have too...maybe its not in working order.
The corridor from the lift lobby to the room is of black carpet & wall of dark colour. Its make you feel walking into a tunnel. I guess that's how the whole concept of fame design associated with Hard Rock Hotel. The room fairly ok. Ours - with balcony!
Bathroom needed a bit of work - our shower mixer don't seem to work properly, delivering either too hot water or cold water! 
You be envy of all the other guest dressing down & you are there to attend meeting! Overall food & surrounding facilities ok, the design maintaining an overall theme of fame & famous. Food at Hard Rock Cafe lovely with a very friendly waiters & waitress to assist you. The swimming pools area fantastic too. Language make be an issued. So speak clearly and listen carefully. Repeat if you have too.

Fantastic hotel with a good location. The pool is super and very well maintained, staff and food equally good, the only drawback if u wanna call it a drawback is the room size, the dimensions are not cumfortable, but the hotel compensates for that, great activities for kids.
Overall a wonderful place to visit

It may be wet because of the reason at the seaside. In general, it is very pleasant.
There is a happy hour on Saturday, and you need a ticket for 300 baht. The room can be used to listen to songs, play bubble bath, pool party.

Perfect location, service was impeccable,walking distance to Walking Street if you're gonna check out the nightlife. I will definitely come again if I make my way back to Pattaya again soon. Highly recommended.

We're not beach lovers, swimming pool buffalo's or night clubbers; just some middle aged executives wanting some fussless onsite relaxation, good food and Spa treatments. 
We certainly didn't return to Pattaya because of Pattaya (yes, it's an absolute dump - and the last place on earth I'd go for a honeymoon or a family vacation!) but because my wife and I wanted to enjoy a few days of R&R, Hard Rock style. 
The rennovated hotel rooms are very well appointed and comfortable; the food quality spot on, and staff as welcoming, friendly and efficient as always. Value for money guaranteed! 
Spa services are excellent, and if the treatments are good enough for the Thai PM (who was also there during our stay) I'm sure they're more than good enough for Pattaya's average tourists. 
Yes, we'll most definitely be back....again, and again!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Pool equipments should be used for free. They suppose to be a service without charges for tourists. The service and room quality are good. The location that near the beach is very awesome. I think I like that.

My go to hotel on family vacation! I love the environment, the amazing facilities, the employees and especially all the entertainment for the whole family! The food is also great! Love IT and highly recomend it!

took "club" room, nice room, cool service,
amazing relax, best ever pool in front of sea,
cool foam party,
one of the best places to stay in patay.
had breakfast only at 9 floor
 long registration, even in the club zone, poor cleaning
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: This was the first time I have ever stayed in  a Hard Rock Hotel and this was an amazing experience. Rooms were comfortable and clean. Swimming Pool is clean , the weekend foam party was super. Loved the spa, though a bit expensive. Great food.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: From the airport pick up to check in, stay and check out the service here was SUPERB! Location was good, pool was great and service outstanding! The crew was ever willing to assist and always in a happy mood!

I didn't like that i couldn't eat my fruits at the pool. Pool boys were nit not nice to me. One of the stump his foot on the board to wake me up and one stood behind me sucking up mucu from his nose like he was going to spit.

The "lagoon" style pool for kids was great and on Saturday they had many activities. Overall, a nice weekend with helpful and pleasant staff.  One of the better hotels in Pattaya for a family vacation.

After few years from previous visit, the service is still friendly and great. The rooms are clean and nice. The beds are comfortable. A little downside was the hot water shower will gradually turn cold and not hot anymore. Other than that, will still come back again next time.

Heard mixed things about the HRH but after checking it out, I can't rate it highly enough. We came and stayed for the Fireworks Festival and had drinks and dinner at the Moon Deck. Best place to be for this time of year. Also had a guitar delivered to the room for some jam time. If you can play, make it happen!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Im a hotel manager myself 
I would give Chakrit a high manager position he is the best working person at your hotel 
Every one needs to learn from him 
It’s people like him that keeps people like me coming back
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I feel noisy too much here at that day.
I have baby .she cant sleep all night.
in the mornong , at restrant I didnt feel  good . My.baby is not interesting in also.
please Revice it .
but place condition is very good.
We can go everywhere convenient.

Is a very nice location if you would like to experience the night life in Pattaya. There is a nice pool at the hotel however, I am very sorry to say that they didn't make their pool shine. The pool was a bit dirty... And watch out if you do not know the area very well, most of the staffs can't speak very well in English and I did not think that they could help us by providing any kinds of tourist information. Another issue which annoyed me the most was the thin wall, guess I don't have to give a full explanation on it as it is just so obvious.

We have stayed at the Hard Rock before, but this time we chose a Kings Club room. The rooms themselves are only slightly better than the deluxe rooms. What sets the Kings Club experience apart is the use of the Kings Club Lounge.
The complimentary breakfast was small, but very nice. They have a selection of items you can have cooked to order (poached eggs on toast with hollandaise, Angus steak burger, waffles etc.), as well breads, fruit, juices etc.
The lounge is available all day for complimentary soft drinks, and there is a cocktail hour (6:30pm-8:00pm), where they serve delicious snacks (sushi, cheeses, cooked fish, chicken goujons, fresh mussels & prawns etc.), with a change of dishes every night. They also serve complimentary cocktails, beer, and wine. This makes for a quiet, sophisticated start to what can be a rather 'lively' evening in Pattaya.
The Kings Club rooms are bit more expensive that standard rooms, but if you like a little sophistication - then the Kings Club lounge is worth it.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Nice hotel, nice pool, the room size is big enough especially for us who travel with kids. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Hotel location is so strategic that it is so convenient for us to hang around the town area.

A bit removed from "downtown" Pattaya with its pedestrian zone (15 minutes walking), the Hard Rock Hotel is separated from the beach only by the promenade. Restaurants & shops start after approx. 200 meters. The hotel has a large pool area & tennis courts. Breakfast was very good with Thai & western food. The rooms are pretty standard with tiny balconies and with their white furniture do not give you a really homely feeling. The rock star "murals" didn't make it any better for me. Good: room safes are large enough even for bigger laptops. Hard Rock hype aside, it's a good middle class hotel but nothing special. Unless you are there for the parties, there's better value hotels in the area.

If you like to be packed with fun and activities, this is the hotel you want to pick. There's are lots of activities for the kids, ie magic show, rock climbing, swimming lesson, etc. There's nothing short for the adults either with different theme buffet dinner, rock band @ Hard Rock Cafe every night and the rocking solid foam party every Saturday. The location is quite central along the Pattaya Beach that allows you to access north or south side of the road.
On the lowlite, the management may want to consider upgrading the room carpet and perhaps keeping the room a little specky clean. (I found my last stay at the hotel with a room that is a little dusty)
Do check out this hotel if you are intending to have rocking fun time in Pattaya.

It's so convenience for the hotel location. The breakfast is good. 
But the below items could be improved:
1. The hotel maintenance is at average level.
2. The noise level could be improved because I can often hear somebody's walking and talking outside the room.
3. The wifi of the room is neither fast nor stable.

It has been a wonderful and awesome stay for my family and I during our short break in Pattaya. The facilities, staffs' friendliness and food are all great. Arrangement of the room and assignment of the beds also greatly appreciated as they helped my family to sleep better at night.

stay there for a night in early Oct
1st view of the place was splendid Hotel lobby huge and spacious
checkin is all the way in, friendly and nice staff though slightly slow
interesting keycard with a lanyard
comfortable room, facing the sea view but not that sea looking afterall
huge bed, interesting TV channels, i mean is american hotel so there must be english channels on them
though is an old hotel but room is new and innovative with its designs yet retro enough with pictures of interesting musician
bathroom is great though it will do much better if there is a door for the shower room to the sink itself
breakfast fantastic
definitely worth staying there again if im ever in town for work again

Me and my wife stayed at Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya from Oct-28 to Nov-4, 2018 to celebrate our Pearl wedding anniversary. The hotel is excellent and they have the best breakfast, very friendly staff. The facilities are great and we enjoyed very much from there.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I've been fortunate to visit the Hard Rock 3 times this year and although they have been for business purposes I love the place.
I've sung the praises of the hotel and it's facilities in the past but been a bit unfair as regards the business side of things but I take that back!
The staff in the hotel can not do enough for you and it's nice to be remembered when you check in again; especially before you have told them your name.
During may last visit I again extended my stay by a few days and was able to relax and enjoy the hotel more.
The café is great with a very good house band and the staff working in there seem to enjoy the atmosphere as much as the guests.
All in all I find it difficult to be negative about the HR and will whenever possible will stay there.
Well done to the Management team and all the staff from reception to housekeeping and security to entertainment.

Feeling great staying at Hard Rock Hotel because of its strategy locations andi wonderful service here. I got chance to meet a GYM instructor Keng bc who is very helpful in sharing his Gym knowledges and introducing Gym facilities to all of us. He also thought us some simple technique that could practice at home. Feeling grateful. 
Aside, room are beautiful, modern and very cosy. Good recommendation.

really love the place, the people, the food. everything! stayed at room 1011 (13/9-15/9 2017) for my birthday. and everything was superb! staff are friendly and helpful. will definitely recommend this place. im the type of person who not easily fell asleep with unfamiliar bed, however i fell to sleep instantly on your bed!!!!

Good food, Good location, good hospitality , good service, good pool area, great cabana and free wifi. We are in love with hard rock. Whatever and when ever we asked room service, they responded within 5 minutes. 
Only disappointment was room...we wanted king size room with balcony with sea view but we  have been given room  with twin beds and no balcony. That was a disappointment although we find room clean and spacious.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Is really can stay in the hotel for the whole day.Have a lots of facilities to enjoy. But just some of the signboard not really clear. Like sauna and collect towel counter. Maybe can have staff in mobile type to  help on it better than just stand/sit in front of the desk. Then one more suggestion to your maintenance team,the sauna room door's magnet not really secure as too tight when the magnet is function a bit worry after the door close can it open.

Not our cup of tea. Chinese guests crowdy and inpolite. Hectic moments at breakfast room with Chinese with no manners  sorry but we will not stay here anymore  Staff correct and polite but we were really look for other place
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Overall was great facilities breakfast buffet location 
Except that's a manager at front desk doesn't seem very professional when we checking in and out. She just kept us waiting for more than 15 mins in a non busy weekday noon time until we asked for another help the whole process just been done in a minute! 
Also that's a cooking staff in egg section  who was not doing fair to customers while we ordering food 
Other then that . We were happy during our stay

We had great fun at Hard Rock Pattaya. There pool is awesome and they organise lots of games during day time to keep guest involved. 
There spa is awesome plus there chilled pool dip is just perfect after sauna.
The location is good on the beach.
Breakfast is decent.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I never regret to book this Hard Rock Pattaya. I have one night using Rao Tiew Duay Gun promotion for Thais promoting domestic tourism. Since the booking process, K Fluke helped me with prompt response, informative and yet very professional and that made my stay really smooth. The club room on 9th floor this trip is such an amazing choice if you're looking for great space with stunning Pattaya beach view from your room. The check in by K Ning's team, K Ann and Nong Gift are superb, no doubt why a lot of Thai and international guests chose this beach resort destination. The pool is a must visit too, K Sake and team entertained me whole afternoon, I loved the vibes of pool activities plus great and unique designs of this lovely pool, great for your Instagram shots/posts. Hard Rock

I came here with my partner from Sep20-28. We loved the room, we had a great view of the water and pool. The staff are even better, could not be more impressed with the way we were treated. We had access to Happy Hour in the Soul Lounge every nite, the girls working in there always had a smile on their faces and always made you feel welcome, plus they never minded pouring another drink :)  The girls from what i remember where "Taylor Swift" and "Whitney Houston" - lovely people! - I'm sure these girls will remember us.great front desk staff helped us from day 1 to day 8. always helpful and the days my partner and I were sick we had people go to the chemist for us, so helpful..the pool was huge, the hard rock cafe was awesome at nights, the live band devotion were great. we will DEFINITELY going back to THIS HOTEL next year . I miss it !!!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Excellent place for families, nice pool, gym. Very relaxing atmosphere. Great sleep, nice breakfast. And great location in Pattaya Central.
Also Hard Rock Cafe great place to dine and listen to a great band

The atmosphere in the hotel is friendly. I liked in the hotel almost everything. The big minus is the lack of access to the pool. The children are really lacked the animation team and the swimming pool.I hope the next time the pool will work and I will be able to fully assess the merits of this hotel.

On Sunday, Despite repeated requests by inter phone, I  have not received the tooth brush at that night and got it next day around 11 am. I have spoken with at least 3 steps over the phone. Thank you for taking the time to hearing my comments.

For me, this hotel have given me an experience that I will not forget forever. The people are full of smile. Everybody is always so courteous. From the security guards who already knows you and greets you when you meet them. The front  office girls was very nice.The housekeeping was doing their job very well.About the food, I was unable to test further due to some dietary issues but I tried some of their cakes and they was DELICIOUS!!!! So, guys, keep on ROCKING!!! You guys are the best.

I'm on vacation with my friend's family at Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya. The hotel is very stylish with its unique design. The wall is decorated with many types of guitars and picture of guitarists. The view on that hotel is beautiful, you can see the ocean all the way from your room. 
At this hotel, the foods are terrific. I ordered the wagyu beef burger charcoal grill, the bun is very rich and the beef is very tender. It comes with fries and salad. We ordered pepperoni pizza with olive and it was truly amazing. And nn the morning, you’ll get a really nice breakfast buffet.
There's many choices for movies or TV shows you can choose too! At 3:30 pm there's a bubble party at the pool, unfortunately I didn't join the party but it was a very nice concept. The pool is very different from other places, there's 2 zones on the pool, there's a place with sands so you would feel like you’re actually at the beach and the other zone was a regular pool with 160 cm deep or 5 feet 2 inches. In the morning, you’ll get a really nice breakfast buffet. 
I think this hotel is almost perfect, but overall, it is a really nice hotel that you must try, you’ll never regret it. Hard Rock Hotel is one of the most unique hotel I’ve ever been with its clever design of decorating the wall with expansive guitars, making you feel like you’re at the concert.

The hotel is a good location that we can easily go to everywhere in Pattaya. Good service in the front desk. I like the breakfast. 
We enjoy the trip in Pattaya and next time I come ,I will stay here again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Room was clean, staff very friendly and speak in your language. Delicious and diverse breakfast (American, European, Chinese, Korean), Thai food is available too. Excellent location - not so far from walking street, mike shopping mall and night market.

My first time in Thailand and found the people in Thailand to be happy and good people.  The hotel staff reflects this.  They go out of there way to be accommodating and truly kind people.
The restaurant facing Beach Road was a blast.

Friendly staff throughout the hotel and restaurants great breakfast with an excellent range of food Relaxing pool environment with sun for the most part of the day The beach is directly across the road

Your have a wonderful team to run the hotel. They always smile and greet me with my name, help me to solve my check in problem, called me to confirm I received what I requested, ask me anything they can assist me when I sit quietly at the dining table. They are all great staff!!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Overall I have good experience to stay at the hotel.... But hot and cool water in room were not stable, difficult to control and make it balance.... Staffs are nice and breakfast are good... but same dishes every morning....

Stayed at the hard rock, pataya , and we were forced to pay for christmas dinner in our package, what a rip  off poor food horible wines which  by the way were extra charge , all  to   gether  cost 500 australian dollars for two with one bottle of wine.and we left within one hour, We were in the club rooms for our accomadation which were just o/k The only good thig about   it was free snacks and a drink in the evening, but when you look at the package price it is very pricy, The manager was vert helpfull but you could see he had very little room to assist his guests,
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
the hotel and the rooms have an excellent ambience with photos of rock stars.
Great rooms, service and breakfast.
The beach is right across the road of the hotel.
The hotel is located on the main pattaya beach road in the middle of the happening street.
When in Pattaya, do enjoy the Coral Islands and ride rental bikes.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I went to Pattaya in Sep 16 to Sep 18 2015. Whole journey is raining and flood. We just enjoy to sleep in this hotel. Friendly staff. The hotel is spacious. All the services is good. Strongly recommend.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I visited hard rock 2 weeks ago and was there for 9 days. How can I start to describe my experience? It was fantastic. The staff are amongst the friendliest in the world. I feel more at home at the hotel then I do at my own home. 
The staff REALLY go out of their way to make your stay memorable. I love it there even after visiting them on 8 occasions. 
The pool is awesome, it is huge, clean and well maintained. the staff by the pool are also at a world class level. Special thanks to Sachs, kito, JR, Pinki, Tiger and the rest. I loved playing those activities day in and day out.
The dinner was also very nice, you will find the best food in Pattaya there. The burger however was not as good as my last visit in 2013, but still very good.
I will be back again next year with my wife and son. I want to send a special thanks to Ralph and Ann who have really transformed my experience at hard rock to make it very memorable. my thanks also extends to Anna, Sierra, and all the hardworking watchmen. 
Thanks Hardrock!!!

Over weekend we had gone to enjoy and it was worth to stay.
Foam party was good and hotel is near to walking street. Hotel has all basic amenities are there. Hotel was crowdie, much of staff can’t speak in English and we are not able to communicate with every one for our requirement. 
Otherwise Hotel is Good and food is also okay, little costly but manageable.

The property is located right at the midst of beach road.
The Best part-
1) Right at the centre of beach road.
2) The rooms are pretty spacious &  decor is very impressive.
3) Neatly done interiors .
4) Lot of amentinities to enjoy with family - Large swimming pool , Baby pool , indorr games room , poolside cafe , Gym & Spa
5) The staff is very courteous & helpful .( infact we took a late night flight & arrived around 8.00 a.m  and to our surprise they considered our request for early checkin---- this was teh best gesture that the frontdesk people could have shown)
6) Major nearbuy attractions are 10-15 minutes drive.
7) Walking street is close by & one can make a leisure walk to the spot.
As it was a weekend we saw lot of family crowd who came with their children & were haveing a gala time at the property.

So I visit this hotel once or twice a year, and it is always the same great quality of service accompanied with smiles and greetings from all staff members, however this time I would like to extend a special thank you to Karol from the Hotel's fitness center, she not only helped me out at the gym but she also managed to help me find a place to play Badminton when she knew that it was my favourite sport, such a lovely person. Highly recommend hotel.

!We live in Bangkok and love to come to Hard Rock for long weekends.
Always fun to stay at Hard Rock Pattaya with family, great and helpful staff from reception to restaurants! Especially 99Band (Yuri & Co), we love them, very talented and great music every day!  My son thinks that 99band is the best band ever :)
Good location and good entertainment! Will come bacK!

Not too many 5 star hotel will make you feel so happy during spend your time with them but Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya can make it.  Every staff are so nice, good service mind friendly and very vivacious. I feel relaxed and really like their work clothes a lot ^^   See you in very soon.Walaiporn Hsu Room#1033

WARNING THIS HOTEL CHARGES 2000bht/day or $55/day security deposit.I had to go to the police to get my money back.Nothing worked,toilet over flows a/c didn't work,beds old and hard.mngt. doesn't care.I flushed toilet it over flowed every time and they sent a maid to clean.This place is the worst hotel,DON'T STAY HERE.They charge $110 plus $55/day security deposit and claim all kinds of absurd charges.THESE PEOPLE ARE THEIVES.GO TO THE IMPERIAL HOTEL NEXT HOTEL $25/DAY.NO SECURITY DEPOSIT AND WAY SO MUCH BETTER

Everything  was better than I expected! Very nice pool, good food, perfect service, clean rooms. I Hope i will be back soon! Very good Live music  at Hard Rock Cafe! Everyday Barbecue at the Stars Diner, very delicious!

The swimming pool water is very dirty.
Before you promise will provide a small birthday cake to me for celebrate my birthday, but finally i not yet received, so very disappointed.
Toilet has cockroach.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: we are so happy that stay for there. good swimming pool.Where can move comfortably navigate location. Those who worked there were always kind and cheerful.Seview  that it is really pretty. The only downside is that there is no balcony.

Staff gave your stay a Very personal touch (especially Quito Who works at The swimming pool)..overall a wonderpil experience With understanding and caring staff. If The staff is The moest important aspect of a hotel then This is surely The case here!

My partner and I stayed here for 12 days in September 2012. On arriving the staff couldn't have been more helpful both at front of hotel and reception, our bags were taken to our room and X explained things to us plus gave us a street map of Pattaya and places to see.
The hotel is beautifully designed, our room was on 6th floor over looking the sea, wonderful, and had everything we wanted, plus a bowl of fresh fruit to welcome us.Its situated right near the beach and not far from the towns amenities.
The pool area was suited to all ages with games orgasnised daily, Jamie, Top and the many others served us always with a smile and a chat, asking if we needed anything else This made our holiday even better.
Whilst I was there I had an unfortunate accident one evening in Pattaya and the evening staff organised transport to the best hospital for me and on my return there was a beautiful basket of fresh fruit which I appreciated emensely.
I would thoroughly recoimmed this hotel to anyone and hope to visit again sometime in the future.
The only small thing I would say would have made it even better would be free wifi.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
the rooms are very standard although we took the club rooms not very impressed with the rooms .
food in the lounge is ok breakfast was fine 
we tried a BBQ dinner and was a disaster has nothing to do with HR  quality .
pool is good and the location is nice
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I love this hotel. Definetly will go back again. First, the room condition was nice, cozy, clean and cool. The swimming pool was awesome! Very big and clean. Poolside bar was also nice. You can enjoy the bert and cocktails inside the pool! All the staffs, espeically staffs in the pool (probably bar staffs) was amazingly kind and friendly. Much appreciated them again. They do foam party every saturday and it was very enjoyable as well. And the breakfast was delicious, many kinds of foods. it was very good enough.

Attended a conference late August. Very well organize with the airport transfer and easy check in.Very good & friendly service from everybody from the service staff to the managers. Delicious food. Manager kindly organize for my late check out. However did not manage to try the Spa.

Hard rock cafe was an amazing hotel food was nice .Hotel very clean and the band Black Velvet who played on the moon deck and the cafe were amazing and really friendly and made my holiday.cheers guys and girls.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: As with any Hard Rock resort, it was an excelllent choice for us. Theres 24 hour security at the gates, and the hotel staff are very kind and helpful. The pool is nice and big and the room was as well. The only thing was that the hotel does not know any reputable taxi drivers. We had one take us to the airport who kept demanding the money during the trip and yelling at us. We told him to turn back and go back to the hotel. When we got back, the hotel said another taxi would be 15 minutes. We ended up waiting 45 mins. None came so one of the employees had to drive us to the taxi station. This process made us late to the airport which is never pleasant. Hopefully this is an issue their working on.

nice place for family vacation, swimming pool so good, very polite staffs for The Great Charcoal BBQ Buffet at Starz Diner and reasonable price and please reduce cash deposit from 2,000 THB to be lower rate (~1,000 THB is acceptable rate)
#NAME?

Its location is at midtown which is comfortable. You can walk down to the beach. The cafe is so cool. Relaxing with your friend. Breakfast is ok  there is swimming pool in the hotel and fitness game room for children. There is tabletennis too for fun.

If it was not for the hard rock my stay in pattaya would have been miserable .pattaya turned out to be not a place for a family holiday.the staff at the hotel and cafe where very freindly and attentive

This was my first time to stay at Hard Rock Hotel.
We get a Sea View Room at 5th Floor, the room is clean, modern with a good interior design. The bathroom is Big enough for both us.
From our room, can see the sea view + the Hard rock pool and all this. When you relax on the sofa in your room, you also able to see the sun set from your room.
Hard Rock is well know for the cheerful and energy staff, from receptionist to bellboy and room service staff, they all are very friendly. When you stay at hard rock, their friendly and cheerful will make your days become more complete.
However it was so sad that for the daily breakfast at the hotel. One of staff show her bad mood to us and make us feel uncomfortable. Not only that, when we request for the new set of the Tableware, she just go to another table and took from that table. The Serviet from that table was dirty!!! Is totally can't use at all....
This is the only bad experience when we were there, the rest is all fine and perfect.
If got change i will be back to Hard Rock and stay there again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Nothing to complain.Beautiful room and was super clean.It was well maintained as well.Great staff all around the hotel.Breakfast was good,they had many varieties of food and drinks.The pool was also good as well.They also had games like table tennis in the hotel lobby.Surely will come back again.

Great hotel service. All staff has service mind & they're friendly. The food & drinks was nice. It's a nice design hotel. Impressive in every moment there. Especially the wonderful swimming pool. My daughter was enjoy playing the slide a lot. And she was enjoy playing in the kids club too.

We were picked up by the hotel driver in Bangkok right on time. Check in was delightful room excellent.  Cafe manager went above and beyond to accommodate us.  Driver services to tour was excellent and transportation back to airport was timely and secure.

Nice hotel but there are better once for the same cost.Good location and nice pool area. The laundry service is not ok, got one of my trousers back dirty.They didn't wash them,just steamd it! Nothing special at the SPA,except for higher prices than on the street. I don't think it's real educated therapist working there. Breakfast is OK,not more than that for an 4 star hotel. I won't book a room with lounge access next time. It's not a kind of lounge that I'm used to. Not sure I would choose to stay in this hotel again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Nice swimming poolexcellent foodclean roomexcellent accesspleasant staffEverybody made my trip perfect.Thank you for your quick feedback on your request.I'd like to visit Hard Rock Pattaya again.

My son really enjoyed your kid swimming pool with foam party activity. We will come back for sure.
Variety of food selections on breakfast but it would be better if you could provide fresh fruit/vegetable juice squeezed station.

I had an awesome stay, great facilities, friendly happy staff, will go out of there way to help, good hotel with clean rooms, swimming pool large, breakfast had great selection. and the location was good

The hotel was excellent service
The location was very good. You can walk to walking street in the night time 
The room have sea view from pattaya beach
The pool was great so big 
And the food from breakfast time so many variety 
Value of price of quality 
The best hotel in pattaya

This is a nice hotel, which is expected from a Hard Rock. But for me there are many better values on and around beach road for what you get at the Hard Rock. The food is "way" over priced (in my opinion) 650 baht for a pizza? You can buy a beautiful large pizza a block away on 2nd road for 250 baht. Also, i felt they try to cheap out on the little things like soap and towels (no face cloth). I guess I just expected a lot more from a hotel at this price point. I did like the staff, they all were extremely nice. The pool area is nice but again, you have to pay extra for things like floats and cabanas, they get you at every turn money wise. Lastly, the hotel is really far from Walking Street which can be bothersome especially when it rains. 
Food/Dining: 3 stars - because the food is way over priced; Hotel Condition/Cleanliness: 4 stars - because the workers do a great job cleaning but the condition of the facility is not as nice as you would expect at this price point; Location: 3 stars - for being across the street from the beach and access from beach road as well as 2nd road but too far from the action; Room Comfort/Standard: 4 stars - even though the view was not spectacular the bed was comfortable but they cheap-out on the everyday things mentioned above; Staff Performance: 5 stars - Staff was awesome; Value for Money: 2 stars - I won't go back, even if i hit the lotto

My recent stay at Hard Rock Pattaya was nothing short of amazing. Not only did the location of the hotel is perfect for a nice solo trip around Pattaya city, the hospitality and service shown by the staff there is enough to make you want to just stay in the hotel and enjoy.
One thing though, I chose the Rock Royalty room and honestly speaking, was a bit disappointed with it. The staff handling my check in and check out was extremely friendly and helpful and first evening cocktail and breakfast was divine. However, the problem started on the 23rd of September's evening cocktail: not only was the lounge crowded and the food wasn't enough, there was hardly any space left not sit. When we finally managed to sit, the staff didn't even acknowledge us or even take our order and chose to serve another family who arrived like 20 minutes after we arrived. My mood for the night was dampened as I just took a cookie and a pastry and headed straight out. Never did the evening cocktail anymore after that experience.
Nonetheless. the dining experience at Rock Starz Cafe was splendid. Menu was varied enough but I was disappointed that there were no Thai Spring Rolls though. The front desk staff were extremely helpful with all my enquiries and even helped me list down all my options for airport transport options.
A great experience and I would love to visit it once again :)

I stayed here for 3 nights with my wife in April, wish it was longer. I had a great time at the pool with the staff. We played basketball seeing who could hit the longest shot. lol good times but very hard to do while drinking beer. All the staff here are very frendly and always smiling. The food was great and priced well. I would recomend this hotel to anyone going to pattaya and looking for a place to relax away from the nightlife areas. I have already booked my next stay, see you Nov 29th Hard Rock!!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: very kindly service and beautiful profile, good food, nice music on the Saturday's night, very fin, the member can speak Chinese, so it can help us to get the good communication and the hotel room price is rational.

We stayed at this hotel just for the night, and were blown away by the place. A bit of confusion upon checking out but it was sorted.    Rooms clean, bathroom fabulous, friendly staff, pool - well, lots to do for the kids,  café food was tasty and good and the night time in the café was really good.    The staff really get into the band.   We would stay there anytime.

I'm not the biggest fan of Pattaya to be honest.  Having lived in Thailand 25 years I'm well aware there are better places to spend your time in this amazing country.  So I always try to persuade my son to spend his birthday trip in other places.  No way.  It always has to be Hard Rock Hotel.
Coming only 1-2 times year (this was our 5th trip) I'm always hesitant just because it's in Pattaya but the moment I arrive I realize why we love it so much.
This trip we had some very last minute scheduling problems and I was sure we would have to cancel and be charged for it.  Hard Rock did their best to help us move our stay to another date and charged us nothing.  I was stunned and so very grateful to be honest.
