Finally arriving to our Family Suite we were greeted to cake and an assortment of free drinks.  It wa say sons birthday and they had set this up for us without me even requesting.  I was a happy mom with a very happy 11 yr old.
Unfortunately the pool was under renovation this time but we got the Cartoon Network Package which is sooooooo worth it! We had a blast at Cartoon Network and were treated with free gifts, free entry and a free shuttle bus round trip. Yet again, another happy mom moment (not to mention even happier son).
Our room came with Rock Royalty privileges which meant we could have a more private free breakfast every morning, a lounge to stay in with a great view whenever we please and free cocktails for sunset.  The best happy mom moment (and husband was happy too).
I can't fault this place at all.  Food, rooms, service, cleanliness all amazing.  
Yes its a bit pricey compared to other options but what you get is so much more and that is thanks to the staff.  I've never met an unfriendly staff member here.  Ever.
So thank you Hard Rock for once again making my family so happy.  You are probably the only reason I'll step foot in Pattaya (and I think my son is happy about that).
:)

As I mentioned earlier, they didnt bother all my special request. Reservation department need to improve. Very dissapointed. Couple for twin bed , so funny.. dont have feeling to extend another nites..
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: This was the first time to stay this hotel. The room was nice and enough size for parents and 2 young kids. Morning meals were very good and clean, there were no flys or cockroaches there. The stuffs were all nice and smiling every time we met. We want to visit again.

Stayed here earlier this week with one of my mates as we are travelling through Thailand.  The hotel is very clean and spacious and the staff are very helpful. Breakfast was okay not sure it's worth the money tho.

Ive been BKK, many times but with my wife along on this latest trip, we decided to go to Pattaya. Been searching for which hotel to book and remembered HR and true enough - there is no better place to stay a quick one day/night than HR hotel. We even got free 2 mugs/cups upon check in just for being Rewards member.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Absolutely perfect for the hotel and services.One thing to remind is kid club is not free,compare to others famous hotel,its free.Employee have high service mind  and friendly. My family agree to return to stay  the hotel again.

I stayed at hard rock hotel pattaya beginning of the year, Pattaya is a good place and heard rock hotel is just on the waterfront and very close to the walking street. The hotel offer excellent service with some delicious food. The discotechque has good music during the evening and had foam party on weekends which is the biggest attraction in pattaya.

Super vibrant place for Family with kids/Friends or a romantic getaway. Love the pool bar .The rooms are very lively and chic. Location is apt too.Walking distance to the beach and all restro and markets.

room very clean mate clean up the room very fast ,staff good service mind especially at the rock royalty club stuff have a good suggestion and kindness for kids customer But I think for rock kids club is not suitable for charge 100 Baht, it should be free for your customer.

Short get away from Bkk. Good location. Everything was absolutely perfect. Very clean hotel! Staff are friendly and make the stay very pleasant.Check in and check out was completed withing minutes too.

The service at the bar in front should be improved. The male staff are AGGRESSIVE to the guess and they provide two standards.   I have been there with my boyfriend and they treated me like I am asking for the free drink comparing to how they welcome the group of Thai customers. Yet I am Thai and went there with the white guy and I could feel how discriminating and ignorant the staff are.   I have been to many different Hard Rock Cafe and it was my idea to went there. However, I am very disappointed and they made me afraid.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: This is my first time staying here. Is a great stay, my kids love it! We stayed in family suit with sea view. The room was spacious and nice view. Especially the club lounge, my kids love it!!! Their favorite hangout place!! The pool was nice and relax too!! Overall is great!!

Faded hotel with mediocre service and a choice of colors and design that even a prison for hardened criminals would not dare choose. There is nothing about this hotel to compliment about. Best stay away.

Really enjoyed my stay. The hotel facilities are awesome, the rooms are very comfortable. Possibly the most comfortable bed I've stayed in. I originally stayed in club room, staff member Paris was awesome and encouraged me to come back. 
Joe in the Hard Rock Cafe was fantastic, very friendly and good food and drink recommendedations. 
When checking out Gino in the pizzeria made sure my food came really quick so I can catch my cab.
The staff in the pool also organised some very fun games to play. 
Will definitely stay again if I come back

Hi! I'm Bombe , I was stayed Hard Rock Pattaya for 2 night. It's very nice, I was impressive the room and cafe. I liked the bed in room because it's so softness than other hotel. The room and bath are clean , when i was stay during period swimming pool has renovate... that make me feeling fail a little bit but it's ok. About breakfast, I think it's so so and  line breakfast not many food but I like a croissant very tasty. In the night you can enjoyed drink and drunk with the Hard Rock Cafe. Every on Saturday have Event Foam Party. I will inform now the pool has been renovated until 31 Oct' 2016. Thank you very much / i'm so enjoyed !!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
we are loyal guests, comparatively speaking, our previous staying are more impressive, staffs were more friendly, helpful and efficient
even the CS staff replying our booking email is lesser friendly nowadays and seems no privileges for returning guests (we have actually been staying for more than 5 times)
I tried to consult about this and being ignored
water pressure of shower head inside bathroom is poor (we are getting connecting room, and both rooms encountered the same problem), I have no choice but to take shower at changing room of swimming pool at the end

Suitable for family trip, mass of children programme, swimming pool activities, convenient location, beautiful environment, tasting food, sufficient hotel facilities, excited weekend swimming pool party
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
The service in this hotel is very good.
Foods are good
Location is good and very convenience
The swimming pool overall is very good and we do have fun to stay in this hotel
The room is nice, very clean and staffs are good

I was at the hard rock hotel for a short stay, the hotel was very good, cozy rooms, good selection of movies that can be watched, all the staffs there were helpful and friendly...only thing was the pool was closed don for renovation.

I just stayed from 24 to 25 september for a short business trip to thailand.. hotel have great ambiance on the poarch to room.. galary have great black interior touch. Nice smiling staff over all.. will stay again soon

Been an excellent place to be...its been the best by far (I'll prefer it on Sofitel), only draw back for me is the bathroom (to small) but still clean and excellent. Been an hard rock member for a while and my first visit to hard rock residence, was excellent, I will be a regular visitor to it now.

I stayed one night with a friend and it was great - friendly staff, good location, great rooms and view, comfortable beds. The breakfast was ok - slightly above average compared to other hotels in Thailand.

Just returned from our family holiday at the Hard Rock Pattaya. The staff were excellent, especially the pool staff who were fantastic with my son. After visiting the much larger and busier Centara Grand for the previous two years we would definitely choose the Hard Rock for our next visit.

Loved the quality of bed and pillows. Room size is not considered spacious, but just alright. Would definitely bring family along the next trip, I'm sure the kids would love the pool! Seafood buffet should be made available all days where possible

The second time we been to this hotel and will keep coming back. The location is really good , you are just across from beach and ideal location to get baht buses. 
The staff are so friendly so helpful. On arrival we upgraded to rock royalty club. Lovely lady called pearl helped us nothing was too much trouble for her. 
The rock royal club is worth the extra money, you get drinks and snacks and a lovely peaceful breakfast! Ideal after a night in Pattaya! From 6 to 10.30 and you can have alcohol from 6pm till 7.30 pm. 
Our suite is amazing , fantastic pool view and sea view , and it is really big with a large bath, 2 toilets lovely complimentary fruit and the toiletries are really nice. 
The pool is lovely and peaceful in morning and in afternoon a bit  more lovely with entertainment . 
Something for everyone here. Well done hard rock you smashed it.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I'm very happy  and impressive to service.  My daughter is very funny.  
She like  party foam.  All Staffs took good care of me that make our holiday was very impressive. See you next time. We love Hard Rock.

This is the 3rd visit Pattaya this year. We stay 8 days.
Our check in is efficient, We can get into our room very soon. The front office staff are always helpful with smiling all the time. They can remember and call our name .
The room is trendy, tidy, clean, well controlled air condition  comfortable bed with nice pillow, I slept tight here. 
The pool area are huge, clean except the day after heavy raining, there was some leaves, i think this is acceptable. There was a artificial beach with sand, boardcasting with music. The beachclub rockers are really amazing, they arrange many activities, adult or kids can also have fun here. On Saturday, there are many show as dancing, crown, balloon, stick, etc which are performed by the rockers. SPA is excellent, the therapist is very skillful.
The breakfast buffet  provide wide variety of choice. We can get our seat fast, environment is clean, staff are nice.
The Wifi is satisfactory.
We enjoy the sunset cocktail in the Soul Lounge, chatting with friends.
We appreciated all staff in this hotel, they are polite helpful with cheerful faces to greet you everyday. We love every moment and every staff here.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
We visited for one night only, so we didn't get to experience the whole service of this hotel. The location of the hotel was good, it had a beachfront path, it was also very close to Alcazar Lady-boy Show. There were a lot of restaurants and clubs near this hotel. 
When entering this hotel, it felt like entering a mall due to Hard Rock shop upfront and their guitar displays. FYI, the shop provided VAT return form. Our check in and out process was smooth and the deposit needed was 1000 Bath. The staff were also friendly. The bellboy was very prompt when delivering and picking up our luggages. 
Our room was 517, it was a average size room with queen bed and shower only room. The TV was small but the room had a long sofa inside. The view from our room was average for us. This hotel also had a beautiful breakfast restaurant by the pool, although the foods were average for us. The hotel provided blockbuster movies for free on their TV and gave a link to download free music upon check in (we didn't try this).
Now for the very down side that we experienced, there was no free WiFi. We were quite shocked about this. We had to choose their packages during check in if we want to use their WiFi. But from my WiFi list, the WiFi itself wasn't very stable. Next, the room looked clean but I was sneezing for a while and then got runny nose, there might be some dust somewhere in the room. In the bathroom, there was no toothbrush and toothpaste provided, they also only provided conditioning shampoo (no conditioner). There was also a broken power outlet in our room, and it was the international one.
Overall, this hotel may be most suitable for singles or couples on party or beach mood.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Staff are very friendly,pleasant and welcoming...Rooms are clean.Food is superb!i had the best Tom Yum soup ever....Ambiance is very relaxing.They have different amenities for the whole family.We enjoyed our night at Hard Rock cafe with a live band entertaining us.Walking distance to buy souvenirs and the best part is..beach is just across the street!! :-)
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: When i askt fore Weel done food i did never get that. Always blody inside . And the room was not good clean. All the do is make the bed. And Even that i durty. Badroom you get Noor good clean to. Hope this will be beter

Overall, for the price, and I believe a 4star rating, this hotel is great.
Rooms are clean, service is great, breakfast was very good, the dinner buffet was also very good, pool area is fantastic, reception is great.   Couldnt fault anything at all.
the only thing that I was a bit surprised was the mens toilet behind the swimming pools.  It was dirty, old smelly and really run down and reminded me of a neglected public toilet which surprised me when I went it

This wasn’t the best hard rock I’d been to! The room size was a bit small and there were a lot of very noisy intimidating guests who dominated the area. The breakfast buffet was good but very very hectic! Good location for the walking street but wouldn’t stay again!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: It was our second stay here, very nice hotel on excellent location, Great pool, very good breakfast offer, exceptionally kind stuff Only bad thing was to many noise from adjacent room, every night some guys come drunk talking loud and play music, bang the door etc , so it was impossible to get sleep before themIf you search for quiet holiday maybe Hard Rock is not the best choose...
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Me and my wife stayed in this hotel for 2 nights. This hotel is absolutely magnificent. The drive up us to the lobby it's feels so royal. Breakfast is classy. The hotel is so close tp terminal 21 shopping mall and beach. Next stay is already bookmarked.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
From the moment we got to the front desk to the time we checked out, my wife, one year old son and myself really had a great time. Check-In, although they were busy, was handled incredibly well and compared to the Sukothai in Bangkok, where we had just stayed, was an absolute pleasure. The room (Deluxe Seaview) was really nice.  It has been recently renovated and is modern and clean.  The bed was extremely comfortable.  The rate we got included breakfast.  The breakfast was more than adequate, but the restaurant was quite crowded and busy.  The staff were really patient with us and didn't rush us to leave when breakfast was wrapping up.  We rented a Cabana each day to lounge by the pool and it was well worth it (especially with the lil' guy).  The pool area is great with slides for the kids and a sand area where the little ones can run around.  The only complaint I have about the pool area is that the stairs to the slides is very poorly designed and in my opinion rather dangerous for children.  
The location is great and it's very convenient to the new mall and easy access to the beach.  If you're up for it - it's a nice walk along the beach to walking street.  
Had a wonderful stay!  Primarily because of the great staff and will definitely stay there again if ever back in Pattaya.

its second for me to hard rock. but this time  fail me lot because of the swimming pool. can't use . I like your big swimming pool alot. it's not feel good espacially I took my freind with me by telling how wonderful swimming pool you have. really embarrassed.

Second visit to Hard Rock Pattaya. The staff is truly wonderful people dedicated to making your experience great. Can't be proximity to beach and entertainment. And of course great massages to keep you feeling good!!

My husband and I stayed there for 2 nights as a celebration for his birthday. Hard Rock Pattaya did not meet our expectations like other hotel did. First, front desk staffs were not welcoming and friendly. We saw cold faces and our room type wasn't ready the time we checked in (we booked a Deluxe City View DBL). We were asked to pick between Deluxe City View TWIN or an upgrade to Deluxe Sea View Disabled room. As we were told that the only difference was the bathroom, so we chose the upgrade. Second, our room was not clean. Black stains on bath towels, bedsheets, dusty bathroom, broken pillow case (the guitar logo area) and dirty carpet, HSKP needs to put more efforts on this please! No new bottles of shower gel or shampoo was provided on the next day after making up our room. We couldn't be bothered to request again as we had brought own own toiletries luckily! Note that no toothbrush, toothpaste, slippers is provided at this Hard Rock, do bring your own. Third, breakfast was satisfactory. It comes with many choices. The Thai noodle soup was my favourite. Comfy dining area. 
One thing i would like to compliment on Hard Rock Pattaya is their Security Staffs. They have the best smiling faces at your hotel. We could see they welcomed us "home"....
Thanks for the birthday cake to my husband too. I had actually emailed reservation in advance to arrange for it but as i couldn't see the cake at night time on his birthday. i had to call Front Desk to send me the cake myself.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Good location, along Beach Road.
Friendly and helpful staffs, going the extra mile to meet the guests' needs.
Good vegetarian Thai set lunch for meeting packages.
Special thanks to Waraporn, Patchara and Thitiwat for all the assitance rendered to the group.

We had a room on the last floor with sea view, nice, comfortable and clean. Very good in-room service, fresh fruit in the morning, candies or chocolates in the evening, the staff always asking if you need something (good point!)
The bathroom is too small and really lack of light.
Unfortunately we could not enjoy the swimming pool as it was being renovated...
The breakfast was ok, enough choice.
Walking distance : 5min to central festival mall. 20min to walking street.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Very nice hotel so do the staff, so helpful  good location for shopping, good swimming pool for kids, room really clean and also need to implement a halal food for Muslim those stay in HR Pattaya in future

This hotel has a lot to offer, providing you do not pay the walk-in rate. The pool is good, location great and the staff are extremely friendly. Breakfast was good, without being exceptional. We did not eat any other meals there. The rooms were neat and tidy, the bed was good, although the hanging space for clothes was not impressive. The range of TV channels was poor for such an international hotel. When we checked in there was a few people ahead of us but really took sometime to check-in, seemed a little inefficient. 
There seemed to be quite a few things for the kids and the pools are child friendly. There is even sand around the pool.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I stayed in Hard Rock Pattaya from 12th Nov to 14th Nov 2009 along with a few friends.
The Property is excellent, its clean and very well maintained.
The staff is very very professional, courteous and friendly and guide you absolutely correctly.
I will certainly visit again as soon as posible.

Hotel and entire facilities are very gud. try to improve variety dishes for breakfast. Location and parking is superb.I recommended this hotel for my colleagues and friends. it is good for business meetings as well as families.

Great friendly fun with all the conveniences- if your on a short break there is no need to leave the hotel. . Great location on Beach Road so access to Pattaya nightlife very easy and close by. Would recommend for familys as the swimming pool caters for all ages.

I actually stayed in this hotel for a business trip, my company is at Amata Nakorn industrial park and it's a good hour travel from Hard Rock. Traffic tends to build up during rainy days so just be sure to get back before 4PM. Century Festival mall (which has everything you need) is a good 5-10min walk. The beach view is good and the hotel's pool is just gorgeous - I'm just a bit sad not being able to use it since they just renovated it during my stay. The room is gorgeous as well especially if you choose the beach view but don't expect a good seat and desk for work, because it assumes you are there to relax. The soap they give you is aromatic. You can never go wrong eating and drinking in Hard Rock Cafe, just be ready with the price. Overall, I had a great and interesting stay (I recommend it for vacation).

the hard rock hotel pattaya is overrated, for 3000 baht u get a small room w/ no breakfast, if u want it is 400 baht xtra per person. i talked to a guest who went to breakfast & it was just a regular hotel breakfast, nothing special. the overwhelming vibe at this hotel, besides the feeling u get when u walk in like ur in a haunted house is to make money. the only thing giving away to guest is 3 small bananas in the afternoon, and 3 bottles of water. there are plenty of cheaper and better hotels on the beach in 
pattaya without the famous name that would be a better choice!

We stayed at the Hard Rock Hotel in Pattaya for a night and the place was heaven.
We got given a sea view room with a balcony and the room was splendid. Very very comfortable, with great TV/Internet facility... the room/bathroom and everything was very well decorated and followed the 'Hard Rock' theme consistently. I needed an iron and it was delivered after a few minutes of calling the room service.
The swimming pool was great, it even had a beach part with fake sand and all. We went to the beach but returned after 15 minutes as we found the pool better. If you've visited the South islands like Phi Phi then you won't really find the beach in Pattaya appealing. The hotel comes with several options for drinking and eating. We had lunch at the Hard Rock Cafe, it was pricey as compared to other restaurants available but the food was filling.
Location wise, the hotel is on the road facing the beach and just about 5-7 minutes by taxi to Walking Street. You can walk to the Alcazar ladyboy cabaret show, which was one of our highlights.

I stayed in this hotel for 4D/3N.
The good thing was cleanliness, quality of food, huge pool, centrally located.
What was really disappointing was that other than front office staff, staff did not know English, it was so difficult to communicate. Conceirge was not at all solution oriented, they are very reluctant becoz of which I wasted lot of time and money to plan my holiday myself, room service is very slow (30 mins to provide tea bags)
I would not recommend this hotel as overall I didnt find it hospitable.

Been there last night and had some dinner with friends....
The NY steak was such a let down. Really tasteless and tough and way over priced. Maybe because of the preparation....however even the dry burger the girlfriend ordered, was tasteless and far below standard and did I mention dry....Don’t believe the pictures in the menu.

Best activities ,staff and room size with all facilties i highly recommend for all ages families or singles great location comfortable  rooms  all what you need under one roof hard rock hotel this.is my 4th book

I would like to thank and congratulate HRH Pattaya for the outstanding team of people at your hotel.
All your staff were extremely helpful and service oriented during my stay there recently for 3 nights and I can only say they are simply marvellous.
I would like to pay special mention to Noom (F&B) manager and Sofia (Restaurant) manager for their superb hospitality towards my family and I during our buffet dinner which we enjoyed so much. I would also like to thank your service staff in Starz Dining for their attentive and prompt service namely Sassy, Jimmy, Noi Na, Kung and Eddie. They really took effort in actively offering the BBQ skewers to all the patrons. The food was great and I am glad your managers managed to convince us to have our dinner at the restaurant while we was loitering nearby after a fun day of relaxation at your cosy Cabana.
Lastly, I would like to thank both Rihanna and Gift for their help in ensuring a smooth check in as well as making good effort to provide utmost service in the executive lounge which my whole family enjoyed thoroughly.
Thank you team HRH Pattaya and I hope to visit you guys again in the nearest future.

Perfect central locoation, excellent service, fun activities for kids all day long, awesome foamparties, yummy breakfast buffet, delicious food overall thai and western, biggest freeform pool ever with poolbar, amazing views of pattaya bay from private balcony, spacious rooms, big comfortable beds,.... en so on en so on.Travelling as a family of four, one teenager and one pre-primary this hotel ticked all the boxes for all of us. After the first time I stayed here I was anxious to try Hard Rock Bali and Hard Rock Penang and I must say Hard Rock pattaya is simple the best. Unlike the others this Hard Rock hotel is really rocking all thanks to the great staff. Been here for 4 times and will be back in December.
Pattaya is not my favourite place for the beach but there are plenty of little thai tropical islands not too far that will give you a good paradise recharge. And after days burning in the sun what more do you want than indulge yourself in a four star hotel with a party twist.

Everything was excellent, especially the breakfast serving and the massage. The room not only large, it also needful and very clean. The room service was very good, always on time and gave the guest a very warm smiling and greeting.

It has been a great experience staying at hard rock Pattaya. The pool is newly renovated and the rockstar family room is very spacious with 2 Bunk beds and a king bed with dividing door for privacy. There is also a sofa for the family. The room has sea 2 facing balcony and 2 separate toilets. We are at the executive floor with food and drinks provided all day from 6am - 10pm. The kids are overwhelmed by that as they can go pick up drinks as they like. The room is clean and hard rock standard. A short walk along the beach to the shopping mall below Hilton hotel with food court and shopping. 
Overall a pleasant stay will come back again.

i had a great time at the hard rock. everyone was helpful and nice. even though the pool was under renovation, the staff is very helpful to point out activities and places nearby or a boat trip away. i would book hard rock again if i ever go back to pattaya

This is where we started our Thai trip. Like hard rocks everywhere it is a well kept one. Nice, young and helpful staff. This is place designed for having fun, stayed there on bnb basis, breakfast was nice, during our stay there were us navy/marines booked in the hotel which made the staff to work at their most efficient skills to keep up with the rush which they managed really well. With hard rock something is always happening, during my stay I got to witness a nice Thai band in the cafe which is regular, an amazing foam party which is one of the memories I will always cherish. Room Services were nice and prompt.  Only issue was the size of the room, they are really small. We had two average size international travellers luggage but the room was too small to manage ones belongings, can only open one bag at a time. Had a nice view of the pool and the beach with the hard rock guitar. Its nicely located and is surly a fun place for youth.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I stay in the hotel for 5 nights and was there for a conference, great facilities for a conference,always looking forward to the coffee breaks with great snacks.
The room i stay in was right the end and was facing the beach and a great view of the pool, bed was comfortable and a soft pillow.
Overall a great experience.

Stayed here from the 8th - 10th November. From the time we arrived, there were warm smiles and greetings.
Everyone was smiling and cheerful..true thai hospitality.
Had a great stay here. The food was awesome.
The staff were always friendly.
The activities were fun.
Thank you very much to everyone at Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya.

I stayed at the Hard Rock Hotel during a business trip in July.  Overall I was impressed with reception, the general cleanliness of the hotel, and its location.  My room was basic, but perfectly adequate for what I needed.  Breakfast, which was included in my room rate was quite good.  Made to order omelets, fruit, cereal, tea, and coffee were quite good.  I was not that impressed with the pool area.  Compared to other hotels in the area I think there a better options.  Still, the Hard Rock is fine.  Like most hotels in Thailand, check out is quite a process and requires a person to personally verify the state of your room prior to receiving your bill.  Plan accordingly.

superb hotel to stay superb location superb actives for kids and adults superb service superb spa and massage superb hotel for family holiday super activities within the hotel Anyone picks HR during their vacation cannot go wrong

We stayed here for a long weekend and had a great experience, wished we could have stayed longer to he honest.
The staff are very friendly and cant do enough to make your stay enjoyable. The room was very well equipped, clean and modern and the food is great with lot of International and Asian choices
I would recommend paying the extra for the use of the Kings Club, it makes the breakfast experience more personal as you're waited on rather than helping yourself with everyone else, you can help yourself to drinks and snacks all day long and the free cocktails for 2 hours in the evening is a very pleasant experience :)  
I would use the hotel again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
When I arrived at Hotel, the receptionist inform us that the water and coffee in the room are free.
However, only the water in the bathroom is free.
We paid money for I drank unwillingly.
If you informed me detailed and accurately, I didn`t need to paid.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: a great and worth every minute at this hotel. Full of activities for my son (age 7). He loves Kids Club the most. He spent 3 hrs playing with the staffs who took very good care of him while the parents enjoy fitness room and sauna room. We love everything there and will definitely go back soon.

The compound is big and beautiful. Good facilities and big swimming pool. Impressive friendly and extremely helpful staffs everywhere I go around the hotel. But the room is an utter disappointment. It is extremely small, with a city view facing an entire block of rooms' balcony! I'm looking man balconies while they are looking into my room! And they are not to far away gosh! So I don't feel like drawing down the curtains at all. The room sound proofing is horrible. I can hear kids running and screaming outside and the corridor light beneath my door. The curtains can't cover the windows properly. By 7am the room becomes extremely bright. No ventilation in the washroom and no hand shower as well. And at this time they are renovating part of the pool. I was only informed after I booked like months in advance and was promised minimal impact to me. But I was woke up by the knocking noises at 7am! I booked a good hotel for a good night rest after a tiring day !

If you want see a good service, nice staff, clean rooms, very tasty food - you need go to Hard Rock. This hotel have a very cool location. In the hotel was a spa center, and well massage with healthy bags.

We upgraded room by paying extra, which was worthless as the shower was not working properly.  There was no speed at all in the overhead as well as the hand shower.
Secondly, the veg options in the breakfast menu was very poor. Practically we only had fruits and a slice of bread in breakfast on both days.
Thirdly, as we upgraded rooms to 10Th floor, we were given access to lounge on 9th floor with FOC services between 6 pm to 7.30 Pm. Your team serving there were very unprofessional. They made us feel very unwanted. The gesture while serving seemed that as charity.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: A great central location, spacious comfortable rooms, excellent facilities, great food and  Staff is friendly and helpful  , recommend for business and leisure travel . Welcome Drink at Hard Rock Cafe is good .

Stay here several times even when we live approx 20 km from this Hotel and Bar. Great place also for kids. Wonderful pool and just cross the road and your on the beach. Wonderful restaurant at the hotel and also at the Hard Rock Cafe. In the evening you can sit direct at the boulevard.

Best property, enviroment and facilities. The nice swimming pool and Hard Rock Cafe. The service from the team is nice and friendly. Specially Indonesian Band performance in Hard Rock Cafe. Bring homey to me

As this is our first time staying at the hard rock in all it's a nice place to stay n friendly staff.One most friendliest staff n helpful is mr Kevin from concierge.Breakfast was good,the pool was nice to swim in,would come back to stay and is highly recommended.

Loved it here, awesome amenities, food is outstanding, the staff treats you like royalty. Incredible pool and the location is perfect. I cannot wait to visit again. This place has everything you may need and then some, if you have kids staying here is a no brainer

Lovely staff with understanding for Their costomers. good rooms Composer-suite but only Half Sea View. Nice swimmingpool pool With lovely outdoor arial and a Nice bar. A hotel we vill returnere to again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
It must be improved.
Otherwise we will not booked your hotel again.It was because we paid this value but we can't get the equal services and quality to us.
If you want to customer back to booked your hotel again, pleaae pay more attention.

The hotel interior and room was really nice.
Customer Service was amazing as well!
Almost all of the staff were nice, friendly and accommodating.
Keep up the good work!
I hope I can go back with my family.
GODBless. :)

It's a luxury hotel and very comfortable quiet,good service and nice location.it is near the beach and you can go walking to the small market and they provide international buffet for the breakfast. You will not regret to stay here. The lobby restaurant was a nice place to relax first thing in the morning as you can sit outside and watch the earlybirds laying about the pool while you eat your brunch. it is a little overpriced but you will find that everything is overpriced at the Hard Rock. The pool was quite tranquil and a nice place to relax or rest from a long night of dancing on walking street. and of course the beach is directly across from the Hard Rock if you prefer that. On Saturday nights they have a foam party that is not to be missed. You wont find many of the locals there as each time ive been it seems to be almost entirely expats but it is still a fun way to party in a "clean" environment. The hotel also has the standard Hard rock restaurant. This has two floors, the bottom being the main dining area and has a stage where we saw quite a few phillipino cover bands playing. and the upstairs is an open air sports bar. however they do pipe in video and the music from the bands playing down stairs if you prefer to listen to them in a more serene environment

Good rooms and food consistent with other Hard Rocks around the world. Location is pretty good as well. It does get a little loud at night from the music on the street though, so make sure to ask for a room higher up.

I booked the hotel as a surprise for my bf birthday.We surly had the amazing time there. The staffs were the best. They were making sure that we had a great time! We will definitely come back for a longer stay.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Super Staff helpfull and polite,but check in took time to find a room <room nice and clean,facilities need help. gym old equipment they need to update  all the equipment ,pool area closed for renovation,didn't know until checkiing in.

wonderful time at Hard Rock Hotel even I did not enjoy noisy music at swimming pool and breakfast personnel who pick up your food while you are collecting your toasts.Don! lieave your chair !
I enjoyed few steps to the beach and back to huge swimming pool with permanent animation.
GREAT

Quality is dropping from the past in general especially club floor lounge (food, drinks and cocketails).  I visit several hotels in Pattaya i.e. Dusit, Pullman, Siam@Siam vs Hardrock.  Among all club benefits of those hotels, we were impressed with Hardrock's club floor and evening cocktails (thumb up).  Now you become average (more or less the same range as those hotels).

I went with my 4 years old son and staying in hard rock hotel pattaya for 4 nights.
I have read the comments here before i book the room. I expected this is a hotel with lots of activities for young kids.  However, the only activity that my son can play is swim.
All the other activities for kids are not free of charge, even the playroom charged in an hourly rate of 100thb.  The waterball charged 200thb.  The pool party and the daily activities in the pool like water volleyball is not for kids but for adults.  I would appreciate if there are more activities organized for kids like kids disco and kids pool party.
We did join the foam party for half an hour on saturday 5pm and its the only thing that i can recall which is interesting for kids.
We were interested to have dinner buffet in the hotel restaurant, as my son is 4 yrs old only and he is free for the breadfast, so i would expect he is also free for the dinner buffet.  However, this is not the case. So finally, we did not join the dinner buffet.
Its also very noisy daytime as there is construction facing my room and near the kids pool.

Excellence service and buffet at Starz Diner. The room is clean and full of amenity stuffs. The Hard Rock Cafe is entertained for who loves hard rock music.
By the way, the location is quite crowded. Not suit for who wants to stay peacefully.

Spend 2 nights in the Hardrock Hotel on a Business Trip in the area - very nice welcome at reception as well a good and friendly service throughout the entire stay. Room was clean and size ok; Pool area is great incl. the pool bar which is positioned in a kind of sandy lagoon environment - also good pool open until 10pm - being Hardrock also great life band playing in the Hardrock Coffee

The best stay ever of my life.... great hospitality with excellent property location ....highly recommended to everyone.... only suggestion would be if you can have at least 2-3 Indian veg items for breakfast..

We were staying here for 5 nights and had an amazing time .... the staff at the front desk were really helpful in getting our room, we were in Deluxe Sea View room, which was nice and spacious with comfy kind size bed, 2 Mini complimentary bottles of water, flat screen TV, DVD, etc etc... The locations great of this hotel, just bang opposite the beach, but unfortunately you cant swim there and its mucky and dirty, not like the beached in Thailand, where the Hard rock pool covers up, which is massive, with good chirpy and enthusiastic staff, the food here is also good, specially sea food.The hotel is a 20-25 mins walk to the walking street where all the action happens and the night market, exit from the pool side onto the street, hail for a cab ( sharing ) hop on - hop off type, 10 Bhat/ person. Its a one way street and should get off just before the left turn, bang opposite the walking street. 
Cons: The Bathroom shower does not have any wet dry concept, either its totally DRY or WET, No full length mirrors in the whole room.Minor details missing, but if you are staying there for a longer time you tend to notice these things, specially if you travelling with your wife ..:)
Over all, it has been a good experience at the Hard Rock,Pattaya their staff are always very helpful and trying their best to make your stay a memorable one. It was more than a than ... have fun ..cheers
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
No doubt, it is a good hotel with good rooms.  Front office staff is helpful and courteous.
But the rooms and menu also is highly priced.  I may not opt this hotel only for this reason.  Swimming pool was not functioning when we checked in on 21st Oct 2016.  
In a place like pattaya, there are plenty of other better options for the same price.  May be if pool is functioning and during the foam party days, the price may be suitable.

We went on a Saturday night, the band was a lot of fun, the staff were great and the food was really, really good! Try the spinach and artichoke dip, burgers and BBQ food, you won't be disappointed. Promise.

I have spent 17 years, an average of 30 weeks per year staying in hotels, so I reckon I can speak with qualification.... 
The Hard Rock Hotel was recommended to us by friends who had been staying here on many previous occassions.  I understand why, this hotel is something you need to experience at least once in your lifetime.  And you will find that once you have been here once, you can't help yourself and you will end up doing what we have done and many others - keep coming back!!  This is our 3rd trip, we are at the lower end of the scale as we have meet people from all over the globe that have been back here 8 - 15 times.
Why you might ask, the culture, the atmosphere, the quality of the service, the cleaniless, the value and last but most importantly the people.  Our plans are already underway for 2011
Do yourself a favour take the time for a holiday experience of a life time...

Excellent quality and location right on the beach.
Restaurant & bar food were all very good and the largely English speaking staff were very happy & helpful.
Great swimming pool.
Will stay here again.

there is good swimming pool and very kind crew
and excellent cafe. mood is romantic. 
but i think breakfast not good. everything is perfect except breakfast for me
i will recommend this hotel to my friends who plan to visit pattaya

It was enough to have fun with young children.
The program with time was very good
Clean bedrooms and toilets
The location of the hotel was also very satisfying to use in the center of Pattaya.
Perfect for the safety of hotel guests.
I want to stay at the hotel again on my next trip to Pattaya.
"Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya"
We wish for development

I'm frequent staying at this hotel but the room is small. Some time I got big size room. some time I got small size. I'm not satisfied this condition. Inside freezer, hotel should think about free. some 4 or 5 star hotel I have been staying provided all free inside freezer for business trip.

It’s the first time we were in a hard rock hotel. We were surprise how it s so awesome! The Staff was so helpful and smiling!!! The Royalaties services were pretty good! The Hard Rock Café was very nice too. It was also our first Time in a Hard Rock Café. The food was good and The vibs was excellent. The shops were nice. Animation seems good, but we didn t participate.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Just finished a 3 day business stay. Have been to Pattaya many time and this was the first time to the Hard Rock. I absolutely loved the fact that music was piped through the hotel. Not sure if it can be heard in the bedroom though. The room was nice/clean and bed comfortable. The pool is down but no big deal for me. The breakfast is fine but I will caution expats that the Thai's use MSG in almost everything so one needs to ask and request not to include it. I can pick up on it immediately.
As a separate issue the Hard Rock has "Save the Earth" as one of their business themes. I have to question their commitment to "walking the walk". The small toiletries (lotion, soap and shampoo) in the bathrooms are black and do indicate the recycle triangle on the bottom but I failed to see a container for recyclables in the rooms or on the room cleaners carts as I walked to the elevators. In addition why are there not water flow restrictors for the sink and the showers? In fact the shower has one of those large rail forest type shower heads. 
They should comp me for this consultation. Could go viral with it
I would stay here again.

Clean room and Good service.
High value.
Good location.
 Good for family or friends trip.
A lot of activity. Game , Beautiful swimmingpool.
High recommendation.
Location is beach froth.
And near downtown pattaya.

You can enjoy great show and music in Hard Rock cafe and the pool with fun events and great food. I think it's the best choice in Pattaya unless you pay a lot. Location is lovely to many bars and restaurants.

The great weekendtrip started already with a smiling face at the airport. I have booked the pickup over the Hard Rock Hotel and it was worth the money to enjoy the drive in a relaxing most confortable car with a perfect driver (mentionable perfect as I hardly feel safe and relaxed in Asian taxi .. ) I also used the transport to go for the Sanctuary of truth  for a tour on the next day- it was again worth the money as the driver brought me, arranged everything, give me tips to enjoy the site and waited for me until I finished my tour.
I will always remember especially the two evenings at the Soul Bar, because the host Felicia was simply great and the Blackvelvet liveband is exceptional - a bunch of exceptional personalities having pure music running through their veins and providing the best soundtrack for two exceptional, legendary evenings (Even now I just start to smile when I just think about the evenings/ Hope they never loose their great spirit and the ability to make others simply happy and they themselves feel the positive energy they provide to others also themselves).
All employees are simply great, always smiling, always helping, ensuring a great and relaxing atmosphere .. no issues to fulfill extra wishes, no problems- just solutions. For example I saw some nice adapted T-shirt with some cutouts in the shop- unfortunately not my size but when I asked they organized that the next day the shirt was available my size- without any issues.
Maybe I am so excited about this stay as I was expecting a lonesome solo-stay at another big impersonal Hotel where I am just some room number - instead I never felt that I had a solo trip, rather felt like meeting up with a bunch of old friends and having a rocking time of my live...

The rooms are spacious. Service is great. Breakfast buffet is good offering plenty of options.
 Unfortunately we missed out on foam party for which we had specifically booked this hotel :( 
Overall a good experience
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: A big shout out and thanks to the wonderful team at the Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya. From the moment i arrived i was blown away with the friendliness and the professionalism expressed by the entire team. The conference facilities and execution were flawless and impressive at the same time, every day there was something new and unique that raised the bar and surpassed our expectations, all delivered in the most sincere and professional way. They make it look too easy. Thanks To Jorge, Andrew, Yoo-Yee, Anne and all of the other people who managed to do a better job of remembering my name than i did of remembering theirs!

Situated in North Pattaya the Hard Rock Hotel spans the block between the north & southbound main roads. Featuring an expansive pool area, well equipped gym, spa, several restaurants & bars, a hall, & an onsite Hard Rock Cafe this location offers visitors a high end experience in Pattaya. Recent renovations to the pool area have this feature of the site looking better than ever & has options for adults & children alike. A dedicated indoor kids' play area is also available if required. Prices are as expected but you can save quite a bit if you join the Stage Pass VIP annual membership club. Staff were friendly, helpful & professional, went out of their way to ensure that our experience was all it could be. The quality of food at the restaurants was high, but prices were not outrageous. Highly recommended.

Booked room in hard rock from australia. Amazing room view awesome pool and food. People were really nice and welcoming. Never an issue. Hotel is full of classy rockstars. Its close to beach. Wifi is pretty strong. We got wifi on the beach from hardrock. Cocktails were awesome. Breakfast was yummmmm. We enjoyed our trip.

From the minute we arrived to the minute we left everything was amazing.  Staff friendly, attentive and fun.  Food was delicious, loads of choice.  Immaculately clean and well maintained.  Definitely a family hotel as well as great for couples, actually just great hotel for everyone.  Staff around the pool did a great job of entertaining kids and adults alike.  Well done, would definitely return.

Great location, right by the beach, great hotel pool! The service attitude is very good, the CAFE food is very good, the hotel security is very responsible. The whole hotel is rock and roll style, very good.

It was a wonderful and pleasant stay. Breakfast had goof variety. Complimentary refilling of drinking water in room was really good. The hotel allowed an early check-in. The hotel is located at very good location in the middle of the central pattaya and opposite to the beach.

staffs are very friendly and helpful. however, the food was rather slow to be served on Sunday 17 afternoon despite no guests around.  food was delicious though.  housekeeper on 7th floor where we stayed was very helpful.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Anywhere you go, your day adventure must be matched with night pleasure and comfort. If your night sucks so will your day. Hard Rock Hotel gives you the best bang for your money by being in the heart of Pattaya and also giving you a wonderful seclusion and comfort when you need it. If you are interested in beach activities, though, the beach may not be the cleanest in Pattaya. You are better off to go out of the city in some other resort like Ravindra Beach Resort. But if you go that far, you may kiss the Pattaya experience goodbye, unless you want to do it the hard way. You can take a boat ride from outside your Hard Rock hotel to many interesting places, and have the beach experience too. So, stay there. Some (not all) of the employees working at the front desk need to be a bit more friendlier. Any one used to Thai hospitality may find these below average.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
The stay was great and we thoroughly enjoyed.
Hello,
The stay was great and we thoroughly enjoyed.
Here are few things that would've made the stay better..
I think you guys kept forgetting we were three. :) (Towels, snacks.. etc)
Also I booked the 15th Anniversary package and I haven't received the souvenir.
I did not recall until I checked the booking after I left Pattaya. Would have been nice you guys took initiative.
15th ANNIVERSARY PACKAGE
Book Direct Exclusive: Enjoy these benefits when you book directly on our website only!
Room inclusive of daily breakfast for 2 persons

A classic Hard Rock hotel, staff are friendly, food is good, rooms are clean. Right in the middle of Beach Road and easy to get to places within walking distance. Gym is well equipped with good staff. Most of all, Rock Spa was super relaxing! Pressure and positions are just right!

This is the second time I have stayed at the hotel, The rooms are clean and spacious, the staff are friendly, and the Pool is great!
They have a basketball ring in the Pool, and all the guests spend lots of time trying out their basketball netting skills, whilst cooling down in the pool.
It is in a great location, near the Central Festival shopping mall, and only a Baht bus ride away from Walking Street. There are lots of bars about a five minute walk away from the Hotel in Soi 7 and 8.
I will definitely stay there again.

I fin it hard to read revoews because people are either whinning to much or are overly generous. So heres my honest oppinion.
for pattaya its a decent hotel but if your expecting everything that comes with the hardrock name then your going to be dissapointed.  Cool looking pool but seats barely keep the sun where there placed. Nobody watching the kids pool. The food is nearly as nice as that of other hard rocks.
but if its raining season be careful it floods and theres no way to go in and out of the hotel without getting wet. And  were talkinf quarter way to the knees. 
Im still here for the next 2 nights but so far have been pretty let down as this doea not even compare to orher hardrocks iv stayed with. 
On the possitive theres a big pool aircon nice staff even if limited english. Its ok I just wouldnt go out of my way to stay here ever again.

Spent 6 wonderful nights at the Hard Rock Hotel in Pattaya in October/early November.
Stayed in a Roxstars family suite overlooking the ocean.  The check in staff were excellent on the 9th floor.  The suite (on the 10th floor) was amazing with separate room for hubby and I and a little nook with bunk beds for my son who felt special in his own little space and had his own bathroom.  Our room was just gorgeous with a beautiful view of the ocean and all around Pattaya.  Bed was super comfortable, pillows were perfect (not too hard or soft) so sleep quality was excellent here.  Bathroom was really roomy with a huge bathtub in it.  There were 2 tvs in our suite (1 for my son's area and 1 in our bedroom) and plenty of good channels including free new release movies.  We also had 2 balconies - a small one which opened in the corner of our bedroom and another large balcony from the lounge room.
Breakfast was a very good mix of asian and western.  I loved having noodles each day - it varies each day but the chicken noodles were just to die for - absolutely delicious!
Pool area is massive combining both concrete pool areas and there was a little beach area attached with various water slides which my son loved.  There was also an area of the littler kids with a playground within a pool.  There were all sort of pool games each day and other fun activities for the kids such as rock climbing (which was free at various times of the day).  There was also a supervised kids club that you can leave your children to play in for THB100 per hour per child (which is an absolute bargain) - they can play xbox/playstation or watch a movie or just hang out.  
By far, the best thing about staying at this hotel was the staff particularly the pool and the lounge (level 9) staff.  What a great bunch of people, so very attentive and such beautiful and funny personalities.  Because of your beautiful staff, we will definitely be back.

We stayed at the Hard Rock hotel for 3 nights and to be honest, I'm glad it wasn't more. Parts of swimming pool closed, children's room very poorly run, some attractions closed and the hotel shows its age!

Top notch Hotel in Pattaya if you love the beach 🏖 its right there in front of you.  Most important thing its H&R great entrainment at night by the bar and customer service is outstanding from the front desk to the restaurant staff.  Get there!!

I highly recommend for family with kids. 
Swimming the best fun.
Rooms are nice but seen better. Bed awesome...
Restaurant near pool too pricey for Pattaya.. Recommend their restaurant off beach road or take a blue public 10 baht taxi down beach road to Hops restaurant. Always a winner. 
Hardrock Breakfast buffet very good.. 
Again best place for the kids to swim and have fun in pattaya...

Overall our experience at the Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya was excellent. quite a central place with 5 min ride on Bhat bus to Walking Street. nice clean rooms and good view on the west wing facing the beach. Nice large pool with slides for kids. Very friendly staff especially Anne (Whitney) at the reception and Esther at the restaurant. The Long haired manager at the Hard Rock Cafe was very rude to one in our group. He falsely accused my friend of inapropriately talking to another guest, which we challenged with the management and proved my friend was falsely accused after checking CCTV.  Overall a super stay and a great experience. I would rate this excellent if not for the incident the Long Haired cafe manager created.

Great place, good vibe and excellent place for families. Unfortunately, the restaurant in the morning for breakfast can be very busy with residents from particular countries more unpleasant to deal with.

I just stay for 1 day but I am willing to go back for next time. My daughter loves the large pool and sandy pool. Sand was very clean and had great texture!!! Room temperature was bit cold for my wife but it was ok for me. Only bad thing was there is no vallet parking and parking lot was bit far when rain was hard.

There not good accomodation for 2 adults and 1 chd - only 2 beds. There no any choice of european food in restaurant . It was very difficult to feed a child, not tasty.No animation for children as was earlier.high price for this level of service

I have very unforgettable experience during my stay in hotel in August 2016. 
I booked a room in the Kings Club lounge and requested to have room near my friends who will stay at the same hotel at the same period. This requested is not entertained.
We have breakfast at the lounge on 9/F. While kids were playing iPad in the lounge, I went back to my room to go to toilet. Surprisingly, I found my luggage was searched by someone, and there were "orange" coloured stains on some of my clothes. I also found out that my daughter FROZEN bracelet was stolen.
I lodged my complain to the manager ANN. She got all the cleaners to come to my room and questioned them in front of me. This is ridiculous. How would the theft admit that she has stolen things in my room. The manager explained to me that no cleaner has stolen my daughter's bracelet. However, she failed to explain why my luggage was so messy with stains.
In the afternoon, she told me that my daughter bracelet was found in the lounge. This was impossible because she cannot take it off by herself, the bracelet is a leather one with button, not easy to take it off by kids.
Another bad experience is about the car. I booked a van for 2000 THB for a return trip from hotel to Cartoon Network waterpark. In our return trip, the driver came to pick up with his girlfriend sitting in the front. We have six people, my friend has to sit at the dog seat at the back with the luggage. This was so uncomfortable for a 45 mins trip. He also dropped his girlfriend to home.  I took photo of his girlfriend sitting in front as evidence to complain. 
I don't expect a five star hotel is so poorly managed.

It´s been a nice accommodation , after the third day the breakfast was a bit boring hence it's been always the same ! However the pool facility is very suitable for a family vacation, we also enjoyed the GYM very much , which is fairly good equipped for a Hotel. We´ll come back and hope the the evening buffet we keep the quality that it once had.

We use the Hard Rock Hotel every year, but our new employees are also kind and satisfied.I'm very satisfied with my recent trip.I plan to use it next year.Do you have any service?HahaI hope you are always healthy and happy.

The big swimming pool is always kept nice with a lot of fun. 
The water temperature of the shower can be improved. Sometimes, especially in the morning, I have to wait for 10 minutes for warm water coming out.

This was our second stay at Hard Rock Pattaya. We only came to Pattaya for a short break before heading to the North of Thailand. We chose Hard Rock due to its great location on Beach Road and its amazing pool. When checking in the receptionist saw we had stayed before and offered us 'our' room, nice touch but he twisted our arm with a free sea facing upgrade so we declined and took the better room! As last time we didn't spend a baht in the restaurant or bar as there is so many options nearby at a fraction of the price. A Baht bus ride (10B) away from craziest nightlife and a short walk from more local drinking establishment's. The pool really sets the hotel apart from other 4*'s, worth the stay especially if the price is right.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Stayed for one night at this hotel.
As usual for Hard Rock hotel, the services was great and excellent.
We stayed at King Club Deluxe Room. I recommended you travellers to choose the King Club, you will pay more but it is worth it.
Your check in counter for King Club is at 9 floor. It is executive lounge, You can enjoy all the soft drink, milk, juice, and cake while checking in.
You can still enjoy this for whole day during your visit. And at 6.30pm-7.30pm there is a cocktail free, which we missed it.
And don't forget to ask the hotel to let you try the fender guitar. They will bring it to your room.
And every Saturday they have a foam party at the pool.
If you have plan to visit the Cartoon Network Amazon, I suggest you to book the ticket through this hotel prior your arrival. With the same price you will get a free shuttle from this hotel to Cartoon Network Amazon go and return.

Stayed here for a business trip.  Nice hotel!  Great location! Nice and friendly staff!  Nice pool!  Decent breakfast. Pattaya has beach under construction so that was kind of a bummer! HOWEVER, Didnt receive my Hard Rock reward points.

K.Bew is very good service, nice guy and take action asap as I have required.
But your sales manager did not follow up my point and slowly responsed also miscommunicate. 
She did not contact me after get our letter confirmation.

I have been staying at the Hard Rock for quite a while.  Never had a disappointing stay.  will continue to stay at Hard Rock when in town.  Have stayed at other hard Rock hotels, but this is my favorite overall
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Just returned from a 10 day stay at the Hard Rock Hotel, had an amazing time. Stayed in a club room, the room was not as large as I expected but having said that it was adequate. The room was always kept spotlessly clean by housekeeping. 
Staying in a club room allowed access to the club lounge, serving breakfast in a comfortable and relaxed atmosphere, free tea, coffee and snacks were also available throughout the day with free cocktails and snacks from 18-00 to 19-30 in the evening. The staff at the club lounge were great, making me feel that little bit special.
This was my 5th visit to Pattaya staying at various hotels and the staff at the Hard Rock were simply the best, a credit to the hotel, nothing was too much trouble for them. I send my thanks to all of the staff of the hotel. 
The facilities and activities were incredible, from rock climbing, pool volleyball, pool handball and more should you feel energetic enough. The pool is large with plenty of sun loungers around, there is a pool bar with attentive staff serving food and drinks, the guy's here at "The Shack" also deserve a special mention.
Apart from the main restaurant, "The Starz" the other bars and restaurants were always very quiet. There are cheaper bars and restaurants close to the hotel which I think many of the guests were using. This is not a hotel for those on a budget but if you want a distinctive and somewhat exclusive hotel, I would highly recommend The Hard Rock. I am now looking forward to my next visit.

It was very cold in the room although we changed the temperature of the air. Food didn’t taste good. However, the staff were very friendly and they provided us with good service. Swimming pool was great.

I was so angry that I could not eat a beer because of the outside food when I used the pool. It seems that some flexibility is needed. Room cleaning, location, and other areas were very satisfactory.....

Once again was not disappointed with this hotel staff are really good and friendly and the pool is a winner. They have a foam party for kids and adults every Saturday which was also lots of fun. The hotel is in a good location for nightlife but is not noisy.
Whilst it is 1 of the more expensive hotels in Pattaya it is worth it.

This hotel rocks. On all counts. Stayed for for 2 nights. Staff are genuinely cheerful and friendly, not just in the front desk but all over the hotel. This is the biggest plus. Had a sea facing room with a balcony and a wonderful view of the pool and the sea. Spent most of my time here. Rooms are functional and comfortable.  Hard rock merchandise displayed in the room for sale. Very good breakfast. Choice of lounge/ restaurants to select from. Helpful travel and activities desk. Just across the beach. Great for families. I can go on.  Keep rocking guys.

I was looking for a bargain for pattaya hotel and found this secret deal on wotif.com for a pattaya hotel so i went for it. It turned up to be this Hard Rock, then I search the net, couldn't find any better rate.
Stay there for the weekend. It was fab, foam party and all that.  Thay also have a free activities for me to join but i was too drunk ot catch it. I went there with my girlfrind so i didn't go for the Hard Rock Cafe but we walk down the street and found this seafood rest. - can't remember the name, the blue blue shop. the sauce was very very spicy. The walking street has changed a lot, too much of those a-go-go, don't go to pattaya with your girlfriend, hehehe.

Stayed for 2 nights and enjoyed every minute of my stay. The service is truly beyond expectation from the minute the transport pick me up to arriving at the hotel warmly greeted by the concierge and the front desk (with quick check in) as well as from the lift attendant to the housekeepers and to the team working at the rock spa, rock royalty and hard rock cafe! Truly awesome and a place that I highly recommend to any tourists that are visiting Pattaya.

We booked a room from agoda, great hospitality from reception, belldesk, frontdesk. Nice facility, clean pool with secure lifeguards around, buffet for breakfast was ok, cappuccino was yummy. Recommended for family stating in pattaya, close to major shopping department storea as well.

First all I would like to say that I am a rock geek and wanted to visit this hotel in Thai a long time ago. I can say that generally I liked it. All of the stylistics and atributes of good music make your stay special. But this hotel is rather
 old and some buildings and rooms better  to rennovate. Also live music in the hard rock cafe was lame! Really you better choose more professional bands for it. But overral o liked my stay there. But the price could be not that aggressive :)

The hotel is along the beach. It’s an easy walk or ride to all the attractions. The place falls short on general service. While they are nice, very few seemed to care if you were there. A booming tip. They drop rates closer to the actual day. Always check for lower rates v

Our stay in Hard rock hotel was a marvellous experience. The rooms though slightly small were extremely cosy and well planned. The lobby was a treat for any music lover. The breakfast spread was one of the best if not the best I have ever come across. I strongly reccomend Hard Rock as its also very well located.
I have stayed at this hotel many times. I very love this place.I will going again on December and staying Hard Rock for sure.Suggestion : If you wants a great time in Pattaya. You must come here.^_^
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We enjoy our stay at Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya, got free room upgrade from City View to Deluxe Pool View. Looking forward to go back again. Good location, the sea beach is clean. The choice of breakfast is not very variety comparing to the 4-5 star hotels. Disagree on the charge of THB 100 / hour for Kids Club, it should be complimentary for the hotel guests just like other hotels. Overall, the stay is worth.

This was my second stay at the hotel which is right on Beach Road. Rooms are large and spacious and ours had a great view to the Ocean. The whole decor of the room is nice and chic with plush carpets. Theres also a huge pool in the hotel with slides which the family can enjoy together. Right across the hotel is the beach with many options for water sports and littered with mini shacks offering drinks and food. I have no hesitation recommending this hotel.

Best hotel in pattaya , everything was perfect , the best thing in this hotel is the friendly staff , smiling and very helpful , it was very comfortable vacation , bathroom is perfect , everyday 4 towels , beside hands towels , floor mat , tv is wonderful u can choose many of available movies to order and watch for free , internet free and fast , for me location for me was far from walking street and restaurants As i dont like walking

It is the best hotel to stay with my family.  And I was happy because of the kind staff who always smiled.  The location of the hotel was good.  The swimming pool was so nice to be with my family.Recommend.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I have stayed at the Hard Rock every trip I've made to Pattaya. There is just no other hotel for me. I've tried others and they just don't compare. Everyone is amazing here and even the guards recognize you. I will definitely be back again.

Great hospitality by Hard Rock hotel Pattaya.
We had a wonderful and great time in attending ICO'2018 International Conference at Hard rock Hotel Pattaya.
This is the best hotel in Pattaya. We strongly recommend this hotel for the tourist vising Pattaya in the near future.
Sincerely Yours,
General Chair
ICO'2018

The times we have stayed at a hard Rock property,the service/food /entertainment have always been wonderful. The location was excellent as well as the view from the room and my wife really enjoyed the pool.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Good and comfortable stay. I would definitely stay at this location again. The club staff was good and provided excellent service. The menu at the club was also good. Keep up the good work and try to maintain it consistently.

ive been to 3 different hard rock hotels in malaysia, bali and pattaya. their environment is great for gateway with family.    services for room changing is quit slow but acceptable.   highly recommend to all families out there.

This is my 2nd time coming back to this Hotel and had read some comments about it! I think it is unfairly remarks given to this remarkable Hotel! Was there early of Sept, and got a fantastic offers for weekdays at their own official webs. I chosen to stay at their Kings Club Sea view rooms and theirs staffs on that floor were superbs! I got the room with balcony as I'm smoker and personally, it is big enough! Fantastic view overlooking the beach... Just breath taking especially the sunset hour complement with free cocktails at the Lounge on the 9th floor. Hanging around their big pool was fantastic! Every morning, I saw their staffs cleaning the big pool even though it is still drizzling! Gosh.. What a commitment! Kudos to these guys.. Tried their Spa, just amazing masseus! Location of this Hotel is just perfect, smacked in the middle of the city... Pattaya's night life is second to none and I just hate it when people say it is sleazy etc etc.. This is Pattaya! I just love it all! I will be back to this Hotel for sure...

Close to Everything , Great service, their chicken wings very nice 
super friendly staff , super nice room. super great bbq dinner just that the menu is same everyday abit boring for eating the same food everyday :)

Overall great time in pattaya. The hotel has a great view of beach road and the staff was friendly. I was there to visit friends for roughly a week. Many of my friends booked other 5 star hotels. When they can to visit they ended up liking the vibe at the hard rock better. They plan on staying there next time they visit.

Good facilities for having fun but maynot be so suitable for business travelers. The room soundproof is not good enough, can still hear the neighbor talking in the room in midnight plus the music. Some of the travelers came back late. Suggest to "separate" the business travelers with those in vacation if there is a way to find out during check in. The morning call was called late, morning call was only made after 45mins. Asked for the 1st aid kit, but only came to the room after 2nd call.

Staff is nice (80% of the staff), but room has some big noise from a machine outside and more is unacceptable in 2019 that hotel blocks money from you credit card for guarantee. A traveler needs money in his credit card not in hard rock hotel bank. C'mon this is so old style. Food is ok but not 4 stars. Pool is nice

would be far much appreciated if you could offer us especially the kids some more complimentary services like few more free laundry (as we were staying for 4 nights, however the free qty is same as those who only stayed for 1 nights which seems not so fair) or offer like free ice cream or 1 time free pool side villa since we are super loyal customers:)
**we have been visiting your hotel for 4 times already**

I enjoyed staying at your hotel in general.  Room condition, location, hospitality, everything was good.  I liked the quality of breakfast and swimming pool the most.  I will definitly come back to your hotel in the future. Thank you!

I am staying in hard rock on period 26-28 August 2019
I need to talk about how greatful in here! in every department
Beginning in front office..
every time i stay here or coming back receptionist they always remember me  and said welcome back! and they are very nice it for me they have a service mind to understand me every time that what i need and if have any problem they can hlep me heart whole to listen to me and always smile not matter what happen for me
i feel like love the smell in around front office location it feel like relax and specially only in hard rock will have this smell and i also like a bell boy always help me to carry a luggage and smile for me not matter how heavy to carry my bag ha ha
i am recognise  the name of staff is Bella,Marvel,and somebody can speak chinese and cantonese i forget him name he is very nice!!! to take care me i remember my birthday i am celebrate here and stay here in period 14-18 February he said happy birthday to me and talk with me like his family and my sister birthday also he always said happy birthday and welcome back and smile :) i just very like him i that why i need to go back hard rock again and again forever !! 
At Pizzeria
Me and My sister alway go there to have a lunch the staff over there is very funny and nice so much!! oh my god they make me smile and Laughing every time 
especial staff name is Tata,Gina,Mac,Toni,Aek,Aod and manager in there i forget him name but he also nice too i very love Tata she is amazing girl she very clever and have a nice service mind oh my god i need to say very fall in love in the restaurant !!
At Swimming pool Location
Every time i come here the best department is Swimming pool in shank bar and  breez club they are very nice staff  amazing in the world !! they are smile and Service mind i very love this place when i use swimming pool im order drink i feel here cocktail is the best and staff very nice and wonderful I recognise name
is Franky is manager he was nice and he always welcome guest to coming and also he sweet word and following   Aek,Golf,Diamond,Biker he is super star in here that i never forget he always help me for many mant assistant he make me langh every time !!! and Breez club name is Rooney he always talk with me a funny thing and very nice man he always advise me about how to swimming and make a good health and he also funny i very like him!! and follow  is  Tat,Mike,Joey he is very very nice also  i love him smile and he is very amazing man.
So all of this i am very love fall in love here i never think i love here to much like this!
That why i and my sister always come here and stay here because i feel here is my secound home here is a heaven i need to say i advise if somebody need to find a place to staying and need a wonderful staff take care and service please come here! here is very amazing and wonderful so much!! 
thanks you all staff to take care me and my sister thanks you hard rock thank you i very appreciate it to staying here i promiss i will come back every month and every time and keep Loyalty this hotel !!!
Joey and Grace :)

Its my first time to stay in Hard Rock. I like their lobby design, big and able to accommodate large sitting capacity. Perhaps cuz of my room location, i cldnt really see pool nor sea... and in this aspect, i thot Amari has a better view, and ambience. 
housekeeping needs to work a little harder. There was no bedroom slippers, and i have to called for it. In addition, I have 4 pieces of free laundry everyday. But everyday, i have to call to request for laundry bag.

We were 3 families and some teenagers together in a group went and were put up at this awesome hotel Hard Rock, Pattaya...with amazing views and calm and serene environement. It was bang Opposite the Beach and every morning fresh air and view was breathtaking...The night foam party with music was also awesome.  Great food and breakfast, and barbeques and drinks at the hotel...Will definitely go back and stay at this hotel for a longer period.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We have over the years had to stay in a number of Pattaya locations. The Hard Rock is my favorite.  The pool is great, the location - if you want to be in downtown Pattaya - is as good as it gets, the service fantastic.  We were lucky to be on the executive floor, and benefited from lounge service and checkin - which we really enjoyed.  Later, when we lost something, management went well beyond expectations to help us find it.  The rock memorabilia - all authentic - and the Cafe out front - all add to the show.  Pattaya is not my favorite place -- luckily there is the Hard Rock to stay at, so there is no need to go anywhere else.

I just found out, that I ve been in that Hard Rock Hotel almost 10 times in the last decade. I ve been to every Hard Rock Hotel around the World and this one is in my TOP 3. Additional it is so much cheaper than the other Hard Rocks. Only Las Vegas is cheaper (during the week) and maybe Penang and Biloxi (Casino-Hotel in nowhere). Caribbean is up to 6 times more in pricing, but in Pattaya you have the same good service and food. The pool is in my TOP 3 as well. Bali is better and even bigger, what is not easy. I guess the Pattaya-Pool is the biggest in that area. Hotel is far enough from loud "walking street", but it ´s still easy to reach für 20 Baht in 5 minutes. The Hard Rock Hotel is good for layovers (24 hours and up) at BKK-airport as well, only a 90 minute drive and taxis charge around 1000 to 1500 Baht. Bus is almost nothing.

일본사람 한국사람이많네요. 조식은 그냥 먹을만하구요, 수영장은 크고 좋았습니다 , 이벤트도 사이사이에 하구요, 토요일에는 풀파티도하네요. 방은 깨끗하고 뷰도 좋았습니다.
