Location is excellent but service and breakfast was average and food was way below average as they served mostly  "hard rock cafe food"  i.e. bad American food of ribs and burgers. 
Do you want to come to Thailand to eat bad American food and listen to western rock n roll which was famous before most of the staff was born. Well the Chinese and Russians do - as they seem to be only customers.

Hard Rock hotel is located a heart of Pattya city, closed to the beach just walk across the road around the hotel you can find many kind of restaurants such as Thai food, Italian food, Japanese food, Korean food, Indian food and so on. And if you looking for supermarket or mini-marts are neared by hotel , Seven Eleven, Family mart and so on. Let talk about hotel facilities definitely the hotel provided you free of charge stream and sauna room. the huge swimming pool is also let you fun and relax in the same time.  during the day they have provided you a lot of activity such as dancing around the pool, playing games, table tennis climbing and so on, all activities there will be treated  you by staff. So let talk about the room, the i stayed in standard sea view room, room is full enough for facilities the room is no balcony and size is to small but so comfy. All staff here very friendly and always warm welcome. if you looking for fun during your vacation here is your answer.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: 4th trip to Pattaya but first stay at the Hard Rock.  Travelling with a 4 year old its sometimes hard to keep him entertained, this place does job.  Great little bedroom just like his own cubby house! Plenty of room pool and water slides a hit with the whole family.  Great location, fantastic hotel the staff are great they are all very helpful and friendly.  Will come back here again fantastic place to relax before heading back to work for another 12 months!

Hard rock 's  hospitality to clients is impressive.
good room service
without much noise , good for sleeping
hotel room is tidy ,the environment is good 
Finally, thanks for the birthday cake from band member,

I stayed at Hard Rock Pattaya several times. I always enjoy the services and the staffs here. And the buffet here is very good. 
The location is also excellent if you want to visit nearby tourist attractions. 
And if you sometimes just feel like drinking before going to bed, It is always nice to know that the famous hard rock cafe (with excellent music and food) is actually located right next to the hotel. 
This means that you can easily walk back to your room no matter how much you had to drink.

It was our first trip to Thailand and first hotel did not disappointed us. Guitars and celebrity costumes make a wonderful atmosphere from the entrance. Huge Elvis portrait in the room. Fantastic view from the balcony. Lovely pool and animation team. And it's great to have Hard rock cafe next to the pool - delicious XXL-hamburgers! Perfect location - it's in the beginning of the walking street, so you can walk and walk and walk. Colored lights outside the building make it visible far-far away in the city. Great for the young couples!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Lovely place, really safe, friendly staff, couldn't have asked for a more enjoyable stay. Extended my room for and extra 3 nights because the beds were just so comfortable and I had previously recovered a broken back. Recommend to anyone who is willing to pay the extra dollar.

Nice hotel, good location...very good live music in the hard rock bar with good foods and good beer...nice pool area, good gym...what else you need? Musicians collection all over the place with amazing stuffs!
Shame that one of guy in the reception has a very condescending attitude...that,s the reason of 4 star.

Nice but showing some signs of age; also not the best deal in terms of value.  But very nice nonetheless.  Pool was undergoing renovation so there was noise from that, but they did discount the room rate because of it.  Fantastic sea view, and very decent gym facility.

Very impressed with the hotel during our stayed....spaces room compared to Hard Rock Penang . The b'fast was good plenty of choices . Special high light to Hardrock cafe helpful staff mr Pound who served us during our anniversary dinner at the cafe . Definitely will be back again .
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
We stayed at room 539. The room was quite old, the door knob of the storage room was falling out. The toilet in the master bed room was a bit dirty. The television has the burned mark all over the screen which need to be replaced for viewing pleasure. 
This is our 4th time staying here for the last 12 months and we still impressed with rooms on 9th and 10th floor. Despite the pool renovation and some hassles in our room, other things that HArd Rock Hotel pattaya gave us were very pleasurable to us and most importantly to our 2 daughters.

The Hardrock Hotel is a large hotel with 323 rooms. It is very well located on the Beach Road. It has a nice big pool, there are many places to sit and hang out and of course there is the Hard Rock Café too. At the reception we had to wait a bit, but were then efficiently processed and provided with our room key. Bags had already been brought up. The staff is very friendly and helpful everywhere. We had a lovely large room with a view on the sea side.
Breakfast is busy and loud, but there is much choice and here too a helpful friendly staff.

Very good service and food very nice and room. Wry clean. I happy on that. I will come again in closed future. But a big far away to Bangkok........
Must take long distance to Bangkok....very tired. Anyway pattaya is a nice place for side sensing ....

Overall the hotel is great and got a nice experience with Hard Rock Hotel.  Although, the hotel looks aged but the overall maintenance and refurbishment is pretty well.
The only drawback is the location is away from the hot spot.

I want high floor and the room not at the end of corridor. But your staff told me There is only 1 king bedroom in 2/f which make me feel very disappointed. Our order should have 2 king size bedroom, then your staff said There is one in 2/f and 3/f, which is at the end of corridor. I think the staff is not helpful

nice hotel with excellent service! we enjoy the foam party! swimming pool! Great Music! nice food! the breakfast buffet is awesome! the room is cleanliness too! the view on that hotel is beautiful! overall very good! will come back again!

The 4 days 3 nights stay at the hotel is fantastic.  However, the 6000 baht you have to pay first as deposit I think is a bit too high.  Most hotels around the area only need approximately 2000 baht as deposit.

I’ll start by saying that the Hard Rock Hotel in Pattaya is the BEST hotel I have ever, eeeeeevver stayed at! This is no joke!!! 
I truly enjoyed every minute of my stay in Hard Rock Hotel, thanks to the super friendly staff, the gigantic swimming pool area, the ever-changing breakfast menu, the game room + activities, the free movies in suite, and the free guitar rental for guests. 
We stayed in the Composer Suite on the 9th floor, and it totally blew me away! Fantastic sea view, a large living room, a separate bedroom, 2 bathrooms (w/ bathtub), and 2 TVs w/ free movies. Everything you could possibly need, this room already has it. I.e. Bluetooth speaker, DVD player, umbrellas, table + chairs on the balcony, many water bottles, surprise treats on a daily basis (i.e. fruit plate, macaroons, brownies, etc...), book lights, etc.... 
They also sent a Fender Strat guitar (by request) up to my room, along with a complete setup of the pedalboard and electronics. All I had to do was pick up the axe and play! As an added bonus, they also provided a free access to the “lounge” along with free drinks + snacks between 6-7:30pm. They also let us check out later @ 1:30pm at no extra charge. I’m now a huge fan of Hard Rock Hotel! Will definitely visit again when I return to Pattaya. Rock on!!!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I was in Hard Rock cafe from Oct 28th- Nov8th. I was staying in a Deluxe, Non smoking single room. I have seen other reviews about the room being too small but for one person or even two there is plenty of space. for extra money I would recommend the Deluxe rooms because it has very nice views over the ocean. Check in took about one hour because my room was not ready but they offered their facilities which was fine. Breakfast was also good and plenty. The only thing is food and drinks in this hotel are more expensive than other places in Pattaya. This was a perfect hotel for me. It was on a very good location right on beach road close enough to walking street but away from all the noise that comes from walking street. If you want a good hotel with great location and very friendly staff then I would defently recommend this hotel.

I can't fault the hotel. The rooms were fantastic. The staff were amazing. The breakfast had an enormous selection and it was all very nice. Unfortunately I absolutely hated Pattaya. I know Pattaya is well known for its sex trade but I've never seen so many sad young ladies paired with ancient pervy western men. Unless that's what  you are going there for then choose another part of Thailand. I won't be back.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Room was very clean, most of staff were great.  Very central location.  Food was good, pool was large and bar was great.  The negative very chaotic when we were checking out that put a very sour note on our stay.

Stayed at Hard Rock Hotel Rock Royalty room with sea view and balcony from 15 Nov to 23 Nov 16. Rock Royalty is exactly as it sounds I was treated like royalty by the staff. My 2 sons also stayed there in Rooms 723 and 403 and both enjoyed their stay. They were also treat like royalty even though I was the only one staying on the Rock Royalty level. Perfect stay and great value for money. Only a few rooms have a sea view with a balcony on the club level. Mine was Room 1017......
Let me be Short and Simple .. Its just a wonderful exp .. everything rooms , service , pool side , food , and hard rock cafe with super market are simply amazing ,.. its a complete value for money

If anyone want to enjoy the staying in pattaya. he should stay here. Specially the swimming pool  and the foam party was simply awesome was awesome. In addition , stuff and other members was really good.

I have been staying at Hard Rock hotel in Pattaya since 2011 when I went to Thailand for business trip. After renovation rooms are clean and all staffs are very friendly.
I love the breakfast so much and I am looking forward to the end of renovation of swimming pool.
I am willing to stay at Hard Rock hotel with my family in near future.

This was a nice hotel.  Good location.  There were some real stars here as far as the customer service.  Fluke at the front desk was awesome!  The security guy that worked by the elevators in the evenings was a superstar, and the folks in the hard rock gift shops were also awesome.  The only thing I would advise is not to eat hear... the food was very bad and over priced.  I would recommend staying here but not eating here.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I have been staying at HardRock for one night, and I wish my trip had been longer.
The pool is really big, with variation of both tile pool and sand-based areas.
Variance selection of restaurants and nice drinks. The 
The staff are very attentive and friendly.
However, I wish I could find a selection of pillow types and a hair dryer.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The day I stay at hard rock was my Birthday and I was so surprise that while returning from sightseeing there were a cake on the table , I really feel welcome and happy that hard rock appreciate my stay within my birthday that I was away from my family . I like to thanks to your team who really make me feel welcome . Thanks again

i had good experienced with hard rock.good services kitchen chefs are really awesome.i like everything in hard rock. the pool area the most likely. i love your colour theme combinations. every thing is rock.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: It is a good hotel with excellent location. You may reach the beach within 1 min walking. The staffs are very helpful and polite. We were unfortunate as during our stays the swimming pool was under renovation, alternatively they offered us a free-shuttle ride to a nearby beach. It is easy to get taxi to and from the airport from the hotel. Overall, is a quite nice experience to stay at this hotel.

Just finished a five night stay at this hotel.  Clean, every thing you need for a great holiday is on site,  the beach is across the street.  All the other local attractions are close by.  Staff are genuinely really friendly and happy in there work.  Prices are reasonable but certainly at the top end of mid range,  you can find cheaper.  Food at any of the five restaurants is great but be warned they are large portions.  The pool area has just been refurbished and is awesome with lifeguards on duty 15 hours a day.

I really like this hotel, im sure in future, i will come again...The location is strategic n the food is nice. The room is huge n cleaniness. The staff is very friendly and helpfull. The pool is big and i really luv their live band while swimm at pool. Tq.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Good staff , friendly , feel very welcome , room is look bit old becouse maybe is open long  ago , and also is answer family choice , kids very happy and daddy and mummy like us enjoys all activity in the hotel

This hotel feel so good,but the air is so cool,the swimming pool is very good and can play games with staff.There are two things ,the room door closing is too loud and the room is freezing cold, will stsy next time.

Great hotel with a fantastic pool, a very pleasant spot to spend the day relaxing before heading out to sample the nearby night life.  Freindly staff right through out the hotel.  The Rock Royalty lounge is great for a quick snack, a relax and for a view of the beach looking towards Walking St.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: The hotel offers Hard Rock standard experience of fun just across the beach of Pattaya. Although there are newer hotel in the surrounding, this hotel still manage to attract visitors due to its fun-filled programs and of course, its signature Hard Rock cafe at your doorstep. I believe the rooms, most of the hotel's interior and its health club had just been renovated in the last few years. Within  walking distance from the hotel, you can find what Pattaya has for you.

This hotel is so nice and beautiful. Perfect location that very close beach indeed. Lounge and Facilities is Awesome. And most important for me is swimming pool is great for my children that look very cool indeed.

Perfectly located in the heart of Pattaya, Hard Rock Hotel was rocking indeed. Service was at its best from the time we checked-in to the time we checked-out. Breakfast was great and the pool party was awesome!!! Keep rocking!

Apart from the good location, I can't find anything good about this hotel. I love Hard Rock Cafe a lot in the past but this hotel totally ripped off my preference in just 2 nights!
I am still staying at this hotel now and have to wake up early in the morning for golfing. However, I am really mad and want to post this message at here at immediately! We are a group of 7 travellers and have 4 rooms starting from 9 Nov. We have different or same issues. First, 2 rooms have problems with the key card which worked intermittently. The receptionist had to swift the cards again to fix this issue. Second, one of the reading lights in my room is not working, the switch is broken but not being replaced. Besides, I really don't understand why we have to input the password whenever using the free wi-fi each time, and each room is only allowed to connect with 2 devices at the same time! I normally only stay in 5-star hotels in Thailand, no matter whether I was in Pattaya, Bangkok, Chiangmai or Phuket. For other hotels, the wi-fi can be assessed by multiple devices and I didn't have to re-type the password all the time. This is the only 5-star hotel which offers such cheap free wi-fi with mean restrictions. 
Room cleaning s poor, I made a cup of tea and left it on the table after drinking half cup on 9 Nov. The cup was still there after room cleaning! 
There are 2 bottles of water in each room which are complimentary to guests. The bottles however looks dirty. I doubt if the bottles have never been cleaned, so I bought drinking water from 7-eleven across the street. However, I took my roommate to Pattaya Memorial Hospital this morning since he has food poisoning with serious diarrhea, But I can't prove whether his sickness is really related to the bottles.
Moreover, 3 rooms has problems with the TV. My friends' rooms are fixed but it's too late for me to call for fixing it now. My room door can't close automatically too, but it's relatively minor issues.
Seriously I am not a demanding customers but I will not stay in this hotel again, and I will tell all my friends about my experience staying at this so called 5-star hotel.

Hardrock resort is very kids friendly resort. But on saturday it’s too noisy because of foam party for the adults. Totally i satisfied with this resort including service, location and price. Thanks you.

my girlfriend and I really enjoyed our stay here. Very clean and great food, breakfast buffet is top notch, love the pool and it's very close to the beach! All the employees were very nice and helpful. Definitely recommend and would stay there again!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Had a great stay at hard rock  .. lots of nice memories . staff  are friendly & go out of their way to help you with anything you need .. shout out to Nastya from reception. Feel safe with the excellent security 24/7 . Food is amazing with a pig on a spit every saturday ... can go on for ever .. thanx Hard Rock for making my experience in Pattaya a memorable on : )

We stayed for 7 nights at the HRH Pattaya, 2 adults and 2 small children aged 4 years and 1 year.  Everything about our stay was superb and a totel experience.  The most important factor was entertainment and care for our children and the staff of this hotel passed with flying colours, engaged our children at every opportunity and seemed to really care.  We stayed in a Kids Suite, with Kings Club Lounge access on the 9th floor.  I highly recommend if you are travelling with young kids as you can access milk whenever you need it and also the breakfast offerings in the club lounge are great and it's not so busy and hectic as it can be in the breakfast room downstairs.  The pool areas and staff are the best I have seen so far, with life guards on duty, absolutely beautiful pool areas and the kids club is a small childs dream with happy friendly carers on site.  Good location, close to great shopping and restaurants.  The staff really are the icing on the cake as they are so very helpful and their speed of service and understanding of your needs are par to none and it's so rare to find this in a hotel.  I love this place and will recommend to everyone I know.  My kids are talking about it all the time and so are we!  Love you hard rock.

- Good service.
- Good rooms.
- Оpen-air swimming pool for children and adults with bar.
- Pictures of international celebritys on the walls.
Very good hotel with a charming entourage of hard rock!

The visit was excellent and the stay was nice.From the time i arrived very tired from the long flight to the refreshing iced lemon tea served to we while i checked in,to the friendly staff and the very good advice i received at the Hard Rock Cafe manager on how the taxi /tuk tuks work to what to avoid and where every thing was.

Just short stay in Hard Rock Hotel, hotel staffs really very good attitude and manners. Room size big and suitable for 2 adults and 1 kid. Breakfast very good and variety of choice. Room slipper need to improve.

thank you to the staff for a lovely stay . It was our special anniversary and they made it special . Mention to niclole in spa and check in girl who helped when i kept loosing things . One negative i like fresh milk not powder in my tea i askes for fresh molk for the room and was charged 180 bhts
mmm first time that has ever happend ! 
But great hotel great if you have kids well catered for . 
  thank you again
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Staff is very friendly and help you on every occasion during your stay. Guitar is the theme of this hotel and you can see this musical instrument everywhere with autographs from renowned musicians across the world.

This hotel has fantastic staff and is very well located on Beach Road making catching a baht taxi very easy. The rooms are very good and I recommend upgrading to top floor with club room and awesome views across Pattaya Bay. The decor is very eclectic with guitars, clothes and photos or rock stars featuring through out. While I was there the much loved King of Thailand died and the hotel was very respectful of this sad situation and were very good at communicating changes to guests. It is also a quick baht taxi to Central Plaza and Mike Mall. Unfortunately while there the swimming pool was being renovated so missed out on this great feature
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: I think I have an uneasy feeling about Koreans.If I am not good at English, your steff feel annoyed.It made me very angry.I couldn't find a way to call.The reception desk and phone reception also made me feel annoyed.

It all started rather well with a nice welcome from a smiling and very professional Korean staff at the reception desk called Caroline, but then the corridor bringing to the room on the 4th floor and the room itself were dark and not welcoming.
Then, I saw by accident a small note on the desk inside the bedroom that the swimming pool was going through some repair etc etc.
Down to the pool, the noise was unbearable and so unpleasant, all day long. Besides, a "new" building on the other side was under construction !
I think the Hotel or the website one books the bedroom from, should inform their guests about this, so that, one can decide whether they want to stay there or not.
The water of the pool didn't look clean at all. That probably explain why.
Most of the staff around the pool looked arrogant and their only goal was to sell you things to drink or to eat. They could hardly speak English.
And it was very annoying to notice that almost all - if not all - activities, one had to pay such as kids club (very poor set up and things to do inside), water mat, football table, ping pong, wall climbing etc....Not nice and unseen before.
Finally,there are 2 young lifeguards on duty by the pool and they spend their time behind their black sunglasses playing with their mobile phones.
Breakfast was just OK.
I will not recommend, sorry

i was at the hotel on 4th september for 1 day , the check in was ok , not as good what i expect from all the good hotel  , i was given room on 8 th floor the location of the room is good and have a nice view too . The internet is not working in the room and it waste  of money. room service is poor  i asked for some food which was firstly hard to expalin in english then i canceled the order and went out for my lunch .
the swimming pool is not clean with respect to 4 or 5 star hotel around the hotel works with card which u have to hang on every where u go even if u use the lift u must have the card  with u .tthe safe in the room is on the back side of the door and really inside cant understand the design ,there r plenty of beautiful hotel  example marriot is really good they have a nice garden and really look beautiful in night and also they have a bar in the swimming pool which is also great and i think they have a wonderful spa and stafff is really excelent for service .
will not recomend this hotel

Staff at the swimming pool who run and entertained our kids with games are fantastic.  Our kids really had fun staying in the water all day. The pool for kids are great with those sliders. We definitely come back again.

I have stayed there for 2 times and I enjoyed it very much. The location is great just a few steps walk to the sea. The parking lot is not that big but I never have problem of finding an available space. If you like to party at night, this is definitely a place for you. There's a open air foam party by the swimming pool from around 10 or 11 PM till 2 AM.
The room was a little bit small compare to the price but it was clean and comfortable. Staffs are helpful but it took very long to check in and there was a mistake on our bill. This was only on the 2nd time we stayed. I think it seldom happen but just warn you to check the list and spare sometimes when you check in and out.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Hardrock had always been my favorite hotel whenever I visit Pattaya for business. It has a relaxing atmosphere with the purple lighting and good facilities. The gym which used to be quite warm in the late afternoon is not more cooling and better ventilated. It is a pity that the swimming pool is under renovation, but there is also special arrangements made to transport guests to nearby beach. The staff are friendly and the food at the breakfast table has variety.

This hotel is great for kids and families.  If you have more than 2 kids, the rooms with the bunk beds are great.  You will also get access to the executive lounge.  There is a lot of attention to detail when it comes to the kids.  The rooms are very kid friendly in that they give them toys, an XBOX and various movies on the TV for free.  Nice little added touches.  The staff are really great and kid friendly.  The dinner at the restaurant (buffet) was amazing and worth it as they don't charge for kids under 12 years of age.  The only complaints I have are the following:  There is a bad, stale smell throughout the hotel.  There are many HUGE boulder like rocks all around the pool area which is dangerous for kids and very slippery.  Even the stairs up to the slides is made up of uneven rocks.  Including the bottom of the slide.  Another major issue I had was the fact that the pool area charged 300 baht for the kids to use a foam matt in the water.  That should be included in the priced of the hotel as it's a pool accessory.  Other than that, great place to bring your family.

The hotel has an Excellent location, it has Decent rooms, and we found a very good online  pricing deal on the hard Rock site. However the set up in the room for playing music was not great. Poor music and really old stereo and speakers set up in rooms

Nice experience as always. Enjoy a little too much of Hard Rock's burger as usual it's took away my 5 km morning run but really worth it. Thanks Joe for a lovely birthday treats for my two friends, your Brownie Ice Cream is ROCK!   Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya is located in Mid- Pattaya in a midst of active and night live. Easy with big parking lots. Nice pool and lots of activities.

Very goooooooooood!!!
I made beautiful memories in a nice place with my family.
Thank you for the hard rock hotel
Thank you all at the reception
Too friendly and great service
Comfortable rooms and pleasant indoor air

I eat at Hard Rock Cafe across the globe, I was just in the Jakarta HRC last week and love it. The food is consistently good, so I thought I'd give the Hard Rock Hotel a try on my trip to Pattaya. I was traveling with my friend and he was initially a bit reticent as he (Europe) thought HR was a 'chain like McDonalds' - lol. 
I assured him it was a little bit more upscale and should have some funky rooms. The pool in Pattaya is massive, and indeed the rooms did turn out to have a very nice design element to them. He and I were both more than happy with the location and layout.
Where the Hard Rock lost our future patronage was in the small things. I know individuals reading reviews often say ymmv (your mileage may very), but when you come expecting to be treated like a rock star and instead are treated like a number it can really leave a bad taste in your mouth.
I booked online through the HR Hotel website, there were PLENTY of rooms available for my stay, I paid online and got an email confirmation - it's super speedy just like any current hotel reservation system should be. Prices were reasonable for hotels in Pattaya.
We took a cab down from Bangkok and when we arrived we were told the 'booking office close 6pm' and 'we have no rooms' and the preceded to try to upsell us to the kings club rooms (twice the price). At 12:30am we just wanted to hit the bars not be upsold and lied to. I showed them my confirmation (actually the email and the website confirmation were still open on my laptop) and the staff were frankly stupid - they looked at it as if they had never seen these items before and did not believe we had reservations. We had to explain to them that we were very SORRY to inconvenience them, you know - trying to get our rooms and all... And they just kept their stinky-faces on the entire time.. What a Hard Rock welcome we got!!
They continued to lie and say they had no rooms, utter crap... Eventually they 'found' rooms that matched our reservation but would have to charge for them at full rate (not internet rate) until tomorrow 'IF' they can find our reservation. C'mon guys - you're staring at it on my computer. Why doesn't their booking system link up to the front desk? A mystery indeed.
The rooms of course were VERY smoky, I don't complain about that type of thing, I just wanted to shower and get out. However it really pissed my friend off and he called down and gave them some strong words (in his refined English manner). They 'upgraded' us to the kings club rooms for the night... This cost them nothing and should have been done in the first place. 
What seemed like a bit of good luck turned turned out to be more bad luck as the rooms had two small beds. While I know some visitors come for the 'beautiful' beach, I would think others come for the nightlife, and two small bed that you can't push together - hardly rock-star experience does it make. More like you're 12yo living with mom and dad. ha.
Room service - forget it, their menu is paltry and it's sectioned off into available by time. Some things are not available past 10pm, and their 24 hour room service is VERY limited. The CRAZY thing to me was that you couldn't order food from the Hard Rock Cafe (attached to the hotel) so all the good stuff (potato skins, nachos) were not available. You would think they share the same kitchen but I tell you - the food available at the hotel sucked compared to to cafe. This is reason enough not to return. 
This hotel is supposed to be guest friendly, however when I brought my 'girlfriend' home for the night she was asked 4 TIMES by 4 DIFFERENT hotel staff for her ID.. (we gave it to reception to the first guy that asked).. Two guys asked us at the elevator and one on the way to the elevator.. Talk about embarrassing, my girlfriend wanted to crawl under a rock and die as there were many other 'family' types waiting at the elevator bank. 
Lastly - as a general example of this hotel's ineptitude - I set my alarm for 10:30 so I could grab some breakfast and then hit the gym and of course I call down at 10:33 and am told they 'stop serving breakfast at 10:30am).. Fine, however on the menus in the room it clearly states 'SERVED UNTIL 11am'. I made two calls and got two different answers - one that no breakfast served past 10:30, one that said only on weekends. LOOK - if you're not going to serve until 11am don't put it on your menus as I set my alarm and checked the night before. 
As far as I'm concerned a late breakfast option would probably be a good thing for guys that party here. I'm not talking about the buffet - i TOTALLY understand that has to have a closing time. I'm talking about being able to order room-service and start off the day.
I'm hoping it's just that the Hard Rock Pattaya that is mis-managed, but my stay will CERTAINLY make me reticent to try another Hard Rock hotel, and to be honest it even taints my feelings about the Cafes... So they've gone from having a loyal fan to someone who thinks their halfwits. 

Stay here? Hope u have better luck than we did. 
;)
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
We visited this restaurant in October so we were out of season but I was delighted to be warmly welcomed by the staff. As in all the hard rock restaurants the cleanliness and the efficiency of the staff was excellent. The food was also really tasty.  I would recommend a visit if you are in Pattaya. 
We did not stop at the hotel but from what we saw and heard we would have no problem in stopping there next time.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Nice property with superb entrance. Check in was quick , asked for higher floors were given in no time. However pool team is quite arrogant especially life gaurds. Also during foam party per towel was charged 500 bhat which was quite absurd. For guest it wasn't required. When same are given in excess during pool use. Liquor is expensive then other star hotels in premises.. stay was comfortable.

It was my first trip to Pattaya and my colleague in Thailand recommended that I should stay.  The words from my colleague were just right and I really enjoyed my stay.  I will definitely come back to Hard Rock Hotel at my trip to Pattaya in future!  Thanks!

Dear Royal Orchid Sheraton Hotel & Towers Team,

Please see my comments and suggestions:
In general the team is Very friendly and professional.
1.	Bad room: Add Silicone has Mold and must be renewed
2.	breakfast room: very noisy, please use all rooms
3.     My room 2330. The room was very noisy 

Kind Regards
Dietmar Hasenpusch

The location is great, best for those who want to enjoy the beach as it is only across the hotel and near shopping mall, but it is quite far if you want to go to the walking street or to the cabaret show. 
The room is average like any other hotel.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We stayed at the Hard Rock in October 2011 and it was awesome.  Everything was enjoyable and nothing was too much trouble for any staff member.  Beautiful view from our room.  Superb entertainment for children.  Will certainly be back.

I love everything about this hotel except one thing - thin walls with no soundproofing.  You can easily hear what's going on in the room next to you.  Makes it hard to sleep.  But this is the only thing that keeps this place from being a solid 5 stars.

Great and fun hotel to stay in. The reception, pool and restaurant staffs were fantastic. The only complaint I had was with the rockshop staffs who were a bit rude and not really accommodating. The rest is fine.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Room was very clean except one of the window was very dirty and was unable to see outside.  Food was very nice with a variety of choices.  Location is very convenient just next to the beach.  Would definitely stay again on our next visit.

Everytime we stay at Hardrocks. this time is best time. enjoy and relax. if you want to get smarts tips. My recommend is Hard rock Pattaya hotel.  My family, My boys are very happy, it's first choice of my family.

It was a wonderful two days we spent in Hard rock hotel at Pattaya. A little attitude problem I found on front office staff.. I think they can be more professional and helping... Otherwise it is a wonderful place. This is the second time,I am staying with HRH

Our 2nd time here, we choose here because your excellent staff and great qualities. Our room have many facilities. Your location is easy to travel and good view. 
We love Hard Rock Cafe the great band 
Nice staff K.Sam , K.Pookie at HardRock Cafe.
K.Top at room service.
And K.Natacha at Star Diner.
You have many excellent staff who are friendly, nice smiles, Service mind and unique.
Thanks, and see you again!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: HR still delivers on so many levels. The service is absolutely first class. The staff are wonderful. They always remember your name and make you and your family feel special. The kids activities are great. Our family has been staying there on and off for year now. The recently renovated rooms are big enough and the bathrooms vastly improved. the food and beverage is also good for a 4-star hotel. My only criticism is the decline in amenity of the club floor. Clearly there is some cost cutting going on and the evening cocktails are testament to this. The food on offer can only be described as miserly and of poor quality. On a Saturday evening when the hotel is full somebody forgot to tell the kitchen staff. The little food that was on offer ran out very quickly. I didn't even bother to take the kids down and ordered room service instead. The breakfast in the club lounge was a similarly stingy offering, a far cry from my last visit. I wouldn't bother paying the extra for club floor in the future as it simply is not worth it. A pity because the ambiance and staff in the club lounge are fantastic. Maybe management should take this on board.

Great and worth money for the whole family, lots of facilities for kids and adult. Life guard at the pool are very helpful to look after young kids while parents away for a while. Breakfast is great varieties but a bit of comment on crispy bacon that a bit thick and make cold bacon tough. Room also great and value, just a bit of comment on changing towels. To request new towels we have to place them on the floor, we hang our towels up but cleaner (with good intention) changed all new towels for us, it's nice thing but we just want to save the washing. In general, we are happy and will come back again.

This is my first visit to Hard Rock Hotel.I was there for only one night. Was given a room with balcony facing towards Hilton instead of the beach.The room size is decent,but its very cozy. There's a very good stereo which could use it with iphone,pretty loud and good one. Room comes with 2 free complimentary drinking water and also not to mention its pillow and mattress! Totally worth it.  There's also a huge free form pool size at the back of the hotel opposite the beach more. Location wise its not too far away from their night market and walking street too,about 15 side. Lots of activity were provided such as rock climbing,basket ball at the pool and other minutes walk you should be able to walk to the street where good local delights and massage are available. Not to forget the breakfast was really good as well.

Good staff. nice food and location. easy access to shopping malls and restaurants. pattaya has many sorts of entertainment to offer and affordable price. the place is secured to move around at any time.

No many words to spend... It was just an amazing experience.
Everything was almost close to the perfection. The location of the hotel is also strategic. 
... thanks guys for be so available and always smiling.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: 5 nights spent were nice and full of plesure. Very good for business or vacation stay in Pattaya. Good location. A lot of food choice arround. Walking distance to the beach of Pattaya. Nice facilities.

I would recommend staying at the hard rock hotel,I found it to be professional in every way , the people were friendly and could not do enough for you,the room was spotless,all In all i had a lovely time ,thank you

We are on the way back home, my kids dont wanna leave Hard Rock Pattaya anyway. We will come here again, this hotel is kid friendly and family entertain. All staff are well trained and very friendly even we are party of 10 Thai with crazy kids.... They all like the purple slider and foam party. This hotel was reccommended by my office colleague. Room is cleaned and comfy bed, like the bath amenities in room. Rock spa. The buffet diner is quite interested, however we planned to go out to beach side restaurant ( wrong decission) the hotel very near shopping mall, just 5 mins walk ( if not wrong) Definitely come back to spend more time here.

Great  place to stay close to every thing great staff plenty of activity's inside the resort for the kids
food was good room service is great  be back next year 
only down fall was the drinks were a bit pricey especially the Coronas

Room is well maintained and was nicely tidy-up by room service in my entire 5-day of stay. Located at prime spot and surrounding by many attractive spots. MICE team from Hard Rock was awesome for my 1 day event. Keep Rock On!

We stay in this hotel only one night. Probably its not enough time to see everything but I will tell you what we experienced. Room is clean, not so spacy, a lot of nice touches to see something diferent from other hotels. If you are rocker in your hart you will like it more. There is no iron in the room. Stuff pleasent but not as I expected. Pool area fenomenal. Hotel is near the beach, only beach road is bitween them. But its not recomended to swim in the sea on the city beach. We ate pizza and salad in pool restaurant, it was great.

Highly recommend Hard Rock Hotel for a great stay. Location on beach road very convenient for everything. First class facilities for all ages. Swimming pool big and also shallow pool for kids and slides for children. Good service at pool for food and drinks never kept waiting as plenty of staff. Food good at hotel and hard rock cafe where you can also enjoy the resident band who are really good. I have traveled all around Asia and can recommend Hard Rock Hotel to business,solo, couples and families as one of the best hotels.

We originally booked here for 5 nights but extended to 9. The buffet breakfast was excellent with different selections every day. Hotel organised an in house babysitter for our 2 y.o for 2 of the days

Ok maybe it is not the most luxory hotel in Pattaya but it is the most enjoyable hotel in Pattaya. You will be a star in this hotel. Everyday you can find a entertainment for yourself or your children. Hotel is located great.

You wont forget your holiday, for sure

Our Grandson loves this place.
He loves the pool and all of the activities that go with it, especially the foam party.
The rooms are spacious and comfortable, but they would benefit from tea and coffee making facilities for English people like me. We discovered that Thai for milk is 'nom'.
The staff are friendly and helpful. We didn't have breakfast but we did eat in the burger place. I don't usually go for burgers but I did enjoy the Thai burger because it was different and spicy. The staff also made a fuss of our Grandson, which always goes down well.

That was my 5th stay at Hard Rock Hotel. Every time the service standard, the staff's friendliness and the property's cleanliness were top notch. This time it was no different. Thank you Hard Rock team and have a rocking day ;).

I love the concept of HRH pattaya, when u enter the HRH Pattaya u fee in las vegas, all memorabilia & design of lobby super look luxury and Hard rocker,all staff is super friendly & specially Megan Reception, she very extramile, she give us good room & good view, unfortunately we stay only 1 night, hope can enjoy if more than 1 night, hard rock cafe is awesome all crew is awesome, the performance band super talented, definitely will come back soon and stay more than 1 night and use all facilities & feel all outlet at HRH Pattaya

My stay on last week was fabulous, it was my birthday trip and I get a comp upgrade to sea view room and the room is awesome! Nice location, near to the beach, nice swimming pool. But the cleanliness in the stars restaurant need to improve. The staffs are helpful, especially Kin from concierge, Pop & Jamie from shack bar. Thank you for making us a memorable stay :)
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Went to hard rock Pattaya recently and the first time we tried the steak which was lovely so went back again. The food is really good the layout of the restaurant is neat but what really is great are the staff who are very caring and good. So thanks to our waktress Pambel and to Pound for the attention and interaction given to us. Paula and George
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
went with family for 3 days. had a wonderful time 
the good things 
 - smooth check in ( some fellow travelers had mentioned difficulties) go one room early as well, staff very courteous.
- good view from the room ( took the sea facing rooms).
- pool was big nice and clean , fun activities for the kids and also a separate area for the kids
- standard spread for the buffet ( repetitive though)
- majority staff very welcoming and pleasing personality
- across the road to the main beach ( beach crowded and dirty but maybe just one visit )
-close to the walking street but not that close  so its upto you 
Now few things which we found odd 
- why are the coca cola floats in the pool charged  200 bhat per day .... found that strange 
- i think having brown color skin does make a difference in the behavior of certain staff members ( especially the Rock Spa).. the reason did not give it a try.
- restaurant timing till 10:00 pm but they shut off at 9:30 pm ( not good if a family comes late from  a walk and it raining and cant go out for food ) .... they did have room service but still why have timings then .

still had a good overall experience 
would recommend for family with youngish kids

What a BRILLIANT CONCEPT! And OMG what amazing service , MUSIC and food. The live music was the highlight of the evening. If you’re in Pattaya, missing this would be terrible . Also don’t forget to ask for the Jumbo combo. Must must have
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Great team, clean at all times, Service from all Crew 👍, Breakfast really much choice,Room always clean & quick Service, At all times the team members helpful, friendly & in a relaxed nice way.Good place to be with friends too and at night at Hard-Rock-cafe with livemusic …In area all relevant Restaurants & Shops & medical support.Beach for relax ok, but swim better at Jomtien..Good place to start trips too.

Overall the HardRock Pattaya was nice hotel to stay in.  I would recommend it to others who are travelling in the area as the price is reasonable.  The service and staff are great.  The hotel was a bit old and could use a remodel.  The pool area was remodeled in the past year and is excellent.  The staff on the 9th floor lounge is always nice to be around.

Such a great place! We recommand it for spend your holiday. Everything works for 100%, service is a first class,staff is very friendly, smiley and helpfull. Hotel is close to the beach and main atraction in the city. Hotel has an amazing swimingpool and sea view, plus children have own sand beach and many animation during the day. The breakfast is very reach and intercontinental food. Hotel has a sever restaurants and bars. Pool bar is cool.You can visit two Rockshops. You must visit HardRock Hotel Pattaya

The hotel's location is unbeatable for one - close to Central Park, best mall in Pattaya as my knowledge, 1 minute to the beach, away from Walking Street (where all the mayhem is but close enough if you decide its your scene in the middle of the night..so hands down, best location for me as this is our fist visit to Pattaya, not to mention taxi available 24 hours for only 100 baht one way for 2 pax..
We were originally stayed in another hotel accross the street before moving to Hard Rock (bad experience) and it is really an excellent decision on our part..for one we were upgraded to their newly renovated Deluxe Ocean Room which is awesome, have all the amenities you can think of plus another..my fave is super fluffly pillow, the ocean view and cd/ipod player..totally cool..from plan to stay 1 night, we extended t0 4 nights as we were having so much fun..
The staff speak excellent english, some even with accent, which i find amusing..hehe..very courteous and nice without being intrusing..excellent choice for breakfast which opens until 10:30am, good for us late wakers, best burgers i know of..concierge is also very helpful with ticket purchase for shows such as Tiffany's and taxi arrangements etc..very much glad to be able to move here from our previous hotel accross the street, so much relieved..
Totally awesome pool, very large even with one sandy beach pool, pop/rock lounging music at the pool, HR Cafe's excellent frozen margarita on hand, life's good..dont forget to stay during weekends for the awesome FOAM PARTY on Saturday night when we were there..gorgeous..awesome DJ, nice crowd and lots and lots of fun.. 
dont forget to try their massage..surpassed my expectations and i am a spa junkie, so thats a really good this..
would definitely stay again and recommend to my friends to stay here while they are in town..keep rocking Hard Rock!!

Every year I go to pattaya to visit my father, I always have to have at least a couple of days at hard rock, because it is so brilliant for us adults and it's amazing for the children, staff are fantastic, everywhere is spotless clean and the location of the hotel is perfect for me and my family , do not hesitate to give this place a go guys you will be pleased

Spent 3 days at the Hard Rock Pattaya and with the amount of money the rooms were you would expect a higher quality of service.  Spent several hundred dollars at the pool...there were only a handful of people using the pool...i had 2 friends come visit and we drank and ate food all day....they charged me an additional $65 USD for having guests even though we spent over $200 USD in food and drinks.  Sorry but that is very unsatisfactory.  I am a permanent resident of Thailand and I will not stay here again.

Hard rock hotel pattaya provides  everything that u ever dream of in a holiday. I had my birthday during my stay. My friends prepared a bday surprise and the staffs there were very helpful, planning and even baked a beautiful and delicious cake.it was the best bday for me. Thank u to JJ HR receptionist for making it happen... Will definitely return here everytime i visit pattaya.. ^^

Very disappointed cannot use the swimming poor, this is the one point to book you hotel because of your swimming poor and also I gave more charges to book you seaview room, but I got lower floor to see the tree, this trip is not satisfy of this, my wife get angry, so sad

Stayed there last two years. Really enjoyed both stays

Helpful staffs from front desk to restaurant.  Pool is huge with lots of activities for kids.  10 minutes walk to Centro shopping mall.

Don't miss the buffet on Saturdays as they have roasted pig.  

Good value for money!

It was clean 
and most of all the swimming pool is amazing i swam a lot.

And the breakfast was great also.
I would use this hotel when i have a chance to go back to pattaya

Room was clean and the employee there is very kind

i like bed that made me comforatble and well sleep. I also enjoy the exexcutive floor that is relaxation and warm welcome. For the facilities - Stream & Suana, Swimming pool, and fitness are well designed ans safe.

It is suggested to make clear the cost of dining, dinner and lunch in the room. I had prepared dinner for the hotel, but I still didn't go there. The communication was a little unchanged. There is no clear Chinese. But the overall occupancy is very satisfied. The children are playing bubbles in the pool. The staff also take good care of the children. Thank you very much.

Good environment, excellent service, breakfast line not so optional, great swimming pool and fun activities provided, no baht tub, broken toilet flushing found in room, remote controller for TV is out of order

Great location, new pool but service can be better. All faciity is new and clean. Sutset cocktail, snack is too less. Should be more.
Over all is ok. I will go back again in the future
Because i like the style and interior
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Read the information on the website prior to booking. Did not see the pool was under renovation which was a a major disappointment. Food at the restaurants we went to was very good. The requirement to use a minimum of 200 charactors is a waste of my time.

I not recommend this hotel everything is bad, unfortunately i book double time read on line reviw and is non refundable charge 2 nd time I have to stay this hotel but I suggest don't be foolish like me, this is even not one star hotel don't book in sort everything is bad.

My friends had a problem, but her could recover it.
It's fine.
And bands member at entrance, they ware very friendly. 555

But swimming pool still renovation. We wanted to join to party, bat we cannot.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
2nd floor room   at level of roofs
No upgrading
Swimming pool closed for renovation . No information when booked. Information  was only when booking confirmed and could not be cancelled.  No discount in spite of our request.
Not our first stay .  staff still friendly . Good breakfast.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Always nice to stay at Hard Rock hotel, keep up the rocking good work.
newly renovated pool and the area around this was looking rocking good and they still have plenty of activities at day time there. 
Also strong and excellent drinks at the café.

They have a really huge swimming pool and nice gym that has pool view. Located right in front of beach. Everyone knows that hotel, which makes you easier to ask a taxi or somebody.
Concierge staff X was helpful.

Breakfast could be better with an urgent need for higher quality items. Breafsast area is dark and there is no energy around the pool area which is unlike most hard rock resorts. Missing the magic of this famous lifestyle brand.

Always everything fine!
Clean!
Friendly,helpful team!
Happy time!
Enjoyed my stay!
Very good,delicious food !
No problems at anytime!
Great rooms! 
Nice view from my balcony !
Looking forward for visiting again!

Clean, safety, the best hotel in Pattaya ..
I advise you to try staying at Hard Rock ..
It is my third time but will not be the last time ..
All staff was kind and helpful especially Recipients Anastasia..
Thanks for all..

This hotel has it all. The great pool with a beach look on one part cool slides activities and more. It even has cabana that are available. The hotel room are comfortable clean and have a nice atmosphere with rock 'n' roll pictures in the rooms. I highly recommend this hotel it is wonderful

Room quite big with 2 double bed, easy check in,friendly staffs,  swimming pool very big and breakfast was good, kids enjoyed but no bath tub in the bathroom. a bit frustrated about that. view from the room was so - so.

Good:
A) Good service for reception, hotel lobby, breakfast in cafe and room daily cleaning
B) Room design very nice

Improvement:
C) Fit-out finishing for wall and floor are out of date, need to replace ASAP
D) L ower water pressure in shower, need to rectification ASAP
E) High noise between public corridor  & guestroom wall/door when the guest talking, need to replace new drywall/door STC rating
F) Outstanding of hair brush/stying comb inside of bathroom, need to action
G) Optional no hong kong cantonese television list

Friendly staff with good breakfast. room is clean but shower is weak and temperature of water is difficult to control. Hotel located near beach. staying at 10th floor we can enjoyed the view every morning

The hotel lobby is clean and bright , the reception service have not smile and slow. and the hotel have 3 elevator and clean , the room very clean and tidy but the air of room is fuggy, the toilet and shower room have some problems which are the shower water are easy to come out . the siwmming pool is not clear. and the concierge and restaurant staff are very good.

There Las Vegas location does not do that, what's the deal, pool is Great, across road from Pattaya Beach, if u can call it that, Go to Koh Larn Island instead about 45 mins away and payment of 30 baht

I recently booked a 6 night stay in Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya. I ended up staying only for 3 nights due to some problems that I think you should be aware of. I had worked very hard during summer so I awarded myself with a nice 10 day holiday in Pattaya and Hong Kong. I chose Hard Rock Hotel over others because it had a large swimming pool and the reviews I read were rather positive. I booked one of their sea view deluxe rooms.

I was warmly welcomed at the hotel after a long flight from Europe. Check-in took a little while and they sent me my bag some 10 minutes after I arrived in my room. 

The room was rather small but OK. Modern furniture and comfortable. It did not smell very good though. As I was very tired, I had an "expensive" dinner at the Hard Rock Cafe and slept right after. After a good night's sleep, I decided to hit the pool which I had been looking for. This is where it all began.

More than half the pool was in shade at only 11 a.m as it is located badly. On top of it, the beds were very simple and not very comfortable and there were some competitions going on in and around the pool. They were having fun but very loud. At one corner of the pool, there is the children's pool. There were many mahy of them. I thought the clientele would be young adults and couples but it was mostly families with small children. It was extremely loud around the pool. They also start playing live music, at the pool, at 3 p.m. !!!

I was there to relax and not to have headache. I thought it would get better but next day was also the same. I wanted to go the beach but it is dirty and it is not advised to swim in it... Pattaya also turned out to be a very "interesting" destination too. So I left the hotel and Pattaya after 3 days.

If you have children and you are looking for fun and you have too much cash, this is the place. Otherwise there are many 4 star hotels around that are much more cheaper than Hard Rock. I am not intending to visit Pattaya or stay in Hard Rock Hotels anymore.

Welcoming was awesome. You get the feeling you are a Rock Star or VIP. Really great looking hotel, with all the facilities you could want. The food is good, the staff are helpful and the room cleaning is above par. An awesome stay.

A good hotel for families on a Sat and Sunday. Very quiet in terms of entertainment on other days. Very disappointing that our 3 rooms were not ready for our on time arrival - reception staff unable to cope. Manager on his day off.  Breakfast and BBQ evening buffet very good indeed. No pool bar "happy hour" apart from 1 hour on Sat for beer only

We was met bye pavel at reception I was ready to walk away and go some where else very arrogant and not helpful really does need training but we met the swimming pool team great with the kids and the restraunt was the same they really do make you feel welcome gredit to hard rock

Great location to access to the local shops and restaurants. The restaurant inside the hotel also great foods. Easy access to the beach by just crossing the road. The bedroom was so clean and comfortable. Staffs are so attentive and friendly. There are so many activities thought out the day for you and kids to join.

Wanted to try the Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya again, after a disappointing experience a few years ago. After all - access to the good western comfort food at the Cafe, a 'refreshed' pool, and rock & roll themed ambiance - who can resist?

1. Booked the Deluxe Sea View room, and sent a special request for non-smoking and a bathtub. Some of the rooms have a deep bath which is awesome. I was assured (after a few inquiries via email) no problem. You can guess; on check-in my room smelled like a cigar box and there was only a shower. I asked to change but was assured there was no smoking on the 7th floor, and the only room they could change us to is facing the city, not beach.. Uh, no thanks.

I don't care so much myself, but my GF has asthma (thus the initial request). For our entire stay the place reeked of smoke, worst when we left for awhile and came back in.

2. You still can't order room-service from Hard Rock cafe - duh. Room service is not a complete menu. How hard is this to get right guys? Last visit they came up with some rubbish that they can't be sure the food can get from the restaurant to your room and still be hot - are you kidding? it's literally 200 steps from the elevator?

3. Eating the food in the Hard Rock Cafe is just about impossible. They have LOUD live bands every night until 12:30am. You simply can not pop in and have a decent meal and conversation with someone. Each time we walked in there were a handful (at most) of drunk dudes screaming back at the stage. Essential - the place was empty - because there's a mismatch of your clientele vs the headbanging rotten live (local) bands that you get to play in your cafe.

4. 1,200 baht hard rock hotel t-shirt hanging in your closet.. Need I say more?

5. Sent GF to salon to get manicure and pedicure - worst job ever, was ruined 30 min later as no UV drier - lady used a hair dryer. May as well have torn up that 800 baht.

6. Still have militant guard by elevators asking who your GF is, and still rude staff at front desk (german lady was the worst)

7. Night food menu was poor - only two deserts, pizza not offered at night, etc. 

8. In the TV menu we saw there was an 'adult' option - so late one night we chose to turn this on (you have to call the front desk and 'ask' them to turn on the porn for you - lol. I was advised there would be a 250 baht fee for this. Sure. However once on - each video also requested a 250 baht fee to watch. Are you kidding me? What's the initial fee for? Just to see your outdated and gouging prices? Please...... 

9. Tried swimming in the pool, the slides are ultra lame. The pool is divided into two sides - a shallow (and dirty) sand side, then the non-sand regular pool. A lifeguard informed me I couldn't wear my black t-shirt in the pool - hello? Most thais wear shirts to avoid the sun, and I pointed out 3 other guests that had t-shirts and hats on.. The reply was 'well they are children sir' - sorry? So a child can wear a cotton t-shirt, but an adult can't? We simply left the pool after a dip in the sand side.

10. What else; the flatscreen TV is horribly small, the windows in room are dark so at night you can't even look out the window at the city (or take photos), the amenities (shampoo / conditioner) are in hard plastic bottles - so removing the liquid is impossible (can't squeeze), the minibar is a joke, and the wifi totally erratic.

Only positive we found was the beds and pillows were comfortable. 

Essentially there is no 'rock star feeling' about the Hard Rock Pattaya. You are not treated 'like a star' - or anything close. Just another chain hotel that under delivers. My humble advice is choose the Hilton or one of the better offerings in town.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I will mention cons first :
No exhaust fan and no water jet in toilet. 
Very small room. 
Not sufficient storage space in the room. 
Very exorbitant rates.
Pros
Good swimming pool. 
Foam party on Saturday is good. 
Location of hotel is good. 
Good breakfast. 
Good cafe and bar but expensive.

As this is the second time for me and my frds went to pattaya for a trip, it is unforgettable to live at this hotel that its location is good. However, its just disappointed that the pool was closed, hoped it may made a notice on website when some facilties were closed for renewing.
By the way, it was quite good in concluded.

Wonderful and friendly staff but we were so disappointed that the pool wasn't completed during our stay.  The hotel sent us an email but there was no discount on our hotel bill.
We want to visit again next year and enjoy the poll this time.  Hopefully we will receive a discount for our room.

When I first booked this family holiday, I was worried about the reputation that Pattaya had and how safe and comfortable I would feel. After just one day in this Amazing hotel , all my worries disappeared. The hotel was clean , welcoming and has the most comfortable bed I have ever slept in. My son, husband and I loved the pool and we had some spectacular sunset views from our room. All the staff are a credit to the hotel. They regularly went out of their way to respond to all our needs. We really felt as though we had been part of the Hard Rock family and were made most welcome. This hotel is in a great location with plenty of restaurants ,shops , tailors  and bars within walking distance.  My son loved the in house movies on demand . Would suggest a ocean view room away from the pool ,especially on a Saturday night foam party , if you like your sleep. Definitely hope to be back soon.

Overall services are good but before i checked in, i called at least 2 times to reservation to and informed them that all 3 rooms of my booking will stay together. However when i checked it, my room had to stay another wing. But luckily that all my family stay in the same floor.

great place close to all the action.  great food and drinks.  they do charge for any guests you have. right across the street from the beach.  there is a really nice nightclub on the property.  I was always greated by name when I went to the reastaurant. I would recommend this place for an upscale stay in Pattaya.

A smile and a friendly greeting go a long way, especially when paired with fast and efficient service, and the staff at the Hard Rock Hotel in Pattaya really went the distance to make me feel at home among friends!

Stayed here for a second time during the summer holidays as a group of four with our two teenage daughters. Booked two rooms on the rock royalty floors, if available ask for a room with a balcony. From the moment you enter the gates you feel like you have arrived!! My daughters were blown away by the building and decor and you are made to feel thar extra bit special. There are a few five star hotels in Pattaya and along the strip however a hotel is just a building, the staff make the experience and honestly the staff here are friendly,  helpful and courteous at all times. Having stayed here last year it was good to see the same faces still there and shows that the hotel must be doing something right to retain staff. You get a sense of pride coming from the staff members which I loved. 
If you can, pay the extra and stay in the rock royalty rooms, you have exclusive access to the rock royalty lounge which serve snacks and drinks during the day and night as well as cocktails in the evening. The service is very personal and I found the staff going above and beyond to make our stay memorable. I had some friends over for dinner who also noted the exceptional service levels.  
The hotel has a lovely outdoor swimming pool as well as separate areas for younger children with water slides and instructors who teach rock climbing!! There is also a gym and spa area as well as steam sauna and cold plunge pool.
The hotel has a great all you can eat buffet in the evenings with food cooked fresh and ample selections of seafood. The breakfast is worth the money with a vast choice and live stations for chefs to make dishes to your requirements. We got to know a few of the servers who ensured we had a table waiting and even made sure I had the same smoothie everyday. The chefs had a particular way of cooking bacon which wasn’t to my liking but were more than happy to do a plate just for us just the way I wanted. 
I honestly was blown away by the level of service here and encourage you to pay this place a visit. The location is great right on beach road and close to the shops and markets. Special thanks to Ning and Patchy for making our stay so memorable. Will definitely be visiting here again.

Me and my girlfriend stay here quite a few times already. The staff is very nice and remember us, since we are returning guests. The hotel itself is quite active, they should be since they are at a very busy road by the Beach.

We took the romantic package now twice, usually including complimentary spa and 10% discounts in restaurant and bar outlets. We also had breakfast buffet and one time BBQ Grill dinner included. You might even get the PINK ROOM (just get it, don't ask)

This time in November we were fortunate to book it during the weekend, so we joined the FOAM PARTY at the pool. with Live Music and DJs throughout the night it was quite an experience for us.

We love rock music, so this hotel is awesome for me and my girlfriend. Always a reason to sneak into the Hard Rock Cafe in the evenings.

good area and nice place for relaxation. The pool looks great and was under renovation and open in November 2016 again .
The breakfast buffet was nice and the places outside were in good condition ok.

Nothing much to explore in Pattaya.so we spent most of our time in the hotel and enjoyed the facilities there.i would say luckily we choose hard rock.if not,it might be our nightmare staying in other hotel because there are lot of activities u can enjoy and relaxed.furthermore,u can also swim in the biggest pool in Thailand.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Very courteous and friendly staff. Pool side area well arranged and manned by LifeGuards even post sunset. Saturday Pool Party is the greatest attraction...helped me narrow down Hard Rock, when comparing with Ramada etc.

I am very happy for the ambiance    of the hotel. Very good front office services, excellent  behaviour of all staff, very good restaurant and bar.  Hard rock cafe and band is an amazing experience. Limosine service is better but lack of tourist guide. Please arrange english speaking tourist guide

Room 503 ; Very  clean , nice sleep , Space for living area is better for kidsSwimming pool s are  Clean , safety , enjoy with activity and staffResturant is ok , many food , delicious and cleanKids room are clean and enjoy for kids

I've requested for one quite single bed room. K'Ann(Front staff) is very nice. She try to seeking the quite room for us. Room is pretty good its quite room and  suitable for relax. Thanks for your support kha :)
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya is one of the best hotel in Thailand! I have stayed there many times and was not bored at the very least! It didn't took long to check in the hotel and the room was big and comfy. There are many activity for you and your children to enjoy. The pool is colossal and the foods and beyond comprehension. The breakfast was enough to make me want to stay there more. Not to mention the services and cleanliness of the hotel. It is really hard to believe a hotel that has so many tourist can still be this clean as if nothing happened! 
I clearly enjoy this hotel and I'm pretty sure you would as well.

We absolutely loved the property and the food.  The employees were spectacular.  The only thing is we booked an early bird rate that said you got a free upgrade.  Our confirmation letter stated we get a free upgrade.  When we checked in the concierge floor read their copy of the terms and it said we get an upgrade.  He called the manager who said give it to us.  Then the manager called back and said it didn’t apply.  I asked to see her, but she was at lunch.  I asked for name and he went ahead and upgraded me instead.  Really just started everything off wrong.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Nice hotel location in northern part of Pattaya. A hotel full of bounce and fun. Good family hotel with a large and busy pool. Staff are very polite and breakfast is varied and plentiful. That said the food could be slightly more varied with a full English breakfast selection.

We are a family, 2 adults and 2 children. We had a great stay at the hotel. Nice and friendly staff, delicious breakfast, great rooms and pool. The beds are really nice! I will recommend the hotel, and would like to stay here again.

Stayed for 4 nights. Room had a nice deco, typical of Hard Rock Hotels. Bed was very comfortable. Room had an ipod/ipad dock which was good. Plenty of tv channels to choose from. They even had a list of recent movies to choose from. 
The reception and restaurant Staff were friendly and helpful. The pizza at Starz Diner was delicious. 
Pool was huge. Had lifeguards. 
Spa was nice. Had a full body massage which was really relaxing. Had a foot massage another day which was very nice as well. 
I would definitely return to this hotel.

Stayed here with my family. firstly, what I liked...awesome spa, good view of the bay, great location, lotsa rock trivia around the place. what I didn't like....we were the only Indians in the hotel and I found the staff a bit stand-of-ish. Very limited in room dining menu! I sent my kids to the Lil Rock club for half a day and they did not feel engaged with at all. Moreover the girl kept repeating the cost of half a day. i had paid for an extra bed in the room which they accepted however at check in they inform me that the rooms aren't big enough to fit an extra bed. Strangely realisation dawned after check in! All in all an OK experience!!!

this trip for us was amazing the people at the hard rock were so helpful to us the rooms were nice and tidy everyday this is a really good hotel for a family i would recommend this hotel for family because its so funny for kids they have games down at the pool for everyone and i am sure missing everyone there

Stayed here as a single traveler.  I made the stupid assumption that since it was the "Hard Rock" that it would be an adult-oriented hotel.  How wrong I was.

The place was completely packed to the gills with Chinese and Indian families.  Tried to eat breakfast one morning and I have never see such chaos.  Kids and families running around... a messy buffet filled with disgusting looking breakfast food-like substances.  I quickly got up from my table and found another place to eat.

Room was fairly clean although the first day the clean bath towels smelled like cheese burgers.  Perhaps this was intentional in keeping with the "Hard Rock" theme?  In any event, it was thoroughly gross and I held my nose as I dried myself after my shower.  The next day the towels smelled normal (though they were paper thin - definitely 3-star hotel quality).

The format of the property was strange in that it is situated in the middle of the plot of land between the beach and 2nd road - meaning, to get to Beach Road one has to travel an annoying path through the bar/lounge, the pool area, and so on to reach Beach Road.  Similarly, if one wants to go the other direction to 2nd Road you have to walk a bit down the driveway of the hotel.  Not the end of the world but one would have thought they could design this better.

If you have a family this hotel is probably not a bad value for the money.  As a single traveler AVOID!

Good & clean, wifi facility was very much helpful. We missed indian food, good lobby, excellent courteous staff, lovely, nice location, inhouse amenities was very much useful, good parking space, security team was everywhere so no worry, luggage handeled carefully, smartly, we looked after well during our stay, bathroom was so spacious and clean

Great position   friendly staff         calm and relaxing    good price
Nice staff what more can I say    will come back and stay again
Good size pool    clean room 
TV not playing films  only channel was Hard rock music ! !
Thank you ! :-)

I had been there with my friend, we stayed here for 1 nights ...the room is nice and comfortable, good shower, great sea view for myroom, like service from the staff ... internet connection is ok, the breakfast is good too ... thank you

译 文
This is my boyfriend and I travel, this is the first time we came to Thailand, the impression is very good for us. Your hotel is one of my very early on the morning, really liked, we regret not to order a few more late, the only advice is hope more types of breakfast, thank you.

Fantastic location close to the night life, shopping and beach.  The staff are fantastic and very friendly and helpful they greet you when leaving your room saying have a rocking day!!! The Pool area is amazing and relaxing and Bar Staff always there when you need a refill!!! The food was fantastic with Hard Rock Pataya and the Entertainment at the restaurant was awesome and fun.

My family and I (total 7 adults and 1 child) planned to visit Thailand for celebrating my cousin’s 1-year-old birthday. We finally chose Hard Rock Pattaya as we would like to have a memorable birthday for the baby and Hard Rock Pattaya has a swimming pool for children.
I booked 3 Deluxe Sea View rooms with breakfast (one room for three adults with extra persons charge including extra bed and breakfast) through Hard Rock’s hotel website in August and input a promotion code for the mango rice (I remember this code is valid for bookings in August) when I made this booking. Their reservations promised to arrange a complimentary birthday cake for celebrating my cousin’s birthday and I have also booked a 2 pounds birthday cake for celebration.
Unfortunately, the baby suffered from entrovirus 1 day before our arrival date and he and his parents were unable to take the flight. I sent an email to their reservations at night regarding this issue to see if any chance to cancel one room without charge, with the provision of doctor’s certificate if they need, but I did not get any reply from the reservations even at 13:00 on the arrival date. 
When 5 of us check-in, I explained this issue to the receptionist and asked if one room can be cancelled without penalty as courtesy as this is unexpected for all of us. The receptionist called the reservations and they said no. Indeed, I totally understand my reservations were made with discount under their promotion and so cannot be cancelled and get refund. So we kept 3 rooms and asked if the extra persons charge could be refunded as we did not need the extra bed and breakfast anymore. THE CHARGE FOR EXTRA PERSONS DOES NOT GET ANY DISCOUNT FROM THE HOTEL AND THE HOTEL but we still could not get a refund! What a ridiculous, that means we paid charges for 7 persons but only 5 staying! And for the birthday cake, I asked if we can get the money back and we also did not need to celebrate the baby’s birthday in this hotel. The receptionists nicely checked with pastry if the cake has been made or not and luckily the cake had not been prepared. HOWEVER, they could not refund the money back to us as well and the equivalent amount of money can only be used as a credit balance before check-out for other expenses in hotel.

I’m really disappointed with this hotel’s inhuman handling and policy regarding this issue. I do not have any idea how to spend the credit balance even I will check out today.

For other travellers who are interested to book this hotel, I recommend you to arrange and pay extra persons charge and cake charge at hotel instead if prepay any money to them as they would not bother to refund the money to you if you have any changes accidentally.

What’s more, the sound-proofing of the hotel rooms is very poor. I could hear all the sounds (including music, laughter, etc) that other guests and room attendant made in the corridor and other rooms with door opened. 

The Philips speaker is quite outdated that useless unless you have brought a disc or a USB with you.
