The ventilation in bathroom of all rooms is very weak and some bad smell came from the toilet bowl in one of the rooms.

Regarding the room make up, I did not put their Save The Planet card on our beds in all rooms, but I found that the room attendant did not change our bed linen in one of our rooms as I could find some hair on the bed sheet after the room make up service (We all had leave tips for room attendants and they took).

And we cannot get the mango rice as the reception said the promotion has expired. How come?!

Only a special thanks to Boy who tried his best to offer us 5 glasses of complimentary drinks (local beer, soft drinks or orange juice) at their bar when he was unable to arrange the refunds.

I will not give this 5 points but its a good hotel with a nice poolarea.
I like that they play music at the pool and that the staff offers great service.  Its a hotel for people that like to party but also very familly friendly with many pool activitys. The negativ is that the food at the pool is expensive if you look att what you get for the money. But overall a good stay!

It was a Overnight stay But enjoyable. Room are with Perfect view . Best food ever had in Thailand. Great Staff enjoy the shopping also in hotel .all of the above the Perfect hotel for a perfect destination. Feel the rockstar inside you once You check in to the hotel .

nice view  ... nice hotel... very bad for pool it was off ... poor breakfast  ... in all I like the trip  ... I can't do it again  without pool ... it was boring to stay in hotel  ... no activities... Beach far as way from hotel

Hard to communicate with the staff in the check in, i managed to get two deposits back, had to pay double for the minibar (i payed it with MY deposit when i check out) my friend extended it one more night and was supposed to pay his room with the deposit, instead he have to pay for my minibar and his own when he checked out = stealing money.

i was there with my family, the hotel location is good and the rooms was great.The outstanding part of our stay was the poolside bar and food. I had half of the cocktails listed on the menu and most of it was fantastic.A hotel I will definitely revisit.

Pattaya beach view from rooms ; complimentary Steam & Sauna usage , a well placed Swimming Pool and a great breakfast spread , It was a family vacation and everyone enjoyed the stay. Hard Rock Live band playing in Cafe and all Hard Rock Stuff on display. A memorable venue for the first time visitor

I do not speak English well
Information staff handled it well

Towel rental staff was so friendly

Why are there fitness room staff?
Not kind
What is the basics of hotel staff?

do you have joiners charge?

The service was excellent and the entire facility was flawless.  Great location and a exceptional staff.  Thevfoid 2as great, as was the pool snd gym. 
 I won't even consider staying anywhere else  in Pattaya.

Excellent property. friendly staff and very child friendly. Close to several eating joints near the hotel to try local food. Beach across the road. Had a great time overall !!!
Rooms were also very nice and spacious. Took a sea facing view room which had a great view of the ocean and the beach across the road.

We stayed here for 5 nights. Great place for family with young children.
Cons
1) Great location. 
2) 10mins to Walking Street.
3) Great amnities
4) Great restaurants
5) Treated like Royalty if you book room with Royalty package
6) They have big swimming pool
7) Great service-oriented staffs. Friendly too.
8) 5 star rooms
9) They have smoking rooms
Pros
1) Need land transfer from Bangkok if you do not have direct flight to Pattaya. (2hrs journey)
Strongly recommended & will be back the next time if we plan to go to Pattaya.

The best pool in Pattaya, and also location is greate. The prices for roomservice and drinks at the pool is high for Thailand. You can order from the hard rock cafe to your room, then you know what food you get. The pizza in the pizza resturant is exstreamly expencive and not to good.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Very nice renovated swimming pool and good service . I stayed many times in Hard Rock and do it again . I always stay in Room 823 or  822  and same room no 823 was given to me as requested by me . This is appreciated
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Last minute booking, found this hotel at a great rate. Loved everything about it. The location is perfect with easy access to the beach or shopping in addition we could make our way to Walking Street within 10 minutes on foot.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Came here 3 times, and I am hyped because I’m coming again in 5 days to kick off the new year just like I did 12 months ago. The buffet is very high quality, our room is very large with a nice view over the Bay Area. Thing I love the most is the activities, especially the basketball game; it really provides good fun and even if there are no games going on, feel free to shoot a hoop. The pool is the largest I’ve ever been to.

I love this hotel the location is perfect right on beach road and within easy walking distance of a very lively Pattaya But the Hotel as the name says Rocks the staff really go the extra mile and are genuinely friendly and very helpful

staying at room 1033, can not sleep well at nite, cause we can hear sound of water running from the ceiling all the time, never stop. breakfast Ok, swimming pool Ok, but a lot of wind, so can not swim too long.

The hotel and staff are very good and normally I love the Buffet but its food quality standard dropped on this occasion. The rooms are good and love the bedding and modern look of the building. This was my 4th visit to this hotel

We have great experience stay at the hotel. Friendly staff with service mind. Room is quite good even it not that big. Kid had good night sleep and fun pool time. Foods were good and room service was excellent. There is no reason to not go back again! We will surely do. Thank you once again for nice hospitality. Cheers to Hard Rock Pattaya <3

Wow !! 
A fantastic stay at this trendy, funky, yet sophisticated hotel! So many fun and "rock" extras around at every turn, definitely the place to stay if you want a chilled / relaxed environment with staff who are very attentive and kind. 
Had a great sea view room, with amenities to match, the room size is a bit small, but everything else about the hotel makes up for it. 
The newly renovated pool is really amazing, fun and warm, just be careful not to slip when entering ( they are fixing the problem though ). 
There are hourly activities to keep one entertained if you would like to participate.
Food and Beverage is a bit over priced, especially if one looks at the local hangouts / bars in the area, but it is understandable when looking at the hotel and facilities. 
Breakfast was great. 
Music at the pool area was great, vibey and exactly what one would expect and like to hear at a HARD ROCK HOTEL. 
Overall a great stay and definitely will return when popping into Pattaya again! 
Well done !!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We had an enjoyable stay, the staffs were all very friendly and helpful. However we felt the room and bathroom were a bit small and cramped. The weather was great for the outdoor but the swimming pool was a bit chilly. Other than that, we had a very enjoyable and relaxing stay. Will definitely stay here again on our next visit.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: This hotel is located in a convenient place that we can go around with my kids easily. The staff are nice and helpful that always offer assistance with cheerful smiles. We enjoyed an uforgettable stay in this hotel.

We were traveling with two young kids and hence chose hotel considering their needs. HardRock was having kids play area with close proximity to beach area and lively walking street. Lots of Indian restaurants with in walking distance where you can have nice lunch or dinner after your local trips. Room was quite clean and fresh fruits were provide on daily basis in morning. Breakfast does not have much vegeterian options as veg fried rice also has eggs and we were limited to eating bread butter with fruits on day 1 and day 2 could see some vegeterian options available .

We were involved in a birthday party for seven year olds and it was handled excellently. Lots of supervision so the parents had no need to constantly  keep tabs on the children. There was plenty of food, cake and endless things for the children to do over  a long day.
There is an outdoor bar near the pool which we went to at 6:00PM but it closes at 6:45 so our stay was quite short. 
We then went to the dinner buffet which was of top quality with a very wide choice of various foods suitable to all tastes. The server was attentive and professional without being intrusive.
Our room was in good order, clean and well equipped although the large overhead shower cap was inoperable. 
The staff are all friendly, helpful and professional.
All in all we were quite satisfied with everything.

Big room clean and full service My kids like seimming pool and we like room is nice for us when holiday we come back here eveytime  me&husband like hardrock cafe' nice band and food dilicious we come back again thank for all sfaff about nice service

Me and my wife enjoyed our stay in Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya.The service provided by staff was excellent. The location of the resort I strategic as you can find easy transport to walking street or even walk. The hotel facilities is great, I love the pool for adult and kids. The food was awesome.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Great trip try mantra restaurant delicious
Take wine set menu and try ko lan island
Boat trip, relatively affordable price around 2500 baht, and the pizza place in hard rock hotel is perfect with me nice service as well as delicious coconuts

We've been coming to the Hard rock hotel for 14 years. Since 2015. And we are not going to change it. We come as to his home. The staff are friendly. Rooms are big. The food is very tasty. Seafood!!! On Saturday, the pig on a spit is delicious, cheese is a delight. The pool an interesting game. Animators well done! The music in the evening by the pool is wonderful! Hot shower by the pool is perfect! We love you! See you next year!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Your colleague is not very friendly, Unprofessional service.The location and environment were good, and the food was good，Also due to decoration, there is no washing machine can provide, can not wash their own clothes。

Despite web booking for two adults and a child only two single beds were provided.
Surcharges were added to the headline room rate and for our son to use the executive facilities that went with the room.
The executive express check in took an hour and our luggage a further half hour.
The bar knew nothingabout the complimentary drinks.
When I expressed my disatisfaction on check out there wasn't even an appology.

During our stay at this hotel, all the staffs were friendly and kind.
they always try to contact and communicate us with smile.
basically even in high grade hotels in Thailand, staff attitude sometimes no good.
I always feel that why this country called as Land of Smile,
but in this hotel, even in high peak season, they always try to keep smile, so always we can spend good time in this hotel

the hotel is nothing great . breakfast menu not for indian vegetarian. accessbility to hotel should be taken car as tuk tuk serivce should be given. no discrimination should be done when guest checking in.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
There is a lounge running from 07:00 to 20:00 hrs, where we can enjoy beverage & snack all the time facing the beautiful scene of Pattaya Beach , the highlight everyday is the cocktail time from 18:00-19:30hrs.
Further more, many other special offers  to King's club guest!
Enjoyed the stay this time very much as all the staffs giving us a sincere treatment! Love all Serve all !

I enjoyed my stay here. Its right in he middle of pattaya so the beach is right across the street and shopping areas just a few steps away. The main buffet restaurant served delicious and wide variety of dishes with a different theme each night. 
Since i stayed here for business, i had a bit of inconvenience since there were pool parties going on while i was trying to rest after a long day in the office.
Service was great. Requests were attended promptly. Thai hospitality is always unbeatable.

It's a good choice for family vacation.My children love the swimming pool very much.The only defect is that the room cleaning is not clean.The location is good .The hard rock shop offers vat refund.We love hard rock.

Fantastic hotel. I can't say a bad word about the place.We upgraded to Kings Club and i would recommend this to anyone booking this hotel. Food was excellent and the staff were brilliant. A big thanks to Winky and the rest of the team at the Kings Club.
I must say a special thank you to the Front Office Manager Rattapong Suntornthepwarakul for his help with our onward reservations.
I hope to see you all again in 2012
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: My family loves having random weekend getaway and Hard Rock has been our choice for more than a few times now. I think the place can truly cater the whole family. The kids as well as the adults love the pool and us grown ups enjoy the hardrock cafe and the live band during the evening. And I always enjoy my breakfast here! Over all everything is great!

To start with the good things, pillows amazing. Usually I don’t have problems with aircon. This one really affected my sinuses. The pool area was fantastic. The food was unimpressive and very expensive for pattaya prices.
My blackout curtains only cover 2/3 the windows.

Just have a feedback on the airport pickup at BKK airport gate5. It took me about an hour to find the driver. The phone number on the letter confirmation is invalid. There is an extra number, please fix it. Thanks!

Overall ok.
Reception staffs friendly. 
Only things disappointed is the lifeguard came to put up closure signed before 7pm and never inform us. All my kids were still playing. At least give us 5mins notice on the closure time as a respect.

Was stay a night with my partner and we quite happy with the service, room and location. However something happen during breakfast in restaurant.
Hard Rock is 4 stars hotel and so many hotels in worldwide with fancy design but don't understand why they used wooden chopsticks which only one time use instead of plastic or reuse chopsticks. It's look like having something in street which those they used to. My partner used the chopsticks and accidentally the wood in his finger like the picture I attached later. 
Complaints to Front Office and they call Restaurant Manager immediately. Restaurant Manager assist us to take out the wood from my partner finger however failed due to too deep. We have no choice to leave it as we need caught our flight same day in evening. 
Hope Hard Rock may considering change the chopsticks maybe this was first incident but hope it was last too. Between your staffs were helpful!
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: We've been in Hard Rock in December 2017. Great place to stay in Pattaya. Hotel team does everything they can to make your stay pleasant and enjoyable.  This was a second time we were in this hotel and we will definitely come back here again.

I was here about 7 years ago before their renovation and a lot has changed since then specially in the pool area. We stayed for 6 nights in their deluxe ocean view room. Before our arrival I emailed the hotel  requesting that our room be on higher floor with balcony, not all rooms have balcony and that is exactly what we got. Rooms are clean and  comfy. we were on 8th floor and had a very nice view of the ocean.
Breakfast is OK but could improve a lot, not too many choices. Also the pool party on Saturday night is not what is used to be, not too many people attending. 
Special thanks to Joe the manager at hard rock Cafe, he is very friendly and represents the Hard Rock brand very well.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
i think this hotel , one of the best in pattaya
staff was very kind , and helpful . hotel was clean 
you can go to the pool until 10 pm 
saturday ( foam party ) you can swim in pool until 1 am 
location is brilliant , near shopping, near walking street , near every where you want to go
only bad thing , i felt , breakfast every day was same , with out change  .....
my wife and me enjoy and recomend this hotel .
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Great hotel for comfort, location and the friendliest staff ever. The staff go out of their way for you. The bed is super comfy with great sheets. But the food is just yuck. Nothing is nice that I ate there.

Once we reached for breakfast just a minute before closing time and the way they helped was beyond my thoughts. A great team in every aspect. Everything was too good. One of the best hotels in pattaya
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: well what can i say rooms are not very spacious and there are no chairs or sofa to sit on i am regular visior there there are better hotels like amari , dusit , holiday inn , hilton, marriot still its a good experince food is good but they should try to work on to mske the room better

The hotel was really good. We were on the 10th floor. The rooms were big & comfortable. Had a good sleep. View was also great. The pool is the plus point. Location is on the main road. Its highly recommendable.

Came back to the Hard Rock hotel in Pattaya after many years, at the request of our daughter who had fond memories if it! We had a great time, service is still top as it has always been. We noticed the renovations which does give the resort a touch more class and indeed the rooms are bigger. Shame about the giant posters in the rooms dissapearing though and shame that the floating trampoline has gone too! Rental for the floating mattresses is a bit steep! Also time to maybe change the beatles/beach boys paintings on the floor landings ?
Otherwise we had a great time and as always also enjoyed the great location by the beach and close to restaurants, bars and shopping mall.
We shall return !

Like almost every Christmas, my family and I went to Hard Rock. The holidays here is just to relax and the activities the agents provide help to keep the kids entertained and parents relaxed.
We had two rooms, 723 and 724, connecting which is quite convenient and with a balcony that I enjoyed a lot. Love to stay there and read a little at the end of the day. 
I love that the beach is just across from the hotel, the beach now is much nicer as sand was added. 
The gym is quite nice and quiet to use early in the morning and I went there every day after running at beach road.
The SPA staff is also nice and very professional and always ask if there's something we needed.
The staff at the restaurant was also very nice and remember us from previous visits and even remember our names. We enjoyed breakfast and sometimes dinner at the restaurant.
Rock Royalty staff is almost all new but we did find some familiar faces during cocktail time and it was really nice to meet familiar faces.
As I know I will be needing vitamin sea again, I'll return in April! :)

Nastya helped us so much. We went to hard rock cafe for dinner 3 nigths . But last nigth Cherry took our order wrong and bring wrong as usual than we want to make her correct than she start to talk us with big voice. Than may be we can go more nigths for dinner to hard rock cafe but we did not go because of her . you must teach her how to talk with customer please

Late house keeping, went back hotel about 3 pm, it still hasn’t clean up, until we need to call up receptionist to do immediately. The Wi-Fi has to keep on manual key in every hour. Not convenient and very irritating.Jazz in the soul lounge was very good.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: All super!!! Saturday dinner is delicious. Especially a pig on a spit. Great game by the pool. We always play and often win. The pool is large. Always have balls for throwing into the net, water basketball. The rooms are cleaned very clean. And what a beautiful pillow of duck down! Soft, comfortable, sleep is a pleasure! We rested at the hotel for 14 years - since 2005. Next year we will come in 15 times. Love You and the Hard Rock!

The location simply can't be beaten... on the beach road, but not too close to the madness. The normal rooms are not massive, but stylishly decorated with cool memorabilia & funky designs. The pool however IS massive, which is good as you don't want to go near the ocean.

Exceptionally good location, the front door is near the sea beach road, is also we go to Greenland embarkation point, the back is to go to the mall and tiffany queen show, let Thai massage the bustling streets. The hotel's service is very comfortable, seascape is invincible. Especially like the hotel's swimming pool, big, and water can play basketball. In general a high performance-price ratio.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Breakfast vegetarian options are less.
Must have free local shuttle service because of one way roads.
Must allow residents free entry at new year Eve parties in the hotel.
Must do reasonable prices of massage centre in the hotel.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Stayed for a week in January. Rock royalty sea view. Staff very good and attentive. The whole place is kept clean and appears quite well maintained.
The rooms are no more than adequate, quite small, think Travelodge with a black bathroom.
The executive lounge (Rock royalty) was in fact a creche. Children everywhere allowed to run riot by parents. Like having breakfast in a kindergarten most mornings.
I have never stayed in a hotel where children were allowed in the main lounge. If they are allowed at all there is a separate family room. Not here.
Lots of space near the large pool taken up by cabanas, which no one uses therefore not enough sun beds for hotel guests. All sun beds occupied by 10.30am leaving guests wandering around with towels and nothing else.
If you are a family then this hotel is for you. If you are young adults or more mature couple then look elsewhere as the Hard Rock Pattaya is geared towards families with young children.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Family room is always great! Kids loved swimming pool with the slides a lot, the renovation turned out great. But the cababa rental is a pretty high for 1 day renting. I think the last year rate 700 was reasonable.

Stayed here with the family and had a great stay.  The hotel is large and mostly caters for everyone as it is a popular hotel sitting opposite the beach.  The staff were very friendly and were happy to help with any request.  Our rooms were not interconnecting having booked over 6 months prior but they were kind enough to rectify this in the coming days.  The rooms are large and very comfortable and modern.  We stayed in the Club Suites which had plenty of room for everyone with ocean views and a balcony.  Food and drink here is on the expensive side with a beer costing 165 baht where outside bars sell for 50 baht. It was expected to be more than outside but it caused us to seek other bars.  A burger is about $800 baht where a bar like Hooters sell for about $400-500.  Having said that the quality of food at the hard rock was very nice and good portions.  The negative experience we had were with 'çlub members'.  They appeared to be retired expats. Life guards daily saved their poolside lounges with towels regardless of whether they turned up or not.  Occasionally one of the children sat on the empty chair and were swiftly ushered off within seconds of sitting.  One incident occurred when one of these club members was attempting to swim laps in the pool.  The pool routinely has ball activities in the pool, mats, floaties, basketball etc.  A ball landed near this person during his lap swimming.  The child was returning our ball and not related.  The club member proceeded with a tirade of abuse and used offensive language with many children around.  I found it absurd that he would think that he could possibly swim laps in such a pool.  The life guards just looked on and did nothing.  The members appeared to have the attitude that the many visitors and families were spoiling their time at hotel and were in fact invading their space claiming some ownership of the area.  Overall a great stay and would recommend this as a family friendly modern and clean place to stay in a great location.

We took one of the most expensive rooms ( rock royalty room) and were excited to stay here. However there were so many things wrong with this hotel 
1) the staff that checked us in was very rude and spoke quite poor English
2) no fruit platter in the room on arrival with No daily complimentary fresh fruit ( as clearly advertised in your website)
3) very slow service at the breakfast buffet area
4) staff extremely unaccommodating. Every 5 stat hotel I have previously stayed at with lounge facilities ALLOWS me to bring back a drink ( for example coffee ) should I wish to do so. however over here it is not allowed? I was shocked as most if not all hotels which provide 5 star services will accommodate and oblige if their guests ask whether they could bring back a glass of coffee. What's wrong with this anyway? It is still within the hotel isn't it? 
5) there seems to be some double standard going around where i observed only some guests being attended to at the lounge area. This is EXTREMELY unprofessional and I feel should NOT be practiced as all guests paid the same price and should be entitled to the same quality of service especially since hard rock has a level to professionalism to uphold to.
6) quality and variety in the breakfast buffet is terrible 
7) wifi services are horribly slow. Could not get any work done.
8) newspaper NOT provided in the mornings
9) although registered as 3 guests, only 2 bathing towels were supplied daily even though we have stated on day one that 3 guests will be staying here.
I SHALL NOT be returning to this hotel. 
It is NOT at all worth the price paid. We are extremely disappointed with the quality of service provided. Kindly improve your services and educate your staff on proper etiquette. Thank you.

I celebrated my Christmas at Hard Rock Pattaya, It was a good time for me.
The staff were very helpful, funny show by the pool.
And I also enjoy The great Christmas dinner at Hard Rock, a lot of special menu:)
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: This is totally family oriented hotel. All staff highly resourceful and friendly. So much of positive corporate culture. Would highly recommend this place. Kids would love it; considering activities and lounges for kids.

Near sea shore, shopping centers so we can go everywhere enjoy Pattaya easily. Also Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya has her own style and atmosphere, which makes us so impressive. All staff is very kind and open minded to anyone~~ ^^ please enjoy at Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya!!! i will be there again~~

It was a wonderful experience at hard rock. The foam party was just too good. Me and my wife enjoyed every bit. The room with sea view was good but if it had balcony would have been better. Moreover the view of other hotel from my room was very bad.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Hard Rock, before I book was looking forward to Wow me.. Upon arrival not so much of warm welcome after a 2hrs trip from BBK. Reception reguster with only a fews words, just left the towels n ice water on desk without offering. TV was spoiled.. Technician took 20mins to find fault.. Went down to take cable to fix... Still not working, dismantle the whole TV.went down to lobby ask for room change..waited another 30min for a upgrade.. 
Our 25th anniversary started this way.. What a shame Hard Rock... 
TV, Air Con, Sanitary.. Etc. Should be checked b4 allowing guest to enter.. 
Anyway thanks Hard Rock.. Will be the 1st and last.. Thanks.

Room was clean, and staff were kind, too, and mr.green was very kind, and it was the completion of pleasant trip more than anything. It is a little disappointing because the booking fee is too different from the hotel reservation and visit in Korea.

Hii
Actually im writing this on behalf of my friend who has visited the hard rock Pattaya for a stay of 2 days 
Lets go to his words
"The hotel staff and everything was so amazing , good view of the city from my room and entertaining staff . 
The cost at the hard rock cafe was a bit  high and on entering an attender who seemed work there told me to pay an entry fee of 100 baht which to ticket nor stamp was given . Never mind, though its bad but not much i didnt care and never saw him again . Well i was covered for my breakfast by the tour airline and it was mouth watering but one thing was to fault 
NOTHING HALAL WAS AVAILABLE  the staff present didnt know even what that was and said they imported all the meat. Well as a muslim and religious i had to hardly satisfy myself with omelette and juice and some veggies , though my apetite and feelings told me otherwise towrds the good delicasies i had to go down with these for the 3 days 
Since if importing the meat ,then its not much  to provide halal 
Through this u guys could really get appreciated 
This sole reason prevents me from choosing next time 
Adbullah "
Guys i request please see to it so that anyone else  including me doesnt have to go elsewhere for dining for this sole reason 
Thank you

This was my 4th stay at the Hard Rock Hotel, Pattaya. Everything was ok except for somethings I will point out later. I enjoyed the food service from the cafe and the drink service from the pool bar and the guest service of the reception staff.
When my taxi arrived on the beach side I came with 3 bags and some shirts on hangers. I asked one of the security there can you call someone to help me with my bags and he said 'NO NO NO NO' so i walked down that whole road by myself with my 3 bags and shirts. Not the best start.
The AC in the room was too cold, (even when turned up to max and the lowest power) and it made me a little sick, so just turned it off. I believe its something what needs to be looked at.
Twice when I ordered food they forget to put the sauce what I wanted and had to wait for them to bring it. There was no communication there.
It was a good stay, i guess. Was there for 10 days,

As a mum who have to look after many children always lost the items around the hotel. My child lost wallet and my sister lost the phone but the hotel staffs alway help me to found it. They all are very helpful which make me feel very safe and I definitely will recommend to anyone who visit to Pattaya. I am really appreciated for all the staff servicing. They are the honest staff I ever meet. Appreciated very much.

Kids club access is charged where other places only charge for certain activities. Breakfast buffet spread is small and the items are not fresh not refilled on time. HR cafe food is also not up to standard, frozen pizza bases are used, the chicken on salads is overcooked and dry as sand. Bathroom ceiling is very low and the carpet in the rooms is very dirty.

From the moment you pull up in the taxi they make you feel welcome the staff are totally going to the next level to try and make your stay the best
The rooms are clean and tidy 
The pool area is out this world

I made a group booking for my team and we had a team building + meetings in Hard Rock for 3 nights. The hotel room was great, clean and simple, overlooking the sea view. The restaurant was good, food was good.  Huge and nice pool.The staffs was friendly and accommodating, 5 minutes walk to the beach and walking streets. The meeting room (Drum Room) was huge and with great view.
Huge favorite was Hard Rock Cafe - The team and the live band was fantastic! We had a private party in Hard Rock Cafe for the team on the 2nd night and I must say - We were WOWED! and we went back to HRC on the 3rd night for them. :)
Heartfelt thanks to:
HRH Pattaya Team : Arisa Fuangfoong(Party) & Kitirak Innok (Jum)
HRC Pattaya Team: Matthew, Peter, Joe and Nu-color band.
YOU GUYS RAWK!

The room's view is wonderful, i can see the beach right in front of my room. The lobby is really classy, the location is strategic, so many restaurants and entertainment places around the hotel, the room is large, fit for 4 person.

Very good facilities for family trip, expecially the swimming pool, artiifcal beach,  and their arranged function - bubble party and pool side party. Good breakfast - a wide range of food, convinience locations, friendly reception.

As name suggest...rocking place.
Marvellous pool, good food and nice location. Good comfortable rooms and nice helpfull staff. But but u should be a music lover for enjoy this type of place specially rock music because it all designed carefully on the theme of rock.
Something which they need to cosider is the standard of drinking water they provide in the rooms must be accirding to 5 star standard plus every little service near pool is chargable which might be not goes down well alteady hefty amnt paid for hotel stay.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
The hotel was good, staff extremely great specially Jamie, Thomas and all pool side staff. 
Only downfall was checking in, unavailability for room with children so had to upgrade which cost a further 22500 plus 10000 bht deposit. Which was inconvenient we were very tired from flying and was very annoying.

This is the second time to be there. Of course staying in THE CLUB. The services are good. The view in the CLUB is great. For breakfast, the waitresses attitudes are good. The food is great. For cocktail party, you can drink as much as you can. The swimming pool is newly renovated. The new facilities such as slides and "pouring water" slide are great. The quality of swimming pool water is good. The room services are also good. Must visit again.

Nice hotel, funky rooms, but it was the pool that sold it too me really, nice, relaxing and right on beach road so your not far from the beach or drinks. The rooms were nice and comfy and nice decor. I do think its a little pricey however and your just paying for the brand name.

Outdated property - needs renovation, average, food choice very limited (in comparison to other hotels), overpriced (i.e. 220BTH for beer) - no wonder I have never seen anybody in their soul lounge bar. 
On the other hand: kids club and regular activites for kids (chargable), central location, very friendly and helpful staff.

After one bed nigh in Marriot we moved to Hard Rock Hotel and I'm sure we did a right thing. If this hotel improve main restaurant I'm sure it can get one star more. It's not bed but it's also nothing special.
Rooms are very good, with the best entertainment system I've ever seen. Big flat TV with good chanels and also great music. Everywhere in hotel the music plays, but really everywhere which is really cool.
Guys on the pool are also great, the try really hard to make you feel good and all the games we played with them were so funny. We really had great time there.
Only thing that boder me is very very slow check in and check out. To checked us out it took them almost an hour!!! And we had a plain to catch.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I booked their Deluxe Sea View and was given a 5th floor non-smoking room. The view to the ocean was entertaining enough, dozens of parasails in the air almost all the time. Windows were virtually floor to ceiling and wall to wall, so a great view.
Room was spacious, clean & comfortable. Bathroom was also large with a walk in rain shower head. In room safe was large enough for a tablet.
Mini Bar prices were quiet acceptable, surprising really
The Included buffet breakfast had a very good variety, well worth the cost when booking. Pool area was as good as expected, very clean, not too chlorine and certainly a nice atmosphere to spend a few hours.
Right on Beach Rd, it's easy access to many shops & restaurants, about a kilometre away from Walking Street so quieter and a less hassle area.
Lived up to the standard expected from a Hard Rock Hotel.

My stay was great. Not a hitch. Breakfast was excellent. A great experience made possible by the welcoming staff at the hotel. I stayed in many hotels in Pattaya before but nothing compared to the quiet sleep i was able to have here.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Being a Muslim, having a halal food is essential. Apart from that, it is perfect. The staff were very helpful throughout. It is very much recommended. The room is clean. It's better if you could add some discount at the Rock Shop for those who stay at the hotel
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Reception and Housekeeping Service quality is not good enough. It must get to improve and retrained the staff when they serve to customers. However, there is a good location and convenient to go around the attractions.

Stayed for two nights in one of the city view rooms.  Had stayed a few years earlier when renovations were going on and wanted to see what the renovations looked like.  No complaints on the room as it had all the amenities one would expect from a Hard Rock property.  The pool was not overcrowded thus easy to find a lounger......the hotel does need to put the brakes on the guests that scurry to the pool first thing in the morning and "claim" the best loungers then don't show up to use them until the afternoon.
One word of warning though is that anything you eat or drink on the property is going to cost major money .... a burger and a beer to the Cafe was near $20 and a margarita (excellent margarita!) was $10.  Breakfast was included with my room and it was excellent

Stayed there 3 times now. We have a 2 year old son and The pool is great for him.
The kids club is great to leave your kids for an hour or two. Very friendly girl there called Cherrie.
 The rooms are always clean and tidy.
The staff are always pleasent
 Not the best buffet breakfast.

In my view the hotel service is so good and the room attendants are show their beautiful smile and greets every time.
Hotel room service is excellent, quality of food. 
Generally, all the staff are greet and show the smile, and very friendly and very helpful.
Big Thanks for all staffs specially Jeana, Tong, Oil, and Room attendants.

Look the rooms are pretty standard nothing special we had a seaview which was OK, the bathroom though had no fan, so shave first before you shower because it's a Sauna once you shower. The staff which make this Hotel were nice always making conversation and the Pool area was great the restaurants were excellent for breakfast and dinner.
The free water was only one bottle per day very poor and the TV channels were not the best but they were so so,would I recommend this for a stay? just don't think it luxurious its not, it's alright just the room's need upgrading, When I come back to Pattaya I will stay elsewhere probably.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
This hotel is very nice and have good location close to beach and nightlife. But its not too noisy when you want to relax and sleep. And they follow the world-known Hard Rock spirit in this hotel too. You will not miss a thing in this hotel! I have stayed at some other hotels too in Pattaya but no one comes close to Hard Rock Hotel. Every staff member is great and does the special Hard Rock atmosphere! That makes me and my friends are returning to this hotel 4 times in one year. But I will especially give credits and honor to two of this hotel's staff-member that did all our stays awesome and extremely pleasant and funny. It’s goes to Aoffy in EBar and Charlie in The Shack. They do fantastic service and want to do everything to make  sure your stay will be great Rock’n’Roll stay as possible! And they always do it in an excellent way! We feels like super-stars because they personally take care of us! I will never forget our stay on this awesome hotel especially thanks to Aoffy and Charlie, and of course the rest of you...
Only negative thing i can think of is that the hotel is a little bit expensive for food and drinks. But i have to say the food and drinks is close to heaven here! Its worth all the money because you will have great pleasant stay here :-)
Best Regards, Glen M.

We extremely enjoyed our 4 nights  stay in Hotel Hard Rock Pattaya.
All hotel staff was knowledgeable and ever helpful. They made our stay  so comfortable and always made us fee that we are staying in our own house.
keep up the good job. 
many thanks

This hotel is ideally located between Beach Road and Second Road and near enough mid point along Beach Road.  Check-in/out is a little slow but all the staff are friendly attentive and helpful. The buffet breakfast is pretty substantial with a reasonable selection of Western and Asian foods.  The pool is large and there are plenty of sunbeds. The rooms are spacious, modern and clean but the single glazed windows mean you can hear lots from outside, so don't go for a pool/sea view if you want to rest during the day or you go to bed early as there are lots of activities organised and it gets noisy.  I also thought the walls were thin as there was a lot of noise from other rooms compared with many other hotels I've stayed in.  The pizza restaurant was very nice. As much as I enjoyed my stay and the hospitality pf the staff it would not be my first choice as it is more focused on families.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: An awesome property and amazing staff makes this hotel a one to visit. The location, service and food & drinks quality makes this an awesome celebrations place. The Saturday foam parties also add to this property being highly recommended specially if you are travelling in a big group.

Resting in Your hotel with my wife in room 601 from 27.12 at 07.01 inclusive. It's all great. Today I came home, and found that one blouse the couple we bought at the Village Mall - no. Looked everywhere, no. All purchases were placed in the suitcase that stood next to the table, the suitcase was not always closed and I think this caused the temptation. The blouse was thin chiffon, translucent, with rosettes of green leaves, it's a shame to horror and ..... HATE that someone went through our stuff, it's disgusting, the more, we leave a tip constantly. Yes, from our side there is negligence in not closing the suitcase, but here to steal ...... Would we return here now? Question. But otherwise, everything is fine.... But, very unpleasant.

Booked 5 rooms for 4 nights for a family vacation. The location is perfect, the rooms are clean and nicely decorated, and the feel is definitely HardRock. However there were a lot of things that if rectified could have made our stay much better. 
Firstly everything was chargeable including the games rooms & children activities which has been 'free'(included in the hotel price) in all other hotels I have stayed in.
Secondly, most things by the pool were also for charge ie. the zorbs (inflatable ball which you can get in), the floats for people to lounge in the pool, as well as the cabanas which were usually empty besides maybe 2/3 being occupied per day despite the peak period. 
Thirdly, when we brought our own food to the pool (despite being paying hotel guests) the threatened to charge us BHT2000 for consuming our own food! In no other hotel has charged guests for eating their own food by the pool.
Lastly, the WIFI is chargeable but due to rooms not being ready and other circumstances we were given free wifi. However, the wifi signal is very bad and we had trouble connecting to it using all devices (ipad/iphone/samsung/laptop) even once they had added an additional router in some of our rooms so to use the WIFI you had to sit in the lobby, not what is expected at the Hard Rock. 
In order to make the visitor more relaxed during their holiday I would recommend increasing the price of the rooms slightly and make everything within the compound complimentary for paying hotel guests and majorly upgrading the wifi system.
Despite all it was still a good holiday but i feel the little things can go a long way in making vacations more enjoyable.

It took me some time to sit down and write this review, but I owe it to the people there! 
I had a special request for our stay, which didn't really got through to the operating staff - some information might have been forgotten to be forwarded from the sales/reservations department... Well anyways, I went to the reception/concierge to find out where the problem was - and if we can get it for the next day. The staff there was very helpful, and as they didn't had any information about my request, he just asked how he may help me and what he could do for me to make me happy. Simon our hero!!!!! Really! Next day we had a nice surprise in our room :-) Thank you soo much!! He helped us with everything! Calling our taxi driver, organizing a tuk tuk, giving information about van and bus service. And even giving a tissue and cheering me up, when I had an emotional moment when saying goodbye to my boyfriend :-D All the staff was very friendly and helpful - special thanks to Simon (when we're back in Pattaya, we will pass by to say hello and bring something small for you) and the 2 guys at the poolbar - we had a fun time!
Not sure if we will visit the hard rock again for a stay - as the rooms are quite small for the price and location, as you can get better offers where the rooms are bigger and the hotel is closer to the walking street... But we did had a great stay and would recommend the place totaly in service questions. 
One recommendation we have: Please, please, please, put some signs which lead to the reception if you come along from the center (especially by feet) and don't use the main hotel entrance. It took us some minutes and we had to ask a few people to get there as there are no signs....  
Thanks for the great stay! 
Cheers
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: This place is located in a perfect area. Awesome atmosphere, lively and great nightlife. Very clean hotel and staff were extremely friendly and well mannered. We were a group of 4 and booked two double bedrooms. All four of us were extremely happy with the bedrooms, service and food!

Please check your card key again.
On the first day, I tried to get in my room, but it was hard to go up and down because I could not get my card key. I was still able to use it again the next day. Breakfast and swimming pool facilities are good, and we seem to relax well.

Thank you for your kind support my team. We have good experienced for team building.
We are happy to stay at Hard rock, every thing is nice for us.
We will come back again when we have time or activity next time.

The rooms are average and air condition was not well running. Check in time was long - as well check out later on. Crowdy during check out. Breakfast was good as well lunch was very well. Service always very polite and supporting.

It was my wife birthday month, the band members prepare a complimentary cake as I requested. This surprised my wife as she didn't expect it. Great activity at the pool, kid enjoyed it very much. Good Location and breakfast

The staffs were really outstanding, professional & accomodating. The hotel a bit far from attractions but very well maintained & walking distance from popular shopping mall, central festival. Overall we enjoyed our stay at Hard Rock Pattaya. Definitely will stay here again for future trip.

the pool area and gym are very nice.
however my room was not good. it was on the backside of the Hotel, beyond me the technical house and obviously the kitchen. Therefor it was loud day and night and it smelled of food always...
the courtain in the room could not be closed, so it was also not possible to sllep Long, as I wished to do in my holydays. I probably will not come back

It's great. I booked directly with the hotel. I was upgraded room from Deluxe to Rockstar Family Suite. It is incredible experience. My son loved it very much. If I go to Pattaya next time. I certainly choose reserve directly with the hotel. Not only the room, but also activities around the pool. It was fun, exciting. We had a great time in Foam party for kid also. Half of the pool is decorated with the sand on the floor.  My son really like it.  We didn't have to concern whether the real sea is dirty or not. I just put myself and my son in the pool instead.

Every winter we travel to Thailand. Out of all the hotels our favourite is Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya, where we stayed for the 9th time this winter. We love the hotel for its marvelous atmosphere and great animation at the swimming pool, foam parties, superb breakfasts and Saturday dinners with roast suckling pig. This year we were pleasantly surprised by new reconstructed swimming pool and new swimming pool with jacuzzi. At the reception there is a Russian speaking girl Nastya, who is very helpful and can give useful advice. In the evening we recommend to visit Hard Rock Cafe, situated at the territory of the hotel, where you can enjoy life-music.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Having been to Pattaya before and knowing that the beaches are not great, we chose the Hard Rock Hotel for its location. We were not disappointed, nor were the two families we travelled with.  We had two club rooms- which was well-worth paying the extra dollars for. The rooms are clean, very comfortable and the service was impeccable.The pool area is relaxing and very child-friendly.  The staff went out of their way to ensure our three children were having fun. Zorb balls, floating devices and rock-climbing can be used for an additional cost.The breakfast buffet had a good variety and the club drinks and snacks were impressive every night. The only negative thing would be the price of drinks and food by the pool, which explains why not many guests were eating and drinking. Fortunately there is an array of food choices within short walking distance to the hotel. I would definitely stay here again.

This hotel has always been fun. The staff exude the Hard Rock relaxed vibe and the facilities are good.  The pool is in a good location in Pattaya (close to major shopping centers and the beach) but we really like the pool because it offers a ‘normal’ pool plus areas for water games and a sand-bottomed shallow pool which is great for children.  
The rooms are well appointed and only complaint we had this time is the pull-out string laundry line was either broken or had been removed and there was no where in the bathroom or room to hang our bath towels or wet swimmers.  Admittedly this was a really minor problem but we thought is was surprising given the centrality of the pool to the hotel’s life. 
The room prices have always been reasonable at this hotel and we enjoy the breakfast buffet.  The restaurant food is good but you have to accept hotel prices (which is to be expected!). 
We would happily recommend this place to singles, couples or families looking for a place to stay in Pattaya that is not in the ‘mainstream’ hotel style.

We always stay in HardRock Hotel whenever we visit Thailand and it’s always been pleasure to be back but this time the tv wasn’t working in one of the room which was the only minute thing which we didnot work as it was in suite we booked the room. Rest it was great stay on my birthday and with my family.

The best thing about Hard Rock Hotel is that it offers a beautiful view of the sea. You can walk out of the hotel onto the Pattaya beach road and savour all kinds of street food, including the delicious banana pancakes and raw mango! The hotel itself is modern n based on a 'rock' theme, with great service, an excellent lobby, fun activities for children and a bar cum cafe of its own! The food is good too. Hire a Tuktuk from the beach road entrance and go around Pattaya to the Walking street or for a great foot massage!

We were already very often at the Hard Rock Hotel in Pattaya, last from 15 December to 29 December 2014th. 
We got again a very nice room above the King Club, that room was very large and comfortable, every day there was fresh fruit in the room and in the evening something sweet to it.
The staff at the Hard Rock Hotel is very friendly and helpful, especially the ladies at the front desk at the King Club are the best, a big thanks to the staff.
The Hard Rock Hotel is just across the road from the beach, the hotel has a very large swimming pool with plenty of sun loungers, it offered various sports activities. The hotel has a gym and a sauna, and a good massage. In the evening there are different ways to eat from Asia to America food. The Hard Rock Coffee offers concerts and entertainment in the evening.
The Walking Street is easily accessible by taxi 10 baht, in the area there are plenty of Shops and also many options for dining are available, the location of the Hard Rock Hotel is perfect for me.

column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Have been there for new years. The DJ wasn't worth it. (500thb entry for new years)
The DJ just tried to add together some old and new mainstream songs from the charts, but the resulting mix was just horrible.
The drinks are good, the price/performance is another question.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Great Pool
Great Breakfast
Nice rooms
Clean
Quiet
Good.location close to shops
Friendly staff with good English
Only downside is the charge for an inflatable in the pool.  This should be free for hotel guests.

The place was well lightened, decorated and had sumptuous food. The hotel has is on the main road facing the beach front.  It also has a big enough swimming people where people can have fun playing in water volley-ball.

My spouse and i were staying for 2 nights in Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya. We came here mostly to golf and we really had great time. They upgraded us to kings club which have lots benefit facilities like happy hours everyday, non stop food and drinks, unlimited internet connection and super friendly staff (noted to Hard Rock Hotel staff Ann and Ciara), they are very helpful and friendly. The room is huge with nice decoration 'Rock style' with nice sea view. The swimming pool is amazing. every kids will love it. We went to Hard Rock cafe as well to see the band perfomed and not forgetting to bought some of Hard Rock cafe merchandise. Overall, very satisfied with the services and definitely will come back again. Thanks Hard Rock Hotel for rocking our short holiday.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: good location, 1 minute walk to the beach, 10 minutes walk to Central Festival, 20 minutes walk to Big C. Food stores are just next to the hotel. Swimming pool with Water Basket Ball and Slides, great place to relax with kids.

We didn’t get our room cleaned for 48 hrs and when I went to reception to complain at 2215 on the second night someone came to our room to clean at 22:52 at night(have you ever heard something more ridiculous)they rang the door bell which woke up our kids. Then the next morning they rang our doorbell at 08:25 and woke us up. I realise they were trying to make up for not cleaning the room but when it’s a family room you have to take into consideration when the family will be in or sleeping. Very poor on that side of things.

Great hotel, all the year‘s that i‘m stay here.
Lovely stuff and clean facility.
Excellent breakfast and food. The Location is  very close to the center and located on the beach road. I will come again.

Checked in for 5 nights for the Christmas period having stayed before and really enjoyed the hotel. We had a suite room for 3 adults and 1 child, great room size and as always cleaned to the very highest standards. We had a couple of problems this trip, not major but nonetheless the reason I haven't given a 5 rating.... We know check in is 2pm and have no problem with that but on leaving Bangkok we called ahead to see what time the room would be ready, at 10am reception said the room was vacant and we could check in at 12, so we left early and arrived at midday. We made good time on our journey and upon arrival we were then told at check in that the room wasn't ready and the last guests were just checking out! We then had to wait 90 minutes for the room, I wasn't impressed and would have stayed at home and travelled later if we had known. I complained and was asked who we spoke to on reception, unfortunately I didn't take a name. The next problem was the confusion about which room the evening club package would be in, either 9th floor or ground floor, at check in we were told 2 nights would be on the ground floor, went downstairs to be told it was on the 9th floor, another night we thought let's ring reception and ask 5 minutes before leaving the room, he said 9th floor, arrived and then told ground floor again- things lacking in communication or maybe the hotel just so busy and things slipped. My final issue- we booked breakfast with the room and you can choose to eat in the club or at the buffet. We chose the buffet due to the choice and serve yourself, twice my wife went to the buffet to be asked to eat in the club as they were busy, we said no and just waited for the table. The person telling us was abrupt and almost complained that all the club guests were eating at the buffet, hey we paid a premium so can choose either!
Went to the Christmas evening buffet, it was awesome, food great and the atmosphere fantastic....free flow drinks for 3.5 hours and all for around 1400 baht a head- magnificent value for the evening.
Pool here is my favourite and the club package is worth every penny, the staff that work in there know the very best of customer service

The best place where I have just been! Friendly staff, great pool,  clean rooms with a great design, favorite bar with live music. Impressive list of additional services. if you want to have a good rest in the comfort and quality service, the choice is obvious.

Me and my family had a great time with your service. Location and room condition was great, and I was really happy when I visit club lounge, because they were very kind to me and my children. Thank you very much

The service level is high, and the staff is nice and helpful. 
The hotel, though a little worn, is very nice, and perfectly located for beach, shopping, food, drinks and partying. 
I was disappointed to find that there is no delux in a delux room, and that ocean view ment the backside of an old closed hotel and its empty and dirty pool.

We were delighted to stay at Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya. The hotel was highly recommended by one of our good friend and we were glad we chose to stay here in Pattaya. We loved that the beach is so conveniently located - after a swim in the hotel pool (which was a good-sized pool) we walked to the beach to continue swimming. The hotel has a long list of well-maintained facilities that we like such as the sauna room and rock climbing wall. The staff always greet us with a big smile and they have a great sense of humour to make us laugh. A special shout-out to one of the staff Paew who never fail to assist us from arranging our tour to Healthland Spa, Nong Nooch Botanical Garden and Floating Market, to helping us to locate our taxi driver who was supposed to send us back to Bangkok. Thank you for the amazing experience and we look forward to staying in your hotel again next time.
Highlight: Love your selection of latest movies that you provide in the room! The breakfast that you serve is also so delicious and there's a variety of selections. Keep it up!

I stayed for 2 nights recently in this hotel located in convenient yet quiet location on Beach Road number 2 and Main Beach Road.
Hotel has sea facing rooms with a decent balcony over looking the sea.
Reception lobby is very lively with music keeps playing. Restaurant, bar and coffee shop are very nice.
Rooms and bathrooms are decent sized though not really spacious.
Breakfast is nice like in most 4 or 5 star hotels.
Management is very nice and humble.
Unfortunately hotel has a very basic problem depriving guests of decent sleep with poor airconditioning. Though the airconditioning has option to drop the temperature up to 15 degree but I believe the hotel does not switch on all the available airconditioning units therefore temperature remains quite high and guests can not sleep with those thich quilts/blankets on.
If the  problem of airconditioning is taken care of then this could be one of the best choices in Pattaya.
I would not recommend staying in this hotel due to poor quality sleep due to airconditioning.

Very nice hotel with good on-site facilities, located in a very good place, close to Pattaya attractions. Clean rooms, very nice swimming pool, great rock theme around it. I would recommend it to everybody visiting Pattaya.

Had viewed this hotel 2 years ago and thought it would be a nice central place to stay in Pattaya for a months stay! Did not realise that there would be a building site next door. Then to crown it all most of swimming pool closed for about a week whilst they built a stage on it for New Years Eve celebration, and the other half is used for ball games and children's games.  Whilst appreciating it is for New Years Eve  and was not a cheap holiday. Then they have got to disassemble the staging so I expect the pool will be closed for another week!!
There was no mention on booking that the pool would be out of action apart from a small section. We are so disappointed as swimming is a large part of my holiday, and the trip was for a special birthday celebration.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3: Quite, large pool, good and clean Gym. All in central Pattaya. Beautifully decorated and spacious. It was a quality time considering that the length of stay was only few days. Good was also that guests had to register with ID card in order to visit. I would like to stay again at this hotel for 4 weeks in December 2018 or January 2019 and would look forward to receiving a nice offer for a double room with king size bed, but this time with sea vew.

First time. Good experience. 
My shared comments for further improvements as below.
1) Hoping the walk way lightings from elevators to rooms to be brighter.
2) Hoping to see the gym facility to be opened earlier than 7 am ...say 5.30-6 am for folks that enjoying exercise before early breakfast.
3) Looking forward for tighter security in accessing elevators to rooms and ONLY allowing patrons with room card key.

I prepaid for their New Years Eve package for me and my girlfriend. The special event was outdoors with tables spaced far apart due to Covid.  
When we arrived to the event with our prepaid tickets they denied access because we only had a picture of my girlfriends proof of vaccination not an original.  When I purchased the tickets in person they did not mention any of entry requirements.  
What we suspected and later found out to be
True as admitted by one of their staff members is they oversold this event and were looking for technicalities to deny some of their guests entry.  
They had us stand outside the event for nearly 30 minutes while 5 of the staff tried to figure out how to give me a refund.  Once they gave me a receipt for refund we were able to enter their hotel and caffe with no vaccination documents or even a temperature check. 
Luckily my girlfriend d and I found an amazing lounge on the.beach to ring  in 2022 and ended up having the best New Years Eve of my life so I guess I should be thankful to them.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
Everything is perfect in this hotel, good for family vacation too. Pool are very good,we stayed most in the artificial beach. Plenty of activities for kids and adults during the day.  I love the bathroom!!!!!Rooms are spacious and very comfy bed. And very secure, I love the welcome drink! The spa is also very good, espicially their 50% on certian time in the morning.Thats the best massage ever had! 
Was just disappointed with the pizza in the restaurant, also with the food in Hardrock cafe. We always go to Hardrock cafe in every place we go,and surely the one in Pattaya didnt  taste well.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
We have returned to Hard Rock once again (I did a review on January, 30th last year with more details).
My kids really like it and are always asking to return.
For us is a short flight (3 hours) so when we have some short holidays we go there.
When we did the check in they ask if we knew how many times we had been there and I guessed 5, then the lady told us it was our 7th time. So, because we were returning guests, they gave us 2 coupons for 2 drinks at the bar “Soul Lounge”. Well, that was strange… I wasn’t expecting anything but then she says we will have a gift and is the drinks… Really?!
Check in was quite fast and we were given room 731. We went to the room and it had a really nice view but was near the lift so we went back and asked if they had any other room available, away from the lift and they gave us the same room as in Chinese new year, room 726 (guess they checked the records :-)).
My kids went back down very fast to meet the rock agents. The rock agents cannot compliment them enough! I love them all, they are very nice and I will not name any as I may forget some and they don’t deserve to be forgotten, they really make the best of it for the kids. My kids enjoy the games and participate in most of them, they even ask to stay in the swimming pool and eat there to join the activities. My son won a “gold” Hard Rock medal in the spinning boat game and my daughter also won one “gold” Hard Rock medal at Bingo, as well as a 500 baths coupon for the spa. Adults also participate in the games and can win drinks from the pool bar. It is funny but if you want peace and quiet not your place.
On Saturdays afternoon they have a foam party for the kids, and my kids love it. At night is for adults and it finishes quite late.
On Christmas the dinner is not mandatory like in some hotels and this year it was just in the Starzs restaurant. We didn’t eat there but I had the feeling it was not as good as when they had the party near the swimming pool like 2 years ago.
We did join their Saturday dinner buffet, kids eat for free, which is quite good and convenient as my kids were joining a show the rock agents were doing for the kids. They have a lot of food choice and a whole roasted pig and the price was very reasonable.
Well, we will be returning for Chinese New Year and it says all, right?!

My husband was alaways a huge fan of all hard rock hotel he ever stayed (vegas,bali) and pattaya branch certainly add to his fave. The room is small yet cozy,with an exceptional view of the ocean.The breakfast is very delicious....each and every single item superb!Oh,and the bed...ehm...very comfy especially. Thank you hard rock for making our trip memorable.

We booked roxstar suite at 9 floor, because we are 2 adults with 1 big girl 
Room at 9 and 10 floor provide coffee breaks 2 times on suite lounge at 9 floor 
This hotel is more than expectation and recommend in this location, it clean and spacious, connect to the beach (cross the road), nice pool, good fitness, provide Fender Bess for snapshots or trial at room with free of charge, new movies in room, polite staff and activities on Friday-Saturday-Sunday
Walking distance to nightlife walking streets and surround by many restaurant and pubs
I booked by hotel website, after checked with agency website and they aren't offer our room type and agent aren't cheaper than hotel website so(another room type) but hotel website can issue Tax invoices

I only had a few days off, during a business trip to Thailand and wanted to go to the beach, so I reluctantly chose sin city, in Pattaya to visit.  The Hard Rock is an excellent family hotel - meaning no overt hookers running around - and the hotel is lovely.  The rooms are large, well maintained and comfortable.  The WIFi works wonderfully, something which is often not the case in Thailand, and the beds are comfortable.  The swimming pool is outstanding.  The staff are friendly.  My only criticism, and it is minor, is the breakfast buffet is very bland, although there is a wide range of foods both Asian and American served.

It was great ! We came very earlier from airport .But Sofia made her best to find a ready room for us  . Thanks so much . In evening cocktails Sandy was so good. Pavel from reception always helpful  and kind ,so pleasant to meet  Russian stuff  wen traveling .

Usually when I stay in Pattaya my budget is 100 AUD a night (70 USD). This time, as I was staying at the end of a long trip, I thought I would pay a little bit more as I saw an Agoda add for this hotel for 125 AUD. However  Agoda charged me in USD and added a "booking fee" the effect of which was I paid approximately double the advertised amount. Ok so not off to a good start
 This is not the hotel's fault I guess but it put a very bad taste in my mouth to be ripped off before even arriving.
The room was of a good standard as you would expect from an internationally branded 4 star hotel. However it was not designed very well to take advantage of the location (beach front) as the beach facing window was tiny.
The pool is large and has a kids section. Love bands playing by the beach is a nice touch and in keeping with the rock theme of the hotel except a but much late at night.
Brekafast selection was slightly below par for a hotel of this size.
Staff all friendly and helpful. I was very impressed by a waitress who remembered my coffee order from the previous day. It's nice to be recognised. Also I requested a 2pm check out. Whilst the hotel could not offer that, they did permit me to use the pool and change rooms yes after check out which I really appreciated.
The beach front location is good and there are things all around. The main night life area is a bit of a walk or you can get on a songteew (open converted truck) for 10 bhat. Main shopping malls also a hike but again the 10 bhat songteew prevails.
Had I paid the advertised price I would have been very happy over all. As I paid double(ish) I am less happy about the experience.

the shower room water power was not so enough
the breakfast was good but hoping for more variety , that will be the best.
reception table stuff are really nice and friendly, along with the welcome drink and towel. too bad they were too busy with other customer so i can only get them when checking in

Excellent service in reception and resturant. Nice location and close to shopping malls and Beach. A good veraiety on the breakfast Choice. I will recommend this holel to my friends for definit. The atmosfer was very frendly.

They don't play any hard rock at this place. It should be called the middle of the road pop cafe. 
Actually it's not even a cafe. 
It's a bit pricey but the burgers are good and the staff speak excellent English.

Overall is good and enjoyable stay especially travel with my 2 kids. 'Playground in swimming pool' what my kids said :) 
The pool really make our days great. There were 10% for hotel guess who dine in buffet dinner.
Great arrangement and reserved a parking lot for me when i requested during the hotel reservation.
My only concern on the room, although i booked the room of sea view, but not really can see the view of sea and even the pool view as well. 3rd floor room was given, only see the tree but not sea view.
Overall are still good and enjoy! Great job from Hard rock team.

Great Location and overall a lovely Hotel. The corridors are very dark but the rooms themselves are modern and clean. The shower is a large wet room. Many of the rooms do not have a balcony and we upgraded 12 pounds a night to have one. 
The pool is fabulous and there was entertainment during the day with  water polo and basket ball. There was good music played all day and I loved the pool bar. However drinks are expensive.
Food was good but again for me too expensive so we went out to eat. Jasmine's on the next street was fabulous.
The Hotel is family orientated and couples. However there were also single men staying at this Hotel. I witnessed on a daily basis men brining  prostitutes to sit with them around the pool for their own entertainment and touching these girls inappropriately in front of everyone. While other paying guests could not get a sunbed!
The Hotel lifts have a sign that says Hotel guests only but security did nothing about it.
I paid a lot of money to stay in a decent Hotel as I was aware of what the Bars in Pattaya  are like and I though the Hotel would have rules regarding bringing prostitutes into the Hotel. Although there is security at the Hotel, you are never asked if you are a Guest at the Hotel or not. This was my biggest disappointment and I feel I should not have to witness such behaviour around the pool on a daily basis.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I’ve reviewed this hotel before for the kids’ suite and after that I’ve been there a few more times. I know in total we’ve been there more than 10 times.
When we arrive we are always greeted with a smile and a “Welcome home” and the concierge will help to take the luggage from the taxi and take to our room. Reception staff already knows us and all are very nice, friendly and helpful.
My kids love this hotel and the rock agents working here. When we arrive, they will go to look for the agents around the pool. There are some activities around the pool or in the pool every day, usually in the afternoon. There are more activities during the weekend than on week days. My 10 years old daughter loves the activities around the pool, especially the pool party on Saturday afternoon. My son is a teenager now and doesn’t appreciate it that much but still likes to play water basketball and water polo.
We need two rooms and always request connected rooms, one room with 2 queen beds and another with a king bed. This time we had also two connecting rooms (724 & 723), one of them with a balcony looking to the sea where I spent the end of the day reading and appreciating the sunset. The room (723) is a bit smaller because of the balcony but I loved it! On Saturday nights it is the pool party and it gets a little noisy in this room but it was still ok for me.
The hotel is just across the beach and at walking distance to 3D Art Paradise (3D Museum), Central Festival Shopping Center, Ripley’s Believe it or Not and some markets. To go to Walking Street you can take one songthaew, the tuk-tuk - open trucks with two rows of seats, it is only 10 bath per person.
Breakfast buffet is nice with a variety of tasty food, a noodle station, an egg station, salads, hot food, cereals, fresh fruits, yogurts, pancakes, waffles, French toast...
We had access to Kings Club but never have breakfast there as kids prefer the variety downstairs and the noodle station. We like to go to the Club at the end of the day for a drink and a snack before heading out for dinner. Staff at Kings Club is all very attentive and nice and nothing that we request is too much.
The pool is big and has different areas, from a sandy part where water is not deep to a deeper area and a kid’s pool. In the sandy area there are slides for the kids. There’s also a bar, a basketball area (in the pool) and a lot of pool chairs around the pool. We like to stay by the pool relaxing and some of the days we didn’t went out, just had lunch by the pool, and then participate in the activities that Sax presented so cheerfully. He makes things funnier and calls most of the guests by their name. 
On Saturday nights, there’s the Kids Rock Show in which kids can perform (my daughter loves it!). There’s also a show that Quest’s team will put on with the team of Hard Rock agents (Sax, Moose, Quito, and Billy).
Wifi is free and very good and there are different TV channels to choose from, as well as free movies that my kids loved.
Wait for us, we will be back!
the staff were very friendly, lots of pool activities, great location, would stay there again.
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
The hotel rooms need to be refurnish as the toilet and balcony looks in a wore out condition.
Water pressure from the shower was rather small.
Check in was rather smooth, the guys assisted to bring the luggage to the rooms.

Conveniently located on beach front near soi 6 where there are many bar. Big parking for car or rented motorbike
Service very kind
Very big swimming pool with many childrens
Rooms are big and bathroom too.
Our room have fantastic scenic view on the sea
column8: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

column3:
I have been in this twice during late Nov and beg Dec.
I experienced in Deluxe Room with Seaview and Family with City View.
Swimming Pools, Pool Staff, Party Foam for Kids on Sat, and Kids Club are keys to bring my kids coming back here.  I plan to bring them to have seafood dinner.  At the end, 7-11 was my destination to buy 7-11 foods to my kids cos' they love staying in the rooms.  Family Rooms seems so impressive....my kids love it

Was there for only a night. Executive room with lounge access was probably the best decision we made. The lounge offers variety of food and drink per hour. Service at the lounge was excellent too. Very professional, if I have a chance to go to Pattaya again, this hotel will be on my list for the next trip

It is an amazing hotel. Located on sea shore . My room was on 14th floor overseeing the great sea. Rooms are excellent , best for romance .  Breakfast and dinner were superb. Staff is very hospitable .  Lovely and large swimming  pools. Music has been extraordinary.

You will never go wrong staying at any Hard Rock Hotel! Yes, prices a little on the high side but you get Safety and Service for your hard earned money.
Security checks on vehicles at the main entrance, bag checks at the side entrance, a little inconvenience but a way lot safer.
Was served by a Chinese guy named "Boy" at the front reception for check in, always had a smile for us, always ready to answer our queries! Haha, he even volunteer to send our luggage's to the rooms, login Wifi to our devices, show us around the room! Great Service.
Rooms were of international 5 star standards, said not me but my teenager girl and 10 year old son! Comfy bedding, latest Awesome Video On Demand Cinema on our TV, cool cool airconditioning to escape the sweltering Pattaya heat, clean dust-free carpeted room (hey housekeepers always greeted and smile at us too! Maybe coz we always had "do not disturb" tag on, haha), shower with great temperature and water force, top notch quality toiletries provided.
Had meals at their value for money BBQ Buffet Dinner, meat and seafood (sad no Oysters though, haha) galore! Daily Breakfast was a great great spread and menu differs slightly daily for my 3 nights stay, special mention to another staff " MAM " who greeted us by our names and always gave us the seats we liked, always smiling always accommodating!
Swimming pool had a sand section! WAAAAA, sand in fresh water pool! How cool is that! Too bad there are no fishes swimming in them only haha.
